product_description:
Strip back your styling regime with the Shu Uemura Blow Dry Beautifier for Thick Hair; a multi-tasking, leave-in treatment that delivers five benefits without weighing hair down.
The first BB treatment for hair utilises SRS Microwaxes and Amino Acid Reactive Silicon – microscopic wax particles that melt when activated by heat to create flexible bonds between hair fibres – helping to prime and smooth each strand for sleek, polished results.
Fortified with antioxidant-rich Ginkgo Biloba extract, the creamy formula weightlessly coats hair, protecting against heat damage as well as free radical damage. Perfect for shaping and reshaping styles in-between washes, it hydrates and replenishes for hair that looks supple and revitalised without that heavy product feel. Use pre-blow dry for flawless, barely-there results.
name: Uemura Art of Hair Blow Dry Beautifier for Thick Hair 150ml

product_description:
Kérastase's Resistance Bain Force Architecte 是有重建、重新均衡和修护作用的洗发水，可用于重建脆弱、受损的发质，增加强度。
这款洗发水中含有创新的Ciment-Cylane3复合物，有效地加强了头发纤维，使您的发丝有更好的强度和镜面般的光泽。 装在泵压式瓶中便于取用。
name: Resistance Bain Force Architecte (500ml)

product_description:
旨在保护您敏感性或染过色的头发，防止毛躁和防湿长达72个小时，Kérastase Discipline Bain Fluidealiste Sulfur Free 会温和地清洁并除去杂质，而亲角蛋白配方将恢复并重新建立了头发的完整性。
富含氨基酸，小麦蛋白衍生物和神经酰胺ř富集，它平滑和强化头发，同时建立一个均匀表面和疏水层以保护头发免于受湿。 您的秀发将会自然飘逸、质地柔软而无毛躁。 不含硫酸的配方是用于染发或敏感头发的理想之选。 - L.M.
name: Discipline Bain Fluidealiste (250ml)

product_description:
卡诗热能活力乳 (150 毫升)采用自身的活性功能修复并保护秀发。 这款畅销的免洗乳液含有该品牌的招牌配方Vita-Ciment® Topseal，能够从内到外地强韧并重塑秀发，同时还能修复头发外层，形成保护表层。
从热量触及秀发那一刻起就开始提供保护，热力造型不再有伤害，只会带来光滑善良的妆效，塑造外观和触感都更健康的发辫。 卡诗研究证明，热能活力乳能够缩短一半的吹干时间，从而为用户减少达 87% 的断发量。 - K.R
name: 毫升）

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Discipline Bain Shampoo，顺滑和护理易于毛躁的发丝。这是一种轻盈配方，专用于清洁秀发，同时防止潮湿。
这款洗发水利用了 Morpho-Keratine Technology 技术和高精度的护理剂，可温和地去除杂质，而不会让秀发下垂，并恢复内在弹性，同时打理外部头发纤维，促进生成顺滑、健康的发丝。 得益于其创新的表面焕彩成分，秀发手感柔软、顺滑。 可再现轻盈顺滑的发丝。 非常适合于敏感型或染过色的头发。
name: Discipline Bain Shampoo (500ml)

product_description:
修復受損髮梢。適合長發，根據頭髮受損程度不同，這款雙重強化護髮素可以一定程度的從內部修復和保護頭髮。同時，重塑外部保護層，使頭髮免受吹風機的使用與外界因素侵害。 
天然蛋白質與Vita-Topseal的融合使髮絲更加柔軟，健康，強韌。 
 使用說明:
name: 卡诗双重强化护发素（200ml）

product_description:
Restore body and fullness back into thin, lifeless hair with Kérastase Densifique Bain Densité Shampoo, a bodifying formula specially developed to treat hair that lacks visible density.
Fortified with Stemoxydine, an innovative, densifying molecule, the volumising shampoo gently cleanses away impurities whilst promoting fuller, thicker-looking locks. Its dose of Hyaluronic Acid plumps up the hair fibre to emphasise body and bounce, creating a denser appearance. Hair is left lustrous and revitalised with enhanced texture, fullness and resilience.
name: Densifique Bain Densité Shampoo 500ml

product_description:
用卡诗的Elixir Ultime 护发油 呵护您的秀发。这款具有无尽优势的多用途发油能够护理、保护和强韧您的秀发。
这款发油富含阿甘油和玉米油等多种珍贵油类，适合所有发质，能够深层滋养并抑制毛躁，同时提亮发色并减少分叉。 吹干前后均可使用，全天均可保持神清气爽。 另有热损伤防护和防水性能。 秀发更光亮、更有弹性。 - K.N.
name: Elixir Ultime 护发油（100 毫升）

product_description:
Kérastase Resistance Therapiste Serum 能转变损伤严重和过度处理的头发，使其护理良好，恢复滋润和健康。 本产品非常适合于稠密、杂乱的头发，可作为修护霜和保水精华液，重塑发质并改善其结构。
精华液含有氨基酸及其独特的 FIBRA-KAP™ 配方，提供可达 230℃ 的过热保护，以防止开叉，在最大程度上减少断裂，并缩短干燥时间，让您可以体验到如丝绸般柔软的发丝。 E.N.
name: Resistance Therapiste Serum (30ml)

product_description: Kérastase 卡诗贝恩重建结构洗发水 250 ml　是一款　L’Oreal　欧莱雅适用于脆弱、易受损伤或严重损伤的秀发和分叉秀发的洗发水。 用作日常洗发水可强韧和重建发丝结构，让秀发更加柔软、顺滑、强健而焕发活力。 Kérastase 卡诗贝恩重建结构洗发水蕴含有复合物　Ciment-Cylane，它是　Intra-Cylane 立体构建分子、神经酰胺 R 和专业蛋白的混合物，可有效调节和强韧发丝。
name: 卡诗贝恩重建结构洗发水（250ml）

product_description:
Soften your hair and acheive maximum shine. Protecting highlighted or sensitised coloured hair from damage and fading to ensure your hair remains perfect for as long as possible.
Aqua-Ionic System fills the hair fibre with an active emollient mix of ingredients and shine enriching combinations. Creating a hydrophoib film around the fibre of your hair protects the moisture level in the fibre and locks out humidity to help fight against frizz.
A UV Filter and mix of Vitamin E limits damage caused by free radicals and protects your hair's colour from photo-oxidation.
name: Reflection Bain Chroma Riche 250ml

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Specifique Bain Divalent Shampoo，呵护油性发根和干性发梢。 这种配方可深层净化，旨在去除多余皮脂，同时清洁头皮，是油性、受损、毛燥发质的理想解决方案。
本品富含 Glycine® 和维生素 B6，旨在从发根重新平衡水分，修复脱水、受损的纤维，令秀发轻盈柔软。 不含有机硅，可呈现亮泽、充满活力的发丝。
name: Specifique Bain Divalent Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
在做热力造型之前采用卡诗 Nutritive Nectar Thermique为秀发打底，这款免洗高温保护护理产品能够阻隔热量，顺滑秀发。

这款滋养乳液配方富含  Iris Royal 复合成分，为发丝蒙上一层面纱，做好洗剪吹和热力造型的准备。 它的护理性复合成分能够舒缓粗糙的发丝、暗沉的头发，并重整发丝表面，强韧发丝，令其散发耀眼光芒。 秀发更易梳理和进行洗剪吹。

适合干性和严重干性发质。
name: Nutritive Nectar Thermique 150 毫升

product_description: 使用Kerastase Discipline Fondant Fluidealiste保护头发，防毛躁和防潮，让您的秀发柔软、顺滑。 配方中含有氨基酸（一种小麦蛋白衍生物）和神经酰胺R，它会顺滑和强化头发，而亲角蛋白成分则将恢复头发的完整性。 创建一个平整的表面区域，它会让您的秀发拥有一个柔软、无毛躁的妆效。 - L.M.
name: Discipline Fondant Fluidealiste (200ml)

product_description: Kérastase Resistance Therapiste Masque 是一款黄油质地的发膜，能够深入渗透发丝，恢复秀发强韧并增加弹性。 这款轻盈的发膜适合浓密、极度受损和染烫过度的发质，能够醒活发束并锁住水分，让您体验如丝般光滑的滋润发丝。 其 FIBRA-KAP™ 配方富含六种氨基酸，能够补充蛋白质，促进形成强韧健康的秀发。 E.N.
name: Resistance Therapiste Masque (200ml)

product_description:
卡诗Chronologiste Duo是专门用于改变秀发暗淡干枯问题的两件套护理产品。 独特的先进配方提供修复秀发所必需的营养物质和水分，让秀发感觉如丝般柔滑。 K.N.
卡诗 Chronologiste 鱼子酱再生洗发水 (250 毫升)
卡诗鱼子酱再生洗发水是一种含有维生素  A 和 E 的浓缩护理配方，能够清洁秀发并从上到下重赋秀发活力，让秀发重获新生。 完全适合所有发型，洗发水在去除杂质头皮的同时，采用"Abyssine"（一种再生分子）强化头发纤维并让秀发光亮可鉴。 保护秀发免受外界侵害，帮助保持发色均匀。 让秀发重获新生，呈现健康外观和强韧触感。
使用指南： 取少量涂抹于湿发并按摩，揉出泡沫后冲洗干净。
卡诗 Chronologiste 鱼子酱再生发膜 (200毫升)
这款焕彩发膜采用丰富的配方结合天然衍生成分，能够调节并软化发质，呵护您的秀发。 这种丰富的配方呈金色，散发明亮光泽，能够为秀发增添光彩、弹力和质感，打造健康诱人的发丝。 体验其奢华质感并见证焕彩净化效果。
使用指南： 洗净并以擦干秀发后，涂抹Chronologiste 鱼子酱再生洗发水。 从发根到发梢按摩秀发。停留 5-10分钟。 乳化后冲洗干净。
name: Chronologiste 鱼子酱再生洗发水和发膜两件套

product_description:
使用Kérastase Densifique Conditioner来滋养您的秀发，该滋养配方可以改善秀发的丰盈程度，同时不会带来任何沉重感。
此款清凉型护发素具有补水的作用，含有透明质酸和Intra-Cylane。该产品可以有效滋润整体的秀发，可以改善丰盈和韧性。 秀发会更为丰盈、轻盈并具有层次感。
name: Densifique Conditioner（200ml）

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Specifique Dermo-Calm Bain Vital Shampoo，舒缓敏感的头皮；这是一种富含植物提取物的创新配方，有助于清除秀发上的杂质和油脂，同时舒缓因干燥引起的不适。
本品具备低过敏性，不含有机硅，融合了抚慰人心的海棠籽油和甘油，旨在修复肌肤并形成保护屏障。 这款温和洗发水含有清爽的薄荷提取物，令发丝轻盈亮泽，并减少瘙痒感和敏感。
name: Specifique Dermo-Calm Bain Vital Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
卡诗 Chronologiste Revitalizing Bain 洗发水 是一款浓缩护理配方，结合维他命 A 和 E，从上至下清洁并醒活秀发，让缺乏光子的发丝重赋活力。 完全适合所有发质，洗发水在去除头皮杂质的同时，采用"Abyssine"（一种再生分子）强韧头发纤维并让秀发光亮可鉴。
保护秀发免受外界侵害，帮助保持发色均匀。 让秀发重获新生，呈现健康外观和强韧触感。 - K.N.
name: Chronologiste Revitalizing Bain 洗发水 (250 毫升)

product_description:
这款 Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力洗发水是一款乳质洗发水，其设计旨在赋予秀发蓬松而丰盈的发量。 这款洗发水可从发根丰盈秀发，让您尽享沙龙级的光泽度，它甚至能改善长发的纹理结构层次，实现持久定型。
它非常适合纤细的发质，其阳离子聚合物技术可有针对性地改善发丝脆弱的部位，有效粗健发丝，赋予秀发轻盈亮丽的光泽。 其创新的配方可从发丝内部改善发质，强化发丝结构，令您的缕缕秀发实现持久定型，让您每天都能尽享极致闪亮的秀发。 K.D.
name: Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力洗发水（250ml）

product_description: Kérastase 浓密滋润洗发水非常适合细发或稀疏的秀发，采用温和配方，让秀发看起来更浓密，不易受损。 富含最先进的浓发分子 Stemoxydine®，另外还添加了透明质酸，使头发纤维变得更丰盈，让您拥有蓬松浓密、充满弹性的秀发。 秀发将变得更有光泽，散发活力。 - L.M.
name: 浓密滋润洗发水（250ml）

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Reflection Chroma Captive Fondant Conditioner 卡诗绽光锁色护发素，呵护染过色的头发；这是一种提亮配方，旨在滋养、滋润和保护发丝。
这款护发素的 SYSTEME CAPTURE™ 技术融合了亚麻籽油、维生素 E 和紫外线光滤剂，有助于保护色彩深度和活力，同时从发根至发梢顺滑所有发束，令秀发丰盈柔软并得到专业调理。 保护色彩整体性并增强光泽。

卡诗滋养恒护系列洗发水 2 号  采用创新配方，专门针对干燥和敏感发质。
这种洗发水含有皇家鸢尾滋养秘方和葡萄糖蛋白，既能清洗头发，又能从发根到发梢补充纤维，以使缕缕头发手感超级柔韧，并使头发更有光泽。 会防止长发重新变干。
 
适合非常干燥和敏感的发质。
name: 2 号（250ml）

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗重建结构发膜让您干燥脆弱的秀发恢复健康而富有活力。 这款发膜采用营养丰富的配方，其特殊配方旨在重建需要少量 TLC 发丝的结构，让您的缕缕秀发更加顺滑柔软。其强健发丝配方可有针对性地调节极其干燥和受损的发丝，以塑造缕缕秀发，使其拥有最佳状态，为发丝注入活力，让秀发焕然一新。
使用说明：
name: 卡诗重建结构发膜（200ml）

product_description: Grow Gorgeous 頭髮增厚精華使頭髮更加濃密，加強版比普通版增加了40%的有效成分，刺激頭皮和頭髮，使頭髮更健康，在沒有副作用的情況下保護頭髮受外界的傷害。 產品其中有穩定的二氫槲皮素－糖苷複合物，精華中含氨基乙酸和鋅，使頭髮更加強韌，獨特的水溶性的咖啡因配方在短時間內減少頭髮脫落的情況。 產品所含的乙酰四肽-3和三葉草花活性萃取，使用四個月內頭髮的密度能增加13%。豌豆芽活性精華可在三個月內促進秀發增長78%。同時還含有透明質酸，幫助頭皮的保濕和吸收，讓秀發更豐盈健康。 此產品只在特定區域稱為頭髮增厚精華，其配方與其他區域一致 。
name: Gorgeous－头发增厚精华加强版

product_description:
卡诗抗干凝养发膜是一款能够呵护秀发的修复发膜，能够滋养并软化干枯的浓密发丝。
这款密集滋养配方利用 4600 PPM Irisome 复合成分和安息香树脂技术，能够满足秀发需求；它的均衡和保护功能有助于平滑和软化每股发丝，改善梳理，减少打结，并激发光亮的秀发。
name: 200 毫升

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗发尾修复精华液是一款舒缓精华，可有效调节纤细干燥、毛躁和难以梳理的秀发。 其软化配方可让您的秀发拥有如丝般顺滑，拥有让人难以置信的光泽，使秀发更易于梳理。
Kérastase 卡诗发尾修复精华采用营养油复合物配方和抗毛躁护发配方，具有顺滑秀发的功能，可为干燥、毛躁和难以梳理的秀发补充营养。 使秀发更加柔软，具备持久的丰盈与定型功能。
使用说明：
name: 卡诗发尾修复精华（125ml）

product_description: 如果您的染金秀发中出现烦人的黄铜杂色，本品能帮您排忧解难。 这款调色洗发水能有效去除秀发中的泛黄杂色，还原您所钟爱的金灿发色， 同时还能滋润、焕活并彻底洗净您的秀发。 -SA
name: Clean Blonde Violet Shampoo (1000ml)

product_description:
这款微散射抗紫外线护发液具有防晒抗光学退化作用，可有效保护经过染发处理的秀发，具备中低等致敏度。
得益于矿物油和具有持久亮发功能聚合物的混合物，这款护发液能够软化、丰盈和顺滑发丝，让您的秀发拥有自然亮丽的光泽。
name: 卡诗防晒护发液（125ml）

product_description:
Kérastase Nutritive Lait Vital是一种具有滋养作用的护发素，经过特别调制，特别适合普通和较干的发质使用。
这款护发素采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，蕴含有葡萄糖蛋白，可从发根到发梢补充纤维；具有顺发和软化的作用，让您的缕缕秀发拥有如丝般的顺滑与丰盈，增强秀发的光泽度。 会防止长发重新变干。

适合正常发质至稍微干燥的秀发使用。
name: Nutritive Lait Vital 200ml

product_description: Nourish and clean particularly dry hair with Kérastase Nutritive Bain Satin 2 Shampoo. The formula complements hair’s natural oil and cleans gently, ideal for sensitised hair. The shampoo is able to moisturise dry hair and condition from root to tip, providing a nourished feel to the fibre and increasing softness and easing detangling.
name: Nutritive Bain Satin 2 Shampoo 500ml

product_description: Christophe Robin 海鹽舒緩頭皮潔淨霜(250 ml) 清潔敏感頭皮，有效排毒。這款舒緩潔淨霜平衡頭皮油脂，有助於在染髮後清除刺激性染髮殘留物，緩解刺痛和皮膚發癢。配方蘊含具有天然去死皮作用的海鹽，促進微循環，提供長效保濕。 - LM
name: Robin 海盐舒缓头皮洁净霜 (250 ml)

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Chronologiste Revitalizing Exfoliating Care，呵护秀发与头皮。这是护理发丝的预备步骤，融合了微粒子与天然衍生源成分的共混物，以清洁和净化头皮和秀发。
这款丰富的配方散发金色的透亮光泽，能够温和按摩并去除头发的角质，同时防止任何发丝积聚灰尘和污垢。 赋予一系列丰盈质感。 体验其奢华质感并见证焕彩净化效果。 - K.N
name: Chronologiste Revitalizing Exfoliating Care (200ml)

product_description:
卡诗吹烫顺滑修护乳（150 毫升）重塑发丝表面并保护秀发，帮助驯服凌乱发丝。 这款免洗护发品能够顺滑每一缕秀发，预防潮湿影响，同时形成防护性外层，将活性成分封入发丝，充分发挥修复作用。
提供热力造型保护，让秀发具有光滑的外观和手感，不再毛躁。 卡诗研究证明，热能活力乳能够缩短一半的吹干时间，从而为用户减少达 87% 的断发量。 - K.R
name: 毫升）

product_description: 如果您的染金秀发中出现烦人的黄铜杂色，本品能帮您排忧解难。 这款调色洗发水能有效去除秀发中的泛黄杂色，还原您所钟爱的金灿发色， 同时还能滋润、焕活并彻底洗净您的秀发。 -SA
name: Clean Blonde Violet Shampoo (300ml)

product_description:
卡诗Nutritive Masquintense CHEVEUX Epais滋养护理系列深度修护发膜 采用特殊配方，强烈滋养厚密、干燥头发。
配方中加入虹膜合成物和葡萄糖蛋成分，从根部到发尖补充头发纤维，锁定水分因子，同时提供深入到头发纤维的核心的营养，恢复秀发丝般柔顺和光泽。 会防止长发重新变干。
 
适合浓密、干燥或敏感的发质。
name: Masquintense CHEVEUX Epais滋养护理系列深度修护发膜（适用浓密发质）200ml

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Specifique Bain Prévention Shampoo，为柔软、缺乏光泽的发丝恢复活力。 这款洗发水经专门配制用于提升秀发体量，拥有先进的护发技术，可温和清洁秀发，同时提升丰盈度。
Système Pro-Actif 是一个具有针对性的三步流程：清除污垢和多余的油脂，令头皮舒缓，然后护理产品可刺激微循环。 所有头发纤维都得到滋养并获得出众质感，而稀疏的头发可即刻变得更浓密，拥有健康光泽。
name: Specifique Bain Prévention Shampoo 250ml

product_description: 卡诗推出 理想奥莱奥卷发调理霜 ；免洗配方，致力于顺滑、软化和打理不羁的卷发。 卷发霜使用创新亲角质蛋白和和弹性复合配方，增加发丝柔软度和发梢强度，而减少头发干燥和分叉，控制头发卷曲程度。
用Kérastase Discipline Maskeratine Treat您的头发，获得深层滋养并提供持久的保护，以防毛躁和湿度 旨在增加您头发的流动性和可打理性，它拥有一个亲角蛋白配方，可恢复头发的完整性。 这款奢华的面膜营养成分丰富，可由内而外修复头发，创建一个光滑的头发表面区域，更便于掌控和造型。 - L.M.
name: Discipline Maskeratine (200ml)

product_description:
Grow Gorgeous 頭髮增厚精華讓您擁有更長、更濃密、更豐盈的秀發，尊享豐盈活力。蘊含21.5%的活性配方，含有7種先進科技使頭髮再生，此款高濃縮頭髮增厚精華可促進改善髮質，明顯增加發量，解決發量減少的困擾。
配方包含8 ％乙酰四肽- 3和三葉草花活性萃取，可在八天內明顯改善頭髮的長度；使用四個月內頭髮的密度能增加13%，約增加13,000根​​頭髮。
含有8 ％的豌豆芽活性精華，5%的中國黃芩活性精華以及大麥精華等，可在三個月內促進秀發增長78%。同時還含有0.5 ％透明質酸，幫助頭皮的保濕和吸收，讓秀發更豐盈健康。
此產品只在特定區域稱為頭髮增厚精華，其配方與其他區域一致。
name: Gorgeous 头发增厚精华液(60ml)

product_description:
Treat your coloured-hair to Kérastase Reflection Bain Chromatique Shampoo, a colour-reviving formula specially developed to cleanse and revitalise colour-treated hair.
Gently cleansing away impurities whilst protecting colour, the nourishing shampoo utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasise light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant with enhanced shine.
Expect vivid colour and light-reflecting shine, for longer.
name: Reflection Bain Chromatique Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
使用Huile Lavante Bain 使暗沉无关和受损的头发恢复活力和健康的亮泽。 这款发膜注入了珍贵的精油，其所含的丰富营养和精油成分可为秀发补充养分并滋润头发，使之呈现奢华的亮泽和健康的光采。
Kerastase结合这些珍贵的精油和保湿精华液，让您的头发尽显无与伦比的柔软。 有了额外的营养脂质化合物，您的头发将会补充养分，具有异常柔软的触感。
这款特殊的配方有助于修护没有生机、干燥和受损的头发，您的头发会感觉轻盈和重焕活力，不会油腻。 把精油的神奇功效提升至一个新的层面，这款Elixir Ultime Masque会给您一个独特、个性张扬的沙龙体验。
使用说明：
name: (200 毫升):

product_description: 卡诗Discipline Fluidissime喷雾（150ml）中是一个多功能的免洗产品，它可以保护您的头发免受热损伤，增加光泽、柔软度和飘逸感，让您的秀发更有光泽、充满活力。 它拥有亲角蛋白配方，这也将有助于强化和修复您的头发，同时防止毛躁和防湿。 - L.M.
name: Discipline Fluidissime 喷雾 (150ml)

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Chronologiste Essential Balm Treatment，令缺乏光泽的发丝再生。这是一款豪华发膜，融合了天然衍生成分，令秀发焕发生机，得到调理并获得令人羡慕的弹性。
这款发膜融合了维生素 A 和 E、海源进化成分和神经酰胺，能够强韧秀发纤维，令其重获活力，同时让秀发柔软、光亮可鉴，效果令人难以置信。 实现超柔软、完美调理的秀发。 - K.N
name: Chronologiste Essential Balm Treatment (200ml)

product_description:
Revive dull, lack lustre hair with Kérastase Aura Botanica Bain Micellaire Shampoo, a gentle, aromatic formula from the brand's natural haircare collection.
Utilising 96% natural origin ingredients, including responsibly sourced Samoan Coconut Oil and Moroccan Argan Oils, the nourishing micellar shampoo gently yet effectively cleanses away dirt and impurities; it transforms into an airy lather and is naturally coloured by caramel pigments. 
Infused with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, the shampoo will expertly cleanse tresses whilst imparting an aromatic scent. Hair is protected against frizz and looks nourished, three times shinier and re-energised.
name: Aura Botanica Bain Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Revive dull, lack lustre hair with Kérastase Aura Botanica Soin Fondamental Conditioner, a lightweight, deep conditioning treatment from the brand's natural haircare collection.
Delivering weightless nutrition and frizz-fighting benefits, the creamy formula melts effortlessly into the hair fibre, imparting a medley of certified organic Coconut and Argan Oils to expertly nourish, moisturise and detangle to promote stronger, shinier and healthy-looking hair. Richer than a conditioner but lighter than a hair masque, the revitalising formula will re-energise lifeless locks and delicately perfume with its aromatic fragrance.
name: Aura Botanica Soin Fondamental Conditioner 200ml

product_description: 使用 Kérastase Reflection Bain Chroma Captive Shampoo，令秀发感觉令人难以置信的清洁和顺滑。 这款洗发水适合所有发质，含有维生素 E 和紫外线光滤剂，保护秀发免受抗氧化侵害因素的损伤并防止过早褪色。 此外还融合了亚麻籽油，用于保护发色强度，赋予秀发迷人亮泽。
name: Reflection Bain Chroma Captive Shampoo 500ml

product_description:
Kérastase 男士浓密滋润洗发水是一款专为男性配制的日常洗发水，能有效清洁秀发，使其重现活力，消除稀疏发质的脱发困扰。
这款洗发水采用生物素和增稠聚合物，能有效去除污垢，并具有让发丝变粗的功效；它可以让头皮变得清爽复活，长期使用可让秀发变得更浓密。
秀发感觉更干净清爽，更丰盈蓬松。
name: 男士浓密滋润洗发水（250ml）

product_description: Kérastase Resistance Therapiste Bain 是一款具有独特的啫喱状质地的洗发水，能够改善柔软、缺乏活力的头发。 采用创新 FIBRA-KAP™ 配方专门配制而成，富含角蛋白相关蛋白质 (KAP)，能够修复头发纤维和内在结构，展现健康滋润的发丝。 包裹每一根发丝，让分叉易断的发束重获新生，增加秀发强度，从而保护秀发免于再受损伤。 E.N.
name: Resistance Therapiste Bain Shampoo (250ml)

product_description:
Meet the needs of colour-treated hair with the Pureology Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner Duo; a convenient set that is ideal for daily use. Developed specifically for coloured hair, the shampoo and conditioner are ultra-hydrating, leaving locks visibly healthy, vibrant and well cared for.
Hydrate Shampoo (250ml)
Gently cleanse hair without stripping colour using the Hydrate Shampoo; an organic moisturising formula developed specifically to hydrate dry, colour-treated hair. Revealing soft, lustrous locks whilst protecting colour vibrancy, the cleanser is derived from Coconut, Corn and Sugar, which combine to deliver a rich lather that helps to optimise colour retention. Expect cleansed locks that are touchably soft and ultra-shiny.
Hydrate Conditioner (250ml)
Protect colour vibrancy with the Hydrate Conditioner; a nourishing formula developed to moisturise dry, colour-treated hair. The conditioner is enriched with Jojoba Esters and Shea Butter, which work in synergy to envelop each fiber in a veil of hydration, whilst an ‘AntiFade Complex’ maximises colour retention. Finished with a blend of Soy, Oat and Wheat Proteins, the conditioner is able to strengthen vulnerable locks, leaving coloured hair in optimum condition.
name: Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner Duo (250ml x 2)

product_description:
卡诗滋养恒护系列洗发水 1 号采用创新配方，专门针对正常和干燥发质。
这种洗发水含有皇家鸢尾滋养秘方和葡萄糖蛋白，既能清洗头发，又能从发根到发梢补充纤维，以使缕缕头发手感超级柔韧，并使头发更有光泽。 会防止长发重新变干。
 
适合正常发质至稍微干燥的秀发使用。
name: 1 号 250 毫升

product_description:
卡诗Resistance Therapiste 洗发水和护发素两部曲 通过两部护理，改善暗沉枯槁的发质。 这款高性能配方专门满足细发护理要求，提供修复头发的关键营养成分，让秀发如丝般柔滑。
卡诗 Resistance Therapiste Bain 洗发水 (250 毫升)
 Resistance Therapiste Bain 是一款具有独特的啫喱状质地的洗发水，能够改善凌乱枯槁的头发。 采用创新 FIBRA-KAP™ 配方专门配制而成，富含角蛋白相关蛋白质（KAP），能够修复头发纤维和内在结构，展现健康滋润的发丝。 包裹每一根发丝，让开叉易断的发束重获新生，增加秀发强度，从而保护秀发免于再受损伤。
卡诗 Resistance Therapiste Soin 护发素 (200 毫升)
这款轻盈的护发素适合受损和染烫过度的发质，通常在洗发之前使用，但也可根据个人偏好，在洗发之后使用。 它能有效形成一层保护膜，覆盖在秀发纤维上，阻挡洗发时进一步损伤头发，给您健康诱人的发丝。 其独特的 FIBRA-KAP™ 配方重新生成角蛋白相关蛋白（KAP），修复秀发结构并恢复滋润秀发。
name: Resistance Therapiste 洗发液 (250 毫升) 和护发素 (200 毫升)

product_description:
卡诗Nutritive Masquintense Cheveux Fins  滋养护理系列深度修护发膜（细发）采用特别配方，深度滋养，专门针对纤细、干燥发质。
这种配方护发品含有皇家鸢尾滋养秘方和葡萄糖蛋白，可从发根到发梢补充纤维，从而发挥软化和培育作用，使缕缕头发丝般顺滑而柔韧，并使头发更有光泽。 会防止长发重新变干。
name: Masquintense CHEVEUX Fins 滋养护理系列深度修护发膜 （细发）200ml

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗贝恩奥丽顺柔洗发水是一款舒缓洗发水，可有效调节纤细干燥、毛躁和难以梳理的秀发。 它可提供最佳的营养成分，有效控制和防止毛躁，让发丝更加柔软、丝滑。
经常使用 Kérastase 卡诗贝恩奥丽顺柔洗发水可使发丝更加柔软，持久地享有丰盈度和定型效果。
使用说明：
name: 卡诗贝恩奥丽顺柔洗发水（250ml）

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗日常护理强效去屑洗发露有助于明显减少头皮屑，增强发丝的光泽和质感，增强头皮的活力，以有效解决顽固的秀发问题。
Kérastase 卡诗日常护理强效去屑洗发露专门为男士而设计，这款日用洗发露可有效解决头皮屑问题。 这款洗发露经过多名男士实践证明，它可有效使秀发恢复应有的亮泽度和质感，让发丝更加舒爽、清洁，显著减少的头皮屑。
全系列 Kérastase 卡诗家用产品的强效去屑洗发露采用系统牛磺酸配方，系统牛磺酸是一种复合物，旨在恢复发丝活力，强韧发丝纤维，丰盈纤细秀发的发量。
使用说明：
name: 卡诗日常护理强效去屑洗发露（250ml）

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Specifique Dermo-Calm Bain Riche Shampoo，滋养干燥发丝和敏感头皮。这是一种富含植物提取物的创新配方，有助于清除头发上的杂质和油脂，同时舒缓头皮的刺激感并起到发丝保湿作用。
这款产品具备低过敏性，不含有机硅，融合了具备抚慰特性的海棠籽油和甘油，旨在由内而外修复头发并形成保护屏障。 吡罗克酮乙酰胺可活化干燥的发梢并锁住水分，而薄荷提取物增添了清新感。 这款温和的洗发水可减轻瘙痒感并降低敏感度，赋予您柔软、亮泽和丰盈的秀发。
name: Specifique Dermo-Calm Bain Riche Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Defend your hair from water damage with an innovative new fluid-cream. Balancing your hair's hydration it actively works to keep water out of the hair to prevent damage, whilst it also leaves your hair feeling beautifully smooth and shiny.
Silicone Derivative waterproofing improves the hair fibre's hydrophobicity. Ceramind reconstitutes the intercullular cement to reinfroce the hair's cuticle.
A UV Filter absorbes UV rays which can cause photo-degradation on hair fibre. Provitamin B5 improves water retention to make the fibre suppler and more resilliant.
name: Soleil Aqua-Seal (125ml)

product_description: 使用 Kérastase Discipline Bain Fluidealiste Sulfur Free (250ml) and Fondant Fluidealiste (200ml) 享受奢华的护发体验。 这款两件套组合包括一个柔顺洗发水和一个豪华护发素，它们都是用于被染色损坏或经热处理的头发的理想产品。 Kérastase Discipline Bain Fluidealiste Sulfur Free (250ml) 是奢华的洗发水，内含神经酰胺R、小麦蛋白和氨基酸（可提高发质强度）及亲角蛋白（可使发丝恢复活力）。 涂抹于湿发上，充分揉搓，然后用温水冲洗干净。 Fondant Fluidealiste (200ml) 是一个完备的产品，既可以使头发如丝般光滑，同时又堪称是亲角蛋白的解决方案，可从内而外驯服不羁的头发。 涂抹于刚洗过的头发，从发根至发梢揉搓以促进吸收。 两三分钟后，彻底冲洗。
name: Discipline Bain Fluidealiste Sulfur Free (250ml) and Fondant Fluidealiste (200ml)

product_description:
Kérastase Nutritive Fondant Magistral专门用于极度敏感的细发，具有强效滋养的作用，从而让所有秀发恢复超柔软和健康的光泽。
此款具有创新性的洗头水含有Irisome 4600ppm Complex，能够温和地消除杂质，同时，Benjoin Resin、Ceramide和Xylose的混合物可以从内部增强和改善发质。 每次使用后，可能改善秀发易于打理的程度，防止热力造型给秀发造成的伤害，从而能够舒缓发丝，使其更为光滑。
name: Nutritive Fondant Magistral 200ml

product_description:
Strengthen and recondition dry, damaged and brittle hair with the Olaplex Hair Perfector 100ml No.3. Containing the same active ingredient found within salon grade Olaplex treatments No.1 and No.2, the pioneering at-home treatment enables you to maintain healthier-looking hair with truly professional looking results.
The advanced formula utilises a Bond Multiplying System; which seeks to reconnect broken disulphide sulphur bonds in hair, effectively resetting the hair from within to allow enhanced regrowth, structure and integrity. Suitable for all hair types, it prolongs colour vitality and vibrancy while strengthening the core follicle for a smoother, supple finish.
name: No.3 Hair Perfector 100ml

product_description:
卡诗滋养恒护洗发水能够呵护极其干燥脆弱的头发；这款超滋养洗发水能够恢复柔软光滑而亮泽的秀发。
这款创新配方采用 Irisome 4600ppm 复合成分加强功效，从发根到发梢消除杂质，同时安息香树脂、神经酰胺和木糖混合修复成分能够从内而外地强化并重塑头发纤维。 让您拥有水润顺滑的发丝，使秀发更易于梳理。
name: 250ml

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗滋养洗发水 1 号和滋养蛋白护发露能够有效呵护您的秀发，这款护发洗发两件套旨在清洁发丝，为干燥的秀发补充营养，使其拥有正常的柔软度。
Kérastase 卡诗滋养恒护洗发水 1 号（250ml）
它是一款创新型洗发水，其配方专门针对护理正常发质至干燥的秀发而设计。 这款洗发水采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，蕴含有葡萄糖蛋白，可温和地清洁发丝，从发根到发梢补充纤维；让您的缕缕秀发超级柔软丰盈，增强秀发的光泽度。
Kérastase 卡诗滋养蛋白护发露（200ml） 
滋养护发素采用专业配方，用于护理正常至偏干的秀发。 这款护发素采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，蕴含有葡萄糖蛋白，可从发根到发梢补充纤维；具有顺发和软化的作用，让您的缕缕秀发拥有如丝般的顺滑与丰盈，增强秀发的光泽度。 有效防止发丝干燥。
name: 卡诗滋养洗发水 1 号 250ml & 滋养蛋白护发露 200ml

product_description:
Achieve luscious dandruff-free locks with the Specifique Bain Anti-Pelliculaire Shampoo from Kérastase, a soothing blend designed to target dandruff and scalp irritation whilst cleansing hair of impurities.
It’s enriched with Zync Pyrithione, a significant anti-irritant and antioxidant, as well as Salicylic Acid, which is known to help reduce visible flakes and form a protective barrier to seal in moisture. Suitable for oily or dry hair types, the gentle shampoo leaves you flake-free and feeling more confident, and you can expect shiny, soft and revitalised tresses.
name: Specifique Bain Anti-Pelliculaire Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Shea Moisture 椰浆芙蓉卷发强化发膜适用于护理浓密的卷发；其营养丰富的配方采用经过认证的纯天然有机成分，具备多重好处。
丝蛋白与印度楝树和椰子油混合物完美结合，能滋养和调节发丝，帮助抚平毛躁，以尽享极致顺滑的沙龙级护理效果。 这款发膜既适合湿发，也适合干发，还可用作定型乳缔造完美的辫子头，令秀发恢复光泽，防止断发。
name: Moisture 椰浆芙蓉卷发强化发膜 326ml

product_description:
非常適合受損髮質使用。煥發髮絲閃亮強韌、易於打理的效果，綻放健康光彩。 
是Joico 產品家族中蘊含礦美絲水解角蛋白（Quadramine Complex）最多的一款產品。卓效提升髮絲強韌度、立體感和豐盈感，效果立竿見影。 
使用說明：
name: K-Pak 深层渗透重塑发膜 150ml

product_description:
这款 Kerastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力护发素是丰盈系列的一款创新型半透明护发素，其设计旨在丰盈亮发，蓬松秀发，增强纹理结构，而不会牺牲秀发的轻盈度。 它具有深层滋养功效，结合阳离子聚合物技术可针对性地修复发丝的脆弱部位，增加发丝的浓密度，让秀发更加闪亮。
其凝胶配方适合各种长度的纤细型秀发，可有效作用于发丝纤维的内部和外部，能够增强塑型效果和丰盈度，而不会增加秀发的厚重感。 这款奢华的护发素可通过强化缕缕秀发的结构提供持久的定型记忆功能，它能提供持久的显著护发效果。 K.D.
name: Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力护发素（200ml）

product_description:
Groom to perfection with the Not a Man Bag Do You Even Set from Evo. The set boasts a duo of Evo’s bestselling products for men, stowed away in a handy, zip secured cosmetic bag, ideal for a man on the move. The ‘Do You Even Set’ contains a construct crème for hair styling and a luxurious shaving cream for the ultimate shaving experience.
Überwurst Shaving Cream (150ml)
Experience a pleasurable shave with the Überwurst Shaving Cream. The rich cream transforms into a cushioning mousse upon contact with the skin and helps to soften whiskers for an easier shave. The formula lubricates the skin to prevent any irritation including rashes or shaving burn. Perfect for all skin types, the skin is left smooth and comfortable.
Free from sulphates and parabens.
Crop Strutters Construct Crème (90g)
Define and shape your hair with the Crop Strutters Construct Crème. Perfect for those who want a low-shine, natural-looking style, the lightweight crème provides texture, support and separation, whilst the malleable hold allows you to switch up your style throughout the day. The perfect product for taking you from understated day styles to rough and ready night-time looks, the multi-tasking formula is suitable for all hair types and lengths.
name: Not a Man Bag Do You Even Set (Worth £33)

product_description:
Revive limp, lifeless and lacklustre locks with the Thickening Conditioner from Sachajuan. Ideal for fine and thinning hair types, the Thickening Conditioner is designed to effectively condition hair, whilst promoting a lifted, volumised finish.
Utilising Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, the mineral-rich formula detangles and smoothes hair to deliver a manageable finish. Expect full-bodied locks that are visibly healthy and ultra-shiny.
name: Thickening Conditioner 1000ml

product_description:
Give hair and skin a nutrients boost with the Woody's for Men Beard and Tattoo Oil; a silky solution that offers a soothing yet invigorating feel.
Targeting both the beard and tattoos, the oil is enriched with an anti-oxidant rich blend of Macadamia and Moringa oils, which helps to protect skin cells and condition a beard. Complete with a hydrating dose of Kukui Nut oil, the non-greasy formula envelops skin and hair in a veil of essential moisture, leaving tattoos vibrant, healthy and comfortable, and beards in optimum condition.
name: for Men Beard and Tattoo Oil 30ml

product_description:
Pamper weak, wanting locks with the Nourish & Nurture Hair Mask from You & Oil. Using only the finest organic and naturally derived ingredients, the oil-based treatment penetrates hair with moisture and helps strengthen from within.
Ideal for dry, damaged and weak hair, it rapidly soaks into each hair follicle, with Jojoba Oil helping to eliminate toxins and hydrate the scalp for healthier looking re-growth. Rosemary and Ylang Ylang effectively minimise bacteria build up, while Vetiver replenishes the core structure to combat split ends and breakage. The luxurious formula leaves tresses feeling silky soft and supple with a mirror-like shine.
name: & Oil Nourish & Nurture Hair Mask 100ml

product_description: Take control of your hair with Lock Stock & Barrel Freestyl Protein Gel; a high performance hair gel with firm, flexible hold and medium shine. Infused with protein-infused film formers, the gel can be applied to damp hair for a sleek, sharp finish, or ruffled into dry hair for a soft, dishevelled style with texture and volume. No build-up, flaking or stiffness.
name: Stock & Barrel Freestyl Protein Gel 100ml

product_description: Functional and innovative, ikoo's Home Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles without pain. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Enhances volume, texture and shine without snagging or tugging.
name: Home Hair Brush - White - Cotton Candy

product_description: Functional and innovative, ikoo's Home Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles without pain. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Enhances volume, texture and shine without snagging or tugging.
name: Home Hair Brush - White - Fireball

product_description: Volumise lifeless locks with the Oscar Blandi Pronto Dry Teasing Dust. Suitable for all hair types, the lightweight powder instantly adds texture and grit at the roots, adding lift and dimension for that second-day, effortlessly tousled effect. Ideal for use prior to styling for enhanced hold and superior definition, hair appears thicker and fuller without feeling sticky.
name: Blandi Pronto Dry Teasing Dust 11g

product_description: Compact, functional and innovative, ikoo's Pocket Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles on-the-go. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Complete with a protective cap to guard from fluff, dirt and bacteria.
name: Pocket Hair Brush - White - Fireball

product_description:
Eve Rebirth Tricho-Cell Healthy Hair 40 Days Treatment is a hair strengthening system for those experiencing hair loss caused by stress, poor diet or heredity.
Promoting a healthy scalp environment, the formula utilises a Trichological Complex comprising active ingredients and plant stem cells to encourage visibly stronger, healthier and shinier-looking hair. Fortified with anti-hair loss substances based on regenerative medicine research, it helps to slow down the ageing process of hair follicles whilst reducing scalp inflammation, dandruff and sebum for an improved growth environment. It also contains Red Grape extract which contributes to improved microcirculation.
Contains: 2 x 50ml Tricho-Cell Healthy Hair Treatment.
name: Rebirth Tricho-Cell Healthy Hair 40 Days Treatment

product_description:
Give dull, limp and weak hair a boost with the Eve Rebirth Tricho-Cell Healthy Hair Shampoo; an advanced treatment that combats hair loss, frizz and tangles for a soft, smooth finish.
Blending together active ingredients and plant stem cells, the Trichological Complex penetrates the hair follicle to effectively slow down the ageing process, with extract of Ginseng helping stimulate microcirculation for healthier looking regrowth.
The gentle yet powerful formula removes dirt and impurities without stripping away essential moisture, instead working to fortify each strand from the core for improved density and thickness. Designed to be used alongside the Trico-Cell hair loss treatment line, the shampoo leaves locks feeling stronger and revitalised with a radiant shine.
name: Rebirth Tricho-Cell Healthy Hair Shampoo

product_description:
Clean and condition in one with the Calma Sutra Cleansing Conditioner for Waves and Curls from TIGI Bed Head’s Foxy Curls collection.
The innovative, no-foam formula sweeps away daily dirt, impurities and product build up with a gentle cleansing system, while an Anti-Tangle Complex works to align hair fibres to eliminate knots and control frizz.
Nourishing oils of Babassu and Brazil Nut alongside a unique Hydracurl Blend deeply penetrates the follicle to hydrate from within, resulting in locks feeling healthy and replenished with improved manageability and maximum shine. Complete with a gorgeous Fruit Twist fragrance.
name: Bed Head Foxy Curls Calma Sutra Cleansing Conditioner for Waves and Curls 375ml

product_description:
This Hair To Die For Treatment from Peter Thomas Roth works to retain and activate the appearance of natural hair thickness. Giving you a fuller head of hair, this innovative treatment boasts the unique Tri-Phase Complex™, which works in three stages of the hair growth cycle. Treating your hair from the roots, meaning that it promotes stronger and thicker looking hair.
Directions of use:
name: Thomas Roth Hair To Die For Treatment 50ml

product_description:
使用 TIGI Bedhead for Men Clean Up Peppermint Conditioner，令秀发焕发光彩。 薄荷带来清凉感，调节抚慰刺激。 蕴含维生素E、C和B7，保护肌肤不受自由基影响，重获健康。 小麦和大豆蛋白锁定每根发丝，增加发量，令秀发散发清爽罗勒和薄荷芳香。
使用说明： 按摩进头发和头皮，然后冲洗干净。
name: Bed Head for Men Clean Up Peppermint Conditioner (200ml)

product_description:
The Giovanni Ultra-Sleek Conditioner helps to moisturise dry, frizzy and unmanageable hair with a Dual Smoothing Complex of Moroccan Argan Oil and Brazilian Phyto-Keratin to strengthen and nourish each individual strand.
Brimming with essential Omega Acids, the softening formula works to detangle knots, smooth the look of split ends and tame frizz and flyaways. Offering a lush fresh scent, it’s fortified with an antioxidant-rich blend of Polyephenols to provide free radical protection that can cause dullness. Safe for colour-treated hair, the conditioner delivers ultra-shiny, sleek locks that feel sumptuously softened.
name: Ultra-Sleek Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
Tigi Catwalk Oatmeal和 Honey Conditioner （750ml）经过专门配制，特别适合干燥和受损的头发使用，该产品可以温和地清洁您的秀发，同时为您的秀发提供充分的营养和水分，使其柔软水嫩。
该产品富含洋槐蜂蜜，小麦蛋白和维生素E，可以增强发质的韧性，补充营养，从而让您的秀发具有质地柔软的触感和闪耀的光泽。 同时，美丽芬芳将会萦绕在您的发丝之上，使其散发出一种不可抗拒的芬芳气息。 - L.M.
name: Catwalk Oatmeal & Honey Nourishing Shampoo（750ml）

product_description:
KeraCare强韧抗热护发乳将呵护您的秀发，抵抗各种危害因子，保护秀发免受热造型和紫外线的侵害。  这种免洗型护发乳不仅可以提高秀发弹性，令秀发丰盈健康，散发迷人光泽。
KeraCare强韧抗热护发乳将缓解高温对秀发的伤害，梳通打结的发丝。 这款高效配方护发乳能够令秀发恢复水分平衡，拥有一头迷人的健康秀发。

这款Sebastian Professional 洗头水、护发素和修复面膜三件套适合需要温柔呵护的干燥、受损的头发。 该Penetraitt三件套包括三件最好的Sebastian Professional产品，配合使用可以令您的秀发营养丰富、水润、如丝绸般柔软。 这款Penetraitt三件套可以为过度造型、经化学处理过的头发提供必要的呵护，是一款必备之物。
该套装包括以下产品： 
Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Shampoo (250ml)对于真正受损、过度造型和经化学处理过的头发，请尝试使用Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Shampoo。 其积极拯救系统渗透头发，修复和重建自然健康，获得超强、丝般柔软的发型。
Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Conditioner (250ml) Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Conditioner 是对受损的头发必不可少的护理，随时随地可以增强发质，消除和防御过去化学处理和热损伤引起的压力。 Sebastian 通过这款颜色安全、深层护理、巩固和加强护发素拯救您的头发。
Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Repair Masque (150ml)Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Repair Masque是一款深层调理护发产品，用于遭受压力、黯淡和化学损伤的头发。 它的有效援救系统可以渗透秀发、修复秀发，并重建秀发的天然健康。
name: Professional Penetraitt 三件套 - Shampoo, Conditioner & Repair Masque

product_description: Boasting a lavish formula enriched with nourishing and hydrating ingredients, this Oat Replenishing Treatment by Weleda works to rescue dry and damaged hair to leave you with luscious locks. Containing Organic Oat, Jojoba and Coconut oils and Shea Butter, this intensive treatment with resurface the hair whilst providing extra moisture, all without weighing it down. K.D.
name: Oat Replenishing Treatment 150ml

product_description:
作为 Ego Boost 卷发套装的附件，这款直径51毫米的卷发筒非常适合打造自然的大波浪，直接作用于发根，持久定型。 每个卷发筒均采用柔软触感设计，只需7秒钟便可完成加热，只需几分钟便可完成定型。
这些卷发筒非常易于使用和佩戴，带给您长效持久的魅力卷发。 K.D.
name: Professional Ego Boost 卷发筒（4 x 51mm）

product_description:
KeraStraight的这款碳梳三件套能还原秀发质朴本色，全新打造完美发型。 本套装包含一把大梳、一把尖尾梳和一把剪发碳梳，一应俱全，让您轻松挑战任何造型。 -SA
KeraStraight Carbon Large Comb适合中度至浓密秀发，轻质耐磨，助您打造独特发型。 梳齿半密半疏，超强耐热，是造型工具的绝佳伴侣。
KeraStraight Carbon Tail Comb终极多功能的专业造型利器。 无论是倒梳、拨分还是造型精修，这把细齿梳都能让效果称心如意； 兼具防静电功能，必将成为您的造型新宠。
KeraStraight Carbon Cutting Comb助您打造靓丽造型。 这把专业发梳轻质耐磨，梳齿半密半疏，适合为适合中度至浓密秀发造型； 超强耐热，是您的完美理发帮手。
name: Carbon Comb Set

product_description: Kebelo丝绒卷发护发素（250ml）能够抚顺毛躁的卷发。 这款令秀发重现活力的护发素不含SLS和苯甲酸酯类，融入了丰富的椰子油、洋甘菊和藜麦，令卷发持久卷曲，柔顺不毛躁，散发耀人光泽。 这款护发产品为秀发提供深层滋养，有效理顺、保护并强化每根发丝，令卷发散发迷人魅力，轻盈Q弹。 - K.N.

Stimulate and boost your locks with the Anne Semonin Botanical Conditioner. Perfect to use after the Anne Semonin Gentle Mistletoe Shampoo, the conditioner will soothe, calm and strengthen the scalp and hair thanks to the extracts of mistletoe flowers, hops, fennel fruit, yarriow, camomile and melissa. Say goodbye to lacklustre, dull, damaged locks and hello to soft, shiny and supple tresses. A.B.
name: Semonin Botanical Conditioner (200ml)

非常适合难以选择确切颜色的人们，来自Beauty Works的100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension让您在购买全套颜色前可以匹配自己头发的自然颜色。

product_description:
利用 Dr. Hauschka的滋养护发素 从发根至发梢深层滋润头发；这是一款强效护发素，可再生、增强和恢复健康头发。
加入药属葵、橡木和荨麻药用植物提取物，该创新配方可提供长效保湿，同时具有保护功效的小麦和牛奶蛋白质可提高弹性和丰盈度。
楝树、澳洲坚果和荷荷巴油混合物带来亮泽，提高可梳理性并防止拳曲，获得平顺、光滑的头发和沙龙式效果。 E.N.

product_description: Sexy Hair 睡眠定型发乳可让您轻松打造层次分明的发型，这款定型乳可为发丝补充水分，具有中等定型作用，而不会导致缕缕秀发因重量问题而下垂。 这款定型乳中蕴含有迷迭香和蓍草的萃取物，可保护头皮和锁住水分，能轻松洗掉，旨在便于"第二天"造型秀发。 使秀发感觉起来更加柔软和浓密，增加定型效果和纹理结构的层次感。
name: Hair 睡眠定型发乳 150ml

product_description:
Uriage1er洗发水，呵护婴儿和儿童。无皂料无泪配方，可清洗宝宝头发，而不会刺激宝宝眼睛。
内含温和清洁剂，可轻柔​地去除头发和头皮的杂质；内含舒缓温泉水，使头发易于梳理、保持头皮天然酸碱值的平衡。 使头发触感柔软、散发淡淡清香。

非常适合难以选择确切颜色的人们，来自Beauty Works的100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension让您在购买全套前可以匹配自己头发的自然颜色。

product_description:
d:fi 日用护发素可有效护理您的秀发；其轻盈配方可使营养成分渗透到缕缕秀发，可为秀发补充水分，焕活发丝，使秀发从发根到发丝都十分柔软。
这款营养丰富的护发素蕴含有水解角蛋白，可有效舒缓毛小皮细胞，使秀发更易梳理，令蓬乱的发丝更贴合，让您的缕缕秀发更有光泽。
name: 日用护发素 300ml

product_description: Achieve long-lasting hold with the Hair Stamina Definition Cream from RPR. Lightweight and non-greasy, the styling gel is enriched with revitalising Guarana Extract to nourish and soften. Suitable for all hair types, it’s the perfect tool for adding definition, texture and body with a strong but pliable hold.
name: Hair Stamina Definition Cream 200ml

product_description: Revlon 露华浓滋养染发膏只需三分钟即可焕活发丝，增强发色的活力。 这款不含氨的染发膏采用离子染料，能瞬间与发丝发生相互作用，具有超快速的染发和超静电作用，而 AHA 水果酸可将营养成分渗透到角质层，以修复和软化发丝，补充发丝所需的水分。 非常适合在两次沙龙染发期间使用，让您拥有所期待的顺滑和闪亮，增强秀发的亮泽感。
name: 露华浓专业滋养染发膏 400 橘色 100ml

product_description: Evo 28 毫米布鲁斯硬毛刷，是一种轻量级发刷，使秀发更浓密、数量更多。 圆管由硬木制作，设有把手，使秀发易于打理造型。 其独特的野猪鬃可覆盖头发角质层，均匀地分布头皮的天然油脂和皮脂，使秀发更亮泽。 这款轻巧的刷子适合短而厚的头发或卷发，使秀发健康柔滑。 E.N.
Revlon 露华浓滋养染发膏只需三分钟即可焕活发丝，增强发色的活力。 这款不含氨的染发膏采用离子染料，能瞬间与发丝发生相互作用，具有超快速的染发和超静电作用，而 AHA 水果酸可将营养成分渗透到角质层，以修复和软化发丝，补充发丝所需的水分。 非常适合在两次沙龙染发期间使用，让您拥有所期待的顺滑和闪亮，增强秀发的亮泽感。

product_description:
A'kin present the Macadamia and Wheat Protein Conditioner; a deeply nourishing, reparative formula developed specifically for dry, damaged hair in need of care.
Harnessing the powers of Wheat Protein and cold-pressed Australian Macadamia Oil, the lightweight conditioning treatment delivers intense moisture to the hair and scalp, whilst targeting split ends and preventing further breakage. Expect hydrated, revitalised locks with renewed radiance.
name: Macadamia and Wheat Protein Conditioner 500ml

product_description:
Make the most of your colour with Colour and Shine Shampoo from MÁDARA. Designed to enhance colour treated hair, the shampoo gently cleanses and protects, leaving locks ultra shiny.
Enriched with Northern Linseed, Horse Chestnut and Plantain, the formula preserves coloured hair, adding reflective shine and a soft touch.
name: Colour and Shine Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Achieve shiny, healthy-looking locks with The Seaweed Bath Co. Balancing Conditioner; a weightless formula that caters specifically for normal to oily hair.
Harnessing the powers of organic Maine Bladderwrack Seaweed (an ingredient that delivers 65+ vitamins, minerals and amino acids), the conditioner rebalances and revitalises the hair and scalp, whilst a hydrating blend of Coconut, Avocado and Olive Oils leave hair deeply restored. Its dose of Argan Oil softens and smoothens from root to tip.
name: Seaweed Bath Co. Argan Conditioner 360ml - Eucalyptus & Peppermint

product_description:
Developed specifically for men, the Senscience PROformance Design Styling Gel delivers medium to firm hold without flaking or build-up.
Suitable for all hair types, the lightweight gel moisturises and conditions hair, whilst adding ultimate volume and definition for a professional, high-shine finish. Simply mould, sculpt and experiment to create your desired look.
name: PROformance Design Styling Gel 150ml

product_description:
Cloud Nine 髮捲是為了是您的捲發看起來更有彈性而設計。提供各種各樣的大小可供選擇，您可以選擇您喜歡的造型。這款髮捲是從裡向外加熱，但是從外面摸起來是涼的。 
使用柔軟的猪鬃,防止捲髮時拉扯頭髮受傷，這款髮捲大小是30mm。 KD 
 4 x 30mm 
 請注意:用來鏈接使用Cloud Nine The O Pod.
name: Nine-发卷

product_description:
Be blown away by the high performance BaByliss PRO Spectrum Hair Dryer. Available in a range of limited edition colours, the styling tool is powered by a long-life 2100W motor with a concentrated, directly penetrating airflow for faster drying times and optimum styling control.
Advanced ionic conditioning delivers over 50%* more negative ions to combat static and minimise frizz, helping to seal each individual cuticle for a visibly smoother and glossy finish. Perfect for all hair types, six variable heat and speed settings allow you flexible styling to suit your needs, while the ergonomically balanced design enhances comfort and ease of use.
Achieve sleek, lustrous locks with professional looking results in minimal time and with maximum impact.
name: PRO Spectrum Hair Dryer - Ocean Teal

product_description:
Discover a new level of clean with the Bio Cleansing Conditioner from Unwash. Formulated without harsh chemicals, the innovative non-lathering formula eliminates dirt and oil from hair, without stripping essential moisture.
Fortified with Cationic Cleansers, the conditioning formula draws unwanted dirt from locks, without disrupting the cuticle. A blend of organic Evening Primrose oil and Hydrolyzed Keratin works to nourish the hair and the scalp, delivering moisture and strength. Expect smooth, shiny and bouncy hair that is free from oil and frizz.
name: Bio Cleansing Conditioner 400ml

product_description:
Color WOW 色哇发根蓬松强韧丰盈喷雾蓬蓬水令您的秀发拥有更高的层次，其浓密的定型配方可让您的秀发一整天都蓬松丰盈。
这款定型喷雾可让您的秀发更柔韧，易于梳理，而不会带给您粘着或僵直的感觉，它采用三种轻质的"弹性剂"，有助于使发丝保持柔韧，其独特的增厚树脂可形成每根发丝之间的支撑结构，以增强蓬松的效果，令发丝根根分明。
附加的紫外线过滤器对发丝具有保护作用，令秀发看起来更浓密，发量更丰盈。
name: WOW 色哇发根蓬松强韧丰盈喷雾蓬蓬水 150 毫升

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸隐形®夹式固定假发。 由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，能从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其固定装置配备有一个纤细的丝网，带有四根纬线，模拟秀发的自然生长方式，能够实现持久的牢固固定，让您舒适佩戴。 它经过手工加工制成，保留有角质层，其独特的有机色素使发丝拥有亮丽的光泽和极致的发色活泼性，令秀发更加顺滑而有光泽，使其看起来更浓密丰盈。 适合热力造型。
name: Works Jen Atkin 隐形夹式固定假发 18 英寸——罗德欧街 JA3

product_description:
Tangle Teezer准备梳理Duo是终极秀发打扮套装。 这款套装带有一把旨在温和疏通干燥头发的发梳和一把专业解开湿结的水精灵美发梳，旨在令您拥有丝绸般柔软、光滑的秀发！ K.D.
 Tangle Teezer Original紫色迷恋Tangle Teezer 的梳齿设计独特，在梳理秀发时，梳齿可弯曲并快速弹回原位，防止容易打结的发丝相互接触，最大化减少因护理不当而导致的断发、毛躁和损伤。 它适用于各种发质，尤其适用于发质脆弱或染发、接发后的头发、卷发以及儿童细密易打结的头发。
 Tangle Teezer水精灵美发梳 - Black珍珠这款创新的 Tangle Teezer 水精灵美发梳是一款可解除打结、温和的发梳，可以轻而易举地梳顺打结的湿发。 这款 Tangle Teezer 美发梳拥有轻质、镂空的外观和圆边，易于握持。
name: Teezer准备梳理Duo - Black /紫色/粉红色

product_description:
Achieve thick, lustrous locks with the Double Volume Remy Hair Extensions from Beauty Works, the UK's leading brand of luxury, professional hair extensions used by stylists and celebrities.
The award-winning extensions are created using the finest Remy human hair with preserved cuticles to deliver a natural, shiny appearance and have been lightly processed to ensure they remain tangle-free. Each individual strand is delicately bound together to prevent shredding, making the extensions ideal for adding length, fullness or volume to hair. The double drawn hair has had any shorter lengths removed to give the extensions a consistent length, increasing body from root to tip. E.N.
100% Remy human hair
Grade AAA
Weight: 140g
Length: 18"
Extension Type: Weft
name: Works Double Volume Remy Hair Extensions - California Blonde 613/16

product_description:
Maximise your style with the Volume Boost Hair Extensions from Beauty Works, the UK's leading brand of luxury, professional hair extensions highly coveted by stylists and celebrities alike.
Designed to add volume and length to your locks, the easy to apply, clip-in hairpiece sits discreetly beneath your own hair, allowing you to add seamless volume to your roots and crown without the fuss of special tools or glue.
Made from hand selected, 100% Remy cuticle retained human hair, which means you get the most natural looking, shiny locks, the lightweight hairpiece features a flat lace cap weft for easy application, and its secure comb has a protective silicone layer on each clip to cushion your natural hair and protect from breakage. - K.N.
name: Works Volume Boost Hair Extensions - Tanned Blonde 10/14/16

product_description: Compact, functional and innovative, ikoo's Pocket Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles on-the-go. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Complete with a protective cap to guard from fluff, dirt and bacteria.
name: Pocket Hair Brush - White - Orange Blossom

product_description: Functional and innovative, ikoo's Home Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles without pain. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Enhances volume, texture and shine without snagging or tugging.
name: Home Hair Brush - Black - Orange Blossom

product_description: Functional and innovative, ikoo's Home Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles without pain. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Enhances volume, texture and shine without snagging or tugging.
name: Home Hair Brush - White - Oyster Metallic

product_description: Functional and innovative, ikoo's Home Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles without pain. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Enhances volume, texture and shine without snagging or tugging.
name: Home Hair Brush - Black - Ocean Breeze

product_description:
Combat hair loss with the Adam Revolution Tricho-Cell Stronger Hair Treatment. Specifically designed for men, the advanced treatment is ideal for those suffering from hair loss and weakness caused by stress, diet and genetics.
A high performance blend of multi-tasking ingredients form a Trichological Complex, utilising plant stem cells to increase the metabolism of fibroblasts and slow down the aging process of hair follicles. Biotechnological derivatives of Green Tea help minimise inflammation of the scalp, while extract of Red Grape activates microcirculation for enhanced and healthier looking regrowth.
Also suitable for hair prone to dandruff and excessive oil production, it leaves hair feeling thicker and stronger with a replenished shine and vitality.
name: Revolution Tricho-Cell Stronger Hair Treatment

product_description:
Tangle Teezer妈妈和女儿Original和魔术花盆粉红色/紫色Duo是送给母亲和女儿的最好礼物。 这款两件套包含可轻而易举疏通秀发的Original Tangle Teezer和供儿童使用的特别改制的花盆Tangle Teezer，可令各种头发变得如丝绸般柔软！ K.D.
Tangle Teezer Original 紫色迷恋Tangle Teezer 的梳齿设计独特，在梳理秀发时，梳齿可弯曲并快速弹回原位，防止容易打结的发丝相互接触，最大化减少因护理不当而导致的断发、毛躁和损伤。 它适用于各种发质，尤其适用于发质脆弱或染发、接发后的头发、卷发以及儿童细密易打结的头发。
 Tangle Teezer魔法花盆 - Princess粉红色不破损、不打结、不纠缠的头发只是一个童话故事？ 用Tangle Teezer魔术花盆就可以将这个童话变成现实。 一把可爱的花形刷，它可以毫不费力地解开纠结的头发，无需用力撕扯或艰难地改变发结。 Tangle Teezer魔术花盆 尤其 Perfect儿童，它易于握持，拥有Tangle Teezer的专利梳齿，梳理头发后令头发显得非常光滑。
name: Teezer妈妈和女儿Original和魔术花盆 粉红色/紫色Duo

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Volume Boost Hair Extensions，获得最佳造型效果。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，深受造型师和名人青睐。
这种易于使用的夹式假发旨在为发丝增加体量和长度，小心地固定于自己的头发下方，使您能够无缝地为发根和发冠增加体量，而无需使用各种专用工具或胶水。
这种轻巧的假发采用手工挑选的 100% 保留雷米角质层的人类发丝制作而成，这意味着您可获得最自然的亮泽发丝。这款假发配有便于使用的平花边帽纬，其安全发梳的每个发夹上都有防护硅胶层，以垫起自然头发并防止断裂。 - K.N
name: Works Volume Boost Hair Extensions - Blondette 4/27

product_description:
An effective and innovative leave-in treatment, the NIOXIN System 1 Scalp Treatment for normal to thin-looking, natural hair is the last step in your NIOXIN three step system.
Specifically designed to help thicken normal to fine hair types, it contains antioxidants and botanicals that work in synergy to maintain a refreshed scalp environment.
Formulated with Activ-Renewal®, BioAMP® and Transactive Delivery System® technologies, the treatment increases the fullness of each hair strand whilst reducing hair loss and breakage, using special ingredients Peppermint Oil and White tea extract to give the scalp a super fresh feel. Your hair will be left looking glossy and thickened with the scalp feeling rejuvenated and stimulated.
name: System 1 Scalp Treatment for Normal to Fine Natural Hair 100ml

product_description:
Encourage healthy hair growth with the Stimulating Conditioner from British Barbers' Association. Thoroughly conditioning locks, the rich formula visibly improves hair’s health to leave it hydrated and shiny.
Formulated with English Peppermint, the gentle yet effective treatment boasts anti-inflammatory properties that tackle scalp conditions such as dandruff, eczema and psoriasis. The formula delivers a cooling sensation that helps to promote micro circulation and encourage a healthy and comfortable scalp. In addition, Jojoba Oil and Shea Butter work in synergy to hydrate the fiber, balance oil production and strengthen hair.
Expect shiny, volumised locks and a healthy looking scalp.
name: Barbers' Association Stimulating Conditioner 730ml

product_description:
Nourish locks with the Expert Colour Care Everyday Supersize Conditioner from Jo Hansford.
Exclusively developed in her Mayfair salon and utilising advanced technologies to protect and enhance natural or chemically coloured hair, the lightweight formula works to detangle and smooth hair while infusing it with essential moisture and vitamins.
Fortified with the exclusive Colour Care Complex, Anti-Fade and Anti-Frizz formula, it contains Sweet Blue Lupin peptides that have been scientifically proven to prolong hair colour vibrancy and tone for up to 30 washes, while Prodew Amino Acids strengthen and protect the surface of hair follicles to counteract damage and breakage.
Natural concentrated extracts of Sunflower Seed and Jojoba Oil combat free radical damage and enhance hairs natural elasticity, plus the addition of protein-rich Keratin Amino Acids repair surface damage and minimise the appearance of split ends. Expect manageable, silky soft and glossy hair with a professional finish and reinvigorated colour.
name: Hansford Expert Colour Care Everyday Supersize Conditioner (1000ml)

product_description:
Philip B Travel Kit（不含苯甲酸酯类）组合了 Philip B 最受青睐的产品，为您打造轻松舒适的旅程。 适合旅行的尺寸能完美地装入配有拉链的旅行袋中，以符合最新的机场规定。 一款理想的周末度假或试用套装！
对于想体验精致生活的人士而言，这款 Philip B Travel Kit（不含苯甲酸酯类）能给予家园般的一流享受。
name: B Travel Kit（4 件产品）

product_description:
Revive limp, lifeless and lacklustre locks with the Thickening Conditioner from Sachajuan. Ideal for fine and thinning hair types, the Thickening Conditioner is designed to effectively condition hair, whilst promoting a lifted, volumised finish. Arriving in a smaller size, the travel conditioner is ideal for on-the-go.
Utilising Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, the mineral-rich formula detangles and smoothes hair to deliver a manageable finish. Expect full-bodied locks that are visibly healthy and ultra-shiny.
name: Thickening Conditioner Travel Size 100ml

product_description:
Trumpers檸檬洗髮水- 200ml旅行裝 
 Trumpers 的檸檬洗髮水俱有清爽寧神之功效，彌散檸檬的怡人香氛，令空氣都活力四射，賦活新生。獨家配方，呈現水潤髮絲，長久保持髮絲的清爽絲滑觸感。本產品採用200ml 的旅行裝塑料瓶包裝，小巧便攜，確保秀發整日保持最佳狀態。
name: 柠檬洗发水 - 200ml 旅行装

product_description: Pump volume back into hair with the Give Me Body and Strength Leave in Mist from RPR. The thickening styling mist is infused with a blend of Carob Amino Acids and RPR’s advanced Baipexil Botanical Complex and provides instantly fuller looking hair with added strength, body and shine. The formula also aims to reduce hair breakages by strengthening the fiber from root to tip, improving the overall appearance of hair quality. Ideal for fine and thinning hair and safe for coloured and chemically treated hair.
name: Give Me Body and Strength Leave in Mist 300ml

product_description: 使用L'ANZA Keratin Healing Oil Hair Treatment（185毫升）Treat干燥、受损发质，恢复张力和顺滑度。 秀发修复配方，用于修复因化学原因及日常侵损对秀发造成的损伤。L'ANZA Keratin Healing Oil作为一种秀发滋养产品包含阿比西尼亚花和果油，能够补充头发必需的脂肪酸和营养成分，恢复水分，使头发如丝般柔滑。 定期染烫造型的Hair发质可能变脆，容易卷缩，而这款功效显著的油能够重构秀发内层，增加发质弹性。 除了修复秀发以外，这种油也可以被用来抵御高达260℃的高温以及紫外线的进一步侵害。使用说明：
name: Keratin Healing Oil Hair Treatment（185毫升）

product_description:
Alterna 爱特纳顶级梦幻洗发露和护发素是一款两件套产品，其旨在改善干枯毛躁的秀发。 其独特的顶级配方可提供十种重要的营养成分，有效修复受损的秀发，让发丝拥有绸缎般的柔软光泽。
 Alterna 爱特纳顶级梦幻洗发露（250 毫升）
十种护发营养配方让您拥有乌黑光亮的健康秀发，可帮助各种类型的发质达到专业级的效果。 这款日常洗发水对头皮非常温和，富含丰富的非洲可可萃取物、玻璃酸、鱼子酱抗老化复合物、肤色光酵素复合物、白松油、香槟葡萄籽油、保加利亚月见草、阿拉伯乳香、摩洛哥皂质树皮、山金车花，让秀发享受完美极致呵护。
使用方法： 取适量本品，加水按摩秀发，然后用水彻底清洗。
 Alterna 爱特纳顶级梦幻护发素（250 毫升）
这款护发素不含任何硝酸盐，采用自然配方，旨在通过保湿滋养来防止秀发天然营养物质的流失。 这款变革性护发素能够为暗淡无光、干枯的秀发有效补充水分，其富含丰富的阿拉伯乳香、非洲可可萃取物、护色®光酵素复合物、鱼子酱抗老化复合物®、保加利亚月见草、摩洛哥皂质树皮、香槟葡萄籽油、玻璃酸、山金车花萃取物。
使用方法： 取少量本品均匀涂抹在清洁的发丝，揉至出泡沫，然后彻底清洗。
name: 爱特纳顶级梦幻洗发露（250 毫升）和护发素（250 毫升）

product_description:
Shea Moisture 牙买加黑蓖麻油强韧修复洗发水可有效补充秀发所需的营养，令发丝保持清爽。
这款日常洗发水蕴含有有机乳油木果脂和富含脂肪酸的牙买加黑色蓖麻油，可有效祛除定型剂的残留和杂质，为发丝和头皮补充水分，促进秀发健康成长。
其中的苹果醋含有纯天然 AHA（阿尔法羟基酸），有助于调节头皮的 PH 水平，使易断的损伤发丝或经过化学处理的发丝变得强壮起来。 让您的秀发从发根到发梢都拥有所期待的清洁、柔软，而且更有光泽。
name: Moisture 牙买加黑蓖麻油强韧修复洗发水 506ml

product_description:
Tackle stress head-on with the this works Stress Check Hair Elixir; a leave-in conditioner that works to combat stress levels, as well as revealing enviable shine.
Fast-acting, the booster can be used anytime in the day, whenever you are in need of support. The lightweight treatment boasts a Superblend of Neroli, Patchouli and Camomile which seek to eliminate feelings of stress or anxiety. The intelligent formula also comprises Mongogo and Tamanu oils, which work in synergy to condition and protect hair.
Releasing fragrance as you move throughout the day, the elixir continuously works to tackle stress levels and encourage feelings of wellbeing.
name: works Stress Check Hair Elixir 80ml

product_description:
使用Shea Moisture 牙买加黑蓖麻油强韧修复护发素护理干枯损伤的秀发；其深层滋养配方中含有天然有机认证的合格原料。
借助牙买加黑蓖麻油的作用，深层滋养护理可促进秀发健康成长，牛油果油可调节发丝和头皮，让其更加舒适。 其非常适合经过染色处理、化学处理或加热塑形的秀发，角蛋白可使发丝恢复强壮，有效解决断发问题，让您拥有时尚顺滑而富有弹性的缕缕秀发。 爽肤薄荷油可刺激头皮。 修复发丝，让秀发焕然一新。

使用后，它会保护您的头发不毛躁和免受湿度的影响长达三天。 该配方将有效地清洁并重建您头发的强度。

product_description:
卡诗Resistance Therapiste 洗发水、发膜和精华三部曲是是一套三步护理产品，设计用于改善暗淡干枯的头发。 独特的先进配方提供修复秀发的重要营养和水分，让秀发感觉如丝般柔滑。 E.N. 
卡诗双重强化洗发水 (250 毫升)
双重强化洗发水是一款具有独特的啫喱状质地的洗发水，能够改善凌乱枯槁的头发。 采用创新 FIBRA-KAP™ 配方专门配制而成，富含角蛋白相关蛋白质（KAP），能够修复头发纤维和内在结构，展现健康滋润的发丝。 包裹每一根发丝，让开叉易断的发束重获新生，增加秀发强度，从而保护秀发免于再受损伤。
卡诗发质修复再生发膜（200 毫升） 
发质修复再生发膜是一款黄油质地的发膜，能够深入渗透发丝，恢复秀发强韧并增加弹性。 这款轻盈的发膜适合浓密、极度受损和染烫过度的发质，能够醒活发束并锁住水分，让您体验如丝般光滑的滋润发丝。 其FIBRA-KAP™配方富含六种氨基酸，能够补充蛋白质，促进生长强韧健康的秀发。
卡诗发质修复再生修复精华 (30 毫升)
卡诗修复再生修复精华能够改善损伤严重和染烫过度的头发，补水加调理，让秀发展现健康面貌。 本产品非常适合于稠密、杂乱的头发，可作为修护霜和保水精华液，重塑发质并改善其结构。 精华液含有氨基酸及其独特的 FIBRA-KAP™ 配方，提供可达 230℃ 的过热保护，以防止开叉，在最大程度上减少断裂，并缩短干燥时间，让您可以体验到如丝绸般柔软的发丝。

使用 Kérastase Specifique Cure Anti-Chute Treatment，改善稀疏、缺乏光泽的发丝；这是一款可使用 4 周的高效护理产品，经专门配制用于稀疏的头发。 这款精华液采用了创新的护发技术，可深入渗透至头发纤维，起到修复和强韧功效。
Aminexil® 15.000 PPM 可形成保护屏障，有助于防止热损伤和断裂，而 Rhamanose® 可刺激成纤维细胞的繁殖，恢复弹性和柔软度。 作为一种抗氧化剂，AOX Complex 融合了 L-肌肽、辣木和维生素 E 等强效成分。 持续使用后，可实现亮泽、丰盈的秀发光泽，且体量和提拉度得以改善。

选择这款 Kérastase Discipline Bain Fluidealiste 无硫磺和 Maskeratine 组合产品，它以创新的方式让您获得美丽秀发。 该套装包含两个产品，让您开始一个最佳的头发修护程序。

使用Kérastase Discipline Bain Fluidealiste 可Smooth，强化并增加您头发的弹性。 本品利用氨基酸和流畅的神经酰胺R调理头发，使头发更顺滑、柔软，看起来年轻而充满活力。
Kérastase Discipline Maskeratine (200ml)
此产品将使您的头发更加飘逸，容易打理，其亲角蛋白配方可以由内而外修复受损发质。 这款创新产品可以为头发带来真正的修护。
name: Discipline Bain Fluidealiste 无硫磺 (250ml) 和 Maskeratine (200ml)

product_description: 全球首款秀發抗老化專用CC霜。完美終結受損髮質，瞬效調理，一次擁有保濕，光澤、絲滑、柔順、強韌，防斷裂，抗UV，抗熱傷害，易梳理，持久明亮十大功效。乾髮時使用能修飾造型線條，提升整個造型的質感。也可在濕髮造型前打底用，均勻抹在髮絲上，創造發妝造型的完美基底，免沖洗。

KeraCare補水柔順洗髮水 
溫和調理和清潔髮絲，奢華養護，PH 值均衡的洗髮露。非常適合毛糙髮絲、燙髮、染色髮絲和自然髮絲使用。產生豐富泡沫，去除髮絲和頭皮上的多餘油脂，防止脫髮。蘊含天然植物萃取物。保濕舒緩混合性肌膚，卓效防止髮絲斷裂。修護受損部位，撫平分叉髮尾。綻現秀發最閃耀迷人的光采。 
 使用說明： 
將雙手完全打濕，在手掌之間摩擦洗髮水並輕輕按摩到頭髮上。揉搓至起泡，然後沖洗並重複。
name: 补水柔顺洗发水

product_description: 菲利普?金斯利豐盈洗髮露非常適合細軟、扁塌或幼細蓬鬆髮質使用。溫和高效的清潔，同時增強彈性和韌度。用後秀發飽滿濃密且富有光澤。適合經過燙染處理的頭髮。
name: Kingsley 菲利普金斯利丰盈洗发露 250ml

product_description: 使用 Kérastase Specifique Stimuliste Hair Thickener，呵护稀疏柔软的发丝。 这款创新喷雾适合日常使用，经专门配制用于提升体量和丰盈度。 Aminexil® 15.000 PPM 可形成保护屏障，有助于防止热损伤和断裂，而维生素 PP 和糖脂质 GL® 可改善秀发浓密度。 秀发得到滋养，恢复活力，且质感得到明显提升。
name: Specifique Stimuliste Hair Thickener 125ml

product_description: Rescue dry and damaged locks with Sachajuan’s Moisturizing Shampoo. Based on proprietary Ocean Silk Technology, the ultra-hydrating formula infuses hair with a potent blend of sea-extracted minerals, protein and nutrients, seeking to repair brittle, weak strands and tame unruly frizz. Sweeping away dirt and grease without stripping essential oils, hair feels refreshed and clean with healthy-looking shine and enhanced body.
name: Moisturizing Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Transform the look of limp, lifeless hair with the Sachajuan Ocean Mist Volume Conditioner, a volumising formula that works to soften and detangle fine hair whilst adding weightless body and texture.
Lending your hair beach-worthy bounce, the conditioner expertly nourishes and boosts natural volume. Utilising Ocean Silk Technology, it improves hair's strength, shine and softness whilst promoting textured, beach-bound tresses with long-lasting volume.
name: Ocean Mist Volume Conditioner Travel Size 100ml

product_description:
Transform dull, lifeless and thin hair with the Moroccanoil® Extra Volume Shampoo and Conditioner Duo. Combining two complementary colour-safe treatments, hair is left looking volumised and full of vitality with a mirror-like shine.
Extra Volume Shampoo (500ml)
Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil and revitalising nutrients, including Linden Bud extract, the shampoo naturally plumps up the look of hair, working to restore health and bring back body, shine and manageability. Impurities and excess oils are eliminated, leaving hair weightless and lifted.
Extra Volume Conditioner (500ml)
The gentle, lightweight conditioner infuses hair with a concentrated dosage of Argan Oil, working to smooth and soften individual cuticles whilst plumping them with uplifting nutrients including Linden Bud extract. Hair is left manageable and detangled with a healthy-looking gloss and boosted volume.
name: Extra Volume Shampoo & Conditioner Duo (2x500ml) (Worth £77.80)

product_description:
Treat your hair to the nourishing properties of KeraCare Thermal Wonder Pre-Poo Conditioner, an intensely hydrating treatment that has been specially developed to be used prior to shampoo.
Preparing hair for cleansing and thermal styling, the pre-cleanse conditioner contains a host of fresh botanical extracts and moisturising ingredients, including Moringa and Marula, and penetrates the hair and scalp to refresh, revitalise and rejuvenate. The 10-15 minute treatment infuses hair with beneficial extracts, hydrating and detangling to help reduce damage and breakage when combining. Vitamins, Menthol, Aloe Vera, Green Tea work in synergy to invigorate and protect hair and scalp. Hair is left feeling soft, replenished and moisturised. Can be used as an intensive overnight hair mask.
The first step in your Thermal Wonder™ routine.
name: Thermal Wonder Pre-Poo Conditioner 52ml

product_description:
Restore luminous, glossy locks with the Redken Diamond Oil Glow Dry Conditioner; a replenishing, revitalising formula that works to detangle and hydrate hair.
Harnessing the powers of Amla Extract and Coriander Oil, the weightless conditioner infuses strands with weightless moisture and shine, whilst softening and smoothening hair for a salon-worthy finish. Tresses are left smooth, sleek and glistening from root to tip.
name: Diamond Oil Glow Dry Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
invisibobble Original Hair 发绳 适合任何风格或场合，可以拢住秀发，无需使用发夹和夹发针。
既好玩又有实际作用，其独特、超舒适的形状可以防止头痛和发绳扭结，而其卫生和不吸水的设计及光滑的表面意味着即使在手腕上佩戴，它也会始终保持干燥。
可在潮湿或干燥的头发上使用，不会让头发缠结，使您可以完成任何束发的发式。
name: Original Hair发绳（3个装） - 水晶Clear

product_description:
Treat your hair to the refreshing properties of Sachajuan Normalizing Shampoo, a gentle, daily shampoo that works to cleanse normal hair whilst enhancing body and shine.
Utilising the brand's Ocean Silk Technology, the shampoo expertly washes away oil, dirt and impurities whilst intensely hydrating and increasing volume. Its stimulating properties help to maintain an optimum scalp environment to promote healthier-looking hair. Hair feels refreshed with improved bounce, body and shine.
name: Normalizing Shampoo Travel Size 100ml

product_description:
使用  Nanogen Fibres Grey (15g)，打造丰满浓密的秀发。 100％ 纯角蛋白纤维具有天然的外观和手感，轻松与您自己的秀发融合，打造丰满浓密的秀发。
专利技术配制而成，确保 400％ 强效粘合，双极充电电荷可实现最优厚化。安全产品，可每天使用。
name: Hair Thickening Fibres Grey (15g)

product_description:
Sexy Hair 强力定型啫喱可有效控制您的秀发，它是一款高效护发啫喱，具有超强的定型和亮泽效果。
这款多功能啫喱蕴含有光亮剂，既可用于湿发，也可用于干发，涂抹在湿发上可塑造发型，拥有顺滑的效果，而涂抹在干发上可以打造蓬松的发型。 使秀发保持造型，增强光泽度而不会有任何蓬乱的发丝。
name: Hair 强力定型啫喱 150ml

product_description: Prolong the life of your colour with the Extend My Colour Conditioner from RPR. The hydrating and repairing formula is infused with a blend of Carob Amino Acids, Coconut Oil and Spirulina, working to maximise colour vibrancy and strengthen the fiber. The addition of UV filters help to protect colour from fading. The conditioner will leave hair healthy looking with vibrant colour, high shine and ideal body.
name: Extend My Colour Conditioner 300ml

product_description:
来自Orofluido的Asia Zen Control Elixir 重新发现并精心混合珍贵的亚洲成分，将日常的头发护理程序变成令人幸福的时刻。 该奢华护发灵药特别为干燥、粗糙或发脆头发配制，加入椿本（山茶花）油以控制拳曲，令头发平顺易梳理。 用一层薄膜包裹角质层以反射光线，提高光泽，令头发焕发光彩，健康自然。
该免洗护发产品含竹子提取物，可增强头发弹性，锁住水分，同时滋养米糠油可防止分叉，并强化头发纤维。 含有紫外线过滤成分抵御来自太阳光线的伤害，并形成一层防潮膜，以获得柔顺、光滑的头发。 萦绕着盛开的山茶花和甜美果实的诱人香气，令人神清气爽。 E.N.
name: Asia Zen Control Elixir (50ml)

product_description: This Colour Intensifying Light Mahogany Conditioner by Evo Fabuloso is a colour enhancing conditioner that works to achieve a red-brown tone on medium brown to dark blonde hair. Also working to remove frizz whilst providing salon perfect shine and texture, this conditioner gives results in just 3 minutes.
name: Fabuloso Colour Intensifying Conditioner Mahogany (250ml)

product_description:
Ideal for creating the perfect up-do, the Sleep In Rollers Black Accessories (Bun Ring and Clips) contains everything you need to form a fabulous bun and refresh your locks, whilst matching your hair colour for a seamless finish. - L.M.

Contains:
name: In Rollers Black Accessories (Bun Ring and Clips)

product_description: 使用 Proraso Moustache Comb and Beard Brush Set，令胡须时刻有型。 这款套装能让胡须时刻保持最佳状态。 这款胡须梳能够打造有趣而时尚的造型，适应任何场合，而须刷能够抚平任何毛躁。 胡须梳和须刷尺寸均为 112mm，可使用刷头长 45mm。 尽情去打造胡须造型吧，您将拥有最靓丽的胡须。 A.B.
name: Moustache Comb and Beard Brush Set

product_description: PAYOT 柏姿男士全效清洁型沐浴洗发啫喱可有效焕活您全身的肌肤和秀发。 这款蕴含有丰富矿物质的泡沫啫喱专门为男士而设计，它含有铁和铜元素，可有效祛除杂质，同时可使您从头到脚的肌肤都更加柔软、水润而清爽。 它可使秀发更加柔软亮泽，使肌肤充满活力，为新的一天做好准备。
name: 柏姿男士全效清洁型沐浴洗发啫喱 200ml

product_description:
Strengthen hair from within with the Sublime Repair Treatment Mask from SHOW Beauty. The intensive formula is designed with a blend of Hydrolysed Pea and Quinoa Protein, which deeply nourish hair and improve its elasticity, resulting in shiny, sleek and glossy locks.
Concentrated with a multi-faceted protein-based complex, the mask works to strengthen the fibers from within. The Treatment Mask is able to improve manageability and boost body due to Pro Vitamin B5 which thoroughly conditions. A blend of Caviar and White Truffle work harmoniously to enrich the formula with deep conditioning and revitalising qualities. The hair is left irresistibly touchable.
name: Beauty Sublime Repair Treatment Mask 200ml

product_description:
利用来自Orofluido的Asia Zen Control Conditioner 理顺纠缠的头发，该品牌重新发现并精心混合珍贵的亚洲成分，将日常的头发护理程序变成令人幸福的时刻。 专门为容易拳曲的头发配制，该轻质护发素富含椿本（山茶花）油，以顺滑发丝，同时水解玉米淀粉可控制头发凌乱。
强大的泛醇可渗入发干，提供强效保湿，以修复断裂和开叉，让您获得健康、强壮的头发。 竹子和米糠油可增加灵活性，令头发更容易塑造发型。 头发将变得柔软、平顺和便于梳理。 E.N.
name: Asia Zen Control Conditioner (200ml)

product_description: Treat dry, frizzy and damaged tresses to the Smooth My Ends Split End Protector from RPR. Specially formulated to seal in moisture, the nourishing leave-in treatment is formulated with Aloe Vera, which helps soothes the cuticle and repair split ends. Botanical extracts of Green Tea and Lime add an invigorating burst of freshness as well as potent antioxidant effects. Use before styling to revitalise lacklustre locks.
name: Smooth My Ends Split End Protector 150ml

product_description:
Catering specifically for sensitive or irritated scalps, the A'kin Unscented Shampoo and Unscented Conditioner Duo combines two expertly formulated treatments brimming with nourishing botanical extracts and essential vitamins to gently cleanse and nourish. Working in perfect harmony with one another, expect softened and hydrated tresses with a healthy-looking shine. Ideal for dandruff, eczema, psoriasis and children's scalps.
Unscented Very Gentle Shampoo (500ml)
The mild, fragrance-free shampoo works to refresh and revitalise hair without over-drying. Fortified with six botanical cleansers, the pH-neutral, fragrance-free formula delicately eliminates impurities, whilst soothing and calming the scalp for long-lasting comfort.
Unscented Very Gentle Conditioner (500ml)
This soothing, fragrance-free formula works to relieve irritation and itching. Synergising Macadamia and Jojoba Oils with Oat Protein and Shea Butter, the antioxidant-rich conditioner replenishes moisture and hydration, leaving hair soft and smooth, whilst restoring a comfortable scalp.
name: Unscented Shampoo & Unscented Conditioner Duo 500ml

product_description:
Inspired by a luxurious Indian head massage, Shiffa's Invigorating Hair Oil works to nourish, strengthen and revitalise the hair and scalp without greasy residue.
Harnessing the powers of Peppermint, Rosemary and Nettle Leaf, the restorative, soothing treatment calms and comforts itchy scalps, whilst Sweet Almond, Jojoba and Rosehip condition and moisturise hair from root to tip. Its dose of Grape Seed Oil repairs and protects from environmental aggressors, resulting in smooth, healthy-looking hair with restored shine.
name: Invigorating Hair Oil 100ml

product_description:
Experience pain free brushing whilst on-the-go, with the ikoo Pocket Detangling Hair Brush. The small yet effective brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp. Arriving with a practical bristle cover, the Pocket Brush is protected from dust and other dirt that can collect in your handbag.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, metallic resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
name: Pocket Detangling Hair Brush - Black/Oyster Metallic

product_description:
Corioliss C1 直发器非常适合于直发、卷发或波浪发，配有柔软的握把，打造高性能美发效果。 加热板具备 1" 宽的钛浮板，每次使用都能实现完美的接触和热量分布。采用创新负离子技术，即使是最密的头发，也能轻松滑过，而不会引起静电。
与陶瓷板直发器相比，这款符合人体工程学原理的工具对头发的损伤较小，具备变温控制，可在 60°C-235℃ 之间进行加热调整，以满足不同的造型需求。 配备专业发廊标准的3米电源线，并可360°旋转。 - K.N
name: C1 直发器（青色）

product_description: Style like a professional with the Finishing Pomade from British Barbers' Association. The pomade delivers strong, long-lasting hold that keeps hair looking well groomed all day; protecting and perfecting your chosen style. The formula boasts a glossy finish, leaving locks sculpted and shiny.
name: Barbers' Association Finishing Pomade 100ml

product_description:
Replenish your locks with the Hydrating Masque from Unwash. Smoothing effortlessly onto hair, the hydrating masque reveals locks full of body and vitality.
Fortified with organic Argan oil, the nourishing formula delivers intense hydration to hair in need. The hair cuticle is smoothed, which helps to reduce frizz and increase shine. The hair mask is complete with protein-rich Hydrolysed Quinoa, which protects and repairs the fiber for a silkier finish. Expect hydrated locks that are touchably soft and shiny.
name: Hydrating Masque 190ml

product_description:
Discover a new level of clean with the Bio Cleansing Conditioner from Unwash. Formulated without harsh chemicals, the innovative non-lathering formula eliminates dirt and oil from hair, without stripping essential moisture.
Fortified with Cationic Cleansers, the conditioning formula draws unwanted dirt from locks, without disrupting the cuticle. A blend of organic Evening Primrose oil and Hydrolyzed Keratin works to nourish the hair and the scalp, delivering moisture and strength. Expect smooth, shiny and bouncy hair that is free from oil and frizz.
name: Bio Cleansing Conditioner 74ml

product_description:
Take control of your locks with the Tangle Teezer Compact Styler - Lemon Zest; a brilliantly bright, travel-friendly hair brush that glides effortlessly through wet and dry hair without snagging or tugging.
Designed with unique two-tiered system technology, its long teeth gently detangle knots, whilst its shorter teeth smoothen the hair cuticle for a calm, sleek finish. An ideal size for throwing in your handbag, the ergonomic brush allows you to add volume, texture and shine on-the-go. Complete with a protective cover to guard from fluff, dirt and bacteria.
name: Teezer Compact Styler - Lemon Zest

product_description:
Combat dullness and fading with the Healing ColorCare Color Guard from L’Anza, a weightless, leave-in treatment that prolongs hair colour by up to 107%.
Fortified with a plant-based WASH SHIELD™, the scientifically advanced formula works to protect hair against oxidative chemicals that degrade hair’s natural protective barrier, bonding individual cuticles and restoring CMC lipid layers for vivid, long-lasting colour.
Enriched with essential antioxidants and UV shields, it combats environmental aggressors that cause dullness. Suitable for all hair types, use before washing to prevent colour fading and as a leave-in conditioning treatment for glossy, healthy-looking locks with revitalised colour.
name: Healing ColorCare Color Guard 200ml

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸假发。由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其发夹采用隐形啮合设计，能够持久、牢固、舒适地固定假发，而所保留的角质层和独特的有机色素能够使发丝拥有亮丽的发色，使色泽极其鲜明。 佩戴简单，适合热力造型。
name: Works Jen Atkin 假发 18 英寸——贝沙湾 JA2

product_description: Functional and innovative, ikoo's Home Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles without pain. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Enhances volume, texture and shine without snagging or tugging.
name: Home Hair Brush - White - Orange Blossom
