product_description:
Treat your hair to the protective and nourishing properties of Giovanni's Vitapro Fusion Leave In Conditioner, a vitamin-rich treatment that works to repair dry hair whilst protecting against heat and chemicals.

Utilising Eco Chic Technology™ which synergises beauty from the elements with science, the leave-in conditioner combines a host of vitamins and proteins that penetrate every strand to help soften and nourish while protecting against external aggressors such as heat styling and pollution. Tresses are left feeling soft, supple and manageable.

Suitable for all hair types.
name: Vitapro Fusion Leave In Conditioner 150ml

product_description:
可用 TIGI 的 Bed Head Totally Beachin' 晒后温和护发素护理阳光浸透的头发；这种不会引起掉色的配方护发品有滋养和护理夏日阳光浸透的长发的作用。
这种有滋养作用的护发膏旨在对头发进行专家级保护和护理，用 UV 复合物进一步保持鲜明的颜色，其所含芦荟和抗氧化维生素 E 可以受损之处为目标发挥作用，以使头发给人以超柔软而得到滋润的感觉。
预计头发会柔软而有光泽，充满芒果和橘子的芳香。
name: Bed Head Totally Beachin 晒后温和护发素 (200ml)

product_description: Made of 100% pure keratin, Nanogen Fibres White (30g)     instantly       create natural looking hair density. Blending   effortlessly   with   your   own   hair, the tiny fibres bind securely   from root to tip,     whilst  the    patented technology gives strong   binding and optimal      thickening.    Non-damaging and dermatologically   tested, your hair  will     look instantly    full and healthy.
name: Hair Thickening Fibres White (30g)

product_description:
Replenish and revitalise hair with Balance Me's Protect and Shine Conditioner; a deeply nourishing formula that delivers intense moisture and hydration to leave you with strong, healthy-looking locks.
Harnessing the powers of Sweet Almond and Argan Oils, the weightless conditioner combats dull, weak strands and helps to prevent split ends, whilst soothing and protecting the scalp to restore long-lasting comfort. Hair is soft, glossy and rejuvenated from root to tip.
name: Me Protect and Shine Conditioner 280ml

product_description:
該三步系列專為正常及髮質細軟的自然頭髮設計而成，作為其中一部分，系統1 清潔洗髮水將深度清潔頭髮，同時令頭皮清爽怡人，保持持久亮澤。該獨特的清潔洗髮水包含Transactive Delivery System®，借助抗氧化物、植物元素和維生素，能夠有效去除油脂、產品殘留和污垢（如皮脂和脂肪酸），可清潔毛囊，同時不會帶走必需的天然油脂。 
 BioAMP®技術令髮絲根根飽滿，同時減少脫髮，讓頭髮更加豐盈，而Activ-Renewal®添加薄荷油和白茶萃取物，令頭皮清爽舒適，煥發活力。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 俪康丝系统 1 清洁洗发水，适合正常及细软自然头发 (1000ml)

product_description:
Transform lack-lustre locks with the label.m Volume Styling Set; a body-boosting kit that combines a strengthening protein spray, volume mousse and professional hair brush. Housed in a gift box.
Protein Spray (250ml)
Enriched with a moisturising blend of Jasmine, Sweet Pea, Wheat and Soy, the non-greasy spray can be used on damp or dry hair to add luminous shine and maintain colour vibrancy. The brand's exclusive Enviroshield Complex works to strengthen hair and shield from heat damage caused by styling tools and harmful UV rays.
Volume Mousse (200ml)
Create bigger, bolder styles with the weightless, volume-boosting mousse; an innovative formula that works to add body and bounce to limp, lifeless locks. Simply spray on damp hair and work through from root to tip, then blow dry for edgy texture and ultimate definition.
Large Hot Brush
Ideal for mid to long hair lengths, the hair brush features a mixture of boar and ionic nylon bristles that glide effortlessly through hair without snagging or static. Its fast-heating ceramic barrel allows you to create a range of styles, from looser curls and waves to a voluminous, straight blow-dry.
name: Volume Styling Set

product_description:
Mr Natty's Face Forest Fix Up Gift Set combines two of the brand's best-selling products that promise to leave your facial fuzz looking and feeling perfectly groomed.
Shipwreck Soap (120g)
Handmade and traditionally cold-pressed, the soap gently cleanses the face and body. With a natural glycerin base, the kind-to-skin bar melts away impurities without over-drying skin, whilst delivering a masculine fragrance blended from Vetiver, Patchouli and Cocoa. Can be used as a shave soap, shampoo or emergency deodorant when applied dry.
Famous Beard Elixir (8ml)
Deeply condition your facial fuzz. Enriched with a blend of natural oils, including Vetiver, Patchouli, Bergamot and Grapeseed, the fast-absorbing elixir moisturises skin underneath facial hair, whilst preventing ingrowing hairs and leaving you feeling invigorated all day long. Delivers a masculine woody fragrance and keeps your beard in tip-top condition.
name: Natty Face Forest Fix Up Gift Set

product_description:
无论是是金发还是白发，使用Tigi Catwalk Fashionista Violet Conditioner（250ml）后都可让秀发展现靓丽风采。                                   该护发素不含硫酸盐，可以软化、滋养和柔顺您的发丝，同时能够消除使金发显得暗沉无光的黄铜色和黄色。
它富含紫罗兰、珍珠提取物和米浆，可以亮泽和恢复您的发色，如此您就可以更长时间地保持"那只是晒白"的感觉。 - L.M.
name: Catwalk Fashionista Violet Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
橙色款 KC Professional Color Mask 将会让头发色泽焕然一新，同时有助于修复秀发。 此款发膜有特殊配方，可以保持和加深目前的发色，同时会恢复头发的神采，给人一种刚刚"染过色"的感觉。
富含维他命原B5和角蛋白衍生物，它还能有效修复受损的头发，让您的头发看起来有强度、顺滑和健康。 此护理产品不仅可以保持现有的发色，它还能使您头发的色调更加柔和。 也可以将Color Mask的各种色调混合起来，创建一个定制的色调。 - L.M.
name: Professional Color Mask - Orange (200ml)

product_description:
Men Rock醒脑须膏是一种免洗型护理膏，该品牌的西西里柠檬清香让它带上淡淡香味。 旨在软化和滋润胡须，让您感觉全身焕然一新。 这款多乳脂的须膏专为胡须和面部皮肤配制，所含的咖啡因愉悦地唤醒胡须，减少刺激和瘙痒。 E.N. 
使用方法：涂少量到洗净后用毛巾擦干的胡须上。
name: Rock西西里柠檬与咖啡因醒脑须膏

product_description: Fast heating, this Babyliss Pro Ceramic Dial-A-Heat tong creates perfect curls while leaving hair smooth and shiny. The ceramic barrel distributes heat evenly to ensure that curls are defined and more natural looking.
name: PRO Ceramic Dial a Heat Tong (24mm)

product_description:
Evo Casual Act Moulding Paste（90g）非常适合那些喜爱低调发型的人士使用。本产品会让您的秀发稍具层次感，同时，可塑的定型效果可以让您全天随时多次任意变换造型。
本产品适合所有发质使用，不会在您的秀发中留下残余物，可以打造出十分自然的哑光外观效果，因而是白天打理发型的理想产品。 易于使用，这款方便的发膏应该成为您日常打理发型的必备产品。 - L.M.

使用说明：

涂抹在毛巾擦干的头发上，然后做出想要的发型。
name: Casual Act Moulding Paste（100g）

product_description:
Evo 伊噢Normal Persons 護髮素(300ml) 配方蘊含保濕因子、蛋白質、控油劑和頭皮滋養成分，多效合一，可滋養頭髮，平衡頭皮油脂分泌。使用後，可讓您的秀發手感柔滑，易於打理。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 伊噢 Normal Persons 护发素 (300ml)

product_description: 适用于纤细秀发的 Louise Galvin 洗发水是一款质地轻盈的加强型洗发水，能让您纤细的秀发更加顺滑而有光泽，增加发量，而不会有重质残留物。 蕴含的小麦蛋白和维他命可有效消除蓬乱；纯天然调节剂可使秀发告别打结，使其变得柔软而有光泽。 – I.M
name: Galvin 洗发水（适用于精细头发） 735ml

product_description: 使用TIGI Catwalk Fashionista深褐色护发素（250ml），滋养秀发，丝般柔软。 该款护发素专为棕色和暖色调秀发设计，修复秀发，使其柔顺丝滑，并防止发丝断裂和零乱碎发。 混合了护发油，深褐色染剂和七叶树萃取物，让秀发呈现深色发色，光彩莹亮。 护发素可以每天使用，而且不脱色。 – N.P.
name: Catwalk Fashionista深褐色护发素（250ml）

product_description:
Nourish facial hair with Mr. King's Royal Beard Oil; a leave-in conditioning treatment to smooth and hydrate with a convenient pipette applicator.
Perfectly balancing a delicate blend of natural essential oils, including Sweet Almond Oil, it helps promote enhanced re-growth and alleviate dry, itchy skin with intense moisturisation. Infused with an invigorating scent of Cedarwood and Lime, your beard will look full, healthy and effortlessly groomed.
name: King's Royal Beard Oil 30ml

product_description:
Treat dry, unruly locks with the Expert Colour Care Anti-Frizz Supersize Conditioner from Jo Hansford.
Exclusively developed in her Mayfair salon and utilising advanced technologies to protect and enhance natural or chemically coloured hair, the lightweight formula works to detangle and smooth hair while infusing it with essential moisture and vitamins, combating flyaways and frizz.
Fortified with the exclusive Colour Care Complex, Anti-Fade and Anti-Frizz formula, it contains Sweet Blue Lupin peptides that have been scientifically proven to prolong hair colour vibrancy and tone for up to 30 washes, while Prodew Amino Acids strengthen and protect the surface of hair follicles to counteract damage and breakage.
Antioxidant-rich extracts of Sunflower Seed and Pomegranate Oil combat free radical damage and enhance hairs natural elasticity, plus the addition of conditioning Guar Gum shields against humidity and electrostatic charge, minimising fluffiness and the appearance of split ends. Expect manageable, silky smooth and shiny hair with a professional sleek finish and reinvigorated colour.
name: Hansford Expert Colour Care Anti-Frizz Supersize Conditioner (1000ml)

product_description:
TIGI 蒂芝床头全效™生发调节啫喱让您拥有柔软的秀发；其生发配方可有效从发根到发梢焕活发丝，丰盈和增加发量。
这款护发素采用创新的纤维增厚技术，能渗透到发丝纤维深层，使其在吸收水分后能够隆起和增厚，从而让其看起来更加饱满，而不会增加重量。 让您的秀发拥有所期待的亮丽和弹性，增强定型效果，增加发量，使秀发散发着该品牌"典型的浆果"馨香。
name: 蒂芝床头海量发量护发素（200ml）

product_description:
Finish your style with the Oscar Blandi Polish Glossing Crème. Suitable for all hair types, the multitasking styling cream combats frizz, protects against heat styling and imparts weightless shine.
Enriched with a Jasmine Calming Complex that delicately balances extracts of Jasmine Flower, Sweet Almond Oil, Keratin and Vitamin E, it strengthens each individual follicle and seals the cuticle while smoothing flyaways for a sleek and glossy finish. Imbued with an exotic jasmine fragrance.
name: Blandi Polish Glossing Crème 50ml

product_description:
用L'Anza Healing Smooth亮泽 Conditioner (1000ml)护理乱发，令秀发光滑亮泽。 这款采用了 Keratin疗愈体系，可以瞬时密封、修复和保护秀发，令秀发光滑不毛躁。
同时，Organic薏苡仁有助于控制卷发和波浪发，如此可以打造丝毫不乱的超直光滑的发型。 这款乳状护发素蕴含丰富奢华的成分，可有效疏通头发，令秀发亮泽柔顺。
name: Healing Smooth 亮泽 Conditioner (1000ml) - （价值 99.00 英镑）

product_description:
Effortlessly hold hair in place with the invisibobble ORIGINAL Hawkwardly Good Looking Hair Tie; a limited-edition piece taken from the brand’s unique Circus Collection. Arriving in time for summer and festival season, the collection boasts an array of colourful creatures that guarantee to brighten any up-do.
The ‘Hawkwardly Good Looking’ hair ties arrive in a metallic, mint green hue and are housed inside decorative packaging adorned with an array of feathered friends. Perfect for any style or occasion, the invisibobble hair tie works to hold hair in place without the use of clips and pins.
Fun and functional, the unique, ultra-comfortable shape prevents headaches and kinks, whilst the hygienic, non-soaking design and smooth surface means the bobble stays dry even when worn on the wrist. Can be used in wet or dry hair without tangling, allowing you to create any up-do you desire.
name: Circus Collection ORIGINAL Hawkwardly Good Looking Hair Tie

product_description: 这款Catwalk Fashionista深褐色洗发水（300ml）由TIGI专为深褐色秀发配制，提亮发色，让卷发柔软亮泽。 轻轻冲洗头发后、可去除污垢、杂质及多余油脂。 含深褐色染料及七叶树提取物等成分，可令头发色调温暖，头发更蓬润、更健康。 – N.P.
name: Catwalk Fashionista深褐色洗发水（300ml）

product_description:
Lilibeth of New York 修眉刀非常适合精心修饰您的眉毛，让您拥有更完美的眉形；它是一款高性能的无痛脱毛工具，能够突显您的眉毛线条，无须使用镊子拔或密蜡脱毛。
这款使用方便的工具既适合男士，也适合女士，它配备有经久耐用的不锈钢刀片，即便是最短的眉毛，也能让您轻松舒适地均匀脱去，此外，其便携的折叠式设计是外出旅行随身携带的理想选择。 还可用于上唇、下巴、比基尼线的毛发或面部的绒毛。
name: of New York 修眉刀——紫色（每套含两把修眉刀）

product_description: 俪康丝系统 4 清洁洗发水配方独特，使纤弱、明显稀疏的烫染头发更加浓密并恢复水分平衡。作为三部护理套装，该清洁洗发水是实现浓密头发的第一步。这款洗发露融合多种先进技术，包括增加发量的 BioAmp™ 技术和焕活头皮的 Glyco-Shield™ 技术，可去除头皮和头发上每日堆积的堵塞毛囊的皮脂、脂肪酸和环境残留。创新配方深层清洁，令头发饱满丰盈强健。- K.N.
name: 俪康丝系统 4 清洁洗发水，适合细软、明显稀疏的烫染头发 (1000ml)

product_description:
Clarify and protect hair with the Clean Conditioner from OUAI, a cult-favourite haircare brand developed by stylist-to-the-stars Jen Atkin.
Fortified with the brand’s exclusive Smart Technology Complex, the hydrating formula contains a delicate blend of Amino Acids, Smart Keratin and Tamarind Seed extract to effectively nourish and protect each hair follicle without weighing it down, leaving locks feeling soft and manageable.
Suitable for all hair types including colour treated, the gentle conditioner helps combat humidity and eliminate toxins for sleek, balanced and healthy-looking tresses with enhanced moisture levels and brilliant shine.
name: Clean Conditioner 250ml

product_description: 塞巴斯汀专业炫彩护发素帮助恢复和柔顺纤细的秀发。富含水晶萃取物，平滑粗糙的角质，使头发易打理，没有坠重感。形成一层发光表面，带来自然美丽光泽，打造完美造型基础。
name: 塞巴斯汀专业炫彩护发素 (250ml)

product_description:
American Crew力量Cleanser Style洗发露拥有独特的配方，可以每天用其清洁和滋养头发。 这款洗头水 Perfect各种发质，可以深层清洁头发，同时，这种洗发水可以进行终极深层清洁，同时给头皮降温，使头皮感到清爽从而重新焕发出青春活力。
它独特地结合了表面活性剂，以获得终极清洁能力，使头发变得丰厚浓密并改善质地以打理出时尚炫酷完美的发型。 这款超大量的洗头水意味着您将可以很长一段时间都用它来滋养头发！K.D.
name: Crew 力量力量净化洗发露 (1L)

product_description: Catering specifically for men, the ManCave Caffeine Shampoo naturally cleanses and strengthens hair. Fortified with a stimulating blend of Caffeine, Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E, the lightweight gel formula effortlessly eliminates excess oil and impurities, whilst soothing itchy scalps for long-lasting comfort. Expect soft, smooth and healthy-looking hair after use.
name: Caffeine Shampoo 200ml

product_description:
Perfect your hair with Alterna Caviar Smoothing Hydra Gelée, a frizz-fighting formula designed to nourish, smoothen and enhance hair's shine.
Delivering weightless hydration, the hair-rescuing solution combines fatty acid-rich Caviar Extract with proprietary Color Hold® technology to promote high shine whilst locking in colour to ensure hair stays bright and healthy looking. Its smoothing and reparative properties combat frizz and keep locks safe from future damage. Hair is left smooth and sleek with mirror-reflecting shine. Can be used on wet hair before drying and heat styling, or dry hair for on-the-go touch ups.
name: Caviar Smoothing Hydra Gelee 100ml

product_description:
精緻小巧，便於攜帶，非常適合晚上外出或假期旅行時放在錢包裡。所以，不要讓打結和毛躁擾亂自己的心情，用髮梳重新梳理，打造髮型！ 
本品輕鬆便攜，不會佔據錢包的太多空間，適合放入最小的錢包。簡單易潔，不會用普通髮梳那樣損害秀發，因為這是一款專業工具。 
請注意： 顏色可能不同。
name: 便携发梳

product_description: Boost and refresh dull, limp locks with the Sachajuan Volume Powder; a matte-finish, powder-based spray suitable for all hair types, lengths and colours. Adding soft texture and malleable structure, the dry shampoo is perfect for instantly bringing lacklustre hair back to life in-between washes, absorbing excess oil at the roots to alleviate the look of greasiness.
name: Volume Powder Hair Spray 200ml

product_description:
使用 Trilogy 光滑柔顺护发素获得柔顺秀发。 让经过染色和热受损的头发获得大量水分并帮助其恢复和修复；松解缠结，平顺秀发，让发丝易于打理和造型。
含抗氧化剂和富含蛋白质的角蛋白，通过植物修复保护涂层保护发干，所以您会感到发质强壮和健康。 芦荟能温和地洁净您秀发上的多余油脂和杂质，而朝鲜蓟能保护您的秀发免受阳光和氧化损伤。

使用说明：
name: 光滑柔顺护发素（250毫升）

product_description: Ideal for normal to fine hair, the yes to Cucumbers Volumising Conditioner adds body and bounce to your style. Fortified with vitamin-rich Cucumber and Aloe Vera, the hydrating formula strengthens and nourishes hair to leave it soft, shiny and healthy-looking from root to tip.
name: to Cucumbers Volumising Conditioner 280ml

product_description:
Combat dandruff with the Sachajuan Scalp Shampoo; a lightweight, daily treatment that soothes dry, itchy scalps and helps eliminate flakes.
Fortified with Piroctone Olamine and Climbazole, the gentle formula delivers anti-fungal benefits without using excessive toxins or stripping away essential oils. Balancing a delicate blend of Rosemary Oil, Menthol, Salicylic Acid and Ginger extract, it helps maintain optimum moisture levels while sweeping away dirt, oil and impurities. Hair feels soft, refreshed and revitalised, while the scalp feels comfortable and calm.
name: Scalp Shampoo 1000ml

product_description:
Restore luminous, healthy-looking locks with KMS ColorVitality Shampoo; a radiance-reviving formula that works to cleanse, hydrate and preserve colour vibrancy.
Harnessing the powers of an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the lightweight shampoo gently purifies and refreshes hair, whilst creating a luxurious lather that locks in colour and helps to prevent fading in between salon appointments. Expect smooth, sleek and glossy locks with enhanced tone.
name: Color Vitality Shampoo 300ml

product_description:
The Kérastase Reflection Fondant Chromatique & Touche Chromatique Duo in 'Copper' offers personalised care for your copper, colour-treated hair. Combining an ink-in-care, highly concentrated hair dye formula with a nourishing, shine-enhancing conditioner, the pair work in tandem to correct and brighten colour for restored softness, colour luminosity and radiance.
Fondant Chromatique (200ml)
A radiance-enhancing conditioner specially developed to soften and revive colour-treated hair. Expertly detangling whilst protecting colour, the nourishing conditioner utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasise light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant with enhanced shine.
Touche Chromatique - Copper (10ml)
A colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique. The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your hair; it helps neutralise unwanted yellow tones for a radiant, enhanced copper finish. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
name: Reflection Fondant Chromatique 200ml & Touche Chromatique - Copper 10ml

product_description: Prolong the life of your colour with the Extend My Colour Leave in Treatment from RPR. The hydrating and reconstructing formula is infused with a unique blend of Sunflower with Vitamin E, Carob and Spirulina offering strengthening proteins and antioxidants, which help to reduce breaking of the fiber. The addition of UV filters help to protect colour from fading. The treatment will leave hair soft, shiny and thoroughly conditioned.
name: Extend My Colour Leave in Treatment 150ml

product_description:
JoicoCliniscalp平衡Scalp滋养护发精油可以使秀发变得浓密，是一款平衡和保湿护发精油，具有明显的成效。 这款产品的独特的配方蕴含迷迭香油和常春藤提取物以及葵花籽油，可以深层滋润秀发和头皮，使卷发变得更浓密、天然健康。
这款护发精油还可以保护秀发免受环境侵害因素的伤害，一定会使您的秀发看起来比以往更健康。 K.D.
name: Cliniscalp平衡Scalp滋养 - 天然Hair (300ml)

product_description:
使用专为染发设计的 KeraCare 护发素，护理染发，超强补水。 这款高端护发素经过专门配制，能够更好地保持染发发色，使其散发迷人光泽。
专为染发设计的 KeraCare 护发素能够减少染发褪色，令秀发充满活力。 采用护发保护配方，可以阻挡紫外线对秀发的伤害，同时滋养秀发。
使用说明：
name: 护发素，针对染发（240ml）

product_description:
Giovanni's Wellness Scalp Serum utilises Chinese botanicals, powerful vitamins and intense nutrients to strengthen, replenish and protect the hair and scalp.
Harnessing the powers of antioxidant-rich An Mole and soothing Hei Zhi Ma, the deeply nourishing, holistic treatment delivers intense moisture, whilst improving texture and manageability for soft, healthy-looking hair from root to tip. Helps to repair split ends and defend against the damaging effects of heat styling, resulting in smooth, glossy locks with a frizz-free finish. Complete with a pipette for mess-free application.
name: Wellness Scalp Serum 25ml

product_description: MiTi 专业发圈非常适合打造沙龙级品质的发型，可牢固地固定秀发，而无需发夹或边夹。 其独特的螺旋形状使其适合各种发型，不会发生锯齿状或扭结，同时提供极致的舒适感，其光滑的设计使其可在睡眠时佩戴，能最大化减轻给头皮带来的压力。 既有趣，又实用，让您轻松打造高髻。
name: 专业发圈——天堂紫（3 根）

product_description:
NIOXIN System 5 Scalp Revitaliser(1000ml) 采用了该品牌独有的三种技术，可以护理和治疗中等至粗糙、 一般至稀疏、天然和经过化学处理的Hair  。  Smoothplex® 技术有助于控制乱发，同时护理和保护毛干，以预防头发损坏和破损，这些还可能造成脱发和头发变得稀疏。
Glyo-Shield®技术融合了白茶提取物和胡椒薄荷油，可以焕醒头皮，护理剂可以平衡水分和提供保护，特别是对于那些需要保湿的经过染色的头发。
Transactive Delivery System® 结合了净化剂和维生素及抗氧化剂，可以防止毛囊因皮脂而堵塞并扫除环境残留的阻碍，而不会剥夺保持健康头发所需的精油。
5号头皮修复护发素是 NIOXIN 护发三部曲中的第二步，能够帮助受脱发困扰和秀发稀薄的人群，同时也针对特定发质，让秀发和头皮保持健康状态。
NIOXIN 护发产品专为丰盈并激活逐渐变稀疏的秀发而设计，帮助那些饱受脱发困扰的人群。 NIOXIN共推出6个不同的系列，无论您属于什么发质，总能找到一款适合您的产品。
如今该品牌已经帮助了全球50%的饱受脱发或头发稀薄问题困扰的人群，而且70%的产品使用者均反映使用头几次便能有明显改善。
name: System 5 Scalp Revitaliser（适合中等至粗糙、一般至稀疏Hair 1000ml） - （价值 68.30英镑）

product_description:
The Sachajuan Styling Cream is a luxurious formula dedicated to defining and smoothing your straight or curly hair.
Utilising Ocean Silk Technology to add light-reflecting shine, the styling cream expertly softens hair whilst improving manageability and protecting during heat styling. Straight hair looks sleek and healthy; curls look perfectly smooth and defined.
name: Styling Cream 125ml

product_description:
Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Shampoo和Conditioner两件套包含超大量洗发水和护发素，物超所值。 这款套装可深层清洁和净化头发，使其质地柔软，是完美的礼物！ K.D。
Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Shampoo (1000ml)
Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Shampoo可温和地清除头发上的杂质，其积极援救系统可深入头发结构中修复、重建和挽回化学处理和热力造型造成的危害。 它添加了护理成分，可使头发变得强韧、光滑而充满活力。
Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Conditioner (1000ml)
用Sebastian Professional Penetraitt Conditioner将头发恢复至健康状态。 这款护发素配有积极援救系统，可深入头发结构，从内部重建和修复头发，帮助换回化学处理和热力造型造成的损害迹象。 颜色安全的配方可使您的头发变得强韧、光滑、触感柔软。
name: Professional Penetraitt Shampoo和Conditioner (2 x 1000ml)

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Elixir Ultime Trio，呵护细发；包括奢华洗发水、多功效发霜和富含美发油脂的滋养油，可从发根至发梢恢复亮泽、提升丰盈度并活化发束。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain (250ml)
Elixir Ultime 是一款非常值得拥有、如金般纯净的奢华轻盈洗发水；经过精心设计，适用于所有发质，让您获得沙龙级妆效。 这款富含油脂的洗发水可为您提供最奢华的清洁体验，让您拥有皇室般感受，并呈现散发镜面般光泽的丝滑秀发。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime Crème Fine (150ml)
这款多功效护发霜含有白花油和石榴提取物，可用于吹干之前预清洗，作为深层调理产品；或作为干性发质的免洗定型产品。 这款轻盈护发霜非常适合中等粗细的头发至细发，融合了紫外线光滤剂，以保护秀发，令其亮泽、顺滑、健康。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime 细发护理油 (100ml)
使用这款细发护理油，呵护秀发并体验丰盈功效；这种配方旨在保护秀发、恢复活力和提升体量。 这款扩散喷雾富含阿甘油和玉米油等珍贵油类混合成分，能够均匀地喷洒在头发上，不会将头发压得平塌，反而能够塑造浓密的外观，同时采用 Oléo-Complexe 和 Intra-Cylane® 技术，加粗每根发丝。 秀发看起来更加浓密、健康而柔软，散发镜面般亮泽。 吹干前后均可使用，全天均可保持神清气爽。
name: Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain 250ml, Crème Fine 150ml and Fine Hair Oil 100ml Bundle

product_description:
Wet Brush Safari 动物印花发刷可轻松去除头发打结和缠结。 这款顺发刷拥有纤细、强韧和富有弹性的 Intelliflex™ 刷毛，可轻松滑过任何发质；亦具备 SofTips™，可按摩头皮并促进毛囊血液循环。
这些刷毛足够坚韧，能清除打结；亦足够灵活，不伤头发和头皮；并被设计为在每次刷过之后能恢复到原有形状，有助于减少头发断裂和受损。 这款多功能发刷还可用于干发、假发和接发。 - L.M.
name: Brush Safari

product_description:
Nourkrin's Scalp Lotion is a gentle formula specially formulated to help protect the scalp and promote a healthy environment for normal hair growth.
Applied directly to thinning areas of the hair, the scientifically formulated lotion performs gentle action on the scalp, protecting components of the hair follicle whilst creating an optimum environment to encourage natural hair growth. With continued use, the scalp will feel protected and hair will look healthier.
name: Scalp Lotion (75ml)

product_description:
使用 Nanogen Fibres White (15g) 打造丰满浓密的秀发。 100％ 纯角蛋白纤维具有天然的外观和手感，轻松与您自己的秀发融合，打造丰满浓密的秀发。
专利技术配制而成，确保 400％ 强效粘合，双极充电电荷可实现最优厚化。安全产品，可每天使用。
name: Hair Thickening Fibres White (15g)

product_description: 完美适合整洁考究的绅士，来自men-ü的定型和闪亮发蜡是一款可使用的发蜡，带来高光泽同时提供中等保持度。 适合所有类型的头发，这款轻盈产品甚至可以控制粗糙、波浪型和浓密的头发。 建模、造型和实验以打造您想要的发型。 用水很容易洗掉。 E.N.
name: Men's定型和光亮发蜡 (100ml)

product_description:
Corioliss 自由式无线直发器 ，非常适合外出时使用。流线型紧凑设计，打造高性能美发效果。
钛板材质、适合旅行时使用。轻量级铁杆可轻松滑过头发，消除头发静电和毛躁，随时随地帮您打造完美发型。
配有三级温度设置，及一个12V车载适配器和家用充电器。该工具电池寿命长，另外配有旅行锁和收纳袋。 E.N.

Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸假发。由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其发夹采用隐形啮合设计，能够持久、牢固、舒适地固定假发，而所保留的角质层和独特的有机色素能够使发丝拥有亮丽的发色，使色泽极其鲜明。 佩戴简单，适合热力造型。
name: Works Jen Atkin 假发 18 英寸——蜜香金 6/24

product_description: Kebelo丝绒卷发洗发水（250ml）能够抚顺毛躁的卷发。 这款令秀发重现活力的洗发水不含SLS和苯甲酸酯类，融入了丰富的椰子油、洋甘菊和藜麦，令卷发持久卷曲，柔顺不毛躁。 为秀发提供深层滋养，补充秀发必须的水分，直击受损的表皮。 期待洁净柔软、弹力丰盈的迷人头发。 - K.N.

非常适合难以选择确切颜色的人们，来自Beauty Works的100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension让您在购买全套颜色前可以匹配自己头发的自然颜色。
这种屡获殊荣的接发使用保有角质层并经轻度加工的最优质Remy人发制造，确保其不会纠结在一起。
发丝巧妙粘合在一起，以防止碎裂，令接发完美增加适当的长度，令头发丰满、茂盛。 E.N.
name: Works 100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension - Hot Toffee 4

product_description: Revlon 露华浓滋养染发膏只需三分钟即可焕活发丝，增强发色的活力。 这款不含氨的染发膏采用离子染料，能瞬间与发丝发生相互作用，具有超快速的染发和超静电作用，而 AHA 水果酸可将营养成分渗透到角质层，以修复和软化发丝，补充发丝所需的水分。 非常适合在两次沙龙染发期间使用，让您拥有所期待的顺滑和闪亮，增强秀发的亮泽感。
name: 露华浓专业滋养染发膏 200 酒红色 100ml

product_description:
Sexy Hair 活力护色染发后锁色发乳可有效保护经过染发处理的秀发，它可用在护发的最后一步锁住发色，保持发色的整体性。
这款强化护发产品蕴含有玫瑰和杏仁油，能够专业地锁住发色，与此同时综合染发处理过程中的化学成分，以更持久地保持发色。 其中具有舒缓和抗炎作用的玫瑰精油可使秀发和头皮保持柔软、舒缓，而杏仁油蕴含有重要的脂肪酸，可为发丝补充营养成分，促进秀发健康成长。 还具有保湿作用，让秀发看起来更加活泼而有光泽。
name: Hair 活力护发染发后锁色发乳 150ml

product_description:
Deeply hydrate hair from root to tip with the A'kin Avocado and Calendula Conditioner; a lightweight, nourishing formula that works to restore healthy, luscious locks.
Enriched with Macadamia, Calendula Extract and certified organic Avocado Oil, the conditioner saturates long, dry hair with intense moisture, leaving it soft, smooth and naturally beautiful.
name: Avocado and Calendula Conditioner 500ml

product_description:
Visibly repair dry and damaged hair with the Nourish and Repair Shampoo from MÁDARA. The rich and silky formula cleanses the fiber, whilst working to visibly repair damage such as that caused by heat or the sun.
Enriched with Northern Nettle and Quince, the formula defends against fatigue, preventing against unwanted split ends or hair breakage. Hair is left looking reinforced and incredibly smooth.
name: Nourish and Repair Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Ideal for people having trouble selecting the exact colour, the 100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension from Beauty Works allows you to match with your natural hair colour before purchasing the full set.
The award-winning extensions are created using the finest Remy human hair with preserved cuticles and have been lightly processed to ensure they remain tangle-free.
Hair strands are delicately bound together to prevent shredding, making the extensions perfect for adding discreet length, fullness or body for voluminous locks. E.N.
name: Works 100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension - California Blonde 613/16

product_description:
Viviscal Man Hair 生长补充剂是一种天然食品补充剂，旨在促进男士现有头发的生长。 这种神奇的产品可以从内部使头发保持健康生长，有助于令头发变得浓密并防止脱发。
这款头发生长补充剂蕴含主要成分 AminoMar C™，该成分是一种富含蛋白质的化合物，融合了海洋提取物和有机可溶性二氧化硅及维生素C。 Viviscal 还含有氨基酸，可以提供必需的营养物质，从内部自然滋养您的头发。
该补充剂为 3 份装，每份 60粒，易于吞咽、没有异味，您在 3个月里有足够的补充剂促进头发生长。
建议用量：
name: Man Hair生长补充剂（3×60）（3个月的分量）

product_description:
Alpecin Tuning shampoo 适合日常使用，其独特成分可加强秀发的自然色泽，同时减少白发产生。 这款洗发水含强化色素，提升发量并加深发色。亦含有咖啡因复合物，120 秒直达发根，刺激头发生长，超越一般水平。
每次使用这款咖啡因洗发水，可实现最终发色并防止脱发，令发丝更加丰盈、亮黑。 K.D.
name: Tuning Shampoo (200ml)

product_description:
Effortlessly detangle locks with a Shades of Love Hair Brush from Wet Brush. The stylish pink brushes boast a rubber coated handle for grip and control and flexible bristles to eliminate knots whilst massaging the scalp, stimulating the circulation at the follicle for healthier, shinier hair. The brush expertly withstands heat and won't snag or break hair.
The ‘Shades of Love’ tool is a 2-in-1 brush and cleaner. The hairbrush comes with a full size brush cleaner that sits conveniently and securely inside the handle. The brush cleaner is useful for removing unwanted hair and residue that can build up on hair tools and reduce their lifespan. This will help to keep your Wet Brush product looking pristine for longer.
name: Brush Shades of Love Hair Brush (Various Shades)

product_description:
invisibobble 强力 Hair 发绳 特别适合在锻炼或进行体育活动时使用，能够使蓬乱、难以打理的头发服帖，无需使用发夹和夹发针。
既好玩又有实际作用，其超舒适的、加强螺旋形的形状可以防止头痛和发绳扭结，而其卫生和不吸水的设计及光滑的表面意味着即使在手腕上佩戴，它也会始终保持干燥。
可在潮湿或干燥的头发上使用，不会造成缠结、断裂或钩到头发。
name: - 水晶透明

product_description:
Treat your hair to the nourishing properties of Sachajuan Conditioner, a replenishing formula that helps to strengthen and enhance the appearance of your tresses.
Utilising Ocean Silk Technology for unrivalled conditioning and detangling, the conditioner glides effortlessly through hair, eliminating knots and tangles whilst adding shine, body and bounce. Hair is left feeling silky and replenished.
name: Conditioner

product_description:
KeraCare 头皮干痒亮泽霜能够舒缓干燥头皮的不适感，展现滋润的美丽秀发。 这一滋养配方能够恢复干燥起皮的头皮，重现健康的美丽秀发。
这款具有舒缓功效的 KeraCare 头皮干痒亮泽霜非常温和，可以加入日常秀发护理步骤，每天使用。
使用说明：
name: 头皮干痒亮泽霜（200g）

product_description: Philip Kingsley 菲利普·金斯利弹力素深层修护霜是一款高度浓缩的护发产品，可有效提高经过过度处理、损伤的秀发和蓬松发型的丰盈度，增强弹性和光泽感。 紫外线过滤器提供残余保护。
name: Kingsley 菲利普·金斯利弹力素深层修护霜（500ml）

product_description:
Witness fuller-looking locks with Grow Gorgeous' Hair Growth Serum Intense, Density Shampoo Intense and Hyaluronic Density Conditioner. Working in synergy to promote longer, denser-looking hair, each product utilises a host of technologies to leave every strand feeling stronger, healthier and fuller-looking.
Hair Growth Serum Intense (60ml)
Achieve visibly thicker hair with this intense hair growth serum, developed with a 40% concentration of nine technologies. With its Stabilized Dihydroquercetin-Glucoside Complex, the serum contains Glycine and Zinc to improve hair length for a fuller appearance, whilst a unique form of water-compatible Caffeine absorbs into the scalp to reduce hair loss in a small time period. Its Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3 and Clover Flower Extract Active Complex has been proven to visibly increase hair density by 13% within four months, whilst Bio-Active Pea Sprout starts to work within two weeks to visibly improve hair growth by 78%. Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid to penetrate the scalp and boost hydration so you can experience luscious, voluminous locks.
Hair Density Shampoo Intense (190ml)
An ultra-concentrated formula infused with Amino Acids, Biotin, Caffeine and B-Vitamins to visibly increase density of hair. Its advanced technology supports the follicles to promote healthy-looking locks. Delivering gentle, yet effective cleansing to prevent damage to hair, the shampoo is ideal for slow-growing and thinning hair, or for weak fibres in need of strengthening. Suitable for all hair types, including colour-treated, you can expect denser, fuller looking locks.
Hyaluronic Density Conditioner (190ml)
An advanced hair and scalp conditioning formula that works to visibly increase hair thickness and restore softness. An innovative form of Hyaluronic Acid is combined with amino acids, biotin and B-Vitamins to stimulate hair follicles for a fuller appearance. Suitable for all hair types, including colour-treated, the conditioner combats and addresses thinning hair so you can experience dramatically improved hair density.
name: Gorgeous Hair Growth Serum Intense, Density Shampoo Intense and Hyaluronic Density Conditioner

product_description:
Enhance the radiance of your blonde hair with Joico's Blonde Life Brightening Masque for Illuminating Hydration and Softness, a nourishing and neutralising hair mask created specifically for bleached, double-processed or high-lifted blonde hair. 
Intensely hydrating and softening, the quick-rinse treatment helps to neutralise trace minerals that can add dullness and yellowness to your blonde hair, and utilises a Bio-Advanced Peptide Complex that targets and helps reconstruct damaged strands for healthier-looking locks. The blonde-brightening masque also contains an exotic blend of Polynesian and Tahitian Tamanu and Manoi oils that hydrate and increase shine to leave hair soft, smooth and radiant without being weighed down.
name: Blonde Life Brightening Masque for Illuminating Hydration and Softness 150ml

product_description:
TIGI蒂芝燕麥蜂蜜護髮套裝，單價¥429 ，強效滋養調理乾枯受損頭髮，令秀發如絲般柔滑。秀發將變得滋潤閃亮。 - LM

name: 蒂芝天桥步伐燕麦蜂蜜组合两件装 - 价值 ï??53.45

product_description: 使用 Wella Professionals Elements Renew Shampoo，呵护长发。 这款洗发水旨在滋润、滋养和保护干枯受损的头发，从发根至发梢呵护每一根发丝，令秀发柔软丰盈。 这种配方非常温和，不含硫酸盐，可供每天使用。丰富的泡沫使其十分高效，这意味着其效果定会让您满意。 A.B.
name: Professionals Elements Renew Shampoo (250ml)

product_description:
这款奢华的 KeraCare 护发精油能够为您的秀发提供超级保护。 混合了丰富的优质天然油脂，自然干燥的秀发和头皮，令秀发重现活力。
KeraCare 护发精油非常适合油性头皮和秀发的护理，适用于所有类型的发质，其独特的配方很容易吸收，不留油腻，让秀发手感柔软，充满健康亮泽。
使用说明：
name: 护发精油（120ml）

product_description:
使用 As I Am 强化补水™ 护发素呵护您的卷发；这是一款轻盈的深层滋养护发素，可让您的秀发从发根到发梢得到充分补水，修复发丝。
其强化营养配方蕴含有椰子油、乳油木果脂和维他命 E，可渗透到发干，让秀发健康成长，同时强壮脆弱的发丝，修复分叉，舒缓角质层。 让您尽享梦寐以求的焕活效果，修复缕缕发丝，增强秀发的光泽感。
name: I Am 强化补水护发素 227 g

product_description:
使用 KORRES Laurel & Echinacea Shampoo 抵御头皮屑和干性头皮。 该产品能有效地平衡皮脂水平，滋润头皮，减少瘙痒并去除死皮细胞，从而防止头皮干燥。
平常使用这款洗发水时，每周至少洗两次，15 天后就能观察到明显的效果。 临床医学证明，使用 KORRES Laurel & Echinacea Shampoo 45 天后，头皮屑的数量和大小减少 68%，头皮发红的现象减少 79%。
使用说明：
name: Laurel & Echinacea Shampoo Against Dandruff And Dry Scalp (250ml)

product_description:
在 Christophe Robin 玫瑰细致丰盈洗发水的助力下，温和地清洗头发。 该独特的配方专为微细、染了颜色和敏感的头发配制，能仔细地洗去您的头发和头皮上多余的油脂和污垢，同时保留颜色，恢复头发数量并增加柔软度和光泽。
富含抗氧化剂玫瑰精油和具有强化作用的猴面包树叶子，该洗发水保护、滋养并收紧头发纤维，防止褪色，但不会使您的发丝干枯。 您的头发将变得朝气蓬勃，而且更容易造型。

使用说明：
name: Robin 玫瑰细致丰盈洗发水（400ml）

product_description:
本品是防斷發、防熱護理的終極解決方案，適合所有髮質。所以可確保秀發既柔順又強韌，富有光澤。 
防止日常環境損害，例如紫外線和燙髮定型劑，立即增強全面護理，使頭髮易打理，富有光澤。 
使用說明：
name: Kingsley 菲利普金斯利防损护理喷雾 (250ml)

product_description:
Ideal for dull and lacklustre locks, the Grow Gorgeous Scalp Detox unlocks the secret to healthier hair regrowth - a healthy scalp.
Utilising plant-based actives and nourishing ingredients, the unique, cooling formula combines natural Castor Oil Beads, White Willow Bark extract and Pomegranate Fruit Enzymes to gently exfoliate the scalp, providing a deep, intensive clean that eliminates clogging impurities, product build up, dry skin and dandruff to create the ideal environment for hair growth.  
A potent blend of minerals helps aid moisture levels while absorbing excess sebum, extending time between washes, with Bean Bio-ferment working to neutralise UV light and free radical damage for optimum protection.  
Suitable for use as an intensive weekly treat, the pre-wash treatment leaves the scalp feeling rigorously purified and fresh, with enhanced stimulation to promote lustrous, revitalised hair and improved re-growth capabilities.
name: Gorgeous Scalp Detox 190ml

product_description:
適合細軟髮質，扁塌髮質，頭髮稀薄人群，Alterna竹豐盈洗髮露可迅速改善軟榻，稀薄髮質，採用天然有機竹配方，搭配秘魯人參精華，溫和潔淨，多種活性滋養源煥活秀發，刺激頭髮再生。 
 Alterna竹豐盈洗髮露應用生態認證成分，獨特配方使用後髮絲強韌有力，易打理，全面提升飽滿度，快速加強髮絲質感，增強韌性，提升彈性及光澤，持久鎖住水分，不含任何防腐劑。 
使用方法:

價值¥1045.20。菲利普金斯利彈力素煥發髮絲的柔順健康之美。適合洗髮前使用，強效滋養護髮，效果卓著，功能多樣，顯著提升髮絲彈性、令髮絲光澤閃耀，富有彈性。富含紫外線防護因子，有效預防染色髮絲脫色，還蘊含橄欖油和蓖麻油，卓效鎖水保濕，令秀髮絲般柔滑、易於梳理。 
首次使用即可見效，非常適合乾燥受損髮質，卓效修護髮絲，還原秀發之美。 
 使用說明： 
 請注意：如果髮絲接受了化學方式處理造型，則該日前後3天不宜使用本品。
name: Kingsley 菲利普金斯利弹力素 (1000ml)

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗滋养系列可有效护理干燥缺乏营养的秀发。 这款洗发护发三件套结合使用，可为发丝补充所需的营养，修复和滋养秀发；使秀发更加柔软滋润，散发着让人难以置信的光泽。
滋养恒护洗发水 2 号（250ml）： 
它是一款创新型洗发水，其配方专门针对护理干燥和敏感的秀发而设计。 这款洗发水采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，蕴含有葡萄糖蛋白，可温和地清洁发丝，从发根到发梢补充纤维；让您的缕缕秀发超级柔软丰盈，增强秀发的光泽度。 有效防止发丝干燥。
滋养蛋白护发露（200ml）：
滋养护发素采用专业配方，用于护理正常至偏干的秀发。 这款护发素采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，蕴含有葡萄糖蛋白，可从发根到发梢补充纤维；具有顺发和软化的作用，让您的缕缕秀发拥有如丝般的顺滑与丰盈，增强秀发的光泽度。 有效防止发丝干燥。
密集修复发膜（细发专用）（200ml）：
这款密集滋养发膜的配方专门针对护理粗发和干燥的秀发而设计。 其配方采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，蕴含有葡萄糖蛋白，可从发根到发梢补充纤维；让您的缕缕秀发拥有如丝般的顺滑与丰盈，增强秀发的光泽度。 有效防止发丝干燥。 适合粗发、干燥或敏感的秀发。
name: 卡诗滋养洗发水 2 号 250ml、滋养蛋白护发露 200 ml & 密集修复发膜（粗发专用）200ml

product_description:
Tangle Teezer Original （纯粉红色） 是问题秀发的独创最佳解决方案，它可以为压力重重的发丝减轻负担。 该美发梳可平稳地滑过最难打开的头发缠结；更好的是，它可以在您走出浴缸或不再淋浴时发挥作用，并且不会损害您的秀发。
用它可以轻而易举地梳理秀发，无需拉扯粗糙的毛发；您会立即爱上它创新的外观和更快的梳发速度。 Tangle Teezer Original （纯粉红色）可用于所有发质，干发或湿发；只需从发根梳至发梢即可。
name: Teezer Original（纯粉红色）

product_description:
Purify and pamper thin, lacklustre hair with the Christophe Robin Cleansing Volumizing Paste with Pure Rassoul Clay and Rose Extracts – a deep cleansing, shampoo-like treatment with a unique consistency and volume-boosting benefits.
The 85% natural-based formula transforms upon application from a paste-like texture into a lightweight foam, with pure Rassoul Mineral Clay, rich in trace-elements, working to absorb dirt, oil and impurities while densifying each follicle for enhanced strength, lift and thickness from the root.
Extracts of Baobab Leaf and Centifolia Rose Water impart a soft, supple texture, with antioxidant properties to help combat free radical damage and protect colour vitality. Tresses are left feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, with superior volume and body.
name: Robin Cleansing Volumizing Paste with Pure Rassoul Clay and Rose Extracts 250ml

product_description:
Lock Stock and Barrel Grooming 生产了一种新式多功能 Ruck 哑光发泥，可有力地控制发型，并使头发可以弯曲，还会在头发上留下波浪形哑光面层。 最适用于较短发型，营造出未理顺的凌乱发型和蓬松感。
通过 Lock Stock and Barrel Grooming Ruck 哑光发泥，可营造出未理顺的凌乱发型和蓬松感，还可以留下哑光面层，并发挥中等定型作用。 这种发泥轻易就能用水洗掉，这样会使头发非常干净，发泥不会累积起来。
使用说明：
name: Stock & Barrel Ruck 哑光发泥 (60g)

product_description:
Vogetti魔髮梳 
特別適合倒梳，能增加發量，打造蓬鬆感。 
猪鬃梳毛抓發性好，能促進頭皮循環，有助於打造完美造型。
name: 魔发梳

product_description:
Transform dry and brittle hair types with the Redken All Soft Megamask; an innovative hair mask that arrives in dual chamber packaging, which combines two effective formulas.
Housing a deep conditioning mask and a hardworking extender, the Megamask provides the ultimate experience for achieving nourished locks. The mask formula provides deep and intense conditioning to the fiber, ensuring dry locks are suitably hydrated and shiny, whilst the extender offers health benefits to hair for up to three washes.
During application, the two solutions combine to create a superior mask that guarantees to strengthen and care for brittle locks.
name: All Soft Megamask 200ml

product_description:
Treat dull, lack-lustre hair with Redken's Diamond Oil Glow Dry Gloss Scrub; a unique pre-shampoo treatment dedicated to exfoliating, detangling and polishing strands from root to tip.
Harnessing the powers of gentle Argan Shells, the luxurious, radiance-reviving scrub expertly eliminates impurities, whilst restoring luminosity and enhancing your blow-dry for a salon-worthy finish. Expect smooth, glossy locks with mirror-like shine and improved manageability.
name: Diamond Oil Glow Dry Gloss Scrub 150ml V805

product_description:
L'Anza KB2每日清潔洗髮水(300ml) 
 L'Anza 蘭澤KB2 日用清潔洗髮露溫和去除頭皮上累積的殘留污垢。這是一款令秀發不干燥的深層洗髮露，溫和去除累積的頭屑，並使油脂恢復至正常水平，令髮絲自然健康如初。 KB2 日用清潔洗髮露富含抗氧化的維生素A、C 和E，每日滋養髮絲，煥現極致健康和光澤狀態。為最需要補給水份的髮絲注入水分。性質溫和，適合每日使用。 
使用說明：
name: KB2 每日清洁洗发水 (300ml)

product_description:
Phyto 發朵PhytoCyane 活發洗髮露200ml 
強烈推薦給脫髮人群。 PhytoCyane 洗髮露具有抗老化功效，強化髮質，還您一頭光彩濃密的秀發。 
 •強烈推薦給脫髮人群 •具有抗老化功效 •還您一頭光彩濃密的秀發
name: 发朵 PhytoCyane 活发洗发露 200ml

product_description:
Meet the needs of coloured hair with the Redken Color Extend Magnetic Megamask; an innovative hair mask that arrives in dual chamber packaging, which combines two effective formulas.
Housing a deep conditioning mask and a hardworking extender, the Megamask provides the ultimate experience for achieving nourished and vibrant locks. The mask formula provides deep and intense conditioning to the fiber, ensuring coloured locks appear healthy and salon-fresh, whilst the extender offers health benefits to hair for up to three washes.
During application, the two solutions combine to create a superior mask that makes sure colour is vibrant and long-lasting.
name: Color Extend Magnetic Megamask 200ml

product_description:
Shea Moisture 推出 10 合 1 超级水果复合新生护发素；其抗氧化配方可为暗沉缺乏光泽的秀发带来多重好处。
这款滋养型护发素所蕴含的硬果漆树果油和生物素可增强发丝的弹性，强健发丝，而创新新的超级水果复合物具有抗老化的功效，让秀发色泽鲜明。 使秀发柔软而有光泽，弹性十足。
十大优点： 
抗衰老、保护发色、补充水分、滋养发丝、软化发丝、减轻压力、提亮发色、使秀发易于梳理、焕活发干、强健发丝。

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗丰盈发量两件套让您拥有丰盈亮丽的秀发，使发丝更富有弹性。 这款独特的护发产品组合以奢华焕发洗发水、丰盈护发素而自诩，让您的秀发拥有自然蓬松度，持久地拥有光泽。 这是一套必备的护发产品，让您的秀发拥有沙龙级的完美效果！ K.D.
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力洗发水 250ml：
这款 Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力洗发水是一款乳质洗发水，其设计旨在赋予秀发丰盈度和蓬松感。 这款洗发水可从发根丰盈秀发，让您尽享沙龙级的光泽度，它甚至能改善长发的纹理结构层次，实现持久定型。
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰凝蓬松啫喱（200ml）：
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰凝蓬松啫喱是一款奢华的护发产品，它蕴含有创新型营养成分，能改善发质，增强丰盈度和蓬松度，让您尽享显著的护发效果。 这款护发产品拥有半透明的啫喱质地，具有深层滋养功效，可有针对性地滋养脆弱的发丝，增加秀发的浓密度，丰盈发量。

product_description:
Keracare Honey Shea Co-Wash气味芬芳、不含硫酸盐，是您秀发的守护神。 专业配方蕴含的天然成分包括蜂蜜、牛油果油、印度醋栗和印度皂角植物成分、印度楝油、摩洛哥坚果油、深海两节荠籽油和蓖麻油，能温和洗净秀发，同时维持秀发自然水分。
本品能理顺发丝，令秀发柔软光亮，同时清除秀发与头皮上的污垢、皮屑和多余油脂。 -SA
name: Honey Shea Co-Wash

product_description:
使用 Alpecin Dandruff killer shampoo，缓解头皮刺激，同时清除和防止头皮屑。 独特配方含离子、泛醇和尿囊素，减少现有头皮屑，同时抵御酵母菌、真菌和细菌。
这款防头屑洗发水适合日常使用，含四种活性成分，稳定头皮状况，确保头皮清新、充满活力。 K.D.
name: Dandruff Killer Shampoo (250ml)

product_description:
使用As I Am Detangling Conditioner打理自然卷发和烫卷的发质，这是一款轻薄的免洗型配方，能够解决打结和缠结问题。
本款护发素富含滋养混合的Shea乳木果，Coconut油和蜂王浆（一种采集自蜂王的天然成分），具有强效滋养和保湿的功能，同时增强秀发的可塑性，为秀发的造型设计做好准备。 能够强化并修复脆弱和受损头发，使秀发从发根到发梢展现出健康秀发光泽。
name: I Am Detangling Conditioner 237ml

product_description:
Treat your hair to the nourishing and purifying properties of KeraCare Thermal Wonder Cream Cleansing Shampoo, a conditioning shampoo that performs a gentle cleanse on hair and scalp to eliminate dirt, impurities and flaky, dead skin. It expertly prepares hair for thermal styling.
Banishing grime without stripping natural oils, the hydrating shampoo contains a host of fresh botanical extracts and moisturising ingredients, including Moringa and Marula to improve hair and scalp hydration whilst facilitating smooth combining to reduce damage and breakage. Promoting a comfortable scalp and soft, silky tresses, it combines Vitamins, Menthol, Aloe Vera, Green Tea that protect, revitalise and purify. Hair feels silky smooth and the scalp feels clean and refreshed. 
The second step in your Thermal Wonder™ routine.
name: Thermal Wonder Cream Cleansing Shampoo 240ml

product_description:
Philip Kingsley 菲利普金斯利丰盈秀发头皮护理液是护法三部曲的第一步，可保护、修复发丝，让您的缕缕秀发更加亮丽。
丰盈秀发头皮护理液是护法三部曲的一部分，它含有发丝所需要的日常营养成分，其中包括最重要的氨基酸和维他命，让您从内向外呵护您的秀发。
Philip Kingsley 菲利普金斯利的护法三部曲是针对头发所需的营养、头皮和发丝本身而设计的一整套护理方案，旨在打造健康秀发。
为了获得最佳的丰盈效果，请结合护法三步曲中的其他两款产品使用：Tricho 专业版丰盈蛋白质喷雾和 Tricho 7 号丰盈秀发头皮护理液。 - K.R
name: Kingsley 菲利普金斯利 Tricho 护发营养配方让您的秀发健康成长。

product_description: KORRES杏仁和亚麻子Conditioner（适合干性/受损发质）。 这款护发素可以滋养干性/受损发质，防止破损和分叉。 杏仁和亚麻子的Hydrating剂可以滋润和调整干性发质，方便造型，同时还帮助控制静电及防止头发毛躁。
name: 杏仁和亚麻子Conditioner（适合Dry /受损Hair）

product_description:
Joico Body Luxe Conditioner（300ml）适合精细、扁平、柔软的发丝，可令秀发变得丰盈而不扁塌。 它富含零重量燕麦蛋白复合物，可令每一缕发丝变得丰盈浓密、顺滑滋润、富有弹性、充满活力。
这款深层滋养配方还会令秀发更易于梳理，帮助秀发更方便打造发型，因此您可以在自己家里舒适地获得沙龙般时尚优质的发型。

使用说明：
name: Body Luxe Conditioner (300ml)

product_description:
Create manageable locks in style with the Tangle Teezer Compact Styler Skinny Dip Hair Brush in Palm Print; a special edition collaboration with London based accessory brand, Skinny Dip. The brush boasts a glossy white finish and is emblazoned with a playful flamingo print
Perfect to use on the go, the compact brush is shaped to fit perfectly in the hand for ultimate control. Featuring unique flexible bristles, the brush effortlessly glides through wet and dry hair to detangle and calm knots without snagging or pulling.
Suitable for all hair types, the coveted brush allows you to add volume, texture and shine to your hair. The Tangle Teezer arrives with a removable cover to protect its innovative teeth from fluff, dirt and bacteria.
name: Teezer Compact Styler Skinny Dip Hair Brush - White Flamingo

product_description:
Tangle Cherub的Hair Brush产品设计卓越，使用效果绝佳，可以温和地将打结和缠绕的部位理顺，让您的秀发看起来丝般柔滑。 该刷子在塑料中添加了特别开发的抗菌添加剂，从而优化其卫生性，是适合儿童使用的最佳产品。
外形独特设计的刷子底座可以让刷毛高度不变，从而确保其坚固性，同时，创新设计的防静电性能可以让头发不起毛，丝般柔滑。  刷子长15厘米，也就是说完全适合放在您的手提包中，可以随身携带！ K.D.
name: Cherub Hair Brush for Kids - Pearlescent Pink（珠光粉色）

product_description:
Experience a fortifying cleanse with Viviscal Full Force Shampoo, a strengthening shampoo that has been scientifically formulated for men to help maintain normal hair growth.
Promoting thicker, fuller hair, the shampoo expertly lifts away dirt and impurities whilst reducing shedding with its blend of Ana:Tel™, Biotin, Keratin and Zinc. Suitable for all hair types, the formula will leave hair feeling stronger, thicker and more resilient.
name: Full Force Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
用 Joico Moisture Recovery Shampoo （公升）改变脱水的秀发。  它富含生物多样的羟基胺海洋复合物，该复合物包含了植物性药材和海基氨基酸及一些世界上最具滋养性的植物性油脂和油，可令秀发变得易于管理（即便是最干燥、最乱的头发亦是如此）。
除了提供深层保湿，这款滋润性的洗发水可温和清除多余的油脂和杂质，令秀发恢复活力、柔软水嫩。
name: Moisture Recovery Shampoo (1000ml) -（价值43.00 英镑）

product_description:
label.m Honey和Oat Treatment发膜是一种让头发光滑、柔软而散发光泽的轻质发膜。 利用独有Hydra-5复合物特别配制以便为焦干的头发补充水分，恢复头发活力和健康，同时保护头发纤维免受热定型和化学过程的破坏。
富含抗氧化剂的Royal Black和Lehua Honey滋补并恢复缺光泽的头发，同时燕麦提取物和猴面包树油修复干燥、脆弱发丝，以防止破损和分叉。 适合每3〜4次洗发使用一次，该发膜从发根至发梢护理头发，让您获得滋养、滋润和营养充足并具有甜美香气的头发。 E.N.

product_description:
使用 Philip Kingsley Maximiser，泵出新高度。 非常适合精细、柔软的飘逸秀发，保持突出发身和发量，稳固秀发，让秀发愈发光泽亮丽。 富含硅和羊毛脂，保护秀发，使秀发保持顺滑，具有防静电特性，让您的秀发丝般顺滑。
除了提供造型和控制，该产品还还有调理成分，保持秀发的原始状态，同时其紫外线防护因子有助于延长染色头发的寿命。 您的发结将变得光泽充盈、弹力十足，充满活力。

使用说明：
name: Kingsley Maximizer（125 ml）

product_description: 使用 Tangle Teezer专业解结美发梳子 可有效控制浓厚的卷发 。 这款美发梳是浓密的波浪式发型和非洲式蓬松卷发的理想选择，其形状的设计非常适合握持在手中，以提供最强的控制力；所采用的 Firmflex 技术和独特的梳齿可让您轻松梳顺干发和湿发，而不会纠结和拉扯头皮。 这款让人梦寐以求的发梳有助于增加发量、改善发质，让您的秀发更有光泽。 - K.N.
name: Teezer 专业解结美发梳子

product_description:
Shea Moisture 10 合 1 超级水果复合新生发膜可有效改善暗沉枯燥的秀发；该品牌是一个采用全球经过认证的纯天然有机原料的品牌。
这款滋养型发膜适合每周使用，其所蕴含的硬果漆树果油和生物素可令秀发恢复健康，令发丝从发根到发梢都非常水润，而含有丰富抗氧化剂的超级水果复合物可补充头皮所需的营养物质，缓解衰老的迹象。 滋养、调节和强健发丝。
十大优点： 
抗衰老、保护发色、补充水分、滋养发丝、软化发丝、减轻压力、提亮发色、强健发丝、深化调节。
name: Moisture 10 合 1 超级水果复合新生发膜 326ml

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Discipline Smoothing 3 Step Regime，护理蓬乱的发丝；这款三件套产品是必备品，可共同协力提供持久的效果。 这款套装产品采用了可再生共混物配方，专门针对卷发、浓密和难以打理的头发，令秀发感觉飘逸、轻松，并拥有镜面般的光泽。
Discipline Bain Fluidealiste (250ml)
使用这款具备再生功效的洗发水，顺滑、强韧秀发，并提升弹性。 产品旨在温和地去除杂质；而氨基酸、小麦蛋白和细胞间脂质 R 的共混物旨在防止毛躁并抵御潮湿，功效可持续 72 小时。 角质蛋白配方可打造平滑表面，令秀发质地柔软，实现无毛躁的妆效。
Discipline Maskeratine (200ml)
这款丰盈发膜能赋予秀发深层滋养，提供针对毛躁和潮湿的持久防护。 该产品拥有角质蛋白配方，旨在提升秀发的流动性和可打理性，由内而外地修复头发，以打造光滑表面，便于造型设计时更好地进行控制。
Curl Ideal Cream (150ml)
这种免洗配方旨在顺滑、软化和重塑蓬乱的卷发。 卷发霜使用创新亲角质蛋白和和弹性复合配方，增加发丝柔软度和发梢强度，而减少头发干燥和分叉，控制头发卷曲程度。
name: Discipline Smoothing 3 Step Regime

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Styling Spray à Porter 打造优雅而略带凌乱的头发。 配备易于使用的泵压式喷嘴，喷雾中混合了卡诗品牌标志性的旗舰成分木糖，以及起定型作用的矿物质定形盐，定型后的头发仍然可以飘逸自如。
轻质配方不会让您的头发发黏或变得厚重，同时也提供了热保护层，让秀发在干燥时免于受到损害。 产生半哑光妆效，令您的头发拥有一个性感的海滩效果。
name: Styling Spray à Porter (150ml)

product_description:
這款美國隊員創新日常保濕洗髮露舒緩滋養頭髮和頭皮。這款日常保濕洗髮露採用溫和天然清潔劑，獨特配方從髮根到髮梢清潔頭髮，但不會帶走頭髮上的天然油脂。 
這款洗髮露有效柔化滋潤髮絲，令頭髮柔順易打理，持久閃亮。 
適合各種髮質。
name: Crew 美国队员日常保湿洗发露 (1000ml)

product_description: American Crew 美國隊員三合一洗浴裝集洗髮水、護髮素和沐浴乳於一體，極致便捷美容。此活力產品可刺激頭皮，理順秀發和增加光澤，柔軟肌膚，感覺清爽乾淨。 - ED
name: Crew 美国队员三合一洗浴装 450ml

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Specifique Cure Apaisant Anti-Inconforts Treatment，舒缓瘙痒和刺激感。这是一款可使用 4 周的免洗产品套装，有助于缓解由干性头皮引起的不适。 该配方采用了创新的护发技术，可深入渗透至头发纤维，起到镇静和滋养功效。
PS21 可舒缓头皮并形成保护屏障，而 Rhamanose® 可刺激成纤维细胞的繁殖，以恢复弹性和柔软度。 作为一种抗氧化剂，AOX Complex 融合了 L-肌肽、辣木和维生素 E 等强效成分。 持续使用后，可实现充满活力的发丝和健康舒适的头皮。
name: Specifique Cure Apaisant Anti-Inconforts Treatment 12 x 6ml

product_description:
卷发可能难以打理，尤其是在它对水中的 pH 值发生负面反应时。 Joico Curl Perfected Curl Correcting Milk 是一款酸碱平衡产品，富含 Curl Repair Technology™，以打造更强韧、更具弹性、更健康的卷发。
这种酸碱平衡配方含天然油脂、重构蛋白和指定聚合物的共混物，可密闭和保护头发毛孔，令头皮表面滋润并减少膨胀，实现恢复弹性后的无毛躁卷发。
这种防毛躁配方可重新恢复卷发的活力，增强妆效，可消除干枯、毛躁的发丝，令卷发更具美感，不显颓丧。 - K.N
name: Curl Perfected Curl Correcting Milk to Balance, Seal and Control Frizz (150ml)

product_description:
label.men的蓬松发蜡是一款多用途磨砂质感产品，可提振发根，长久保持更丰满的外观。 成形、塑形并试验，创造想要的发型，并牢固定型，产生干燥的哑光效果。 它适用于所有类型的头发，可用来增加头发的体积和厚度。 E.N. 
使用方法：用指尖均匀涂满头发。 施用所需量的本品，达到想要的定型程度。

Achieve gorgeous, healthy-looking locks with the ultra-lightweight T3 Featherweight Compact Folding Dryer. Designed with luxurious rose gold detailing, the streamlined hair dryer features a folding design for optimum space saving, with advanced technology for maximum on-the-go styling.
Infused with an innovative, specially engineered Tourmaline SoftAire™ system, it emits concentrated air volume infused with negative ion streams to rapidly dry large sections of hair without causing frizz and enhancing shine. Featuring a small frame and folding full-size handle, it packs a small but powerful punch for effortless high-speed drying.
name: Featherweight Compact Hair Dryer (White/Rose Gold)

product_description: TIGI Catwalk Fashionista紫罗兰Tween 是专门放在一起以满足金发的需求。 该洗发水和护发素旨在减少冷色调的黄铜色卷发，使您金黄色的卷发看起来鲜亮而充满活力。 - L.M.
name: Catwalk Fashionista Blonde Tween Duo 2×750ml（价值 55.90 英镑）

product_description:
用这款奇妙的超级保湿Sebastian Professional Hydre Duo平息干燥、毛躁秀发的饥渴。 获取这款二件套，体验这些配方充满关爱的产品，重塑秀发水活生命力！
这款Sebastian Professional Hydre Duo包括两件先后使用的重要产品，可以恢复秀发的活力，使其易于梳理、富有弹性而丰厚。 这款产品具有极大的美发功效，这是您拥有美丽秀发的最佳时机。
此包装含以下产品：
name: Professional Hydre Duo（2件产品）

product_description:
Nourish your hair with OUAI Repair Conditioner, a weightless yet intensely moisturising conditioner that infuses every strand with much-needed hydration.
Working to replenish damaged hair, the conditioner softens and detangles whilst protecting colour integrity. Its Smart Technology complex combines with Tamarind Seed extract and Smart Keratin to weightlessly repair neglected hair. Damaged tresses are transformed into nourished and beautifully healthy-looking locks. Developed by celebrity hair stylist, Jen Atkin.
name: Repair Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
Christophe Robin 玫瑰细致丰盈洗发水具有保护发色、滋润发丝和丰盈蓬松的功效；采用温和配方，不会让头皮和秀发变干，保持柔软清新。
Christophe Robin 玫瑰细致丰盈洗发水采用创新配方，富含玫瑰精油和猴面包树叶精华，能有效清洁秀发，维持发丝的PH酸碱平衡，防止色素流失，从而让秀发保持亮丽色彩，持久清爽。
使用说明：
name: Robin 玫瑰细致丰盈洗发水（250ml）

product_description: 本品靈感來源於原有的暢銷產品Crude Clay 莎貝聖凝土，有定型作用，配方採用礦物質，能起到隔離作用，便於重新造型，而且能讓髮質蓬鬆.
name: Sebastian 专业 Craft Clay 随心所欲发泥 (50G)

product_description:
Restore radiant, salon-worthy locks with Wella's Color Fresh; a semi-permanent hair dye that enhances vibrancy in between colour services.
Developed with a Care Complex of vitamins and conditioning agents, the ready-to-use formula adds depth and corrects tone, whilst innovative Tone2Shine technology delivers mirror-like shine that lasts up to ten washes. No mixing required.
name: Color Fresh Lightest Pearl Ash Blonde 10/81 75ml

product_description:
Refresh and revive your hair with OUAI Repair Shampoo, a nourishing formula that cleanses and strengthens every strand.
Developed by celebrity hair stylist, Jen Atkin, the hair cleanser washes away dirt and impurities whilst delivering a unique, Smart Technology complex to replenish moisture and fortify weakened strands. Its blend of Tamarind Seed extract and Smart Keratin help to protect against breakage, improve shine and keep colour looking vibrant. Hair is healthier, glossier and stronger.
name: Repair Shampoo 300ml

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Specifique Cure Anti-Pelliculaire Anti-Recidive Treatment，清除头皮屑。这是一款可使用 4 周的高效抗头皮屑护理产品，有助于消除鳞片并缓解由干燥头皮引起的不适。 该配方采用了创新的护发技术，可深入渗透至头发纤维，起到镇静和滋养功效。
羟甲辛吡酮 2.500 PPM 可舒缓头皮并形成保护屏障，而 Rhamanose® 可刺激成纤维细胞的繁殖并恢复弹性和柔软度。 作为一种抗氧化剂，AOX Complex 融合了 L-肌肽、辣木和维生素 E 等强效成分。 经过持续使用，您将获得无头皮屑的健康发丝和舒缓的头皮。
name: Specifique Cure Anti-Pelliculaire Anti-Recidive Treatment 12 x 6ml

product_description:
Macadamia澳洲天然堅果油深層修護髮膜是一款高營養成分、充滿活力的護髮產品，讓秀發重新煥發活力，更加富有彈性和光澤。 
提取自各種珍貴、稀有、質地清爽植物油，包括澳洲堅果油、摩洛哥堅果油、茶樹油、洋甘菊油、蘆薈和海藻提取物。 Macadamia澳洲天然堅果油深層修護髮膜給秀髮帶來長時間滋養修護。本產品建議一周使用不要超過兩次。 
為了達到超級養護和修護效果，這款深層發膜添加了具有修復功效的澳洲堅果油。在秀發上停留5到10分鐘可以令營養成分充分深入角質層。 
使用方法：

Alterna竹柔順洗髮露萃取天然竹的精華和瓢油，溫和不刺激，純綠色配方，不含矽油及防腐劑。雙重滋養柔順配方，深入頭皮底層的保濕呵護，清新自然，有效預防洗​​後髮絲打結。還具備最大程度的鎖色涵養功效，燙染後使用髮色持久光鮮亮澤。 
 Alterna竹柔順洗髮露打造絲綢一般順滑的髮質，同時可有效改善脆弱易捲曲髮絲質地，使髮色持久光鮮亮澤且有韌性。 
使用方法:

Achieve salon-worthy results from home with the Hair Heroes Marvellous Moisture from Percy & Reed. Presented in a gift box, the kit combines four haircare treats that work in tandem to cleanse, hydrate and leave locks easier to manage.
Splendidly Silky Moisturising Shampoo (50ml)
A cleansing and ultra-nourishing formula to replenish vital moisture. Fortified with antioxidant-rich Blueberry Extract and Vitamin E, the lightweight shampoo gently eliminates impurities, whilst delivering intense hydration to wanting strands. Hair is left soft, smooth and glossy with minimised frizz.
Splendidly Silky Moisturising Conditioner (50ml)
A deeply hydrating formula developed for frizz-prone, heat damaged hair. Harnessing the nourishing powers of Sweet Almond Oil, Grape Seed Oil and Blueberry Extract, the replenishing conditioner smoothens the hair's cuticle, helping to enhance shine and vitality. Defends against dryness and frizz to reveal sleek, luscious locks from root to tip.
Smoothed, Sealed & Sensational No Oil Oil for Thick Hair (15ml)
Perfect for dry, damaged, rebellious or frizzy hair, the nourishing formula utilises Pomegranate Seed Oil to expertly tame and control coarse styles. Calms frizz and flyaways so you can experience smooth, sleek locks with improved manageability and shine.
Reassuringly Firm Session Hold Hairspray (50ml)
Keep hair in place with the ultra-fine, humidity-resistant mist. Fortified with shine-enhancing ingredients, the spray takes full control of your style; delivering strong yet flexible hold with long-lasting effect. Can be used as a finishing spray after styling, or applied onto a dressing brush and combed through the hair.
name: & Reed Hair Heroes Marvellous Moisture

product_description:
Combat lacklustre, lifeless and thin hair with the Intense Shampoo and Conditioner Duo from Grow Gorgeous. Expertly formulated with botanic extracts and advanced scientific complexes, the pair work in tandem to re-strengthen hair follicles and intensively hydrate them. Ideal for damaged and colour treated hair, you can expect denser and revitalised locks with a radiant shine.
Hair Density Shampoo Intense (190ml)
Boost thickness and definition with the Hair Density Shampoo Intense. Its ultra-concentrated formula is infused with Amino Acids, Biotin, Caffeine and B-Vitamins to visibly increase density of hair, whilst advanced technology supports the follicles to promote healthy-looking locks.
Hyaluronic Density Conditioner Intense (190ml)
The Hyaluronic Density Conditioner Intense is an advanced hair and scalp conditioning formula that works to increase hair thickness and restore softness. An innovative form of Hyaluronic Acid is combined with Amino Acids, Biotin and B-vitamins to stimulate hair follicles for a fuller appearance.
name: Gorgeous Intense Shampoo and Conditioner Duo

product_description:
使用这款超强定型啫喱让您的秀发保持定型。 Fudge 纤维发胶可牢固控制短发发型，可使较长的秀发更丰盈。
这款具有超强控制力的定型啫喱非常适合光滑、鸡冠头或湿润的发型，能够为厚重的缕缕秀发提供坚固的支持。 纤维发胶可丰盈纤细的发丝，定型和控制粗糙的秀发。
将定型膏均匀地涂抹在手指，然后在发丝上做轻敲动作，以形成神奇的纤维，按照您喜欢的方式精确造型和定型秀发。
Fudge 造型产品按照定型系数因子 0-15 分为轻微定型、中强度定型、强效定型或超强定型。 纤维发胶的定型系数因子为 13，属于超强定型发胶。  所有 Fudge 定型产品均含有中长波紫外线过滤器。
使用说明：
name: 纤维发胶（150ml）

product_description:
Macadamia深层修护发膜是一款高营养成分、充满活力的护发产品，让秀发重新焕发活力，更加富有弹性和光泽。
提取自各种珍贵、稀有、质地清爽的天然油脂，包括澳洲坚果油、摩洛哥坚果油、茶树油、洋甘菊油、芦荟和海藻提取物。 Macadamia深层修护发膜将给秀发带来长时间滋养修护。 本产品不含苯甲酸酯类，建议一周使用不要超过两次，以获得最佳效果。
为了进一步加强养护和修复效果，这款深层发膜添加了具有修复功效的Macadamia澳洲坚果油。 在秀发上停留5到10分钟可以令营养成分充分深入角质层。
使用说明：

Corioliss C1 直发器非常适合于直发、卷发或波浪发，配有柔软的握把，打造高性能美发效果。 加热板具备 1" 宽的钛浮板，每次使用都能实现完美的接触和热量分布。采用创新负离子技术，即使是最密的头发，也能轻松滑过，而不会引起静电。
与陶瓷板直发器相比，这款符合人体工程学原理的工具对头发的损伤较小，具备变温控制，可在 60°C-235℃ 之间进行加热调整，以满足不同的造型需求。 配备专业发廊标准的3米电源线，并可360°旋转。 - K.N
 
产品特点：
name: C1 直发器（青色）

product_description:
Encourage healthy hair growth with the Stimulating Conditioner from British Barbers' Association. Thoroughly conditioning locks, the rich formula visibly improves hair’s health to leave it hydrated and shiny.
Formulated with English Peppermint, the gentle yet effective treatment boasts anti-inflammatory properties that tackle scalp conditions such as dandruff, eczema and psoriasis. The formula delivers a cooling sensation that helps to promote micro circulation and encourage a healthy and comfortable scalp. In addition, Jojoba Oil and Shea Butter work in synergy to hydrate the fiber, balance oil production and strengthen hair.
Expect shiny, volumised locks and a healthy looking scalp.
name: Barbers' Association Stimulating Conditioner 290ml

product_description:
有了 Sebastian Professional Color Ignite Mono Conditioner（200ml） 单色调头发永远不会感觉沉闷或枯燥。作为 Color Ignite Mono 护发方案的第二步，它可以消除染色后头发经常出现的拳曲、静电和凌乱。 为头发的颜色增强光彩，可提高25％的鲜艳度，这意味着您可以间隔更长时间去美发沙龙。
适合日常使用，该护发素封住颜色并平滑角质层，让头发尽可能展现健康状态。 - K.R
name: Professional Color Ignite Mono Conditioner (200ml)

product_description:
KeraCare 发蜡棒非常适合打造特效造型。 采用轻盈配方，不会让秀发变得沉重或油腻，它可以强化束状和高低不平的风格，抚顺发际线和脖颈处的毛躁和碎发。
适合直发或自然秀发，在编辫子或造型时用它固定发丝，效果很好。 易于使用，您可以直接用发蜡棒涂在秀发上，或者用手指蘸取发蜡，以便更精确的涂抹。 - L.M
使用说明：直接用发蜡棒涂在秀发上，或取少量，用指尖揉搓，然后涂于发梢或顺着发丝中间涂抹。
name: 发蜡棒（75g）

product_description:
Macadamia Natural Oil澳洲堅果蓄熱鬃毛造型梳專為加熱造型而打造，符合人體工程學，具有耐高溫的時尚設計。不論是直發或捲髮造型都可在髮根處做出蓬度及支撐力，輕鬆完成不同造型。 
含百分之百鬃毛的陶製蓄熱梳，同時讓秀發更健康、更加順滑，易於打理，散發閃亮光澤。
name: Natural Oil澳洲坚果蓄热鬃毛造型梳 25mm

product_description:
Evo 伊噢Gluttony 洗髮水(300ml) 可讓稀少細軟的頭髮更加濃密強韌，同時環境友好型配方可減少泡沫產生，祛除多餘油脂和雜質。本品配方含有蛋白質和成膜劑，成分可滲透至髮絲內部並在表面形成保護層，讓您的秀發更顯健康，富有光澤。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 伊噢 Gluttony 洗发水 (300ml)

product_description: Sebastian Professional的Color Ignite Multi Shampoo是来自其FOUNDATION系列的一款护色洗发液，旨在滋养、滋润并焕发多色和漂浅色头发的活力。 其智能色彩保湿复合物有效滋润染色头发，同时深层穿透重构头发纤维，以获得强壮、光滑和最高增加25％鲜艳度的头发。 - K.N.
name: Professional Color Ignite Multi Shampoo (1000ml) - （价值£56.00）

product_description:
Instantly revive your locks with the d:fi Dry Shampoo; a lightweight, texturising spray that works to cleanse and revitalise all hair types in between washes.
Ideal for post-workout, travelling and transforming hair before a night out, the invisible dry shampoo effectively absorbs excess oil and impurities, whilst adding definition to limp, lifeless strands for a fresh, full-bodied finish. No white residue, flaking or product build-up.
name: Dry Shampoo 300ml

product_description:
TIGI Bed Head 色彩女神洗发水（400ml）能够让染过色的秀发保持色泽，特别添加了甜杏仁油、具有滋润功效的椰子油和角蛋白，让秀发恢复健康状态。 这款洗发水还富含重要的维生素E，强韧并修复发丝，彻底清洁秀发，去除护发产品残留物，让秀发清爽洁净。 - E.D
涂抹于湿发上，按摩起泡，然后彻底冲洗。
name: Bed Head 色彩女神洗发水（400ml）

product_description:
Achieve luscious locks with the Expert Colour Care Everyday Supersize Shampoo from Jo Hansford. 
Exclusively developed in her Mayfair salon and utilising advanced technologies, the lightweight shampoo protects and nourishes natural or chemically coloured hair, working to eliminate dirt and impurities that can cause dullness while infusing hair with moisture and vitamins for long-lasting colour.
Fortified with the exclusive Colour Care Complex, Anti-Fade and Anti-Frizz formula, it contains Sweet Blue Lupin peptides that have been scientifically proven to prolong hair colour vibrancy and tone for up to 30 washes, while Prodew Amino Acids strengthen and protect the surface of hair follicles to counteract damage and breakage.
Natural concentrated extracts of Sunflower Seed and Jojoba Oil combat free radical damage and enhance hairs natural elasticity, plus the addition of protein-rich Keratin Amino Acids repair surface damage and minimise the appearance of split ends. Expect sleek and shiny hair with a professional finish and revitalised colour.
name: Hansford Expert Colour Care Everyday Supersize Shampoo (1000ml)

product_description:
Color WOW 色哇发根染色粉进行四种发色的发根染色护理，能在进行两次沙龙护理之间快速遮掩色差迥异的发根。
这款创新型的矿物质粉末采用避免凌乱的简单应用配方，含有多种色素，可与发丝无缝融合，实现完美而不油腻的遮瑕，让您更加自信。
内置于带有镜子的粉盘中，配备有双头刷子，可将其轻松涂抹到干燥的发丝上，这款染色粉具有防水性和防汗性。 染色效果可一直保持至您下一次洗发。
name: WOW 色哇发根染色粉—白金色 2.1g

product_description:
Alterna 十全混合香波、护发素与面膜是三件套产品，设计宗旨是改变暗沉、倦怠的头发。 其独特的顶级配方可提供十种重要的营养成分，有效修复受损的秀发，让发丝拥有绸缎般的柔软光泽。
爱特纳十全混合香波（250 毫升）
十种护发营养配方让您拥有乌黑光亮的健康秀发，可帮助各种类型的发质达到专业级的效果。 这款日常洗发水对头皮非常温和，富含丰富的非洲可可萃取物、玻璃酸、鱼子酱抗老化复合物、肤色光酵素复合物、白松油、香槟葡萄籽油、保加利亚月见草、阿拉伯乳香、摩洛哥皂质树皮、山金车花，让秀发享受完美极致呵护。
使用方法： 遍搓湿发，然后彻底冲洗。
爱特纳十全混合护发素(250毫升)
这款护发素不含任何硝酸盐，采用自然配方，旨在通过保湿滋养来防止秀发天然营养物质的流失。 这款变革性护发素能够为暗淡无光、干枯的秀发有效补充水分，其富含丰富的阿拉伯乳香、非洲可可萃取物、护色®光酵素复合物、鱼子酱抗老化复合物®、保加利亚月见草、摩洛哥皂质树皮、香槟葡萄籽油、玻璃酸、山金车花萃取物。
使用方法： 取少量本品涂抹在洗净的头发上，搓出泡沫，然后彻底清洗。
爱特纳十全混合面膜(150毫升)
高性能面膜让头发焕然一新并修复头发。 浓缩的护发素组合10种必需的成分，即刻给发丝补水，滋润倦怠、暗沉的头发。 适合各种发型。
使用方法： 用毛巾擦干头发，涂上本品，一直梳到发梢。 保留3-5分钟，然后冲洗干净。

Perfect for long hair, the fantastic wide hair curling tong allows you to create a variety of styles, from toussled waves to tight, defined curls. The Babyliss Pro Triple Barrel Waver is a hair essential, with an innovative engineering that makes creating new looks easy.
name: PRO Triple Barrell Waver - Black

product_description:
使用专门配方，从而可以让发质较细和平直的头发看起来更为充盈，Tigi Catwalk Your Highness Shampoo（300ml）可以让发型看起来更为饱满，增加秀发的光亮度、并让发丝呈现光泽，充满活力。
该产品富含薰衣草油和甜杏仁油，可以让秀发保持水分。此外，该产品中的多种防静电聚合物可以减少头发起毛和凌乱的程度，从而使秀发呈现光滑靓丽的特点。 - L.M.
name: Catwalk Your Highness Elevating Shampoo（300ml）

product_description:
使用這款超級護理產品，讓髮絲如絲般​​順滑，打造魅力的豐盈秀發。採用特別配方，護理乾燥受損髮質，用後頭髮呈現健康光澤，富有彈性。 
使用說明：
name: B 俄罗斯皇室琥珀护理乳液 (178ml)

product_description:
使用  Nanogen Fibres Auburn (15g)，打造丰满浓密秀发。 100％ 纯角蛋白纤维具有天然的外观和手感，轻松与您自己的秀发融合，打造丰满浓密的秀发。
专利技术配制而成，确保 400％ 强效粘合，双极充电电荷可实现最优厚化。安全产品，可每天使用。
name: Hair Thickening Fibres Auburn (15g)

product_description: 滋养保护纤弱染发发质。富含冰晶，能让发色更严厉，适合纤弱发质和普通发质，让头发恢复活力。
name: 威娜专业亮泽护发素 - 适合纤弱发质，普通发质和染发 (200ml)

product_description:
Men-ü 男士日常清爽洗发水可带给您超洁净的体验，其温和而高效的配方可强化补水，令秀发更加清爽。
水分对发丝非常重要，就像水分对肌肤的重要性一样；它可令发丝更柔软、更有弹性。 洗发是良好秀发护理的第一步，这款洗发水采用阴离子配方，这意味着它可以令发丝带有负电荷。 当与带有正电荷的护发素配对时，能让您的秀发获得多重好处，最大化地吸收（锁住）所需的水分。 可为发丝补充营养，让您拥有所期待的焕活效果。 - K.N
name: 男士日常清爽洗发水（100 毫升）

product_description:
Cloud Nine The O 是您的 O 加热卷发器的必备伴随物，因其使用开创性感应技术曾荣获多个奖项。 这款卷发棒可以在不到 4 秒的时间内即可加热每个 O 卷发器，是一款真正创新的造型工具。 - E.D
请注意：  Cloud Nine的'O'可操作的电源电压范围为 AC200-240V, 50-60Hz 。 由于在美国的电压 (120V) ，这是目前您不能使用该款卷发棒的唯一地方。
name: Nine盒装 The O 卷发棒

product_description:
威娜炫彩顺滑两件套令秀发颜色更持久不掉色。提升发丝色泽，有效预防掉色，令发丝焕现闪耀光泽，奇效润泽。将这三款产品搭配在一起，独具匠心，只为精心呵护秀发，令秀发青春赋活。
威娜炫彩顺滑洗发水(适用于细软正常、染色发质) - 250ml
赋予发丝饱满亮丽的色泽。融入三重创新技术和奢华钻石微粒，质地轻盈、深层滋润，非常适合细软正常发质使用，水润丝滑焕现，色泽绚丽饱满。
Wella 威娜炫彩顺滑护发素(适用于细软正常、染色发质) - 200ml
轻松驯服桀骜不羁的发丝。专为接受护理的发丝锁水保湿而设计，融入三重创新技术，改善发丝色泽，令细软正常发丝臻至闪亮，飘逸动人。
name: 威娜炫彩顺滑两件套 - 洗发露和护发素（适合细软正常染色发质）

product_description: Enhance dull and dry hair with the Make Me Shine Finishing Spray from RPR. Ultra-lightweight and non-greasy, the leave-in conditioner helps to tame flyaways, reduce frizz and add a glorious glossy sheen. Enriched with the potent antioxidant Vitamin E, it works to repair damaged follicles and encourage hair growth, whilst UV Filters provide added protection. Locks are left smooth, soft and nourished.
name: Make Me Shine Finishing Spray 60ml

product_description:
Achieve squeaky clean locks with the Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Shampoo from Natural Spa Factory. Packed with a blend of soothing, nourishing and cleansing ingredients, the shampoo is both gentle and intensely nourishing, leaving the hair with a clean Lavender aroma.
The shampoo works to clean the hair through utilising a Coconut cleanser, which is gentle and natural. Enriched with Comfrey oil, the formula boasts high levels of Allantoin, described as a healing substance that encourages cell growth and promotes healthy looking hair. Locks are left thoroughly nourished, clean and cared for.
name: Spa Factory Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Shampoo

product_description: Compact, functional and innovative, ikoo's Pocket Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles on-the-go. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Complete with a protective cap to guard from fluff, dirt and bacteria.
name: Pocket Hair Brush - Black - Ocean Breeze

product_description:
Introduce hair to the innovative Fusion Care collection with the Wella Professionals FUSION Mask; a luxurious, creamy mask that targets damaged hair in need of nurture.
Simply apply to damp locks and let the hair mask restore health in just five minutes. The rich treatment boasts Wella’s ‘Silksteel Fusion’ programme, which utilises Silk Amino Acids to repair and protect hair against breakage and damage. Inspired by resilient spider silk, one of the strongest fibers in nature, the mask seeks to restore strength to locks by penetrating deep into each strand.
The FUSION mask leaves locks conditioned, smooth and resilient. Hair is visibly healthy and renewed.
name: Professionals Fusion Mask 500ml

product_description:
Maximise your style with the Volume Boost Hair Extensions from Beauty Works, the UK's leading brand of luxury, professional hair extensions highly coveted by stylists and celebrities alike.
Designed to add volume and length to your locks, the easy to apply, clip-in hairpiece sits discreetly beneath your own hair, allowing you to add seamless volume to your roots and crown without the fuss of special tools or glue.
Made from hand selected, 100% Remy cuticle retained human hair, which means you get the most natural looking, shiny locks, the lightweight hairpiece features a flat lace cap weft for easy application, and its secure comb has a protective silicone layer on each clip to cushion your natural hair and protect from breakage. - K.N.
name: Works Volume Boost Hair Extensions - 613/24 LA Blonde

product_description: Compact, functional and innovative, ikoo's Pocket Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles on-the-go. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Complete with a protective cap to guard from fluff, dirt and bacteria.
name: Pocket Hair Brush - White - Oyster Metallic

product_description: Turn back time with the Rejuvenate My Hair Anti-Aging Shampoo from RPR. The rejuvenating formula is infused with a blend of Rosehip, Baobab and Biotin and works to transform damaged, lifeless hair into lustrous, healthy looking locks. The shampoo gives hair enviable body, bounce and shine for a youthful finish, ideal for both dry and oily scalps.
name: Rejuvenate My Hair Anti-Aging Shampoo 300ml

product_description:
Catering specifically for normal to curly, frizz-prone hair, The Seaweed Bath Co. Smoothing Argan Shampoo works to cleanse, protect and tame locks from root to tip.
Fortified with organic Bladderwrack Seaweed, sustainably-harvested off the coast of Maine, the luxurious shampoo replenishes and revitalises hair, whilst Argan Oil and omega-rich Borage Seed Oil leave hair smooth, sleek and healthy-looking. Infuses hair with a Citrus Vanilla scent derived from a natural, pure essential oil blend.
name: Seaweed Bath Co. Argan Shampoo 360ml - Citrus Vanilla

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Double Volume Remy Hair Extensions，实现稠密、亮泽的发丝。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，为造型师和名人所使用。
屡获殊荣的接发采用最优质的雷米人类头发制作而成并保留了角质层，提供自然亮泽并已经过轻度加工，确保能保持无缠结。每一束发丝都精心捆绑在一起，防止出现碎条，使得这款接发非常适合用于增加发长，提升丰盈度和体量。双齐档发去除了所有较短的发丝，使接发具备一致的长度，从发根至发梢提升体量。 E.N. 
100% 雷米人类发丝
AAA 级
重量：140g
长度：18"
接发类型：无痕
name: Works Double Volume Remy Hair Extensions - 613/27

product_description:
Wella 威娜專業彈力洗髮水- 適用於染色後的粗糙髮質。配方營養豐富，效果卓越，能迅速增強染髮活力，同時讓頭髮光滑，易打理。 
富含奢華的冰晶成分，採用革命性的三倍混合技術，這款產品能修復髮色，清爽髮質，同時滋養保護秀發，讓頭髮更閃耀。 
 使用說明：
name: 威娜亮采护理，适合毛糙染色秀发 (500ml)

product_description: 来自 men-ü的头发定型喷雾完美适合整洁考究的绅士，它质地轻盈，可提供灵活保持度。 从发根提升头发，增加丰满度，以获得想要的发型。 适用于所有类型的头发，其超浓缩配方意味着只需一点即可起效，而且很容易用水冲刷。 E.N.
name: Men's头发定型喷雾 (100ml)

product_description:
Create a big, bouncy blow dry with KMS ThermaShape Shaping Blow Dry; a lightweight spray that mists onto towel-dried hair and delivers enviable body, movement and texture.
Developed using an innovative shaping blend, the blow dry solution utilises Polysilicone-9 and Polyquaternium-68, which work in synergy to shape hair when using heated styling tools, as well as offering flexible, touchable hold. Once sprayed onto damp hair, the spray creates a full and natural-looking blow dry with long-lasting results.
name: ThermaShape Shaping Blow Dry 200ml

product_description: 使用 TIGI True Lasting Colour Shampoo，实现更柔滑的秀发。 这款丰盈洗发水能温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，而甜杏仁可提供额外滋润，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。 采用椰子油专门配制而成，可有效地深入渗透至头发纤维和表面，提供深层滋润。 这款洗发水可提供保护，防止热造型工具和环境压力造成损伤，以此保护染过色的头发，确保在一次次清洗后发色仍能保持。 实现如丝绸般柔软的亮泽发丝。 E.N.
name: S-Factor True Lasting Colour Shampoo 750ml

product_description:
利用 A'kin无味超温和护发素平复舒缓敏感头皮；该抚慰、无香料配方旨在缓解刺激和瘙痒。
结合澳洲坚果和荷荷巴油与燕麦蛋白和牛油果脂的共同功效，该富含抗氧化剂的护发素可补充水分，滋润保湿，令头发柔软顺滑，同时恢复健康、舒适的头皮。 适合头皮屑、湿疹、牛皮癣和儿童头皮。
不含任何对羟基苯甲酸酯、硝酸盐、聚硅酮、邻苯二甲酸盐、矿物质油和人造色素。
name: 225ml

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions（18 英寸）in Ebony 1B，获得最佳造型效果。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，深受造型师和名人青睐。
这种易于使用、可自行动手完成的假发旨在为发丝增加体量和长度，使您能够随时变换想要的造型，而无需使用各种专用工具或胶水。
这种轻巧的接发采用手工挑选的 100% 保留雷米角质层的人类发丝制作而成，这意味着您可获得最自然的亮泽发丝。这款接发配有三条带发夹的易于使用的平纬纱带，提供防护硅胶层，以垫起自然头发并防止断裂。 每条发带均采用花边纬纱结构，自然而舒适，便于您层叠混搭发件，实现各种丰盈发型。 - K.N
name: Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions 18 Inch - Ebony 1B

product_description: Achieve bouncy, defined curls with the Elnett Satin Extra Strong Hold Curl Crème Mousse from L'Oréal Paris. Boasting the strong hold of a mousse but with the care of a delicate cream, the mousse works to provide humidity protection and frizz prevention, leaving hair tamed and incredibly smooth. The innovative formula delicately melts on the fiber, providing lightweight, non-greasy nourishment to curls.
name: Paris Elnett Satin Extra Strong Hold Crème Mousse 200ml

product_description: Discover voluptuous, long lasting hold and body with the Elnett Satin Strong Hold Volume Mousse from L'Oréal Paris. The Crème de Mousse builds volume directly from root to tip, giving hair bounce and fullness. With the power of long lasting hold but with the delicate care of a cream, the innovative formula delicately melts on the fiber, providing lightweight, non-greasy nourishment to curls. Hair is left volumised with a satin soft touch.
name: Paris Elnett Satin Strong Hold Volume Mousse 200ml

product_description: 使用 Wella Elements Light Ren Conditioner，强韧脆弱的发丝。 这款活化护发素旨在由内而外强韧每一缕发丝，同时保持秀发的自然活力，这意味着受损的头发得以修复并重现新的活力。 非常温和，可供每天使用，令秀发柔软顺滑、健康亮泽。 A.B.
name: Professionals Elements Light Renew Conditioner (1000ml)

product_description:
Tame locks whilst on-the-go with the Travel Hair Brush from Christophe Robin. Crafted with natural boar bristles, the smaller size Hair Brush ensures gentle brushing, keeping the hair free from damage. The travel brush utilises a traditional French method, boasting bristles of varying lengths which effortlessly glide through hair, leaving locks detangled and ultra-shiny, wherever you may be.
Necessary to stimulate blood circulation, regular brushing can contribute toward healthy hair growth. Brushing tresses from root to tip evenly distributes the natural oils in hair and subsequently protects the fiber against damaging external factors.
name: Robin Travel Hair Brush

product_description:
使用 TIGI Bedhead for Men Clean Up Peppermint Conditioner，令秀发焕发光彩。 薄荷带来清凉感，调节抚慰刺激。 蕴含维生素E、C和B7，保护肌肤不受自由基影响，重获健康。 小麦和大豆蛋白锁定每根发丝，增加发量，令秀发散发清爽罗勒和薄荷芳香。
使用说明： 按摩进头发和头皮，然后冲洗干净。
name: Bed Head for Men Clean Up Peppermint Conditioner (750ml)

product_description: 使用 hif (Hair is Fabric) Anti-Ageing Support Conditioner，提升秀发的强度和弹性。 这款泡沫护发素采用印度基诺树皮配方，可保护秀发与头皮免受环境压力造成的伤害，并从发根至发梢提供滋润。 与常见洗涤剂不同，Hif 凭借调理技术、乳油和透明质酸，可深层清洁秀发，实现健康柔顺的发丝。 E.N.
name: Anti-Ageing Support Conditioner (180ml)

product_description:
Cloud Nine魔法药水的配方独特地混合了轻质护发素，可以将头发的干燥时间缩短 50％。 这款药水还可以保护头发免受热力造型的破坏性影响，使您的头发超级闪亮、柔软健康。
Cloud Nine 魔法药水是一款必备之物，除了配备了 UV 防晒剂，还具有消除毛躁发、防静电性能。 K.D.

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸隐形®夹式固定假发。 由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，能从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其固定装置配备有一个纤细的丝网，带有四根纬线，模拟秀发的自然生长方式，能够实现持久的牢固固定，让您舒适佩戴。 它经过手工加工制成，保留有角质层，其独特的有机色素使发丝拥有亮丽的光泽和极致的发色活泼性，令秀发更加顺滑而有光泽，使其看起来更浓密丰盈。 适合热力造型。
name: Works Jen Atkin 隐形夹式固定假发18 英寸——热太妃糖 4

product_description:
Redefine the way you wash your hair with the Phytoelixir Cleansing Care Cream, a super concentrated, non-foaming treatment that cleanses locks whilst nourishing them with essential oils and potent botanical ingredients. 
Infused with Naricissus Flower wax, the cream gently removes impurities and dirt, leaving hair feeling soft and refined. The active ingredient of lipid-rich Macadamia Oil provides long lasting hydration, sealing in moisture for glossy, healthy locks. Suitable for all hair types from desert-dry to impossibly thick, the cleansing care cream is an innovative treatment to add to any haircare routine.
name: Cleansing Care Cream (75ml)

product_description:
Part of a 3 step regime for Noticeably Thinning, Medium to Coarse, Natural and Chemically Treated Hair, the NIOXIN System 6 Scalp Treatment is the third and final step in the NIOXIN process to fuller and thicker healthy hair.
Glyo-Shield® technology provides White tea extract and peppermint oil mixed with cleansing and protective conditioning agents to give you a refreshed, hydrated and healthy scalp to start the NIOXIN process.
Enriched with their Smoothplex® technology, it aids to prevent hair loss and thinning by conditioning and protecting against damage and breakage, whilst also smoothing flyaways.
The final technology added to the conditioning formula is Scalp Access Delivery System®, which not only removes environmental residue and sebum with its purifying agents, but the hair and scalp are also protected from sun damage with SPF 15. Vitamins and botanicals in the technology ensure that hair stays healthy and isn't stripped of its natural essential oils.
name: System 6 Scalp Treatment for Noticeably Thinning, Medium to Coarse, Natural and Chemically Treated Hair 100ml

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸假发。由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其发夹采用隐形啮合设计，能够持久、牢固、舒适地固定假发，而所保留的角质层和独特的有机色素能够使发丝拥有亮丽的发色，使色泽极其鲜明。 佩戴简单，适合热力造型。

product_description: 使用 hif (Hair is Fabric) Silver Hue Support Conditioner，为自然或染过色的银色头发增添光泽。 这款泡沫护发素具备金属折射炫光，可从发根到发梢深层滋润和亮化发丝，从而有效地恢复缺乏光泽的头发。 与常见洗涤剂不同，Hif 凭借调理技术、乳油和透明质酸，可深层清洁秀发，实现健康柔顺的亮泽发丝。 E.N.
name: Silver Hue Support Conditioner (180ml)

product_description: Kebelo丝般柔顺洗发水（250ml）专为所有发质或卷发配制，能够有效清除秀发污渍和护发产品残留物，并抚顺毛躁。 混合了"超级滋养成分"藜麦、苋菜和洋甘菊，令每一根发丝顺滑轻盈，带给您丝般顺滑、轻盈弹性的柔软秀发。 - K.R

Sexy Hair 夸张造型定型膏可打造蓬乱、‘床头’发型，它是一款纹理结构定型膏，能够牢固定型，并赋予发丝哑光效果。
这款定型膏非常适合轻松地打造凌乱的发型，能够专业地粘结在发丝上，以打造更加丰盈的效果，使缕缕秀发更加分明，所蕴含的蔗糖和仙人掌花萃取物有助于保湿。
有效定型并强健发丝。
name: Hair 夸张造型定型膏 50g

product_description:
Sexy Hair 强效丰盈洗发水可有效改善柔软、缺乏活力的缕缕秀发；其强化发丝的配方可让您的发型拥有无与伦比的弹性。
这款轻盈的洗发水利用植物萃取物、维他命 B3 和柠檬草可温和地清洁发丝，祛除杂质，与此同时还能增加发量，从发根到发梢蓬松秀发。 适合正常至干燥型发质，让您拥有所期待的健康丰盈效果，增强发丝的光泽度。

product_description:
Treat dry, damaged hair to the KMS MoistRepair Conditioner; a replenishing, detangling formula that helps to restore the hair's natural protective coating without weighing you down.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including Lactic Acid, 18-MEA and an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the conditioner delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst combating split ends and breakage to leave you with strong, healthy-looking locks from root to tip. Expect smooth, salon-worthy hair with improved manageability.

product_description:
Sexy Hair 活力 CC 护发素能够焕活您的发色，其奢华的免洗型调节护发素旨在柔顺秀发，改善暗沉、脆弱和缺乏生命力的秀发。
其特殊配方蕴含有玫瑰和杏仁油，可有效滋养和顺滑秀发，为发丝补充水分，以起到滋养功效，让缕缕秀发更加健康。 蕴含有重要蛋白质，可修复和强化毛囊，借助强劲的抗氧化剂和紫外线过滤器为肌肤提供保护层，有效抵御环境侵害因素的影响。 适用于所有发质，让您拥有所期望的光泽和亮丽色彩。

product_description:
Show your facial fuzz who's boss with the ManCave Blackspice Beard Control; a lightweight styling product that softens, conditions and tames for a well-groomed finish.
Harnessing the powers of nourishing Caffeine, Hemp Oil and Shea Butter, the non-greasy formula encourages healthy hair growth, whilst combating frizz and improving manageability to reveal a smooth, easy-to-control beard with super soft skin beneath.
name: Beard Control - Blackspice 100ml

product_description:
Triumph & Disaster Shampootreat您的头发，100%天然成分制成的洗发香波利用温和植物基的清洁剂，可完成彻底、滋养性和抗氧化剂丰富的清洁过程。
注入新鲜的薄荷香味，温和泡沫配方高效清除污垢、多余油脂和残留的护发产品；它所含的水解Keratin和摩洛哥坚果油协同发挥作用，以保护、修复和强化受损的发质。 富含Keratin，可改善厚度、发质，这款洗发香波会让您的头发重新恢复活力，同时补水和增进头发的健康。

product_description: Achieve the perfect up-do with the Popband London Hair Ties; a pack of five bobbles in a range of designs. Fun and functional, the unique, super-stretchy hair accessories allow you to create your desired style without dents, kinks or uncomfortable tightness. Ideal for any style, occasion, or wearing on your wrist as an attractive bracelet.

product_description: 使用 Jo Hansford Everyday Shampoo，温和清洁秀发并保护染过色的头发。 其独特的温和配方含有甜蓝羽扇豆肽。这是一种唯一取得 Ecocert 认证的天然成分，已被科学证明，能在经过 30 次清洗后仍保持头发的色泽。 这款洗发水有助于延长发色保持时间，提升光泽度，令秀发健康，更易打理。 Jo Hansford Everyday Shampoo 完美融合了 Heliovita Colour Care Complex 等成分，可延长发色的保持时间，令秀发更具光泽和弹性。 向日葵籽提取物有助于保护发丝不受自由基损伤，而 Iselux LQ 可防止染发褪色。 这是秀发日常护理的完美第一步。 MBE Jo Hansford 被誉为"发色第一夫人"，是世界领先的发色专家之一。 她的护发产品范围广泛，特殊配方涵盖亚马逊河可持续的天然成分，完美护理秀发颜色；而角蛋白氨基酸可深层滋养秀发，令秀发散发迷人光泽。 不含苯甲酸酯和硫酸盐的配方。
name: Hansford Everyday Shampoo (250ml)

它还可以滋润头皮，富含促进秀发生长的维生素PP成分，还能防止脱发。 -SA

Healing Style Texture Cream 是一款造型产品，可锁住发色并防止褪色。 这也是造型产品中第一种也是唯一一种配方，可抵御三种紫外线伤害，亦提供自然光泽及造型支持，且头发无粘结或坠重感。

product_description:
Treat your hair to the nourishing benefits of Kérastase Aura Botanica Concentré Essentiel Hair Oil, a multi-purpose oil from the brand's natural haircare collection.
Utilising 99% natural origin ingredients, the replenishing oil blend combines Avocado, Jojoba, Samoan Coconut, Moroccan Argan and Sweet Orange Oils with Rosemary extract to expertly soften, enhance shine and revitalise tresses. Its frizz-fighting properties smoothen and tame hair whilst intensely conditioning to leave locks supple and healthy-looking. Luxurious and versatile, the elixir will lend hair mirror-reflecting shine whilst imparting an aromatic scent.
Multi-use (scalp, pre-shampoo, treatment and massage).

Viviscal 生发精华洗发水，带给头发一个好的开端。使秀发致密的配方，让头发健康生长。
这款洗发水可温和地清洗头发，促进头发健康生长，可巧妙地使每根头发都更浓密、更蓬润。 内含Ana：Tel™（一种混合了生物素、角蛋白和锌的专有聚合物，可促进头发增长、减少头发脱落，使头发看起来更自然、更蓬润浓密。

这款塑型液 Perfect打造潮湿的秀发外观，吹干、塑造发型，令秀发丰盈、亮泽耀眼。 它蕴含紫外线防护剂，可护理和抵御日常的环境压力。

Kérastase 卡诗丰盈发量三件套让您拥有丰盈亮丽的秀发，使发丝更富有弹性。 这款独特的护发产品组合以奢华焕发洗发水、丰盈护发素和轻质丰盈摩丝而自诩，让您的秀发自然蓬松，持久地拥有光泽。 这是一套必备的护发产品，让您的秀发拥有沙龙级的完美效果！ K.D.
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力洗发水 250ml
这款 Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰盈丰凝活力洗发水使一款乳质洗发水，其设计旨在赋予秀发丰盈度和蓬松感。 这款洗发水可从发根丰盈秀发，让您尽享沙龙级的光泽度，它甚至能改善长发的纹理结构层次，实现持久定型。
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰凝蓬松啫喱（200ml）
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰凝蓬松啫喱是一款奢华的护发产品，它蕴含有创新型营养成分，能增强发质，增强丰盈度和蓬松度，让您尽享显著的护发效果。 这款护发产品拥有半透明的啫喱质地，具有深层滋养功效，可有针对性地滋养脆弱的发丝，增加秀发的浓密度，丰盈发量。
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列丰凝蓬松喷雾 125ml
Kérastase Resistance 卡诗强韧修复系列的这款丰凝蓬松喷雾是一款轻盈的乳状质地喷雾，赋予您的秀发无与伦比的发质和丰盈度。 这款喷雾采用 Intra-Cylane 立体构建分子技术，能够通过强化发丝结构实现持久定型，它可从发根丰盈秀发，而不会牺牲秀发的轻盈度。

product_description:
用Joico K-PAK Color Therapy Shampoo 愈疗受损的头发、令染发颜色更持久。 这款超贴心的洗头水富含脂肪酸，可保护每一缕头发，对其进行滋养，令其变得强韧，充满活力。
Joico K-PAK Color Therapy Shampoo的配方采用了突破性技术，可令秀发更富有弹性、光泽度更高，同时防止头发褪色。

TIGI蒂芝床頭系列迷幻魅卷乳液

Transform limp, lifeless locks with David Mallett's Shampoo No.2 Le Volume; a volumising formula that promises to restore body and bounce to fine hair.
Fortified with mild surfactants that are kind to sensitive scalps, the lightweight shampoo gently eliminates impurities, whilst Nori (a Japanese Red Algae) provides proteins, vitamins and trace elements to improve elasticity and suppleness. Delivers an invigorating fragrance of Green Tea, leaving hair fresh, clean and prepared for styling.

使用 As I Am 柔顺凝胶定型卷发；它是一款轻质型定型凝胶，具有持久定型和滋养功效。
这款凝胶蕴含有芦荟、甜菜和小麦蛋白，可增加光泽感，具有保湿定型的功效，可保持您的发型不会因重量因素而导致发丝下垂或有不雅的脱落及堆积感。 易于清洗。

不要错过这一革命性的护发产品——DS Laboratories 光谱 DNC-N 生发精华液。 它通过预防导致秀发脱落的诱因，对抗脱发，让您拥有丰盈浓密的秀发。
DS Laboratories 光谱 DNC-N 生发精华特别添加了分子量比米诺地尔（minoxidil）还小的纳诺地尔（nanoxidil），能有效调节头发生长，强韧发丝，让头皮重现活力，进而促进秀发的健康生长。
使用说明：
