product_description:
Achieve enviable locks with the Regenerating Hair Ritual Travel Kit from Christophe Robin. Housed inside an exotic, cotton cosmetic pouch, the set is ideal for all hair types, including hair that is badly damaged. The travel kit boasts a daily shampoo, reviving mask and nourishing balm, each guaranteeing to deliver a sumptuous hair that is regenerated from root to tip.
Regenerating Shampoo with Prickly Pear Oil 75ml
Catering for all hair types, the Regenerating Shampoo with Prickly Pear Oil deeply nourishes strands from root to tip to repair dry, damaged hair. Infused with antioxidant Prickly Pear Seed Oil for ultimate protection, the daily, creamy shampoo gently cleanses from dirt and impurities, whilst smoothening hair fibres and restoring healthy-looking, luscious locks.
Regenerating Mask with Rare Prickly Pear Seed Oil 50ml
Perfect for very dry and damaged hair, the Regenerating Mask with Rare Prickly Pear Seed Oil restores and revitalises your locks from root to tip. Enriched with pure Prickly Pear Seed Oil, it has antioxidant and regenerative properties, penetrating deep into the hair to repair it from within. The formula also stimulates the scalp and protects hair from split ends and further breakages. Suitable for coloured hair, the mask contains Inula flower extract which restores the pigments of both natural and dyed locks, leaving it looking vibrant, healthy and full of vitality.
Intense Regenerating Balm with Rare Prickly Pear Oil 50ml
The Intense Regenerating Balm with Rare Prickly Pear Oil is a multi-functional balm that moisturises, nourishes, protects and soothes hair and skin. The non-sticky and easy to use balm is made from 99% natural butters and plant oils and is perfect for both men and women. Ideal for use on hair, body, lips, hands and feet, the balm will nourish, moisturise and soothe dry, damaged or irritated areas.
name: Robin Regenerating Hair Ritual Travel Kit

product_description:
Joico K-Pak平滑Balm 是保护秀发，令秀发顺直的理想产品，它可以护理秀发，消除毛躁。 它可以保护秀发免受热力和环境的损害。
K-Pak Smoothing Balm使用了Keratin硅复合物，具有防潮性能，可以保护秀发，令秀发顺直、丝般柔滑。
使用说明：
name: K-Pak Smoothing Balm (200ml)

product_description:
invisibobble Nano 束发发绳  最适合任何发型或场合，用其可将头发细分成多个部分，固定高髻，或在没有发夹和发针的情况下将辫子固定到位。
这种球状束发发绳既好玩又好用，既采用卫生的不吸水设计，而且光滑的表面意味着无论如何都会一直处于干燥状态，又具有超舒适的独特形状，可防止头痛和头发打结。 可在潮湿或干燥的头发上使用，不会造成缠结、断裂或钩到头发。
name: - 水晶Clear

product_description:
使用获过奖项的 Tangle Teezer Original Blue Brush 护理易于缠结的头发。 Tangle Teezer Original Blue Brush 富于创新、大胆而绚丽，结合了抢眼的色彩和处理发丝缠结的有效无痛方法。
Tangle Teezer 独特设计的刷齿在头发中滑动时会发生弯曲并弹回，及时梳散顽固的发结，同时保留发型，尽量减少破坏、分叉和损伤。 这款符合人体工程学设计的顺发刷适用于所有发质（包括脆弱的，染过色或细的头发，以及接发和编织头发），在梳理时能提供完美的造型，令头发如丝般柔软，顺滑到底。
Tangle Teezer Original Brush 可用于湿发或干发，实现瞬间梳散和顺滑效果。
name: Teezer Original Blue Blush

product_description: Shield against the damage caused by heat styling and UV rays with this label.m Heat Protection Spray which can be applied to both wet or dry hair. Containing label.m's exclusive Enviroshield Complex which protects hair from heat damage whilst providing a seductive shine, this protection spray lets you create individual, fashion led styles with expert protection. - E.D
name: Heat Protection Spray (200ml)

product_description:
Wella 鲜色染发剂弱光自然金发8.03是一款半永久性染色剂，pH值呈酸性，能融进多达40%的灰白发。 其新配方使持续时间最多延长了35%，产生神奇的颜色效果和高亮光泽。
Wella鲜色染发剂弱光自然金发8.03最长能经受10瓶洗发水，有助于获得柔和的色彩效果，翻新永久性的颜色，调匀不均匀的色调。 Color Fresh 不含氨或过氧化物，对秀发温和；可进行均匀、彻底的清洗，也可就在烫发后使用。
使用说明：
 
请注意：我们不能保证颜色与图片绝对一致，因为颜色会依头发现在颜色的不同而不同。
name: 鲜色染发剂弱光自然金发 8.03（75毫升）

product_description:
Transform dry, dull and lifeless locks with the Kérastase Aura Botanica Fraiche Hair Oil Regime Bundle. Selected from the brand’s exquisite natural haircare collection, the trio work in tandem to tackle impurities, combat frizz and maximise vitality without stripping or drying hair. Tresses feel sumptuously soft and supple with mirror-like shine.  
Aura Botanica Bain Shampoo (250ml)
Utilising 96% natural origin ingredients, including responsibly sourced Samoan Coconut Oil and Moroccan Argan Oils, the nourishing shampoo gentle yet effectively cleanses away dirt and impurities; it transforms into an airy lather and harnesses natural micelles to lift away dirt for shinier, revitalised locks. Infused with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, the shampoo will expertly cleanse tresses whilst imparting an aromatic scent. Hair is protected against frizz for 72 hours and looks nourished, three times shinier and re-energised.
96% natural origin*. Free from silicones, sulphates and parabens.
Kérastase Aura Botanica Soin Fondant Conditioner (200ml)
A lightweight yet deeply moisturising conditioner from the brand's natural haircare collection. Delivering intense nutrition and frizz-fighting benefits, the deep conditioner melts effortlessly into the hair fibre, imparting a cocktail of natural oils (Coconut, Argan and Sweet Orange) to expertly nourish, moisturise and detangle. The revitalising conditioner will re-energise lifeless hair and delicately perfume locks with its Sweet Orange Essential Oil fragrance.
97% natural origin*. Free from silicones.
Aura Botanica Huile Fraiche Hair Oil (100ml)
Utilising 99% natural origin ingredients, the lightweight, bi-phase mist formula combines four nutritious oils (Jojoba, Avocado, Coconut and Argan) with an aqueous solution; the two layers work in synergy to infuse hair with nutrition, moisture and frizz-fighting benefits. Use as a hair primer before blow-drying, or mist over dry hair to enhance softness and radiance. Hair looks rejuvenated and is delicately perfumed with Sweet Orange Essential Oil and Damask Rose Flower Water.
99% natural origin*. Free from silicones.
name: Aura Botanica Fraiche Hair Oil Regime Bundle (Worth £85.10)

product_description:
Achieve a salon-worthy blow dry with the Kérastase Styling L'Incroyable Blow Dry Créme; an opulent, reshapable heat-styling cream developed for those with thick and unruly hair types.
The innovative formula utilises proprietary SRS® technology. This boasts Micro-Beeswaxes and elastic Polymers, which work in synergy to create flexible shape memory and define a new kind of hold. The heat-sensitive Beeswax melts when heated, which allows for infinite reshapeability and endless, touchable styles, without unwanted stiffness.
The crème effortlessly glides through locks, instantly delivering up to 3 times faster heat-styling and eliminating frizz with long-lasting effect. Use the treatment before drying hair and the formula will allow you to boost locks on the second day, touch up styling errors and change up your style. Expect a natural feel that lasts for days.
name: Styling L'Incroyable Blow Dry Créme 125ml

product_description:
Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask 是一款深层保湿产品，用于缺乏光泽的发丝。 适用于因化学或染色处理、热力造型工具和日晒所造成的干枯、受损的头发。 这款轻盈面膜富含天然鳄梨油，为秀发补充和锁住水分，并提供环境压力抗氧化保护。
其特有的 B 族复合维生素可改善秀发质地，修复开叉和防止断裂，呈现如丝绸般柔软的健康秀发。 玫瑰果和甜杏仁油可平滑角质层，控制毛躁，滋养脆弱发丝并提升亮泽，呈现柔软的发丝。 E.N.
name: Don’t Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Mask 236ml

product_description:
这款深层调节蛋白精华乳可使您严重损伤的秀发得到爆炸性的修复。 Fudge Dynamite 乳脂软糖炸弹秀发再生精华乳可修复您干燥和因化学处理而受损的秀发，使其恢复最佳的健康状态，拥有亮丽的光泽。
即便是纤细的发质，Fudge Dynamite 乳脂软糖炸弹秀发再生精华乳也能有效调节发质，而不会增加秀发的厚重感，它还有助于防止断发和分叉，强健发丝，为秀发提供所需的营养物质。
这款五分钟集所有功效于一身的修护滋润霜可渗入发丝结构的内部，进行结合、增加头发强度，并永久改善发质，并使秀发更易于梳理。 始终在洗发与护理头发之间使用该产品。
所有 Fudge 乳脂软糖产品均蕴含有长波紫外线/中波紫外线过滤器，对秀发起保护作用，有助于使其一整天都保持亮泽柔软。
使用说明：
name: Dynamite 乳脂软糖秀发再生精华乳（150ml）

product_description:
不破损、不打结、不纠缠的头发只是一个童话故事？ 用 Tangle Teezer 魔术花盆就可以将这个童话变成现实。 一把可爱的花形刷，它可以毫不费力地解开纠结的头发，无需用力撕扯或艰难地改变发结。 Tangle Teezer魔术花盆顺发梳尤其 Perfect儿童，它易于握持，拥有Tangle Teezer的专利梳齿，梳理头发后令头发显得非常光滑。
Tangle Teezer魔术花盆顺发梳配有一个收纳头饰的可爱花盆盒，它对于浓密、易打结的秀发是必备之物，简单好用，孩子们可以自己使用它！ 用这款创新解结发梳梳发后，您会心情畅快、精神愉悦。
Tangle Teezer 的梳齿设计独特，在梳理秀发时，梳齿可弯曲并快速弹回原位，防止容易打结的发丝相互接触，最大化减少因护理不当而导致的断发、分叉和损伤。 它适用于各种发质，尤其适用于发质脆弱或染发、接发后的头发、卷发以及儿童细密易打结的头发。
name: Teezer魔法花盆 - Princess粉红色

product_description:
卡诗 Styling Lift Vertige 75ml 具有超细腻的质地，能够有效提拉发根，不会让秀发显得僵硬。 这款半透明啫喱采用阳离子聚合物、木糖和 POWERSOFT 技术配制，增加发根体积，使其容易梳理，同时还能担当高温保护剂。 持久有效，提供中度定型效果，成就最佳丰盈度。 - L.M.

使用说明：
name: Styling Lift Vertige (75ml)

product_description:
使用Fudge Fat Hed获得一头浓密的秀发。 绝不可小看这款有强大功效的造型啫喱，它会使您最顽固的头发也会被控制得服服帖帖的。
这款定型啫喱可在一整天使您的秀发造型完美而坚挺，使用后您的头发会充满光泽和质感，随时展现惊人魅力。 Fudge Fat Hed可使您的头发处于掌控之中，使秀发造型精美。
这款使发质坚挺的定型啫喱膏使头发更有质感，在提拉发根和增加头发厚度的同时让您的秀发像丝缎般的柔顺亮泽。  将其用于干燥的秀发上以获得更可塑的质感和光泽度。
Fudge定型产品的指导性坚挺系数为0-15，代表轻、中、强或极度。 Fat Hed 的坚挺系数是9，属于强度级的。  所有Fudge Styling产品均有UVA/UVB过滤成分。
使用说明：
name: Fat Hed (75g)

product_description: Grow Gorgeous 防髮尾開叉精華可滋養並修復髮尾，讓您的秀發重回強韌、健康狀態。這款免洗型防髮尾開叉精華富含多種充滿異國情調的亞馬遜油，包括阿薩伊油、棕櫚油和印加果油，消除分叉現象，同時不會讓頭髮感覺油膩或粘連。 - LM
name: Gorgeous 防发尾开叉精华 (120ml)

product_description:
使用Sukin 保濕修護洗髮水，讓秀發更加柔順、易於打理。這款洗髮水以具有舒緩功效的蘆薈和甘菊配製而成，同時結合玫瑰果油與調理頭皮的牛蒡成分，以幫助改善頭髮質地並防止分叉。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA
name: 保湿修护洗发水 (500ml)

product_description:
Calm unruly locks with the OUAI Smooth Conditioner; an award-winning, frizz-fighting formula developed by celebrity hair stylist, Jen Atkin.
The lightweight conditioner glides onto frizz-prone locks; smoothing, soothing and hydrating each fiber. Utilising OUAI’s ‘Smart Technology Complex’, the conditioning formula is infused with an effective blend of naturally-derived oils, which work to calm disobedient tresses, without weighing them down.
Enriched with a reviving scent of Italian Lemon, Bergamot, Rose and Blackberry, the calming conditioner thoroughly nourishes and tames locks, leaving hair smooth, sleek and frizz-free.
name: Smooth Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
用这款 Joico K-PAK Color Therapy Conditioner滋养染色后的头发，令秀发更强韧。 这款超贴心的护发素富含脂肪酸，可防止秀发褪色，令染色的秀发看起来充满活力、散发健康光泽。
Joico K-PAK Color Therapy Conditioner 的配方采用了突破性技术，是理想的日常护发素，可令秀发不可思议的柔软，散发出美丽的光芒。
name: K-Pak Color Therapy Conditioner (1000ml) - （价值 50.00 英镑）

product_description:
Experience long-lasting volume with the Pureology Pure Volume Shampoo and Conditioner Duo; a convenient collection that is designed for daily use. Combining a volumising shampoo and conditioner, the duo works to clean and condition locks from root to tip, leaving fine tresses visibly thicker and healthier.
Pure Volume Shampoo (250ml)
Infuse locks with moisture using the Pure Volume Shampoo; a protective cleanser that guarantees not to strip colour. The Pure Volume Shampoo gently cleanses, whilst delivering exclusive volumising technology, leaving hair bouncy, lustrous and radiant. Pureology’s Volume Shampoo is formulated with ‘ZeroSulfate’, a mild cleansing system that ensures hair colour remains vibrant and healthy looking. Derived from Lavender, Ylang Ylang, and Sandalwood, the effective treatment delivers a rich lather and helps optimise colour retention.
Pureology Pure Volume Conditioner (250ml)
Experience lightweight moisture that detangles and defends colour without weighing hair down. The Pure Volume Conditioner is an innovative daily conditioner that creates fullness from within to reveal nourished, vibrant hair with natural body. Formulated with exclusive volumising technology and multi-weight proteins, the nourishing formula works to create fullness in fine hair to reveal locks with enviable body. Boasting an exclusive AntiFade Complex, the conditioner also works to maximise colour retention so hair is left vibrant with enhanced colour brilliance.
name: Pure Volume Shampoo and Conditioner Duo (250ml x 2)

product_description:
Tangle Teezer Original Jellee Beenz 防毛躁顺发梳可在短短几分钟内将您不可收拾的秀发变得令人难以置信的柔滑。 Tangle Teezer 革命性的凸状呵护秀发的梳齿可以无痛梳理秀发，其独特的符合人体工程学的外观，可在一接触秀发时即可疏通最难打开的头发缠结。 不管您是何种发质（染过色、遭到损坏、厚的、细的、甚至有接发或织发），这款黑色Tangle Teezer Original Jellee Beenz 防毛躁顺发梳均适合您。
用 Tangle Teezer发梳梳理湿发或干发，可即时令头发变得柔顺光滑。
name: Teezer Original 纯 Black

product_description:
使用各种滋养产品呵护秀发。Kérastase's Elixir Ultime Trio 包括洗发水、护发素和发油，赋予秀发深层洁净和保护，令其散发闪耀亮泽。
Kerastase Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain (250ml):
一款轻盈洗发水，奢华、珍贵，且如黄金般纯净。 适用于所有发质，呈现沙龙级效果。 这款富含油脂的洗发水可为您提供最奢华的清洁体验，让您拥有皇室般感受，并呈现散发镜面般光泽的丝滑秀发。
Kerastase Elixir Ultime Fondant Conditioner (200ml):
一款日常护发素，融合了四种珍贵精油的共混物 Oléo-Complexe。 这款护发素旨在顺滑和软化所有发束，而不会产生下坠感；含有摩洛哥坚果、玉米、山茶花和巴卡斯果油的共混物，实现滋养，提升光泽并改善可打理性。 秀发看起来超亮泽，如丝绸般柔软、轻盈。
Kerastase Elixir Ultime Original Hair Oil (100ml):
一款多用途发油，旨在护理、保护和强韧秀发。 这款发油富含阿甘油和玉米油等多种珍贵油类，适合所有发质，能够深层滋养并抑制毛躁，同时提亮发色并减少分叉。 吹干前后均可使用，全天均可保持神清气爽。 提供热保护和湿度保护。 秀发更光亮、更有弹性。
name: Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain 250ml, Elixir Ultime Fondant Conditioner 200ml and Original Hair Oil 100ml Bundle

product_description:
使用 Braun BR750 Iontech 发刷提升头发的光泽度。这是一款具备天然鬃毛和离子技术的创新性护发工具，可提高光泽并抚平毛躁。
发刷非常适合纤细到中等发丝，可以毫不费力地轻轻滑过每一股头发；在触摸按钮时，可提供数百万计的活性离子，这些离子与每一缕头发结合，防止静电和毛躁，提升光泽并引导周围空气中的水分回到头发中，打造健康秀发。
该装置拥有独特的功能，能主动生成离子并通过小型绿色喷嘴喷出；安静的嘶嘶声表明提升光泽的刷头在工作。 配备旅行锁，在不使用时保护离子输出端。
可实现顺滑、有光泽，且无缠结的飘逸秀发。
name: BR750 Iontech 发刷 - 白色

product_description:
蒂芝床頭系列增厚造型膏 
增厚— 增加發量。賦活— 令頭髮柔順，煥發生機。造型— 打造髮型，拒絕髮絲打結。具有多種功效。 
 使用說明： 
噴於濕髮上可輕鬆造型。
name: 蒂芝床头系列增厚造型膏 (200ml)

product_description:
適合髮色暗淡，無光澤，受損發，易老化髮質，Alterna竹防曬鎖色洗髮露萃取天然有機竹精華，溫和清潔，不含矽酸鹽。用後秀發能持久保持自然清新的色澤。 
專為護色鎖色設計的滋養保護配方，Alterna竹防曬鎖色洗髮露搭配精選喀拉哈里沙漠甜瓜精華，強效鎖色快速修復損傷，預防髮絲顏色駁落，有效延長髮乾中色素細胞的壽命，最大程度緩解髮絲光老化痕跡，並抵抗紫外線照射損傷，帶給髮絲最高級別的安全保護。 
使用方法：

Viviscal 生发精华护发素，带给头发一个好的开端。使秀发致密的配方，让头发健康生长。
这款轻型护发素，用以保湿调理秀发，促进头发的健康生长，可巧妙提高每根头发的外观，使秀发更蓬润、更浓密、而不会加重头发重量。 内含Ana：Tel™（一种混合了生物素、角蛋白和锌的专有聚合物，可促进头发增长、减少头发脱落。 使秀发更蓬润、更浓密、更亮泽。
使秀发超柔软、魅力迷人。
name: 浓发护发素

product_description:
Treat hair to intense conditioning with the Matrix Biolage Sunsorials Sun Repair Treatment; a protective formula developed for sun exposed hair.
Ideal for locks being exposed to the sun, sea or pool water, the reparative treatment envelops hair in a protective veil, which prevents damage to the fiber. The formula is enriched with Sunflower Seed Extract, which provides vulnerable tresses with environmental defense, as well as nourishing moisture.
Working in just five minutes, the sun repair treatment ensures locks are thoroughly cared for and ultra-shiny.
name: Biolage Sunsorials Sun Repair Treatment 150ml

product_description:
Fudge Big Hair 丰盈造型粉能够增加秀发的丰盈度和质感，即便是超细的发质。 这款瓶装蓬松粉采用特殊配方，让您实现想要的蓬松感，而且不会造成秀发毛躁。 产品特别添加了具有锁水功效的水解小麦蛋白，因此秀发可以在全天任何时候随意重新造型，不需要使用其他产品。
使用说明：直接洒在干燥的秀发上。 然后让手指穿过发根，打造想要的效果。- K.R
name: Big Hair 丰盈造型粉（10g）

product_description: 俪康丝系统 3采用特殊配方，可以放大纤细、正常和稀薄的烫染头发的纹理，恢复水份平衡。作为三步法之一，此清洁洗发水是让秀发更浓密丰盈的第一步。这款洗发露融合多种先进技术，包括增加发量的 BioAMP® 技术和焕活头皮的 Glyco-Shield™ 技术，可去除头皮和头发上每日堆积的堵塞毛囊的皮脂、脂肪酸和环境残留。创新配方深入清洁，Transactive Delivery System™ 富含抗氧化剂和植物性药材，让秀发丰盈强韧。- K.N.
name: 俪康丝系统 3 清洁洗发水，适合细软、正常及稀薄的烫染头发 (300ml)

product_description:
Kérastase Styling Laque Couture 让任何发式都完美无瑕，它提供了弹性而灵活的定型效果，可随时间推移保持头发的状态如初。 轻盈的配方可减少毛躁和飞翘的头发，让您轻而易举地控制秀发的造型。
配方中含有长效定型聚合物，它让您的头发有卓越的光泽和柔软度，并且不会使发质发粘或发脆。 它还具有造型记忆功能，让您的发式完美如初。 - L.M.

使用说明： 将足量产品随意喷在吹干或做好造型的头发上，喷雾时与秀发保持10-15cm距离。
name: Styling Laque Couture (300ml)

product_description: 让在旅行中打造发型变得如此轻松！ 这款 Tangle Teezer 便携式男款顺发梳可解决从额发到胡须及发髻的各种毛发问题。 光滑的哑光黑梳身搭配灰色梳齿，其设计旨在提供舒适握持感的同时，梳顺秀发，帮您打造与众不同的发型！ 梳齿可对头皮进行舒适的按摩，同时防止断发、拉扯头皮和损伤秀发。 这款小巧的黑色发梳既可用于湿发，也可用于干发，以打造出您想要的发型。 它配备有可拆卸的保护盖，可防止梳齿粘上污物，让它保持清洁如新。 LB
name: Teezer 便携式男款顺发梳

product_description:
Kerastase Elixir Ultime 菁纯系列护发霜（细发）能够有效滋润并抚顺发丝，而且秀发不会因此变得扁塌。
针对纤细和敏感发质的 Kerastase 菁纯系列护发霜富含 Oleo-Complexe，散发着千禧玫瑰的淡淡芳香，这款多功能美发精油能够保护洗发不受外界侵害的损伤。
name: Elixir Ultime 菁纯系列护发霜 - 细发（150ml）

product_description:
特別適合乾枯毛躁、易打結髮質，Alterna竹柔順精華油萃取天然竹的精華和瓢油，迅速改善毛躁脆弱的髮質。雙重滋養柔順配方，深入頭皮底層的保濕呵護，有效預防髮絲打結。 
 Alterna竹柔順精華油是一款多用途、純天然滋潤油，可以在洗髮或者吹風造型前使用起到保護頭髮的作用，也可以乾發時做日常護理。可持久保濕，多種維他命深入髮絲內層修復破損蛋白，同時有助於涵養髮色，打造絲綢一般順滑的髮質，同時可有效改善脆弱易捲曲髮絲質地，使髮色持久光鮮亮澤且有韌性。 
主要功效及使用方法：
專用於打造順滑直挺造型，軟化自然捲髮絲。防水防汗，持久定型。  髮型：極致定型力，閃耀耀眼光澤
name: Crew 美国队员男士修饰发霜 85g

product_description:
Joico Color Infuse铜色头发洗发水  可保护头发的鲜明色泽。其配方具有修补性，可维持赤褐色头发及红色系发色自然色彩的完整性。
本品可清洁保护每丝秀发，属修护型洗发水。采多光谱防御聚合物对抗头发褪色。内含色调增强颜料，在后续的 18 次洗发过程中，可维持原色彩的鲜明度。 采用生物高级肽复合物，从发根至发尖进行全面修复。 确保毛躁头发减少、秀发光泽亮丽。 添加了阴离子染料技术，确保维持头发色彩不变，令秀发更明亮、更坚韧。
本品具有增强特性，为金发增添玫瑰色温暖。
name: Color Infuse铜色头发洗发水 300ml

product_description:
准备好接受一个无可比拟的奇迹般的治疗！ Fudge Ends 富含多种动力蛋白，可修复和密封干燥的发梢以防止头发断裂。 使用后，您将获得您所渴望的超光滑柔顺的秀发。
要获得理想效果，在应用这款令头发顺滑的绝佳护理之前，首先使用Fudge Ends直发器拉直头发。
使用说明：
name: Ends Miracle Treatment (50ml)

product_description: KeraCare 直发霜富含多种天然轻质精油，能够有效保护秀发不受高温损伤，带给您如丝般垂坠的秀发。 这款护发霜能够防止秀发干燥易断，让秀发更持久垂坠，散发天然光泽。 -SA
name: 直发霜（115g）

product_description:
Rediscover luscious, healthy hair with Grow Gorgeous' Hair Density Serum and Cleansing Conditioner Brunette Prismatic. The innovative formulas work in synergy to deeply cleanse and condition your hair whilst enhancing your brunette colour and inspiring thicker, denser-looking locks.
Hair Density Serum (60ml)
An ultra-concentrated blend of 7 technologies encourages your hair to appear longer and denser within 4 months. Made with a 21.5% active complex, the growth serum contains Clover Flower Extract Active Complex to visibly improve hair length. Bio-active Complexes of Pea Shoot, Chinese Skullcap, Soy and Wheat Sprout combine to visibly increase hair thickness, density and health. Hyaluronic Acid improves scalp hydration and penetration. Expect dramatic results with regular use, or as a pampering treat.
 
12-in-1 Cleansing Conditioner Brunette Prismatic (190ml)
Formulated with a 28.1% active complex, it combines foamless shampoo-cleansing with deep conditioning to revitalise your hair colour and rebalance your scalp in one simple step. Offering 12 benefits, the treatment has an air-light texture that won't dry out your hair or strip natural oils; it absorbs excess oils whilst eliminating product build-up and toxins for improved lustre, volume and vitality. Metal-derived prism technology binds to each individual strand, working to reflect light particles and add a mirror-like gloss to your brown locks. An advanced Conditioning Complex coats each individual follicle and works to smooth the cuticle for a sleek, frizz-free finish. Gentle enough for daily use and suitable for all hair types, it's the perfect addition to maximise your colour and leave hair feeling touchably soft with a radiant gloss. Paraben and sulphate free.
name: Gorgeous Hair Density Serum and Cleansing Conditioner Brunette Prismatic

product_description:
卡诗的吹发定型乳液 是一款能够抑制头发过于蓬乱毛糙，顺滑秀发的护发乳液。用了它，你的秀发你做主。
这款创新型护发乳液采用顺发弹性体和抵抗毛躁的阳离子聚合物强化功效，能够巧妙控制造型和发量，将过密的秀发控制在恰到好处的柔软度，同时更易梳理。 中度定型配方在毛糙的头发上覆盖一层保护膜，防止水分流失，头发决不会变得僵硬难以驾驭，而是保护光滑整齐。
打造顺滑整齐的发型。 - K.N.
name: (125 毫升)

product_description: 超強造型力，造型隨心創。使用天然提取物和蜂蠟研製而成，獨特配方，用心打造可感觸的形狀和質地。短髮使用效果最佳。  風格：強定型力，中等光澤度
name: Crew 美国队员男士造型护理发泥 85g

product_description:
使用 KeraCare 密集型修复发膜护理您的秀发，让您拥有极致的美发效果。 其超级滋养配方的设计旨在强健干燥、损伤的秀发，使其富有弹性，能够使发丝比原来强壮 43%。
KeraCare 密集型修复发膜带给干燥、脆弱和分叉秀发极致的护发体验。 它可有效强化和调节发丝，让您的秀发更易于梳理，更柔软丝滑。
使用说明：
name: 密集型修复发膜（236ml）

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Elixir Ultime Hair Oil Duo for Fine Hair，让秀发体验丰盈功效；这是一组美发油雾，旨在呵护、保护和提升秀发体量。
这款扩散喷雾富含阿甘油和玉米油等珍贵油类混合成分，能够均匀地喷洒在头发上，不会将头发压得平塌，反而能够深层滋养并塑造浓密的外观，同时采用 Oléo-Complexe 和 Intra-Cylane® 技术，加粗每根发丝。 秀发看起来更加浓密、健康而柔软，蕴含明亮的光泽和轻盈的气质。 吹干前后均可使用，全天均可保持神清气爽。
秀发更光亮、更有弹性。
name: Elixir Ultime Fine Hair Oil Duo 100ml

product_description:
KeraCare 免洗护发素，适合所有发质，效果立竿见影，提供深层滋养。 采用三合一浓缩配方，这款护发素将为秀发注入充盈水分，提供深层滋养，令秀发光彩照人，柔顺如丝。
这款轻盈的护发素能够防止秀发因高温造型而受损或发丝断裂，让秀发变得光滑柔亮，更易于打理。 -SA
name: 免洗护发素（475ml）

product_description:
Strip back your styling regime with the Shu Uemura Blow Dry Beautifier for Fine to Medium Hair; a multi-tasking, leave-in treatment that delivers five benefits without weighing hair down.
The first BB treatment for hair utilises SRS Microwaxes and Amino Acid Reactive Silicon – microscopic wax particles that melt when activated by heat to create flexible bonds between hair fibres – helping to prime and smooth each strand for sleek, polished results.
Fortified with antioxidant-rich Ginkgo Biloba extract, the serum-like formula weightlessly coats hair, protecting against heat damage as well as free radical damage. Perfect for shaping and reshaping styles in-between washes, it hydrates and replenishes for hair that looks supple and revitalised without that heavy product feel. Use pre-blow dry for flawless, barely-there results.
name: Uemura Art of Hair Blow Dry Beautifier for Fine to Medium Hair 150ml

product_description:
Joico 锁色紫罗兰护发素（300ml）专为金发、挑染、变淡和发白发质配制，内含高含量的紫罗兰染发剂，有助于调和不自然的黄色和黄铜发色。
这款温和的护发素除了能够修正发色，增加活力之外，还可以抚顺秀发，带给您顺滑不打结的秀发。 秀发看起来会更亮，更强韧，同时还能保护秀发免受环境伤害和物理伤害。
name: 锁色紫罗兰护发素（300ml）

product_description: 使用 Wella Elements Light Ren Conditioner，强韧脆弱的发丝。 这款活化护发素旨在由内而外强韧每一缕发丝，同时保持秀发的自然活力，这意味着受损的头发得以修复并重现新的活力。 非常温和，可供每天使用，令秀发柔软顺滑、健康亮泽。 A.B.
name: Professionals Elements Light Ren Conditioner (200ml)

product_description:
使用 Philip Kingsley Geranium and Neroli Elasticizer，转变脆弱、缺乏光泽的发丝。 这款丰盈预清洗产品适用于需要韧性和滋润的受损、干燥或过度处理过的头发，富含橙花、天竺葵、薰衣草、玫瑰和橙子等天然油脂，提升秀发弹性，呈现亮泽、健康的发丝。
屡获殊荣的 Elasticizer 受 Philip Kingsley 最喜爱的意大利度假胜地启发，采用充满活力的包装，并散发着令人振奋的花香和柑橘香味。 控制头发毛躁和凌乱，并防止其进一步断裂，同时提升弹性，让您实现更具光泽感的发丝。 E.N.
name: Kingsley Geranium and Neroli Elasticizer (150ml)

product_description:
In its latest collaboration, Tangle Teezer has treated its on-the-go detangling hairbrush, the Compact Styler, to a special edition print, featuring the iconic Star Wars TM logo and the film's exciting characters.
The Compact Styler is designed to detangle, define and deliver great hair on the move. This is all possible thanks to its unique two-tiered system technology - the long teeth detangle and the short teeth smooth the hair cuticle for healthier-looking, glossy hair. With teeth that good, you'll want to keep them in tip-top condition, so the Compact Styler also arrives with a protective cover, so no matter where you go, the teeth stay perfect.
Star Wars fans will love this new addition to the Tangle Teezer Compact Styler collection - which totally saves their hair from going to the dark side!
name: Teezer Disney Star Wars Compact Styler Hair Brush

product_description:
深層保濕秀發，盡情享受優質的熱帶海藻萃取物和夏威夷姜。這款獨特的洗髮露能增加發量，讓頭髮健康閃亮，富有彈性。 
採用維他命A，C 和E 保護頭髮，具有獨特的植物醇，滋潤頭髮，令頭髮健康光澤。植物萃取的維他命B5，能徹底深入頭髮及根部，帶來持久保濕，減少分叉，同時增加發量，使頭髮易打理。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森天然海藻洗发露 (480ml)

product_description:
蒂芝床頭系列活力重現組合兩件裝， 價值¥429含有一瓶洗髮水和一瓶護髮素，可強韌，保護和修復髮絲，令您的秀發更加順滑，易於打理，倍顯光澤。 - LM 
 包含：
name: 蒂芝床头系列活力重现组合两件装 - 价值 ï??47.00

product_description:
Protect, prolong and enhance your colour with Kérastase Reflection Touche Chromatique in 'Cool Blonde', a colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique.
The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your blonde hair; it neutralises unwanted brassiness and yellow shades to restore bright, radiant cool tones back into your blonde locks. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. 
Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
name: Reflection Touche Chromatique - Cool Blonde 10ml

product_description:
Witness fuller-looking locks with Grow Gorgeous' Hair Growth Serum Intense and Density Shampoo Intense. Working in synergy to promote longer, denser-looking hair, both products utilise a host of technologies to leave every strand feeling stronger, healthier and fuller-looking.
Hair Growth Serum Intense (60ml)
Achieve visibly thicker hair with this intense hair growth serum, developed with a 40% concentration of nine technologies. With its Stabilized Dihydroquercetin-Glucoside Complex, the serum contains Glycine and Zinc to improve hair length for a fuller appearance, whilst a unique form of water-compatible Caffeine absorbs into the scalp to reduce hair loss in a small time period. Its Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3 and Clover Flower Extract Active Complex has been proven to visibly increase hair density by 13% within four months, whilst Bio-Active Pea Sprout starts to work within two weeks to visibly improve hair growth by 78%. Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid to penetrate the scalp and boost hydration so you can experience luscious, voluminous locks.
Hair Density Shampoo Intense (190ml)
An ultra-concentrated formula infused with Amino Acids, Biotin, Caffeine and B-Vitamins to visibly increase density of hair. Its advanced technology supports the follicles to promote healthy-looking locks. Delivering gentle, yet effective cleansing to prevent damage to hair, the shampoo is ideal for slow-growing and thinning hair, or for weak fibres in need of strengthening. Suitable for all hair types, including colour-treated, you can expect denser, fuller looking locks.
name: Gorgeous Hair Growth Serum Intense and Density Shampoo Intense

product_description:
Achieve the perfect blow dry with the Pro Blo MEMEME, an ultimate home styling kit combining together the CurlME, AddME and VolumizeME sets for a superior salon experience - ideal for long, thick hair.
Expertly designed to allow you to recreate professional salon looks at home, the CurlME is an innovative hair brush with a unique detachable handle that allows the ceramic coated barrel to remain in place until hair has completely cooled to lock in styles. This complete set provides twelve barrels in various sizes to suit different hair lengths and thickness, as well as twelve clips to secure each barrel in place.
The VolumizeME brush features a unique double width head, which allows you to achieve super voluminous hair without causing damage or breakage. Simply backcomb and tease until you have the desired volume before gently brushing over the top to tame any flyaways.
Locks are left looking volumized, bouncy and smooth with a gorgeous glossy shine. 
Please Note: Not recommended for hair longer than 22".
name: Blo MEMEME

product_description:
Sukin 蛋白質洗髮水內含可強健髮絲的大米與小麥蛋白質，以及鱷梨、荷荷巴、玫瑰果成分和維他命E，讓秀發易於打理，充滿彈性。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA
name: 蛋白质洗发水 (500ml)

product_description:
Joico Color Balance Blue 护发素  配方具有中和性。可将自然黑发中的杂色头发发色修正，如黄铜色头发或橙色头发。
本款护发素可滋养保护每丝秀发。采用多光谱防御聚合物， 对抗头发褪色；内含生物高级肽复合物，可从发根到发尖完全修复秀发，确保毛躁头发减少、秀发光泽亮丽。 其修正性可使秀发恢复至原本的高亮泽。使用本品后，将保持修正后89%的秀发颜色长达 8 周。
您将拥有柔软光滑、晶莹凉爽的秀发。
name: Color Balance Blue 护发素 300ml

product_description:
Christophe Robin藍莓抗氧化護髮素呵護細軟、染色、敏感髮質，獨特配方能即時滋潤頭髮，讓髮絲回复順滑，令頭髮染色更鮮豔亮麗。 
這款滋潤的護髮素，能預防髮色氧化，順滑髮絲，鎖色護色，增強並滋養頭髮的細胞膜，讓秀發持久具有健康光澤。
name: Robin蓝莓抗氧化护发素250ml

product_description:
这款使秀发坚挺的Fudge Matte Hed可以让您呈现出多变的风格。 增加头发厚度，并获得个人风格，这款产品的质感和超级磨砂感的妆效使您在白天和黑夜均拥有完美造型。
Fudge Matte Hed 拥有最佳的哑光磨砂质感，为您的秀发塑型，使之充满动感。 它在光滑角质层的同时提供了控制。 这款使头发坚挺的定型膏也非常适用于蹩脚的、没有经过精心修饰的发型。
Fudge定型产品的指导性坚挺系数为0-15，代表轻、中、强或极度。 Matte Hed 的坚挺系数是9，属于强度级的。 所有Fudge Styling产品均有UVA/UVB过滤成分。
使用说明：
name: Matte Hed (75g)

product_description:
JASON Kids Only!本品採用溫和配方，能有效清潔，而不會刺激頭髮。採用安全有機原料，減少打結，讓梳頭變得簡單。 
特別配方中使用極溫和植物活性物質，能溫和清潔，抵禦污染造成的水油不平衡，特別保護年幼兒童的頭髮。傑森兒童專用！極溫和洗髮露pH 值與眼淚相同，因此即使洗髮露進入眼睛，也不會刺激流淚！採用新鮮的有機植物萃取物，如甘菊、金盞花和聚合草，幫助鎮靜舒緩頭皮，而山金車和金絲桃有抗敏感的功效，令您的小孩頭髮乾淨，不打結。 
使用說明：
name: Kids Only!超温和洗发露 (517ml)

product_description:
The Matrix Biolage Sunsorials After Sun Shampoo protects hair from the harmful effects of the sun, pool and seawater to leave hair soft, shiny and tangle-free.
Containing UV filters and Sunflower Seed Extract the cleanser supplies hair with moisture, smoothness and sun reflecting shine. Luminescent textures and a sunny, fresh fragrance creates a multi-sensorial, total sun experience. The Sunsorials range also cares for colour-treated hair.
name: Biolage Sunsorials After Sun Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸假发。由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其发夹采用隐形啮合设计，能够持久、牢固、舒适地固定假发，而所保留的角质层和独特的有机色素能够使发丝拥有亮丽的发色，使色泽极其鲜明。 佩戴简单，适合热力造型。
name: Works Jen Atkin 假发 18 英寸——金发女郎 613/24

product_description:
使用Cowshed Moody Cow Balancing Shampoo来让您的秀发得到净化、重现活力。 配方温和，可以去除您秀发中的污垢和杂质，同时可以让油性和敏感性头皮恢复平衡。
本款洗头水中含有苦橙叶、麦卢卡蜂蜜和肉桂，功效强大，可以让您的发丝看起来更为健康，呈现闪亮光泽，更具活力。 - L.M.使用说明：

product_description:
The Kérastase Reflection Fondant Chromatique & Touche Chromatique Duo in 'Red' offers personalised care for your red, colour-treated hair. Combining an ink-in-care, highly concentrated hair dye formula with a nourishing, shine-enhancing conditioner, the pair work in tandem to correct and brighten faded colour for restored softness, colour luminosity and radiance.
Fondant Chromatique (200ml)
A radiance-enhancing conditioner specially developed to soften and revive colour-treated hair. Expertly detangling whilst protecting colour, the nourishing conditioner utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasise light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant with enhanced shine.
Touche Chromatique - Red (10ml)
A colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique. The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your red hair; it enhances shine and redness for a beautifully, vibrant finish. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
name: Reflection Fondant Chromatique 200ml & Touche Chromatique - Red 10ml

product_description: 使用 Schwarzkopf BC Oil Miracle Shampoo，实现沙龙风格的发丝。Schwarzkopf 品牌将技术专长与研究相结合，打造可滋养和转变缺乏光泽发丝的产品。 采用微分散技术专门配制而成，精细地分布于头发上并为头发表面的多孔斑点提供适量的油脂，令秀发光滑柔软。这款轻盈洗发水可清洁和滋润秀发，提升光泽，而不会显得颓丧或留下残留物。 E.N.
name: BC Oil Miracle Shampoo (200ml)

product_description: 使用 hif (Hair is Fabric) Anti-Ageing Support Conditioner，提升秀发的强度和弹性。 这款泡沫护发素采用印度基诺树皮配方，可保护秀发与头皮免受环境压力造成的伤害，并从发根至发梢提供滋润。 与常见洗涤剂不同，Hif 凭借调理技术、乳油和透明质酸，可深层清洁秀发，实现健康柔顺的发丝。 E.N.

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸假发。由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其发夹采用隐形啮合设计，能够持久、牢固、舒适地固定假发，而所保留的角质层和独特的有机色素能够使发丝拥有亮丽的发色，使色泽极其鲜明。 佩戴简单，适合热力造型。

product_description:
维他命 E 可增强 Philip B 菲利普 B 抗毛躁配方 57 的调节作用，能舒缓、亮泽和焕活发丝。 Philip B 菲利普 B 抗毛躁配方 57 采用具有耐湿防护功能的配方，可让您拥有让您自信的持久完美定型秀发。
这款营养丰富的精华不仅可在热力造型过程中为秀发提供保护，还能调节发质，神奇地控制毛躁，让秀发拥有自然光泽，持久保持定型。 纯薰衣草、荷荷巴、米糠和豆油可让您的秀发保持理想的水分含量，确保轻盈定型，富有动感和光泽，而不会带给您厚重感。 Philip B 菲利普 B 抗毛躁配方 57 让您拥有闪亮而不毛躁的秀发。 只需一滴就能让您忘记您曾经拥有糟糕的秀发。
使用说明：
name: B 菲利普 B 抗毛躁配方 57（60ml）

TIGI蒂芝床頭系列金髮美女護髮素 
蒂芝金髮美女護髮素非常適合用於挑染、受損或燙染的頭髮。這可以滋潤和活化甚至是受損最嚴重的秀發。

product_description:
这款 Macadamia "Get the Look" 豪华卷发套装包含全面的护发产品，是您的卷发等待已久的不二之选。 内含活力卷发乳、泡沫蓬松喷雾和造型霜，让卷发丰盈，充满弹性和活力。 LB
活力卷发乳 148ml Macadamia 活力卷发乳将提拉并支撑下坠的卷发，使其恢复活力。 富含抗毛躁成分，保持卷发的卷曲度和弹性，令卷发柔顺，防止其垂坠变形。 除此之外，这款卷发乳还富含具有滋养功效的水解大豆蛋白和具有护发功效的水解苋菜蛋白。 在控制因子2的作用下，您的秀发时刻听话。
泡沫蓬松喷雾 180ml 使用泡沫蓬松喷雾，令秀发获得绝佳滋养。 这款产品将让秀发轻盈如羽毛，提供深层滋润，保护秀发免受环境有害因子和温度损伤的侵蚀。 这款蓬松摩斯含有护发成分，令秀发柔顺，为造型做准备。
造型霜 57g Macadamia 造型霜质地浓稠，具有很好的定型力和质感，而且无残留。 使用这款产品抚顺零乱碎发或打造一个造型时尚、充满质感的秀发。 这款造型乳还具有蓬松效果，能够吸收多余的皮脂，因此让秀发持久保持健康光泽。

product_description: 适用于浓密发质或卷发的 Louise Galvin 深层护理发膜蕴含有海檀木油，它是一种天然硅胶，可修复经过化学处理的损伤秀发，不会堵塞头皮的毛孔或留有残留物。 这款发膜还含有蔬菜蛋白，能定义发卷，让您的缕缕秀发如丝般地顺滑。 – I.M

product_description:
Achieve big and bouncy locks with the Volume Styling Cream from Sachajuan. Without weighing hair down, the innovative cream delivers a volume boost to hair in need.
Utilising Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, the leave-in formula delivers moisture to locks, as well as protection against heat styling. Use during styling or as a blow dry booster to achieve hair with height, balance and shine.

Treat your hair to the Sachajuan Hair Control Treatment, a leave-in formula that works to improve the condition of your scalp whilst promoting healthy hair growth. 
Rich in vitamins and Oleanolic Acids derived from natural olive trees, the treatment absorbs quickly into the hair, strengthening every strand whilst maintaining a healthy scalp environment to encourage healthy hair growth. Hair looks luscious, stronger and thicker.

这款蜡状定型膏的设计旨在使难于定型的不规则毛躁发丝始终保持完美状态，同时改善发质，具有专家级的补水效果，提高发丝的水合作用，使其更加闪亮。 令干燥损伤的秀发看起来更加顺滑闪亮，使其看起来更加健康。

product_description: Prolong the vibrancy of your colour with the Extend My Colour Shampoo from RPR. The shampoo will leave hair healthy looking with vibrant colour, high shine and ideal body.

product_description: Compact, functional and innovative, ikoo's Pocket Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles on-the-go. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Complete with a protective cap to guard from fluff, dirt and bacteria.

product_description: Combat frizz with the Fix My Frizz Smoothing Shampoo from RPR. The nourishing formula is infused with a blend of Carob Amino Acids, Collagen and Argan oil, restoring smoothness, body and gloss whilst promoting frizz- free hair every day. The shampoo also works to seal split ends and visibly tame hair. Locks are left incredibly smooth and frizz free, ideal for normal to coarse hair.

product_description: Turn back time with the Rejuvenate My Hair Anti-Aging Conditioner from RPR. The rejuvenating formula is infused with a signature blend of Rosehip, Baobab and Biotin and works to transform damaged, lifeless hair into lustrous, healthy looking locks. The conditioner gives hair enviable body, bounce and shine for a youthful finish, ideal for both dry and oily scalps.

product_description: Nurture hair with the Repair My Hair Treatment from RPR. The intensive treatment mask works to nurture dry, damaged and chemically treated hair back to health with its moisturising properties. Infused with a blend of Aloe Vera, Ginseng and Coconut Oil, the formula thoroughly nourishes hair, soothing and hydrating the fiber for a healthier, revitalised look.

product_description: Compact, functional and innovative, ikoo's Pocket Brush glides effortlessly through hair to banish knots and tangles on-the-go. Designed by traditional Chinese medicine doctors, its ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the hand, whilst its 'chessboard', two-tiered bristle architecture massages and harmonises the scalp with each brush stroke. Complete with a protective cap to guard from fluff, dirt and bacteria.

product_description:
Treat limp, lifeless locks to the benefits of The Seaweed Bath Co. Argan Conditioner; a weightless formula dedicated to adding body and bounce to fine hair.
Harnessing the powers of organic Maine Bladderwrack Seaweed (an ingredient that delivers 65+ vitamins, minerals and amino acids), the conditioner lifts hair at the roots for enviable volume and definition. Gluten-free Hydrolyzed Barley Protein creates a thicker, fuller-looking finish, whilst Lavender Essential Oil rejuvenates the hair and senses.

product_description:

Fortified with organic Bladderwrack Seaweed, sustainably-harvested off the coast of Maine, the luxurious shampoo rebalances and revitalises, whilst repairing Argan Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E leave hair smooth, sleek and healthy-looking. Infuses strands with an energising fragrance of Eucalyptus and Peppermint Essential Oils.

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions（18 英寸）in Raven 2，获得最佳造型效果。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，深受造型师和名人青睐。
这种易于使用、可自行动手完成的假发旨在为发丝增加体量和长度，使您能够随时变换想要的造型，而无需使用各种专用工具或胶水。
这种轻巧的接发采用手工挑选的 100% 保留雷米角质层的人类发丝制作而成，这意味着您可获得最自然的亮泽发丝。这款接发配有三条带发夹的易于使用的平纬纱带，提供防护硅胶层，以垫起自然头发并防止断裂。 每条发带均采用花边纬纱结构，自然而舒适，便于您层叠混搭发件，实现各种丰盈发型。 - K.N

product_description:
Fudge 的一款色泽调节产品，旨在提升发色和亮泽。 从五种不同的发色中选择您的染发创作：金发、黑发、红发、铜色发和红褐色发。 Fudge Colour Cocktails 让人感觉大胆而自信。这款产品可单独使用或与其他产品混合使用，打造个人定制化的护理方案。 在使用 Fudge Shampooo 后效果最佳，令秀发更持久地保持活力。 500ml 一瓶的半永久性染发剂一次可挤出 4ml。 E.N. 
使用说明：通过轻拍将本品涂抹于头发上，并根据所需的色泽强度，保留 10-20 分钟，然后冲洗干净。 戴上手套，避免涂抹过程中双手被染色。500ml 一瓶的半永久性染发剂一次可挤出 4ml。

product_description: 使用 TIGI S-Factor Health Factor Shampoo，实现更柔滑的秀发。 这款丰盈洗发水能温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，而牛油果油可提供额外滋润，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。 采用 Healthy Hair Complex 专门配制而成，强韧秀发并减少梳理造成的断发；护理油和维生素 E 提供抗氧化保护，避免造型工具造成的热损伤。 实现如丝绸般柔软的亮泽发丝。 E.N.

product_description: 使用 TIGI Smoothing Shampoo，实现如丝绸般柔软的秀发。 这款丰盈洗发水能温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，同时提升亮泽，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。 采用维生素原 B5 复合物专门配制而成，提供高光泽度的妆效并深入渗透至发干，以保持滋润。 这款洗发水适合日常使用，可用于滋润干燥或受损的头发，并在清洗过程中保护发色。 E.N.

product_description: 使用 TIGI S-Factor True Lasting Colour Conditioner，转变缺乏光泽的发丝。 其独特的配方含有甜杏仁，可增强光泽并保护染过色的头发，使其充满健康活力。 椰子油可有效地提升亮泽并渗透头发纤维及表面，提供深层滋润。 这款轻盈护发素可提供保护，防止热造型工具和环境压力造成损伤，确保在一次次清洗后发色仍能保持。 呈现滋润、顺滑的发丝。 E.N.

product_description:
Sexy Hair 顺滑去毛躁洗发水让您拥有顺滑而有光泽的秀发；其不含硝酸盐的配方旨在抚平毛躁和蓬乱的发丝。

这款轻盈凝胶的特殊配方含有薄荷和鼠尾草提取物，有助于修复发丝，防止分叉。涂抹到发丝后可形成丰富的泡沫，以供发丝轻松地快速吸收。 能够打造各种时尚发型，富有亮丽的动感，并增加纹理结构的层次感。

product_description:

使用Wella Professionals Enrich保湿Treatment真正地改善发质。 这款产品可以深层滋养和丰盈秀发，只需洗发后使用，留存5 分钟，然后彻底冲洗，即可取得立竿见影的效果。

Wella Professionals Enrich 丰盈Shampoo（适合细发至一般 Hair 250ml） 用 Wella Professionals Enrich 丰盈 Shampoo （适合细至一般 Hair）令秀发变得丰满鲜活。 这款轻盈温和的洗头水蕴含具有呵护功效的蚕丝提取物，适合缺少光泽的细发至一般发质，可以滋养秀发，令秀发变得光滑、飘逸飞扬。
Wella Professionals Enrich 保湿 Conditioner （适合细发至一般 Hair 200ml） 用 Wella Professionals Enrich 丰盈 Conditioner（适合细发至一般 Hair）令秀发富有弹性、充满活力。 它含有天然蚕丝提取物，可令细发变得丰盈、充满活力。
Wella Professionals Enrich 保湿Treatment （适合细发至一般 Hair 150ml）针对纤细到正常头发的Wella专业版丰盈保湿护发油赋予发丝甜美的色彩。 这款护发油采用丰富、高性能的配方，使细发充满自由流动的动感。

product_description:

product_description:
Shield your locks with the Colour Protect Shampoo from Sachajuan. Thoroughly cleansing, the shampoo is specially designed to prevent colour loss and ensure hair remains healthy-looking.
Utilising Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, the shampoo delivers long-lasting care and enviable shine, without weighing hair down. The cleansing formula also protects against free radicals and heat styling, ensuring coloured hair remains healthy as well as vibrant.
name: Colour Protect Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Treat your hair to the refreshing properties of Sachajuan Normalizing Shampoo, a gentle, daily shampoo that works to cleanse normal hair whilst enhancing body and shine.
Utilising the brand's Ocean Silk Technology, the shampoo expertly washes away oil, dirt and impurities whilst intensely hydrating and increasing volume. Its stimulating properties help to maintain an optimum scalp environment to promote healthier-looking hair. Hair feels refreshed with improved bounce, body and shine.
name: Normalizing Shampoo 250ml

product_description: This Divine Thickening Lotion from Show Beauty is a decadent lotion designed to plump up your hair without weighing it down. Boasting a unique and innovative blend of aloe vera extract, mango, kiwi and ginger lily, this gorgeous lotion gives you all over fullness and a salon perfect finish that lasts all day. With added wheat protein and amino acids, your hair will be restored to its natural texture, whilst vitamin E and lychee work to reduce the fading of coloured hair. K.D.
name: Beauty Divine Thickening Lotion (150ml)

product_description:
適合各種髮質或毛躁髮質， Kebelo絲滑洗髮水(500ml)能有效清潔頭髮，去除化妝品堆積，同時消除毛躁。 “超級食品”藜麥、莧屬植物和甘菊，共同柔順每一根髮絲，讓秀發倍感光滑、柔軟、輕盈，充滿彈性。 - KR 
 *不含防腐劑。 
 使用說明：
name: 丝滑洗发水 (500ml)

product_description:
Catering specifically for dry, damaged hair, the KMS MoistRepair Cleansing Conditioner delivers the benefits of a shampoo and conditioner in one innovative formula.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including Lactic Acid, 18-MEA and an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the lightweight blend gently refreshes and purifies hair, whilst infusing strands with intense moisture and hydration. Combats split ends and breakage as it restores the hair's natural protective coating for a salon-worthy finish.
name: Moist Repair Cleansing Conditioner 750ml

product_description:
Take control of your style with the KMS TameFrizz Conditioner; a weightless formula dedicated to nourishing, restoring and detangling strands from root to tip.
Harnessing the powers of an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the frizz-fighting conditioner replenishes and strengthens hair, whilst providing superior frizz protection and improving manageability. Expect smooth, sleek locks with a calm, salon-worthy finish.
name: Tame Frizz Conditioner 750ml

product_description:
Catering specifically for dry, damaged hair, the KMS MoistRepair Cleansing Conditioner delivers the benefits of a shampoo and conditioner in one innovative formula.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including Lactic Acid, 18-MEA and an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the lightweight blend gently refreshes and purifies hair, whilst infusing strands with intense moisture and hydration. Combats split ends and breakage as it restores the hair's natural protective coating for a salon-worthy finish.
name: Moist Repair Cleansing Conditioner 300ml

product_description:
Restore glossy, healthy-looking locks with the KMS ColorVitality Blonde Conditioner; a weightless formula developed specifically for grey, white and blonde hair.
Utilising an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the radiance-reviving conditioner expertly hydrates and moisturises hair, whilst eliminating unwanted yellow and brassy tones to leave hair soft and luminous. Helps to prevent colour fading for smooth, bright locks with mirror-like shine.
name: Color Vitality Blonde Conditioner 750ml

product_description: 滋養保濕頭髮和頭皮，Alterna魚子醬去頭屑護髮素不含防腐劑，配方含巰氧吡啶鋅可以緩解頭皮屑引起的干燥和刺激。可每日使用，這款保濕護髮素也有助於平衡頭皮，緩解頭皮發癢，並防止新頭皮屑的形成。使用後頭髮柔軟而有光澤。
name: 250ml

product_description: Achieve the perfect up-do with the Popband London Hair Ties; a pack of five bobbles in a range of designs. Fun and functional, the unique, super-stretchy hair accessories allow you to create your desired style without dents, kinks or uncomfortable tightness. Ideal for any style, occasion, or wearing on your wrist as an attractive bracelet.
name: London Hair Ties - Cheerleader

product_description: Men-ü 男士头发&头皮健康洗发水才采用补水滋养的清洁配方，可彻底清除汗液、氯、定型产品残留等。 这款男士洗发水含有去头屑剂，适用于有头皮屑、头皮瘙痒的人士，小包装符合 TSA 手提行李标准，可使用多达 120 次。 – L.R.
name: 男士头发&头皮健康洗发水（100 毫升）

product_description: TIGI   S-Factor强效修护护发素 ，可修复保护脆弱、无光釆的头发。 配方创新，含荨麻、荷荷巴油、维他命原B5等成分。可长效保湿、从发根至发尖提高秀发色泽、使头发浓密蓬润。 令披肩长发更亮泽、更浓密蓬润。 E.N.
name: S-Factor 强效修护护发素 750ml

product_description:
Enjoy a pain free brushing experience with the ikoo Home Detangling Hair Brush. The innovative brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, metallic resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
name: Home Detangling Hair Brush - Black/Pacific Metallic

product_description:
Define and structure hair with the L'Anza Healing Style Sculpting Paste. Developed with a Keratin Healing System to provide thermal protection up to 260°C, the non-greasy styling putty is ideal for all hair types.
The versatile formula allows for pliable yet long lasting style, working to repair pre-existing heat damage while building grit and texture at the same time. Use prior to heat styling or use as a finishing touch for effortlessly undone tresses.
name: Healing Style Sculpting Paste 100ml

product_description:
FIT 浓发修护精华液  ，可增强头发韧性。这款先进的头发头皮精华液，用以刺激头发生长，改善头皮健康。
富含胶原蛋白及海洋萃取物，可防止脱发。刺激性配方，可巧妙地滋养头发，使每根头发都浓密厚重，以提高头发强度，增加头发厚度。 采用 OXY-FIT-10技术，可促进肌肤细胞再生，创造最佳的头皮环境。 - K.N
name: 浓发修护精华液 250ml

product_description:
Philip B菲利普B皇家地心引力凝膠178ml  
打造濃密亮澤的髮絲，強力定型力，讓您奢享完美精緻造型。不含防腐劑、增塑劑和硫酸鹽，助您打造專業造型。 
使用說明：
name: B 菲利普 B 皇家地心引力凝胶 (178ml)

product_description: 适用于纤细、稀疏的头发，这款来自Lock Stock & Barrel的修复蛋白质洗发液 可令头发浓密饱满。 其富含蛋白质的独特配方渗透毛鳞片及头皮，增加发质强度，同时有效去除污垢、产品积聚和杂质。 富含泛醇，可提供维生素B5，以提高头发数量。令秀发健康润泽、更加浓厚。 E.N.
name: Stock & Barrel蛋白修复Shampoo (1000ml)

product_description: 威娜豐盈精緻洗髮水混合乳木果和蠶絲提取物，可清潔脆弱和正常頭髮，具有補水功效。此配方從髮根到髮梢滋潤髮質，修復和保護每一縷髮絲，使頭髮閃亮有活力。 - KN
name: 威娜丰盈精致洗发水 (1000ml) (¥ 378.30)

product_description:
Lilibeth of New York 修眉刀非常适合精心修饰您的眉毛，让您拥有更完美的眉形；它是一款高性能的无痛脱毛工具，能够突显您的眉毛线条，无须使用镊子拔或密蜡脱毛。
这款使用方便的工具既适合男士，也适合女士，它配备有经久耐用的不锈钢刀片，即便是最短的眉毛，也能让您轻松舒适地均匀脱去，此外，其便携的折叠式设计是外出旅行随身携带的理想选择。 还可用于上唇、下巴、比基尼线的毛发或面部的绒毛。
name: of New York 修眉刀——浅绿色（每套含两把修眉刀）

product_description:
Philip B菲利普B Katira發膜(178ml) 
菲利普B Katira 發膜適用大部分髮質，能讓頭髮更豐盈、蓬鬆，更易打理。本品溫和，具有多重功效，能豐盈塌扁髮絲，緩解秀髮乾啞，柔順不易打理髮絲，從而讓秀發恢復新生。此外，還包含高科技L-透明質酸複合物，給頭髮輕盈無油補水和滋養蛋白，讓頭髮更好打理，更富彈性。只需用一次，便能迅速提亮髮色，縮短吹風時間，鎖水亮澤髮絲，讓頭髮看起來魅力十足，絲絲順滑。 
使用說明：
name: B 菲利普 B Katira 发膜 (178ml)

product_description: Revlon 露华浓滋养染发膏只需三分钟即可焕活发丝，增强发色的活力。 这款不含氨的染发膏采用离子染料，能瞬间与发丝发生相互作用，具有超快速的染发和超静电作用，而 AHA 水果酸可将营养成分渗透到角质层，以修复和软化发丝，补充发丝所需的水分。 非常适合在两次沙龙染发期间使用，让您拥有所期待的顺滑和闪亮，增强秀发的亮泽感。
name: 露华浓专业滋养染发膏 411 冷棕色 100ml

product_description:
可用 Institut Karité Paris 乳木果护发品（乳霜）护理头发；这是一种可恢复活力的护发品，有使干燥受损的头发恢复活力，并使其水分得到补充的作用。
这种配方护发品含有 25% 的乳木果油（这种成分则富含维生素，对干性头发有强效滋养和补水作用），既有助于恢复活力，又能改善头发结构；其保护特性可防止头发受到环境因素的损害，以使头发的观感和触感健康而强韧。
干性头发会变得丝般柔顺，水分也会得到补充。
name: Karité Paris 乳木果护发品 - 乳霜 (165ml)

product_description:
Treat hair to the benefits of Dead Sea Spa Magik Hair Magic Serum; a powerful conditioning treatment that works to repair dry, damaged locks, leaving them calm and manageable.
Infusing hair with Pro-Vitamin B5 and thirst-quenching Dead Sea minerals, the non-greasy serum controls frizz and flyaways, prevents split ends, enhances shine and delivers optimum hydration to restore healthy-looking strands from root to tip. You can expect glossy, replenished locks with body and bounce. Can be used on dry or wet hair.
name: Sea Spa Magik Hair Magic Serum 150ml

product_description: 使用TIGI Catwalk Fashionista深褐色护发素 (750ml)，滋养秀发，丝般柔软。 该款护发素专为棕色和暖色调秀发设计，修复秀发，使其柔顺丝滑，并防止发丝断裂和零乱碎发。 混合了护发油，深褐色染剂和七叶树萃取物，让秀发呈现深色发色，光彩莹亮。 护发素可以每天使用，而且不脱色。 – N.P.
name: Catwalk Fashionista深褐色护发素（750ml）

product_description:
invisibobble Nano 束发箍最适合任何发型或场合，用其可将头发细分成多个部分，固定高髻，或在没有发夹和发针的情况下将辫子固定到位。
这种球状束发箍既好玩又好用，既采用卫生的不吸水设计，而且光滑的表面意味着无论如何都会一直处于干燥状态，又具有超舒适的独特形状，可防止头痛和头发打结。 可在潮湿或干燥的头发上使用，防缠结、断裂或抽丝。
name: Nano 束发箍（3 个装）- 棕色结状

product_description:
給乾燥受損髮質（由於造型、燙髮或暴晒）及時修復。含有植物萃取物、維他命和礦物質，深層保濕，讓秀發閃亮健康。 
本品能令秀發恢復正常光彩，舒緩頭皮。透明質酸、植物蛋白和植物醇能強韌髮質，而植物萃取的維他命B5 能徹底深入頭髮及根部，帶來持久保濕，減少分叉，同時增加發量，使頭髮易打理。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森天然荷荷巴油护发素 (480ml)

product_description:
清爽配方，有助於刺激頭皮血液循環，呵護髮根，預防掉髮。本品有助於強韌髮質，滋養頭髮，同時減少掉髮。 
本品富含活力配方，如咖啡因和薄荷醇，能深入頭皮，拯救髮絲，讓頭髮豐盈濃密，充滿活力。
name: 威娜专业水油平衡抗掉发乳液 (8X6ml)

product_description: Perfect for straightening, curling or waving, the Corioliss C3 Hair Styler combines a slimline aesthetic with high performance results. Featuring titanium smooth plate technology and extra-long floating plates for perfect contact and heat distribution every time, the straighteners will glide over your hair smoothly, creating sleek, glossy locks. Less damaging than ceramic plated straighteners, the ergonomic tool with geometric detail features LED digital temperature control to allow heat adjustment from 135°C-235°C to suit your styling needs. Complete with 3 metre salon standard cord with 360° swivel action.
name: C3 Hair Styler - Geo

product_description:
菲利普金斯利活化頭皮發膜的配方具有活化頭皮和促進血液循環的作用。富含維生素、薄荷醇和薄荷，清爽配方讓頭髮和頭皮感覺清爽，恢復最佳狀態。 
 使用說明 ： 
打濕頭髮，用手沿著髮際線直接塗到頭皮上。按摩並保持10-20 分鐘。徹底清洗。 - KR
name: Kingsley 菲利普金斯利活化头皮发膜

product_description:
Philip Kingsley 菲利普金斯利专业版蛋白丰盈喷雾是全新变革性护法三部曲中的一款产品，专门针对纤细、受损和稀疏的发质而设计。 这款专业版蛋白丰盈喷雾不仅可从本质上改善发质，还可有效修复受损的发丝，保护角质层免受未来的伤害，增强秀发的自然光泽。
Philip Kingsley 菲利普金斯利的护法三部曲是针对头发所需的营养、头皮和发丝本身而设计的一整套护理方案，旨在打造健康秀发。 最了获得最佳的丰盈效果，请结合 Tricho 护法三部曲中的其他两款产品使用：Tricho 维他命和矿物质补充剂和 Tricho 7 号丰盈秀发头皮护理液。 - K.R
name: Kingsley 菲利普金斯利专业版蛋白丰盈喷雾适用于纤细、稀疏发质。 头发浓密配方

product_description:
Wella这款冷金色 Color Recharge Conditioner拥有创新的配方，其设计是为了防止您的金色秀发变黄或褪色，产生高性能且明显的成效。 本护发素适合经过染色或自然色的头发，注入了巧妙的色彩沉积色素，有助于消除金发里黄铜色。
本护发素具有深度调理和滋润的作用，保护秀发免遭可致头发暗哑无光的环境破坏，同时保持其活力和光泽。 本护发素让您拥有超柔软的秀发，有光泽而且色彩充盈，是您的必备品。
name: Professionals Color Recharge Conditioner 冷金色（200毫升）

product_description:
Philip Kingsley 弹力素Extreme 是为由于过度处理而变得水分不足和多孔的加勒比黑人或高加索人的头发专门配制的。 弹力素Extreme可瞬时补充水分，它是一款在用洗头水之前使用的产品，可滋养过于干燥的头发，令其恢复生机。 它蕴含了常规弹力素的所有保湿成分，其高效成分可令您秀发的状况发生变化。
请注意： 在化学处理头发之前三天或之后三天内不要使用弹力素Extreme。
name: Kingsley 弹力素 Extreme (75ml)

product_description: American Crew 美國隊員雕塑髮蠟非常適合為平坦脆弱的頭髮添加質地，提供中度定型效果，沒有油光。如蠟般濃稠，非常柔軟，便於在頭髮上塗抹，全天保持髮型。 - ED
name: Crew 美国队员雕塑发蜡 (85g)

product_description:
In its first collaboration with wonderful Walt Disney, Tangle Teezer has treated its on-the-go detangling hairbrush, the Compact Styler, to a special edition pretty ice blue colour and cute image of Disney's Frozen sisters, Elsa and Anna.
The handbag-friendly Compact Styler is designed to detangle and deliver fabulous hair on the move. This is all possible thanks to its unique two-tiered system technology - the long teeth detangle and the short teeth smooth the hair cuticle for healthier-looking, glossy hair. With teeth that good, you'll want to keep them in tip-top condition, so the Compact Styler also comes with a protective cover, so no matter where you go, the teeth stay perfect.
Get ready to smooth, shine and define anytime and anywhere without tugging or pulling. It's Tangle Teezer's most magical hairbrush yet!
name: Teezer 迪士尼冰雪奇缘主题发梳

product_description:
KeraCare Silken Seal Liquid光澤噴霧 
本品是純淨的液態有機矽層壓塑料噴霧，它可令秀發卓然亮澤柔順。 
乾濕發使用效果俱佳。 
如若吹髮前使用，本品可密封髮絲角質層，保護髮絲免受熱定型的損傷，預防水份流失。最終造型將絲滑亮澤，極致豐盈。用作光澤噴霧使用時，髮絲將從黯啞狀態漸進幻變，最終綻放迷人亮澤光采。蘊含防曬成分，有效保護髮絲免受陽光紫外線的損傷。 
 使用說明：
name: Silken Seal Liquid 光泽喷雾 (120ml)

product_description:
在干发上喷洒 Sexy Hair Powder Play Volumizing & Texturising Powder，即刻打造丰盈秀发和质地。 是扁塌头发的完美提升品！
使用 Sexy Hair Powder Play Volumizing & Texturizing Powder 是打造厚重性感秀发最快最轻松的方式！ 轻盈、无色无味粉末能瞬间溶解并被吸收，呈现人人渴望的丰盈秀发。
使用说明：
name: Hair Powder Play Volumizing & Texturizing Powder (15g)

product_description:
As I Am 卷发定型乳专门为卷发或超紧密式卷发而设计，它是一款独特的定型乳，让秀发更加亮泽，具有超强的控制毛躁功效，令秀发容易梳理，而不会带给您粘着或油腻的感觉。
本品将营养丰富的向日葵和蓖麻油与印度醋栗和甜菜相结合，可为发丝补充营养和水分，定型卷发，同时，其营养成分可渗透到毛囊，以促进秀发健康成长。 有助于防止脱发和发丝变细的问题，因此通过强力持久定型可以让您拥有富有弹性的大卷发型。
name: I Am 卷发定型乳 227 克

product_description:
卷发更容易断裂，因而可使用 Joico Curl Cleansing Sulfate-Free Shampoo 进行呵护。这是一种滋润洗发水配方，富含 Curl Repair Technology™，令卷发更强韧、更具弹性、更健康。
这款洗发水含天然油脂、重构蛋白和指定聚合物的共混物，可在需要时强化和修复头发，同时细致清洁每一丝卷发，令秀发更具弹性、更易打理。
这款修护洗发水可重新恢复卷发的活力，令柔软度加倍*，并可消除干枯、毛躁的发丝。每次使用都能打造富于弹性的、持久的、符合预期的卷发。 - K.N
name: Curl Cleansing Sulfate-Free Shampoo for Bouncy, Healthy Curls (300ml)

product_description: Fudge推出Gloss Dual-Purpose 吹干和光泽精华护发素，这是一款轻盈、不油腻配方，旨在控制拳曲和抵御潮湿以获得沙龙式发型效果。 加入荷荷巴油和金盏花，该精华护发素可保护头发免受热定型造成的损害，获得超级顺滑、光泽莹亮的秀发。 适用于潮湿或干燥的头发。 E.N.

Housed in a convenient spray bottle, you can expect smooth, luscious locks that are easier to comb and tame.

product_description: 對細軟稀疏的燙染頭髮使用質地輕薄的護髮素，可增強彈性，控制水分平衡。儷康絲的系統3 頭皮煥活護髮素將角質層加強BioAmp™ 和頭皮活化Glyco-Shield™ 與白茶提取物和薄荷油獨特地混合在一起，經證明，可帶來明顯更加厚重、更加濃密的頭髮和健康的頭皮。作為三步護理套裝中的第二步，該煥活護理方案具備由抗氧化物和植物元素組成的Transactive Delivery System™，將滋養厚角質層，減少頭髮斷裂，實現健康、濃密、強韌的頭髮。 - KN

product_description:
卷发可能很难打理，因而可使用 Joico Curl Controlling Anti-Frizz Styler。这是一种富含 Curl Repair Technology™ 的顺滑配方，可打造更精致的健康卷发。
这款防毛躁造型产品含天然油脂、重构蛋白和指定聚合物的共混物，很容易渗入发丝，顺滑秀发并控制毛躁，抚平凌乱的卷发和波浪发，同时避免潮湿。
这种精制的卷发配方提升了卷发的保持力、体量和防护，令秀发无毛躁，实现顺滑、迷人的卷发。 - K.N

product_description:
2 号洗发露是三步护发程序的一款产品，专门针对细软、明显稀疏的自然发质，在深层清洁的同时保护头皮，令发丝持久闪亮。这款独特的洗发露融合 Scalp Access® 系统，蕴含维生素、植物萃取物和 SPF15 防晒霜，可清洁头发毛囊，同时不会带走头发所需油脂。
BioAMP®技术令发丝根根饱满，同时减少脱发，让头发更加丰盈，而 Activ-Renewal® 添加薄荷油和白茶萃取物，令头皮清爽舒适，焕发活力。K.D.

product_description:
Fall into a peaceful slumber with natural sleep aids from this works. The Sleepy Head Gift Set combines two pillow sprays with a 2-in-1 hair elixir to promote a deep night's sleep and eliminate unruly bed-head come morning.
deep sleep pillow spray (5ml):
A best-selling natural sleep aid that inspires feelings of calm. Designed to inspire a rejuvenating and deep sleep, the pillow spray is formulated with 100% pure essential oils of Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile; it releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale any nerves and worries. Spray onto your pillow before bedtime; feel your troubles melt away and enjoy a peaceful slumber. Suitable to use during pregnancy.
sleep plus pillow spray (5ml):
A fast acting, natural remedy to restore a healthy sleep pattern. Formulated with natural oils, the fragrant formula releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale your worries. Contains naturally encapsulated Lavender to gradually release its aromatherapeutic benefits as you sleep.
sleep plus hair elixir (5ml):
A 2-in-1 night treatment that both promotes better sleep and improves hair vitality. A motion-activated sleep aid and hair treatment in one, it maximises beauty sleep whilst delivering Sunflower Extract and botanical oils to hair for healthier-looking locks. Its time-release system of pure essential oils ensure you get a good night's sleep that your hair will thank you for. The results? Shinier, softer, smoother hair.
name: works Sleepy Head

product_description:

invisibobble Original Hair 发绳 适合任何风格或场合，可以拢住秀发，无需使用发夹和夹发针。

使发丝更柔软，拥有像镜子一样闪亮的光泽。

product_description:
Protect, prolong and enhance your colour with Kérastase Reflection Touche Chromatique in 'Cool Brown', a colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique.
The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your brown hair; it neutralises unwanted red undertones to enhance cool brown locks. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands.
Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.

product_description:
对于"刚起床"或"海滩形象尽失"的乱蓬头，只需喷些Fudge海盐喷雾。 这种中等坚挺度、可使秀发浓密的海盐质地强化喷雾会增加头发厚度和原始质地，同时保护头发免受紫外线的伤害。
Fudge品牌为"盐"这个词赋予了新的含义，这款海盐喷雾是让您的秀发呈现原始质感的理想佳品。 可使秀发坚挺的聚合物提供一个爽洁的妆效，其抗潮湿成分最大限度地增加了头发的弹性和坚挺性，而维生素B族成分则可强化和调理头发。
使用说明：

The Kérastase Reflection Masque Fina and Cool Brown Touche Chromatique Duo offers personalised care for your colour-treated hair. Combining an ink-in-care, highly concentrated hair dye formula with a nourishing mask, the pair work in tandem to correct and brighten faded colour for restored softness, colour luminosity and radiance.
Touche Chromatique (10ml)
A colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique. The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your brown hair; it neutralises unwanted red undertones to enhance cool brown locks. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair, and helps prevent fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
Masque Chromatique (200ml)
A nourishing hair mask specially developed to enhance and protect the colour intensity of colour-treated or highlighted, fine hair. Promoting prolonged colour vibrancy, the deep conditioning treatment utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth with enhanced shine, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasis light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant. Expect vivid colour and light-reflecting shine, for longer.
name: Reflection Masque Fins and Cool Brown Touche Chromatique Duo

Achieve ultra-sleek locks with the OUAI Smooth Shampoo; an award-winning cleanser developed specifically to meet the needs of unruly, frizz prone hair.

缔造更浓密、更蓬润的秀发。

product_description:
Restore dry, weak and lifeless locks with the OUAI Treatment Masque, a powerful hair mask with concentrated ingredients to intensively repair, hydrate and protect.
Working its magic within minutes, the intensive hair mask contains Artichoke Leaf extract to effectively seal the cuticle and combat further damage, alleviating the appearance of split ends and minimising breakage. The brand’s proprietary Smart Technology Complex infuses hair with essential Amino Acids and Keratin to help strengthen and nourish each follicle while shielding against environmental aggressors.   
Suitable for all hair types, the deep conditioning formula effectively reverses damage caused by heat styling, pollution and UV, resulting in locks feeling soft and replenished with a glossy shine and delicate fragrance of Rose, Bergamot and Lychee.

这款修复洗发水采用椰浆、印度醋栗和橘子提取物，可温和地清洗秀发，消除杂质，而不会使发丝有残留物堆积，可有效解决干枯暗沉的问题，让秀发更容易梳理，柔软而健康。 让秀发拥有所期待的清洁和平静，使定型变得更轻松。

Helps to relieve dry, flay scalps for long-lasting comfort.

product_description:

这款温和的洗发剂能赋予您的秀发亮丽的光泽。 与此同时，还能增强发丝对损伤因素的防护能力。

这款摩丝中所蕴含的活葡滋养成分能够修复发丝陈旧损伤，而透明质酸具有粗壮发丝和丰盈发量的作用。

product_description:
經過7年的研究， 菲利普金斯利推出了創新獨特的3步頭髮 ​​護理套裝- Trichotherapy 。這三個產品針對不同領域，幫助頭髮細疏和受損的人士擁有夢寐以求的亮麗秀發。 
此套裝包含為節食人士提供的營養補充包，針對髮根和促進頭髮生長的頭皮護理品和修復、保護和美化秀發的蛋白質護理噴霧，這意味著秀發可從內到外獲得全面護理。 - KR 
此套裝包含： 
 Tricho Complex  Tricho Complex 通過營養補充片劑，提供保持健康頭皮和美麗秀發所需的所有維生素和礦物質。經過試用和試驗，加入了維生素B12、C 和D3 及必需氨基酸（賴氨酸和蛋氨酸），可改善頭髮生長和健康狀況。 
使用說明： 
 Tricho 7 此配方富含抗氧化劑，不只是修復和保護頭髮，還可以立即使頭髮蓬鬆，看起來更濃密。包含7 種特別成份，可從由頭皮到髮梢進行修復和保護，同時刺激和促進頭髮生長。 
 - 超級抗氧化綠茶提取物

 Tricho Pro  Tricho Pro 是一款豐盈蛋白質噴霧，不僅能增強髮質和髮根，還能修復受損，保護角質層不再受損，改善秀發的自然光澤。增強纖細的頭髮，同時讓頭髮有彈性，看起來更濃密。

product_description: 使用 Beauty Works Pearl Nourishing Argan Shampoo，恢复秀发活力。 这款丰盈洗发水可温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，同时提升亮泽，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。采用有机摩洛哥坚果油、乳蛋白和角蛋白专门配制而成，可深入渗透至发干，以保持水分含量。 这款洗发水适用于保持健康的接发，令发丝如丝绸般柔软，体量饱满。 E.N.

product_description:
非常适合由于经常进行造型或化学染烫而变得干枯粗糙的头发。其奢华配方成分丰富，能深入滋润干枯头发。
本品富含K2复合成分，内含坚果、漆树果仁和葡萄籽精油，能温和去除杂质，减少毛燥，提升顺滑度，令秀发焕发闪亮光泽。
同时，这款洗发水不含硫酸盐和苯甲酸酯类，集中修复最受损伤的部位， 令秀发柔软顺滑、恢复生机。 - L.M.

name: Make-A-Mends Shampoo (1000ml) - (Worth £33.00)

product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy locks from home with the Giovanni Smooth as Silk™ Conditioner; a revitalising formula developed specifically for dry, damaged hair in need of repair.
Enriched with vegetable protein, the detangling conditioner delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst combating frizz and flyaways to leave hair calm, manageable and super smooth with enhanced shine.
name: Smooth as Silk Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
Alterna魚子醬Omega逆齡精華油是一款質地豐富，不黏膩的滋養油，能瞬效修護滋養秀發，同時也能修飾髮型線條，呈現不毛燥亂翹的亮麗外型。 
含有高濃度的魚子醬精華、深海魚油脂肪酸Omega 3和C22脂肪酸，對抗干枯髮絲，增強彈力，讓頭髮柔軟閃亮。可於熱燙造型時保護秀發，這款奢華精緻的抗老化護髮油能瞬間改善乾枯受損的發況，保濕滋潤，減少靜電，由內而外為髮質帶來不可思議的全面性蛻變，同時加強髮絲亮澤度，讓秀發呈柔軟輕順並散發如同絲緞般的青春光澤。此款神奇的護法油應用鎖色科技，保護秀發不因UVA/UVB及光照引起髮色褪色。應用酵素療效科技幫助各種珍貴配方與療護成份，轉化為頭髮與毛囊容易吸收的結構分子。 Alterna魚子醬Omega逆齡精華油具有多重功能，是護髮造型必備品。 
適合乾枯毛躁、易衰老髮質。

Viviscal 女性浓发纤维 ，方便使用，使用后头发浓密亮泽，瞬间浓密蓬润。 
内含大量天然着色微静电电荷纤维，可增加头发数量，使头发浓密，遮盖白头发。打造瞬间浓密蓬润的秀发。 该农发纤维经得起风雨，可用洗发水轻松冲洗。 配有独特的涂抹装置。
name: 女性浓发纤维（深棕色）

product_description:
Transform limp, lack-lustre hair with the TIGI Bed Head Fully Loaded™ Massive Volume Tween Duo. Combining a volumising shampoo and conditioner, you can create full, luscious locks every time.
Fully Loaded™ Massive Volume Shampoo (750ml)
A lightweight formula dedicated to delivering enviable body and bounce. Developed with a unique Foam Cleansing System, the shampoo gently eliminates impurities and product build-up, whilst innovative Uploader™ technology creates superior definition and instant va-va-voom. Infusing hair with a delicious berry fragrance, you can expect long-lasting volume memory that won't drop out.
Fully Loaded™ Massive Volume Conditioner (750ml)
A body-boosting formula to revitalise, plump and thicken strands from root to tip. Fortified with innovative Fibre Thickening Technology, the conditioner penetrates deep into the hair fibre, causing it to swell and thicken as it moisturises, revealing a fuller-looking appearance without added weight. Expect beautiful, bouncy locks with enhanced definition, volume and the brand's 'Full Blown Berry' fragrance.
name: Bed Head Fully Loaded Massive Volume Tween Duo 2 x 750ml

product_description:
日常的压力会给头发增添额外的负担，GrowGorgeous强韧发丝滋养精华能够为发丝提供深层保护，让头发更强壮更健康。
强韧发丝滋养精华是一款质地轻薄不油腻的发油，能够帮助强韧发丝，保护发丝免受UV紫外线、污染、微生物以及发梳等外部因素带来的损伤，让秀发重现闪耀健康光泽。
注入奇亚籽油和一种可持续来源的亚马逊巴西坚果和印加果油复合成分，结合能够快速吸收的独特质地，能够通过长度以及它滋润的特质有效帮助维持秀发健康，在持续使用2个周期后，为您带来90%的明显改善，拥抱更闪耀的健康光泽。
我们的强韧发丝滋养精华液质地轻薄，方便使用，不会让头发油腻粘黏。能够在提供保护的同时为头发深层补水保湿，让秀发更健康更强壮。

product_description:
Viviscal Max 生髮補充劑是一款旨在促進頭髮生長的天然食品補充劑。多種因素都可導致暫時性脫髮，其中包括激素變化、過度造型、營養不良和年齡增長。 Viviscal 的AminoMar C™ 海洋複合成分可提供深度滋養，促進頭髮生長所需的重要蛋白質，同時維生素C 可作為高效抗氧化劑，防止自由基損傷和環境侵害。馬尾草提取物是二氧化矽的有機形態，可讓暗沉的頭髮恢復亮澤生機。產品內含180 片易吞服無味片劑，可輕鬆促進頭髮生長。 
 使用說明：每日2片，至少堅持3-6個月（早晚餐後各用水送服1片）。之後，要維持頭髮的健康生長，按照需要每天服用1-2 片。
name: 生发养发营养片 3 月装（180 片）

product_description: 本品幫助增加每縷髮絲的直徑，為秀發增加額外的豐盈度和彈性。此噴霧還可定型，不留任何油脂殘餘。

product_description:
澳洲坚果修复滋养发油喷雾是一款极绵密的喷雾，质地轻盈，能迅速被秀发吸收，增加秀发湿润度、柔软度、闪亮度和可控度。细软发质效果尤其明显，也适用于其他发质类型。
使用方法：
造型时使用，将发油喷雾喷到擦干后的秀发上。造型后使用，可以让发丝光泽亮丽不油腻，保护发色。

KORRES Aloe & Dittany Conditioner for Normal Hair 是一款全面护理护发素，配方温和，维持秀发的自然平衡。 KORRES Aloe & Dittany Conditioner 富含希腊克里特岛的有机提取物。
这款滋养护发素拥有轻盈配方，富含岩薄荷、芦荟和氨基酸，使秀发水润顺滑，同时增加秀发弹性，防止分叉。 Aloe & Dittany 能维持皮肤的自然酸碱平衡，使秀发保持最佳健康状态。
使用说明：洗发后，将产品涂在湿发上，并轻轻按摩，避免接触发根。 在头发上保留最多两分钟后，彻底清洗。 对于正常发质，最好与 Aloe & Dittany 洗发水搭配使用。

Alterna竹萃亮採護髮素萃取天然竹的精華和瓢油，溫和不刺激。雙重滋養柔順配方，深入頭皮底層鎖水保濕呵護，清新自然，有效預防髮絲打結。 
純綠色配方，Alterna竹萃亮採護髮素不含防腐劑，可有效改善脆弱易捲曲髮絲質地，打造絲綢一般順滑的髮質，使秀發更健康，髮色持久光鮮亮澤。

product_description:
Replenish extremely dry and lacklustre locks with the Kérastase Aura Botanica Concentré Essentiel Hair Oil Regime Bundle. Selected from the brand’s exquisite natural haircare collection, the trio work in tandem to tackle impurities, combat frizz and maximise vitality without stripping or drying hair. Tresses are left feeling sumptuously soft and supple with a brilliant gloss.  
Aura Botanica Bain Shampoo (250ml)
Utilising 96% natural origin ingredients, including responsibly sourced Samoan Coconut Oil and Moroccan Argan Oils, the nourishing shampoo gentle yet effectively cleanses away dirt and impurities; it transforms into an airy lather and harnesses natural micelles to lift away dirt for shinier, revitalised locks. Infused with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, the shampoo will expertly cleanse tresses whilst imparting an aromatic scent. Hair is protected against frizz for 72 hours and looks nourished, three times shinier and re-energised.
96% natural origin*. Free from silicones, sulphates and parabens.
Aura Botanica Soin Fondant Conditioner (200ml)
Delivering intense nutrition and frizz-fighting benefits, the deep conditioner melts effortlessly into the hair fibre, imparting a cocktail of natural oils (Coconut, Argan and Sweet Orange) to expertly nourish, moisturise and detangle. The revitalising conditioner will re-energise lifeless hair and delicately perfume locks with its Sweet Orange Essential Oil fragrance.
Aura Botanica Concentré Essentiel Hair Oil (50ml)
Treat your hair to the nourishing benefits of Aura Botanica Concentré Essentiel Hair Oil, a multi-purpose oil from the brand's natural haircare collection. Utilising 99% natural origin ingredients, the replenishing oil blend combines omega-rich Avocado Oil with Jojoba Oil and Rosemary extract to expertly soften, enhance shine and revitalise tresses. Luxurious and versatile, the elixir will lend hair mirror-reflecting shine whilst imparting an aromatic scent powered by Sweet Orange Essential Oil. 
99% natural origin*. Free from silicones.

圆润的木梳齿轻松地滑过头发，梳理打结的头发，使梳理变得容易。 同时刺激头皮血液循环，防止静电积聚，使头发光滑亮泽，易于打理。 配有品牌手柄。

非常适合难以选择确切颜色的人们，来自Beauty Works的100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension让您在购买全套颜色前可以匹配自己头发的自然颜色。
这种屡获殊荣的接发使用保有角质层并经轻度加工的最优质Remy人发制造，确保其不会纠结在一起。
发丝巧妙粘合在一起，以防止碎裂，令接发完美增加适当的长度，令头发丰满、茂盛。 E.N.

Providing superior deep conditioning, tresses are left detangled and supple, with enhanced shine and revitalised colour vibrancy and tone.

这款洗头水特别适合暗沉无光的头发，可以为头发造型打下完美的基础，同时创造一个柔软的表面，反射出散发着活力的炫目光芒。

本产品绝对干净、无油光。令秀发自然、散发活力。MenScience 定型发蜡容易冲洗；其天然成分可保护强化头发。

product_description:
威娜炫彩洗髮水適用於染色後的粗糙髮質，幫助恢復亮麗色彩。此強效洗髮水可以增強染色後的髮質，讓厚厚的頭髮充滿生機和活力。 
威娜炫彩洗髮水適用於染色後的粗糙髮質，幫助重獲絢麗色彩。此輕型護理洗髮水採用革命性的三重混合技術，富含奢華鑽石沙，適合粗糙的厚發，滋潤頭髮，使頭髮順滑有保護，同時保持亮麗的色彩。

Enriched with Northern Nettle and Quince, the luxurious formula transforms hair, making it healthier looking and easier to style. Hair is left protected against future breakage and split ends.

product_description:
Enjoy a pain free brushing experience with the ikoo Home Detangling Hair Brush. The innovative brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, metallic resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.

Enjoy a pain free brushing experience with the ikoo Home Detangling Hair Brush. The innovative brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
