product_description:
Restore radiant, salon-worthy locks with Wella's Color Fresh; a semi-permanent hair dye that enhances vibrancy in between colour services.
Developed with a Care Complex of vitamins and conditioning agents, the ready-to-use formula adds depth and corrects tone, whilst innovative Tone2Shine technology delivers mirror-like shine that lasts up to ten washes. No mixing required.
name: Color Fresh Medium Gold Blonde 7/3 75ml

product_description:
Gently cleanse and hydrate locks from root to tip with the David Mallett Shampoo No.1 L'Hydration; a highly concentrated, rejuvenating formula developed for normal and dry hair.
Infused with refined Macadamia Nut Oil, the regenerating shampoo creates a light lather to eliminate impurities, whilst allowing beneficial nutrients to penetrate deep into hair that has been damaged by blow-drying, styling or chemical treatment. Expect soft, healthy-looking locks with restored radiance and vitality.
name: Mallett Shampoo No.1 L'Hydratation 1000ml

product_description: 這款產品採用獨特配方，蘊含有效的清潔保濕和醒發成分，令秀發和頭皮持久清爽。此外，還含有抗菌物質吡硫鋅，而表層護理分子則可打造柔軟的髮質，清潔過後令頭髮蓬鬆有型。這款高級洗髮水能舒緩頭皮，同時令頭髮乾爽豐盈。 KD
name: 蒂芝床头系列抗菌洗发水 (250ml)

product_description: 由于其先进技术可以修复及软化头发纤维而不留残留物，Radia 清洁及软化护发素令秀发散发自然、健康的光泽。 该护发素可以每天使用，既可以避免常规护发素产生的沉积又可防止其他造型产品的积聚。 软化活动来自化合物，它们密封头发，保留皮层的水分，重建发丝，并防御进一步的环境侵袭，而且均无任何自身油腻残留。 Radia可以用作日常护发素，其经常使用意味着其他护发产品可以提供最佳功效。 因此，使用者可最大程度上令头发焕发光彩和光泽。
name: Laboratories Radia Conditioner 180ml

product_description:
Inject body and bounce into lifeless hair with the KMS AddVolume Shampoo; a lightweight formula that promises to cleanse, revitalise and strengthen locks from root to tip.
Fortified with an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the volumising shampoo expertly eliminates impurities whilst strengthening and lifting fine, limp hair to leave it looking thicker and fuller. Expect luscious locks with instant va-va-voom and an invigorating Eucalyptus and Cinnamon fragrance.
name: Add Volume Shampoo 750ml

product_description:
Protect and revitalise hair with the Paul Mitchell Ultimate Color Repair Mask Collection Kit; a selection of products to cleanse, condition and repair. Specifically developed for colour-treated hair, the range works in tandem to prolong hair colour and promote healthier looking locks.
Ultimate Color Repair® Shampoo (250ml)
The sulphate-free shampoo removes excess oil, dirt and impurities from colour-treated hair, whilst Sugar Cane and Lemon Peel extracts enhance shine for healthy-looking locks. Its Quinoa Color Repair complex delivers protein to repair hair strands and lock in moisture so you can experience vibrant, manageable locks. The luxurious shampoo preserves coloured hair by providing UV protection against harmful damage and environmental stresses to ensure colour is maintained after each wash.
Ultimate Color Repair® Conditioner (200ml)
Specially formulated with the Quinoa Color Repair complex, which penetrates deep into hair to create a protective barrier and preserve colour-treated hair, leaving it vibrant and healthy-looking. An effective blend of Shea Butter, Jojoba and Soybean Oil soften hair and enhance shine, whilst nourishing vitamins lock in moisture. The lightweight conditioner contains powerful antioxidants to shield hair from exposure to harmful UV rays, environmental aggressors and fading of colour.
Ultimate Color Repair® Mask (150ml)
Effortlessly combed through damp tresses, the easy-to-use mask replenishes hair with its Quinoa Color Repair Complex, which locks in colour and has a reparative effect. A hair-loving blend of Shea Butter, Jojoba and Soybean oil works to envelop hair in nourishing vitamins that hydrate the fiber and leave locks touchably soft with reflective shine. With potent antioxidants to shield against colour fade, the hair mask leaves coloured hair vibrant, moisturised and salon-fresh.
Ultimate Color Repair® Triple Rescue (150ml)
A non-greasy spray developed to preserve colour-treated hair, whilst enhancing shine and manageability. With a dual-phase formula and UV protection, the spray shields coloured hair from environmental stresses and excessive heat damage that can lead to dull, faded locks. Its Quinoa Color Repair complex intensely conditions hair to leave it vibrant, healthy-looking and full of moisture.
name: Mitchell Ultimate Color Repair Mask Collection Kit

product_description:
无论您是毛躁的短发或直发，还是时尚的吹干发型，只需少许 Philip B 菲利普 B 恋上发蜡就能抚平一缕缕蓬乱或独立的秀发，或是塑型或突出某一缕秀发，让您拥有能带给您自信的完美发型。
对于纤细至中等发质的秀发，这款多功能基于水的轻盈塑型、定型发蜡在干燥后会使秀发具有半哑光效果。 Philip B 菲利普 B 恋上发蜡是纯天然成分的混合物，它蕴含有甘油、黄豆、椰浆聚合物，有助于打造完美发型。
使用说明：
name: B 菲利普 B 恋上发蜡（60g）

product_description:
用 TIGI Bed Head 幻时新生Shampoo (250ml)瞬间拥有光泽柔软的秀发。 该配方温和，可以清除掉污垢、多余的油脂和杂质，使您的秀发拥有美丽闪耀的光泽。
它专家级融合了富含维生素 C 的水果提取物、红花籽油和野茶树叶提取物，还可以促进您的头皮和发根保持健康、秀发光鲜亮泽动人。 同时，香草、野草莓、百香果和茉莉的迷人香气将使您的秀发散发出极具诱惑力的气味。 - L.M.
name: Bed Head幻时新生Shampoo (250ml)

product_description:
Experience a gentle and comfortable blow dry with the Special Blow Dry Hair Brush (12 Rows) from Christophe Robin. Showcasing a pre-curved shape, the hair brush grips the hair perfectly and is able to smooth down the cuticle to leave locks silky and disciplined. Ergonomically designed, the hair brush arrives ready to use and requires no breaking in.
Crafted with natural boar bristles, the Hair Brush ensures gentle brushing, keeping the hair free from damage. The brush utilises a traditional French method, boasting bristles of varying lengths which effortlessly glide through hair, leaving locks detangled and ultra-shiny.
name: Robin Special Blow Dry Hair Brush (12 Rows)

product_description:
Create tousled, beach-bound tresses with KMS HairPlay Sea Salt Spray, a texturising mist infused with Salt from the Dead Sea to promote fuller, textured and volumised hair.
Adding texture, fullness and grip to fine, lack lustre hair, the salt spray helps create animated, beachy waves; it utilises an innovative shaping blend that combines Dead Sea Salt with a setting polymer to volumise, support and hold for ocean-inspired hair. Enhancing waves and adding definition, it's great for adding grip to fine hair and up-dos, and imparts a matt finish for a genuine, just-out-of-the-ocean look.
name: Hairplay Sea Salt Spray 200ml

product_description:
Maximise your colour with the Healing ColorCare Color Guard and Illuminator Duo Pack from L’Anza. Combining two advanced leave-in treatments, hair appears revitalised and full of life, with intensified colour and relentless shine.
An ultra-lightweight, leave-in treatment that prolongs hair colour by up to 107%. Fortified with a plant-based WASH SHIELD™, the scientifically advanced formula works to protect hair against oxidative chemicals that degrade hair’s natural protective barrier, bonding individual cuticles and restoring CMC lipid layers for vivid, long-lasting colour.
Healing ColorCare Color Illuminator (100ml)
The weightless treatment instantly revives hair colour and boosts vibrancy for that just-dyed freshness. Fortified with advanced Optical Refraction Technology™, it delivers colour pigment optimisation to intensify hue and create a brilliant, mirror-like shine. The perfect finishing touch for any hair style.
name: Healing ColorCare Color Guard and Illuminator Duo Pack

product_description:
KeraStraight KS Style Glossing Texture Creme赋予秀发华丽光泽。适合所有发质，质地轻盈，能抚平毛燥和浮发，令秀发整洁如新。 这款造型霜具有重建和还原功效，令秀发健康美丽，内外兼修。 - K.R
主要益处：- 抚平毛燥和浮发- 提亮- 打造和保持丰满的秀发造型- 重建和闭合毛鳞片，恢复健康
name: KS Style Glossing Texture Crème (100ml)

product_description:
TIGI 最新 Bed Head for Men 头皮保健洗发水  。 是一款清爽的高科技产品，可清洁修复头发，使头发焕发光釆，散发出罗勒和薄荷的芳香。
内含强大的Fibroscalp™清洁剂，可轻松去除头发污垢、死皮细胞等；活性炭，可去除杂质和污染物；咖啡因，起刺激头发和头皮的作用。
其造型启动系统，内含独特的抗起毛分子。轻量级洗发水，可防止头发刚洗后的蓬松现象，为头发造型做好准备。 E.N.
name: Bed Head for Men 头皮保健洗发水 (250ml)

product_description:
Reduce drying time with KMS ThermaShape Quick Blow Dry; a conditioning solution that mists onto towel-dried hair and speeds up the time it takes to dry locks naturally or with a hairdryer.
Utilising an AHA structure complex, which includes Polyquaternium-11 and Methylal, the lightweight blow drying solution works to even out hair’s surface, whilst encouraging the evaporation of water to severely reduce the time is takes for hair to dry. Ideal for any busy lifestyle, including parents and professionals, the ThermaShape solution guarantees to nourish hair and ensure it dries quickly.
name: ThermaShape Quick Blow Dry 200ml

product_description:
Christophe Robin刺梨籽油滋養修護萬用霜是一款多功能修護霜可保濕、滋養、保護並順滑秀發和肌膚。含99%天然成分及1%的香水，方便使用且不黏膩，適合所有髮質及膚質，無論男女都適用。 
同時具有修護、滋養秀發與肌膚、造型、保濕、鎮靜、防護等功效，此款修護霜可用於秀發、身體、手足和唇部等受損或過敏紅腫部位，可深層潤滑舒緩肌膚，並持久保濕。
name: Robin刺梨籽油滋养修护万用霜 120ml

product_description:
Achieve calm, manageable locks with the KMS TameFrizz Shampoo; a lightweight formula that guarantees to leave hair sleek, smooth and frizz-free.
Synergising Polyquaternium-10 and an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the cleansing shampoo gently eliminates impurities as it combats frizz and flyaways to leave hair easier to style. Locks are controlled and disciplined with a salon-worthy finish.
name: Tame Frizz Shampoo 750ml

product_description:
Restore hair to its natural health and shine with the Sublime Repair Shampoo from SHOW Beauty. The unique formula is designed to repair hair, leaving it strengthened and incredibly soft.
Formulated with a blend of Quinoa Protein and Vitamin E, the shampoo delivers targeted repairing and nourishing properties. Infused with Caviar and White Truffle, ingredients renowned for their intense conditioning properties and enriching benefits that help to revive and protect the hair, resulting in a healthy, luscious look.
name: Beauty Sublime Repair Shampoo 200ml

product_description:
Phytospecific Integral Hydrating Mist适合所有发质，能巩固发型且不失秀发光泽，是您打造发型的最佳拍档。 由植物成分制成，卓效理顺干湿发丝，帮助秀发定型。
无论是平顺或重塑发卷，还是定型或盘发，本品的红藻和向日葵成分都能捋平发丝表层，令秀发丝般光亮。 - K.R
name: Integral Hydrating Mist Spray (150ml)

product_description:
Revive limp, lifeless and lacklustre locks with the Thickening Conditioner from Sachajuan. Ideal for fine and thinning hair types, the Thickening Conditioner is designed to effectively condition hair, whilst promoting a lifted, volumised finish.
Utilising Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, the mineral-rich formula detangles and smoothes hair to deliver a manageable finish. Expect full-bodied locks that are visibly healthy and ultra-shiny.
name: Thickening Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
使用这款 Green People Vitamin Conditioner 活力护发素，唤醒秀发和心情。 这款提升情绪的产品具备丰盈和修复功效，非常适合用于接触阳光、盐或氯的头发，使其活力重现。
Green People Vitamin Shampoo 散发着精油的混合芳香，令疲惫的头发充满活力并滋润头皮。 这款护发素不含 SLS（存在于多数主流洗发水中，但可能导致头皮瘙痒）和苯甲酸酯，是大自然可以提供的最纯净的护发产品。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 这些产品也适用于素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Vitamin Conditioner (200ml)

product_description:
Fun and functional, the Popband London Headbands are the ultimate hair accessories to hold your locks in place without uncomfortable tightness.
Featuring a silicone backing and stretchy design, the bands prevent headaches and kinks, whilst allowing you to create your desired style with ease. Ideal for keeping hair back during workouts and make-up application, or wearing on your wrist as a unique bracelet.
name: London Headbands - Black

product_description:
Restore the hair’s natural moisture with the Pure Moisture Conditioner from SHOW Beauty. The deeply nourishing formula balances hair’s moisture, resulting in intensely soft and smooth locks.
Formulated with a blend of Caviar, White Truffle and Shea Butter, the conditioner works to infuse hydration to each fiber for added tensile strength and exceptional gloss and shine.
name: Beauty Pure Moisture Conditioner 200ml

product_description:
L’Anza Art Elements Powder Up Texturizer 是一款创新的造型产品，可提供轻盈质地，并提升丰盈度和定型效果。 这种独特粉末可即刻分解并被发束吸收，提升秀发支持力和定型效果。
这款独特的 Powder Up Texturizer 易于使用，令秀发自然飘逸，全天保持清爽。 定型系数为 0.6，可提升所有发质的质地和丰盈度。
使用说明：
name: Healing Style Powder Up Texturizer (15g)

product_description:
Fight frizz and flyaways with Macadamia's Natural Oil Smoothing Shampoo; a daily formula dedicated to cleansing, moisturising and protecting hair from root to tip.
Harnessing the powers of antioxidant Green Tea Extract and nourishing Macadamia Oil (rich in fatty acids), the lightweight, pH balanced shampoo effortlessly eliminates impurities, whilst infusing chemically-treated, damaged hair with intense hydration and shine. Shields from environmental aggressors and seals the hair cuticle to reveal sleek, smooth locks without heavy build-up.
name: Natural Oil Smoothing Shampoo 1000ml

product_description:
使用 Nanogen Fibres Light Blonde (15g)，打造丰满浓密的秀发。 100％ 纯角蛋白纤维具有天然的外观和手感，轻松与您自己的秀发融合，打造丰满浓密的秀发。
专利技术配制而成，确保 400％ 强效粘合，双极充电电荷可实现最优厚化。安全产品，可每天使用。
name: Hair Thickening Fibres Light Blonde (15g)

product_description:
Joico Color Endure Violet Conditioner-无硫酸盐（1 公升） 专为金发、挑染、变淡和发白发质配制，内含高含量的紫罗兰染发剂，有助于调和不自然的黄色和黄铜发色。
这款滋养性护发素还可以纠正秀发的发色，帮助秀发变得顺滑、柔软、易于梳理。 秀发看起来会更亮、更强韧，同时还能保护秀发免受环境伤害和物理伤害。
name: Color Endure Violet Conditioner - 无硫酸盐(1000ml)

product_description: Phytospecific Rich Hydration Mask能卓效理顺哪怕是最"倔强"的发质。 本品蕴含白三叶草蜂蜜和锦葵花成分，滋养保湿，令秀发丝般柔滑、光彩照人。 -SA
name: Rich Hydration Mask (200ml)

product_description:
使用 Jack Black Texture Cream，控制秀发。这是一款轻盈造型霜，具备护理与抗毛躁特性并提供持久灵活的定型效果。
这款非粘性的产品非常适合于干性至中性粗、密头发或卷发，采用 PureScience® 配方，融合了丝氨基酸与荷荷巴油和甜菜根，以软化、滋润和控制毛躁，令秀发浓密并提升亮泽。
给予秀发额外的控制，保持定型，呈现光滑不油腻的妆效，而不显僵硬。 适合在吹干头发前后使用。 - K.N
美国生产。
name: Black Texture Cream (96g)

product_description:
Ideal for dry and damaged locks, the A'kin Rice Aminos & Wheat Protein Shampoo and Macadamia & Wheat Protein Conditioner Duo combines two expertly formulated treatments brimming with nourishing botanical extracts and essential vitamins to deeply restore and repair. Working in perfect harmony with one another, expect hydrated, revitalised locks with renewed radiance.
Rice Aminos & Wheat Protein Shampoo (500ml)
Harnessing the powers of Rice Amino Acids, Wheat Proteins and six botanical cleansers, the lightweight shampoo gently eliminates impurities, whilst delivering intense moisture to parched strands. Expect smooth, frizz-free locks with enhanced shine.
Macadamia & Wheat Protein Conditioner (500ml)
Utilising the benefits of Wheat Protein and cold-pressed Australian Macadamia Oil, the softening conditioning treatment delivers intense moisture to the hair and scalp, whilst targeting split ends and preventing further breakage. Hair is left manageable and ultra-glossy.
name: Rice Aminos & Wheat Protein Shampoo & Macadamia & Wheat Protein Conditioner Duo 500ml

product_description:
用 L'Anza Healing Nourish 刺激 Shampoo (1000ml)告别稀疏的秀发。 它可以有效去除阻塞毛囊的皮脂、残渣和 DHT，有助于延长头发的自然生长阶段，防止压力、药物和个人情况引起脱发。
它是 L'Anza 强韧健康头发 3 步配方的一部分，其蕴含的有机植物成分可以深层滋养秀发，令秀发强韧健康。 使用说明：
name: Healing Nourish 刺激 Shampoo (1000ml) - （价值 91.00 英镑）

product_description:
TIGI 蒂芝床头全效™生发调节啫喱让您拥有柔软的秀发；其生发配方可有效从发根到发梢焕活发丝，丰盈和增加发量。
这款护发素采用创新的纤维增厚技术，能渗透到发丝纤维深层，使其在吸收水分后能够隆起和增厚，从而让其看起来更加饱满，而不会增加重量。 让您的秀发拥有所期待的亮丽和弹性，增强定型效果，增加发量，使秀发散发着该品牌"典型的浆果"馨香。
name: 蒂芝床头海量发量护发素（750ml）

product_description: Uniq One Hair and Scalp Conditioning Coconut Shampoo 适合于日常使用，是一款针对所有发质的轻盈洗发水，可去除多余油脂、污垢和杂质，深层滋润头皮并保持持久舒适，同时增强光泽和控制毛躁，实现更易于设计造型的平静、可打理的秀发。 这款丰盈洗发水可强化和柔顺发束，减少断裂和分叉，实现散发椰子清香的、充满活力的顺滑发丝。 E.N.
name: One Coconut Hair and Scalp Conditioning Shampoo (300ml)

product_description:
Become a beach goddess with the TIGI Bed Head Queen Beach Salt Infused Texture Spray; a fast-drying mist that adds instant body and texture to locks.
Guaranteed to become a summer essential, the salt-infused spray effortlessly mist over damp locks to create enviable beachy texture. Used on dry hair, the formula delivers a ‘next day’ texture for the ultimate surf look. Infused with Balinese Sea Salt, the texturising spray ensures locks boast long-lasting body.
name: Bed Head Queen Beach Salt Infused Texture Spray

product_description:
使用Recipe for men胡须护理，让您的胡须保持最佳状态。 混合了天然油脂和萃取物的专家级配方，这款多功能护理油具有软发、护法、提亮光泽的功效，能够减轻皮肤发红、瘙痒和刺激的状况。
这款胡须护理油含有松油、柠檬草和沙棘萃取物等成分，能够防止头屑产生，并具有抗真菌的作用，非常适合将其收入您的日常清洁护理套装。 让您的胡子重现健康状态，且易于梳理。 - L.M.
使用指南：将几滴护理油涂在手上，然后按摩胡须，让胡须充分吸收精油。
name: for men胡须护理油（25ml）

product_description:
Create long-lasting styles with the Moulding Cream from British Barbers' Association. Offering moderate hold, the moulding formula can be used to style hair into place.
Effortlessly gliding through hair, the cream can be applied to both damp and dry locks. The formula delivers lightweight, non-greasy staying power that complements both casual and sophisticated occasions. In addition to providing hold, the rich moulding cream conditions the hair to leave it shiny and healthy looking.
name: Barbers' Association Moulding Cream 100ml

product_description: Bring limp, lifeless locks back to life with the Biolage R.A.W. Re-Bodify Mask. Based upon a nutrient-rich natural blend, the rich treatment cocoons hair with essential moisture and vitamins, promoting enhanced thickness and vitality. Enriched with extracts of Ginger and Kaolin Clay, it improves manageability and builds body for superior volume and density.
name: R.A.W. Re-Bodify Mask 400ml

product_description:
本品含健康頭皮和秀發所需的豐富必須營養素， Phytospecific喚能秀發含120種膳食補充劑，能提高身體活力，補充營養，同時讓您的頭皮健康，預防掉髮。 
本品含維他命B 族、大豆和鋅，可給纖細毛髮由內而外的全面呵護。 - KR 
使用說明：  - 每天用水吞服2 片，最好在早上服用。  - 為獲得最佳效果，建議持續服用3 個月。  - 請勿超過每日建議服用量。 
 * 一盒120 片。需搭配均衡飲食。
name: 唤能秀发

product_description:
用 L'Anza Healing Nourish 刺激护发素 (250ml) 告别稀疏的秀发。 它可以有效地软化和疏通头发，帮助延长头发的自然生长阶段，防止压力、药物和个人情况引起脱发。
它是 L'Anza强韧健康头发 3 步配方的一部分，其蕴含的有机植物成分可以深层滋养秀发，令秀发强韧健康。
name: Healing Nourish刺激Conditioner (250ml)

product_description: The Ultra-Sleek Hair Styling Wax from Giovanni allows you to create defined, separated curls and waves with a soft, sleek finish. Fortified with a moisturising blend of Brazilian Phyto-Keratin and Moroccan Agran Oil, the nourishing hair wax hydrates individual strands while locking in style with a pliable yet strong hold. Ideal for adding flexible texture, hair is left looking glossy and effortlessly tousled.
name: Ultra-Sleek Hair Styling Wax 57g

product_description:
Achieve surfer-inspired, beachy locks with the d:fi Beach Spray; a salt-infused formula that promises to leave hair tousled and textured with ocean vibes.

product_description:
Achieve full-bodied tresses with the Pureology FullFyl Shampoo and Conditioner Duo; a convenient combination that is ideal for daily use. Host to a protective shampoo and conditioner that transform fine, lifeless hair, the duo strive to reveal full-bodied locks with colour that is radiant and vibrant. Expect healthy looking hair after each and every wash.
FullFyl Shampoo (250ml)
Reveal enviable locks with the FullFyl Shampoo; a hardworking cleanser that promotes rich colour and texture. The shampoo utilises an AntiFade Complex, which helps to reveal vibrant and shiny colour, whilst a plant-derived PhytoBlend™ creates a densifying effect. Suitable for all coloured hair, the shampoo has a sulphate free formula to leave you with optimal colour vibrancy.
FullFyl Conditioner (250ml)
Treat coloured hair with the FullFyl Conditioner; a nourishing formula developed to reveal fuller, denser and beautifully rich colour and texture. With the brand's signature AntiFade Complex for vibrant and shiny colour; plant-derived PhytoBlend™ for a densifying effect and IntraCylane for a thickening appearance. Suitable for all coloured hair, the conditioner has a sulphate free formula to leave you with optimal colour vibrancy and thicker-feeling, textured hair that is full of vitality.

product_description:
In its first collaboration with magical Disney, Tangle Teezer has treated its multi-award-winning detangling hairbrush, The Original, to a special edition glittery pink colour and a set of Disney princess stickers to customise your hairbrush with.
The very first creation by Tangle Teezer inventor Shaun P, The Original banishes tangles, knots and helps prevent hair breakage. This is all possible thanks to its unique two-tiered system technology – the long teeth detangle and the short teeth smooth the hair cuticle for healthier-looking, glossy hair.
Designed to glide through wet or dry hair of all types and textures with ease and speed, it's the perfect hairbrush for little princesses who dream of soft, shiny, tangle-free hair.

Achieve long-lasting, professional results with The White Touch Straightener - Gloss Edition from Cloud Nine.
Utilising exclusive, revolutionary Touch technology, the hair straighteners are the first of their kind to offer instant heat without an on/off switch. Their patented, automatic heat up technology emits heat from the first stroke, allowing you to straighten or curl your locks without delay. The button-less irons are kinder to hair than traditional straighteners, and feature mineral ceramic-coated plates to enhance your hair's natural shine. Offering dual temperature control (165°C and 195°C) depending on your hair type, simply tap the plates together three times to switch between temperatures. Expect salon-worthy results.

Phyto Joba 是一款富含多種成分的柔和洗髮水，具有超強補水功效，可鞏固頭髮的自然保護系統，確保其完整性。讓頭髮迅速恢復最佳水潤、光亮和柔軟水平。 
本產品的質地如絲絨般柔軟，怡人香氣，同時能柔順秀發，讓其立顯光澤。 
 說明： 
 成分： 
矢車菊花（矢車菊）提取物（植物來源）、葵花花提取物（錦葵- 植物來源）、十二烷基醚硫酸鈉（植物來源）、PEG-4 菜籽油酰胺（植物來源） 、椰油酰胺異丙醇胺（植物來源）、乙二醇硬脂酸酯、二鈉Cocamphodiacetate（植物來源）、西蒙得木（荷荷巴）籽油（荷荷芭油- 植物來源）、水（溶液）、椰油酰胺丙基甜菜鹼（植物來源）、鉀Unidecylenoyl 水解大豆蛋白（植物來源）、月桂酰肌氨酸鈉（植物來源）、泛醇(Provitamine B5)、聚季銨鹽10（植物來源）、檸檬酸、香精（香水）（香料）、丙二醇、氯化鈉、苯氧乙醇、對羥基苯甲酸酯（甲酸乙酯，丁基）、甲基氯、甲基異
name: PhytoJoba 强效补水洗发水 200ml

product_description:
Philip Kingsley 闪亮香膏护发精华  使秀发柔滑闪亮。对抗头发毛躁、可调理保护头发。
配方独特，采用轻巧新颖的有机硅，使秀发柔顺，易于梳理。营养物质维他命原B5和维生素A等，为您展示沙龙式秀发光采。 本品在手掌心即可从膏状变为精华液，方便涂抹至全部头发。 适合做过染色处理的头发。
name: Kingsley PK 闪亮香膏护发精华 75 ml

product_description:
As I Am 椰子乳油木果脂造型乳专门为螺旋卷或超紧密式卷发而设计，可实现轻质定型，具有超强的控卷能力，增强柔顺性。
这款奢华的造型乳蕴含有丰富的保湿乳油木果脂油、椰子油和滕金合欢萃取物，可起到护理、保湿和滋养的功效，同时让您的秀发从发根到发梢都更有光泽，更柔顺飘逸。 适用于卷发、发髻和辫子头，让您拥有梦寐以求的顺滑和定型效果，而不会发生脱落、造型乳堆积或带给您油腻感。
name: I Am 椰子乳油木果脂造型乳 227 g

product_description:
提示存在于本产品的名称中；bliss supershine 洗发水（柠檬和鼠尾草味）让每一缕发丝拥有闪亮光泽，享受小麦蛋白和抗静电活性的天然益处，改善带静电，毛躁和凌乱的头发。
bliss supershine 洗发水（柠檬和鼠尾草味）能有效地保持头发健康、柔软和亮泽，也非常柔和，可供每日使用，含有有利于清洁的椰子油，在护发的同时，不剥离水分，令秀发清洁而滋润。 泛醇（维生素 B-5）保持头发润泽，而小麦蛋白则有助于修补分叉，令秀发更顺滑和柔软。
使用说明：
name: Supershine 洗发水（柠檬和鼠尾草味）(250ml)

product_description:
更蓬松、丰盈，更有保障！ L’Anza Healing Volume Thickening Shampoo 采用 L’Anza 的知名角蛋白修复系统和竹子提取物配方，令稀疏头发更蓬松、丰盈。
L’Anza Healing Volume Thickening Shampoo 的浓稠配方不含硫酸盐，性质温和，含自然雨果树皮，泡沫丰富。 秀发充满活力，恢复健康，光彩照人。
使用说明：
name: Healing Volume Thickening Shampoo (300ml)

product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy locks from home with the Giovanni Smooth as Silk™ Conditioner; a revitalising formula developed specifically for dry, damaged hair in need of repair.
Enriched with vegetable protein, the detangling conditioner delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst combating frizz and flyaways to leave hair calm, manageable and super smooth with enhanced shine.
name: Smooth as Silk Conditioner 60ml

product_description:
Alterna竹萃亮採洗髮露萃取天然竹的精華和瓢油，溫和不刺激。雙重滋養柔順配方，深入頭皮底層鎖水保濕呵護，清新自然，有效預防髮絲打結。 
純綠色配方，Alterna竹萃亮採洗髮露不含防腐劑，可有效改善脆弱易捲曲髮絲質地，打造絲綢一般順滑的髮質，使秀發更健康，髮色持久光鮮亮澤。 
使用方法:

Catering for all hair types, Christophe Robin's Regenerating Shampoo with Prickly Pear Oil deeply nourishes strands from root to tip to help repair dry, damaged hair.
Infused with antioxidant Prickly Pear Seed Oil for ultimate protection, the daily, creamy shampoo expertly cleanses hair to eliminate excess oil and impurities. Its lightweight formula improves manageability and restores calm, smooth and healthy-looking locks with enhanced shine.
name: Robin Regenerating Shampoo with Prickly Pear Oil 400ml

product_description:
適合細軟髮質，扁塌髮質，頭髮稀薄人群，Alterna竹豐盈護髮素可迅速改善軟榻，稀薄髮質，採用天然有機竹配方，搭配秘魯人參精華，溫和潔淨，多種活性滋養源煥活秀發，刺激頭髮再生。 
 Alterna竹豐盈護髮素應用生態認證成分，獨特配方使用後髮絲強韌有力，易打理，全面提升飽滿度，快速加強髮絲質感，增強韌性，提升彈性及光澤，持久鎖住水分，不含任何防腐劑。 
使用方法:

适用于所有类型的头发，Christophe Robin的Regenerating Shampoo与仙人球油从发根至发梢提供深层滋养，修复干燥、受损的头发。
加入具有抗氧化功效的仙人球籽油以提供终极保护，这款日常霜膏洗发液温和清洗灰尘和杂质，同时平顺头发纤维，令头发恢复健康光泽，迷人魅力。 E.N.
name: Robin Regenerating Shampoo与仙人球油 (250ml)

product_description: 使用 Wella Professionals Elements Renew Mask，修复受损长发。 这款发膜旨在修复和保护秀发的自然内部结构和强度。 这款发膜的轻盈霜状质地和温和配方，令秀发健康柔滑。 非常适合每周使用一次，效果不会让您失望。 A.B.
name: Professionals Elements Renew Mask (500ml)

product_description:
Achieve smooth and sleek locks with the KMS ThermaShape Straightening Crème; a luxurious formula that glides through hair and assists in creating a straight and shiny finish. Ideal for curly and wavy hair types that are seeking straight results.
Developed using an innovative shaping blend, which includes Polysilicone-9, the rich crème helps to shape hair during heat styling. Used before blow drying or paired with straighteners, the solution effortlessly smoothes hair and encourages a sleek, straight and shiny finish.
Not only smoothing and taming locks, the straightening crème envelops each fiber in order to shield hair from heat damage during styling, as well as protecting tresses against humidity, which can lead to unwanted frizz and flyaways.
name: ThermaShape Straightening Creme 150ml

product_description:
TIGI Bed Head 强发护发素  ，防止头发断裂。配方轻盈，用以从发根至发梢强化头发。 富含甜杏仁油、必需脂肪酸和维生素A和E等成分。配方独特，滋润修复头发，使秀发柔软光滑，促进头发健康生长。
采用水解小麦蛋白和乳酸等成分，修护受损发质；内含的氨基酸，可使干枯的头发重焕光釆，发质增强，头发变得浓密亮泽。 减少静电现象，使头发亮泽，带您体验超营养的秀发，浓浓的、富有弹性。 散发出黑醋栗、油桃和粉红葡萄柚的淡淡清香。 E.N.
name: Bed Head 强发护发素 (750ml)

product_description: Kebelo丝绒卷发护发素（500ml）能够抚顺毛躁的卷发。 这款令秀发重现活力的护发素不含SLS和苯甲酸酯类，融入了丰富的椰子油、洋甘菊和藜麦，令卷发持久卷曲，柔顺不毛躁，散发耀人光泽。 这款护发产品为秀发提供深层滋养，有效理顺、保护并强化每根发丝，令卷发散发迷人魅力，轻盈Q弹。 - K.N.

Jack Black Wax Pomade。该品牌采用 PureScience® 技术结合植物治疗成分和经过认证的有机成分，创造有助于您获得最佳形象和感觉的产品。 轻盈发蜡可提供灵活定型和莹亮妆效。 采用天然油脂配方，其中茶树油可缓解瘙痒和干燥，柚子皮可赋予秀发清香。
富含矿物质的海带有机可滋养秀发，而绿茶叶提取物可刺激毛囊，促进再生长。 使用通用发蜡来控制毛躁，打造想要的发型，并护理或调理胡须。 这款不油腻的造型发蜡可以很轻松地完成塑形和试验。 用水很容易洗掉。 E.N. 
美国生产。
name: Black Wax Pomade (77g)

product_description:
The Wellness Shampoo from Giovanni combines traditional Chinese botanicals with advanced scientific technologies to create a holistic treatment that nourishes hair from within and calms irritations or itchiness.
Containing an active base of organic extracts, including antioxidant-rich An Mole and soothing Hei Zhi Ma, the gentle formula effectively sweeps away dirt and impurities to leave hair feeling softened and refreshed. Enriched with Panax Ginseng and Mulberry Fruit, the shampoo stimulates circulation at the root and encourages healthy re-growth. Expect revitalised and strengthened locks with a soothed scalp.
name: Wellness Shampoo 250ml

product_description:
Achieve big and bouncy locks with the OUAI Curl Shampoo; a lightweight, cleansing formula developed specifically to meet the needs of curly and textured hair types.
Utilising OUAI’s ‘Smart Technology Complex’, the shampoo thoroughly cleanses each fiber, whilst replenishing hair’s moisture levels. Simply lather into wet hair and the shampoo will drench locks in a cocktail of hair-loving ingredients.
Enriched with a reviving aroma consisting of Italian Lemon, White Musk and Jasmine, the hydrating shampoo guarantees to leave locks fragrant and soft, as well as enhancing hair’s natural curls.
name: Curl Shampoo 300ml

product_description:
Treat dry, damaged hair to the benefits of A'kin's Rice Aminos and Wheat Protein Shampoo; a deeply nourishing formula that works to restore healthy-looking locks from root to tip.
Harnessing the powers of Rice Amino Acids, Wheat Proteins and six botanical cleansers, the lightweight shampoo gently eliminates impurities, whilst delivering intense moisture to parched strands. Expect smooth, frizz-free locks with enhanced shine.
name: Rice Aminos and Wheat Protein Shampoo 500ml

product_description:
Boost the appearance of fine, limp hair with Giovanni's GNV 2chic U-Volume Shampoo, a volumising shampoo infused with a Dual-Volumising Complex of Tangerine Butter and Papaya to take hair to new heights.

Utilising Eco Chic Technology™ which synergises beauty from the elements with science, the thickening formula combines a cocktail of certified organic botanicals to help cleanse away impurities whilst amplifying the look of hair, lifting at the root and boosting volume without weighing hair down. Hair looks energised and fuller, and is protected with antioxidant vitamins.
name: GNV 2chic U-Volume Shampoo 250ml

product_description: Transform weak and thinning hair with the Phyto PHYTODENSIA Fluid Plumping Mask; a targeted, deep conditioning treatment to add lustre, volume and density. Fortified with a strengthening core of Vernonia and Grape extracts, the fluid textured formula quickly works to create an ideal scalp environment for healthier regrowth, while Hyaluronic Acid and Acacia Collagen work in synergy to thicken each individual strand. Tresses appear revitalised and lifted with enhanced body and vigour.
name: Phytodensia Fluid Plumping Mask

product_description:
用 L'Anza Healing Nourish刺激Treatment (100ml)防止脱发。 这款产品的配方采用了毛发生长初期 7 系统，可以延长秀发的自然生长阶段，并通过经皮渗透提供丰富养料，有助于防止因压力、药物和个人情况造成的头发稀疏和脱发。
它是L'Anza 头发健康生长 3  步系统的一部分，可以有效激活毛囊，赋予秀发活力，促进秀发生长，令秀发看起来丰盈饱满。 使用方法： 将产品涂抹到刚洗过的秀发上，护理秀发。
name: Healing Nourish 刺激 Treatment (100ml)

product_description:
用 L'Anza Healing Colorcare Colour保护Shampoo  (1000ml)延长染过色的头发的寿命。 这款产品的配方采用了L'Anza的花卉防护复合物，可以使用可在花卉中发现的相同防褪色化合物来保护头发色泽，而 UV 三合一防护剂可以保护秀发免受太阳有害射线的损害。
这款乳状奢华的配方蕴含榼藤子树皮，可清洁头发杂质，而Keratin疗愈体系可以修复染色和环境侵害因素造成的损害。 效果奇妙，可令您的头发色泽持续时间延长107％。 使用说明：
name: Healing Colorcare Colour 保护 Shampoo (1000ml) - （价值 78.00 英镑）

product_description:
使用 Jack Black True Volume Shampoo，为稀疏的头发赋予活力。这款日常洗发水可让秀发稠密，同时温和清洗并保持头皮的最佳健康状态。
这款丰盈洗发水拥有 PureScience® 配方，融合了天然植物和温和的表面活性剂以及专有增稠复合物 'Expansion Technology'，有助于您获得更丰盈、健康的亮泽秀发。
添加生物素和绿茶叶有助于强化、修复和刺激毛囊生长，呈现亮泽发梢。 - K.N
美国生产。
name: Black True Volume Shampoo (295ml)

product_description:
The BaByliss Pro Dial a Heat Conical Wand - Hot Pink 32-19mm has been designed with the professional in mind. Gives amazing versatility to shaping and curling the hair. So easy to use - just take a section of hair, wrap around the cone and style. Make a beautiful cascade of curls, soft waves or ringlets.
240 volt UK specification with 3 pin UK plug. A power transformer is required for use in countries not using 240 voltage.
name: PRO Dial a Heat Conical Wand (32-19mm) - Pink

product_description:
使用 Briogeo Curl Charisma™ Rice Amino + Shea Curl Defining Conditioner，实现无毛躁的发丝。 其轻盈配方适合卷发、波浪发、干枯或难以打理的头发，提供深层补水并锁住水分，令卷发成型。 稻米氨基酸可渗透至发干，使角质层光滑并理顺凌乱的头发，同时番茄果实发酵液可促进卷发形成的一致性。
采用可软化秀发的油树叶提取物和保湿牛油果油的独特混合液配方，富含抗氧化剂、维生素、矿物质和营养素，令秀发感觉如丝般柔滑。 甜杏仁油可提升亮泽，呈现健康柔软的发丝。 E.N.
name: Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Shea Curl Defining Conditioner 236ml

product_description:
Give thin and lacklustre locks a boost with the Nioxin Hair System Kit 2 and Bodifying Foam Bundle; an advanced haircare regime that replenishes strength and body. Working in synergy, the System 2 four-piece set delivers essential nutrients and scientific technologies to hair, working to minimise damage and simulate growth for thicker and healthier looking hair.
Bodifying Foam (200ml)
Treat thinning hair to the Bodifying Foam, a multi-tasking styling foam that provides sturdy hold and creates the illusion of thicker, fuller looking hair. Formulated with PRO-THICK™ technology, its complex of thickening polymers deposit on the hair, forming bonds between gaps in strands to create a fuller-looking appearance. Hair will look thicker and healthier with improved manageability and body.
System 2 Cleanser Shampoo (150ml)
Part of a three step system designed specifically for fine, noticeably thinning natural hair, the System 2 Cleanser Shampoo will deeply cleanse the hair whilst protecting the scalp for a lasting shine. Containing a Scalp Access® delivery system which uses vitamins, botanicals and SPF15 sunscreen, the unique cleanser clears hair follicle sites without stripping hair of essential oils.
System 2 Scalp Revitaliser Conditioner (150ml)
Containing innovative BioAMP® technology which increases the fullness of each hair strand whilst reducing hair loss, the scalp revitaliser is also designed to refresh the scalp with added peppermint oil and white tea extract as part of the Activ-Renewal® technology. With added SPF15 protection against damaging sun rays, this conditioner will give your locks with a stunning shine and thicker feel.
System 2 Scalp Treatment (40ml)
Thicken the hair whilst refreshing the scalp with the System 2 Scalp Treatment for Noticeably Thinning Natural Hair by NIOXIN. A unique leave-in spray treatment, it boasts a blend of innovative technologies which work to thicken fine natural hair types whilst ensuring a refreshed scalp environment. Also formulated with added SPF15 protection to shield the scalp from damaging UV rays.
name: Hair System Kit 2 and Bodifying Foam Bundle

product_description: Delivering light to medium hold, Neville's Hair Putty creates texture and definition with a matte finish. Fortified with extracts of Maca and Artichoke, the non-greasy formula helps to promote thicker hair, whilst fighting dandruff and brittleness to leave you with a healthy-looking head of hair. Can be applied to wet or dry hair. Washes out easily.
name: Hair Putty 75g

product_description:
Corioliss C1 直发器非常适合于直发、卷发或波浪发，配有柔软的握把，打造高性能美发效果。 加热板具备 1" 宽的钛浮板，每次使用都能实现完美的接触和热量分布。采用创新负离子技术，即使是最密的头发，也能轻松滑过，而不会引起静电。
与陶瓷板直发器相比，这款符合人体工程学原理的工具对头发的损伤较小，具备变温控制，可在 60°C-235℃ 之间进行加热调整，以满足不同的造型需求。 配备专业发廊标准的3米电源线，并可360°旋转。 - K.N
name: C1 直发器（淡紫色）

product_description:
invisibobble 强力 Hair 发绳 特别适合在锻炼或进行体育活动时使用，能够使蓬乱、难以打理的头发服帖，无需使用发夹和夹发针。
既好玩又有实际作用，其超舒适的、加强螺旋形的形状可以防止头痛和发绳扭结，而其卫生和不吸水的设计及光滑的表面意味着即使在手腕上佩戴，它也会始终保持干燥。
可在潮湿或干燥的头发上使用，不会造成缠结、断裂或钩到头发。
name: 强力 Hair 发绳（3个装） - 幸福来不来

product_description:
Take control with Zirh Flexible Hold Hair Gel, a sculpting hair styling formula with lightweight, flexible hold.
Working to style and control your hair with long-lasting results, the gel expertly holds hair in place with a natural finish whilst enhancing shine and moisture. Its non-sticky formula is enriched with hydrating Argan Oil and Marine Algae to perform a soft hold without flaking or leaving a greasy residue.
name: Hold Flexible Hold Hair Gel 100ml

product_description:
利用Sebastian Professional Hydre Treatment修复干燥、拳曲的头发，令其恢复健康。 该滋润发膜旨在滋补并焕发头发活力，灵感头发丰润而又如丝般柔滑。
该护发产品缓解头发的干渴，让头发更加易于梳理并增加光泽。
众所周知，Sebastian professional 对一切事物的颜色和形状进行了实验，旨在打造无所畏惧的发型。 Sebastian 美发产品渴求创新，不断改变发型设计的规则，有助于您打造梦寐以求的发型。 -SA
name: Professional Hydre Treatment (150ml)

product_description: MiTi Professional Hair Ties 三条套装。 这款发绳适用于所有发质，秀发绑扎整齐，全天均可保持紧实，提供完美的定型效果。因而您可轻松打造想要的盘发造型。 发绳对秀发很温和，非常适合在睡眠时系带，可降低头部压力，实现持久舒适。 E.N.
name: Professional Hair Tie - Sweet Lavender（3 条）

product_description:
Tangle Teezer 三步Perfect Hair是最具创新性的护发套装，包括 3 把高效的美发梳，可以疏通秀发，令头发看起来和感觉起来柔软有光泽。 Perfect 梳理潮湿或干燥的头发，并且有一把美发梳专用于旅途中造型，因而这款套装是一款必备之物！ K.D.
Tangle Teezer Original 紫色迷恋Tangle Teezer 的梳齿设计独特，在梳理秀发时，梳齿可弯曲并快速弹回原位，防止容易打结的发丝相互接触，最大化减少因护理不当而导致的断发、毛躁和损伤。 它适用于各种发质，尤其适用于发质脆弱或染发、接发后的头发、卷发以及儿童细密易打结的头发。
 Tangle Teezer Compact Styler - Black /粉红色Compact Styler是Original Tangle Teezer的迷你版。 这款美发梳手包大小，其储存盒可以保护它的鬃毛。 "它平滑、特征鲜明并闪耀 - 就像头发的唇彩"。
 Tangle Teezer水精灵 - 粉红虾这款美发梳可以使秀发在沐浴时始终美丽动人，它适合将护发素和焗油膏梳进头发里，并且随带了独特的干燥脚，可令秀发看起来卫生且随洗随干。 再一次用这款精致的亲水、防滑美发梳节省您的护发时间。
name: Teezer三步Perfect Hair（准备、梳理和润色 - 粉红色）

product_description: 使用 L'Anza 完美卷发修复护理精华（100ml），让卷发重现活力。 这款独特的激活精华能够深入秀发毛表皮，为卷发注入活力，重塑卷发，为其提供支撑力和弹性。 采用 L'Anza 独家修复技术，这款护理精华能够抚顺毛躁和小碎发，带给您柔软顺滑的卷发。 -SA
name: 完美卷发修复护理精华（100ml）

product_description:
Minimise drying time by using a Lisse Luxe Hair Towel from Aquis. Suitable for all hair types, including curly, fine and damaged hair, the towel is able to provide gentle treatment.
Crafted with new generation Aquitex, the towel boasts improved absorbency, as well as increased comfort. The towel wraps easily around wet hair, tucking in neatly to leave your hands free whilst hair dries. Use of the Lisse Luxe Hair Towel decreases drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber.
Dimensions: 50cm x 107cm
name: Hair Towel Lisse Luxe Desert Rose

product_description:
Groom to perfection with the Lock Stock & Barrel Styling Heroes Gift Set. Host to four essential hair products, stowed away inside a zip secured cosmetic bag, the set is ideal as a gift, or an indulgent treat for you. Each product guarantees to aid in creating enviable locks, and are designed especially for the styling needs of men.
Volumatte Hair Powder 10g
Volumatte is a highly superior prep and styling powder that liquifies on contact to add an instant lift and extreme volume to fine, thinning and lifeless hair. Especially for men, Volumatte is formulated with an exceptional blend of expert proteins, which coat each strand of hair to help thicken and restore its natural strength and rigidity. Hair will be left looking thick and full whilst boasting an ultra-matte texture with invisible hold. Perfect for the modern day gentleman.
Preptonic Thickening Spray 100ml
Helping to build strength, volume and thickness while giving a versatile finish, the Preptonic Thickening Spray is a modern interpretation of an original hair tonic. Leaving a light, masculine fragrance on the hair and containing a unique blend of protein, this tonic infuses each hair strand immediately after application in such a way that strength and volume will be added from the root to the tip.
Recharge Moisture Shampoo 250ml
The Recharge Moisture has been developed to leave the hair and scalp looking and feeling healthy. Ideal for men with thick, dry or frizz-prone hair, the refreshing shampoo has been formulated with natural polymers and powerful humectants to deliver intense hydration deep into the hair shaft. A combination of cationic agents cleanse hair from root to tip to remove dirt and grime, leaving hair calm and manageable.
85 Karats Original Clay
For superb shaping control try the 85 Karats Original Clay. Delivering enviable volume and texture, alongside a matte finish with an incredible hold, the clay is the perfect grooming tool. The highly versatile formula provides definition, volume and gives the hair superb styling control with an incredible hold that won’t let you down. Great for finger styling to add texture or for use as a strong architectural styler.
name: Stock & Barrel Styling Heroes Gift Set

product_description:
使用 L’Anza Body Building Volume Duo，告别细软无生气头发，使头发增添活力。 这款增效套装组合包括 Body Building Volume Shampoo 和 Body Building Volume Conditioner。
L’Anza Body Building Volume Duo 可清洁滋养秀发和头皮，其中的增量丰盈成分使细软头发浓密、蓬松。
此包装含以下产品：
name: Body Building Volume Duo

product_description:
Viviscal 女性浓发纤维 ，方便使用，使用后头发浓密亮泽，瞬间浓密蓬润。 
内含大量天然着色微静电电荷纤维，可增加头发数量，使头发浓密，遮盖白头发。打造瞬间浓密蓬润的秀发。 该农发纤维经得起风雨，可用洗发水轻松冲洗。 配有独特的涂抹装置。

product_description:
The Ultra-Sleek Flat Iron Styling Mist from Giovanni shields hair from extreme heat damage while infusing it with essential nourishment and moisture.
Fortified with an exclusive Dual Smoothing Complex of Moroccan Argan Oil and Brazilian Phyto-Keratin, the protective spray seals in hydration and strengthens each individual strand to reduce breakage and combat frizz. Hair is left feeling more manageable and silky soft with enhanced glide for optimum styling results with straighteners.

product_description:
Gentlemen's Tonic 蛋白护发素将为秀发补充丰富的滋养和水分，可日常使用，适合所有发质。 这款护发素添加了富含蛋白质的有效成份，能够抚顺、保护并强韧秀发，带给您丝般柔滑且易于打理的秀发。
采用温和配方，可作为日常洗护，根据需要频繁使用，有助于维持秀发和头皮健康。
将蛋白护发素涂于洗净的秀发，保持两分钟，然后冲洗干净。

product_description:
Sebastian Professional Trilliance Shampoo和Conditioner套装包括两件超大量1000ml 产品，二者配合使用可以清洁、滋养和滋润头发，使头发看起来和感觉起来清爽鲜润。 这款两件套是一件完美的礼物，物有所值，值得拥有，是一款必备之物！ K.D.
Sebastian Professional Trilliance Shampoo (1000ml)
Sebastian Professional Trilliance Shampoo 适合所有发质，可以让头发亮泽洁净，散发出美丽、健康的光泽。 它会形成丰富的泡沫，可温和地去除杂质，而水晶提取物可缓和角质层，使头发更易于梳理。
Sebastian Professional Trilliance Conditioner (1000ml)
使用 Sebastian Professional Trilliance Conditioner获得美丽闪亮的头发。 它配有水晶提取物，可疏通秀发，抚平角质层，为造型创造完美的条件，同时赋予秀发眼花缭乱的光泽，使其散发出光芒和活力。

product_description:
Wella专业版亮彩香波赋予染过色的粗犷头发令人惊叹的颜色。 这款高性能香波将改善染过色的头发，让浓密的头发充满生机与活力。
Wella专业版亮彩香波赋予染过色的粗犷头发丰富鲜活的颜色。 这款悉心呵护的轻型香波含有革命性的三重融合技术和华贵的钻石粉，非常适合粗犷浓密的头发，它滋养、顺滑和保护头发的同时保持耀眼的色彩强度。
使用说明：

Cloud Nine卷发器旨在让您拥有引人注目弹力持久的卷发。 这款卷发器有各种不同大小的尺寸，如此您可以根据需要做卷的头发数量选择不同尺寸，它们可以从内部加热，因此它们在头发上会一直是热的，但触手不烫。
尺寸大小为 50mm 的 Cloud Nine卷发器是一款必备之物，采用了软握刷毛，确保可以毫无痛苦地打造靓丽有型的卷发。 K.D.
包括：
4 x 50mm 卷发器

product_description:
非常适合难以选择确切颜色的人们，来自Beauty Works的100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension让您在购买全套颜色前可以匹配自己头发的天然颜色。
这种屡获殊荣的接发使用保有角质层并经轻度加工的最优质Remy人发制造，确保其不会纠结在一起。
发丝巧妙粘合在一起，以防止碎裂，令接发完美增加适当的长度，令头发丰满、茂盛。 E.N.

product_description:
Sebastian Professional Hydre Conditioner  (1000ml)是专门研制的可深层滋润干性发质的护发素，其配方适合毛躁和凌乱的头发，有助于恢复秀发的天然健康和活力。
这款护发素丰富细腻，可温和地软化和疏通秀发，同时提供丰富的营养，令头发丰盈浓密、富有弹性。 秀发的水分含量将彻底得到补充，从而变得光滑、易于梳理。 - L.M.

product_description:
Maximise your style with the Volume Boost Hair Extensions from Beauty Works, the UK's leading brand of luxury, professional hair extensions highly coveted by stylists and celebrities alike.
Designed to add volume and length to your locks, the easy to apply, clip-in hairpiece sits discreetly beneath your own hair, allowing you to add seamless volume to your roots and crown without the fuss of special tools or glue.
Made from hand selected, 100% Remy cuticle retained human hair, which means you get the most natural looking, shiny locks, the lightweight hairpiece features a flat lace cap weft for easy application, and its secure comb has a protective silicone layer on each clip to cushion your natural hair and protect from breakage. - K.N.

product_description:
D:fi 日用洗发水可温和地清洁秀发；其焕活配方利用来自植物能进行生物降解的清洁剂，可有效消除杂质和化妆品残留，而不会引起肌肤的过度干燥。
这款泡沫洗发水增强了角蛋白氨基酸的作用，具有保湿作用，可有效防止秀发变得暗沉、脆弱和干燥，其创新型的季铵化聚合物可使屡屡秀发恢复应有的柔软，使其更易于梳理，令发色更活泼。

product_description:
强化发丝和头皮护理几乎可替代头皮自身的天然油脂：身体的天然发丝养料。 Philip B 菲利普 B 活发精油蕴含有从植物、坚果和鲜花提取的载体和精油香氛混合物。
这款精油是一切护发程序的开始！ Philip B 菲利普 B 活发精油可为干燥至损伤的发丝和头皮补充水分。 这款深层渗透和舒缓精油具有焕活发丝的功能，可使秀发恢复应有的弹性、修复能力和整体强度，同时定型秀发，恢复发色的深度、活力和活性，改善发质，消除粗糙的灰色和银色，促进发丝再生。 仅护理一次就能让秀发看起来和感觉起来更有弹性、更健康、柔软、丝滑、闪亮！
使用说明：
name: B 菲利普 B 活发精油（60ml）

product_description: Shine bright like a diamond! Mix this cream into any DOOP product to achieve dazzling shine combined with the effect of the DOOP product you mixed it with! Perfect for a super shiny look with an edge. LB
name: The Blender (30ml)

product_description:
Wella Professionals Enrich 丰盈三件套包含可以滋养和清洁秀发的创新成分，可以令喑哑细柔的头发变得丰盈。 这款轻盈配方蕴含蚕丝提取物，不会令秀发扁塌，而会从发根提升秀发质感，令其变得丰盈。
使用Wella Professionals Enrich Hair 发梢分叉Elixir恢复和护理干燥、分叉的发梢。 它含有天然牛油果油，只需取少量涂抹到湿润的头发上，并一直涂抹揉搓到发梢。 让本品留在头发上，不要冲洗，使用几次后即会看到秀发的状况会有所好转。
该套装包括以下产品： 
 Wella Professionals Enrich 丰盈Shampoo（适合细发至一般 Hair 250ml） 用 Wella Professionals Enrich 丰盈 Shampoo （适合细至一般 Hair）令秀发变得丰满鲜活。 这款轻盈温和的洗头水蕴含具有呵护功效的蚕丝提取物，适合缺少光泽的细发至一般发质，可以滋养秀发，令秀发变得光滑、飘逸飞扬。 
Wella Professionals Enrich 保湿Conditioner （适合细发至一般 Hair 200ml） 用 Wella Professionals Enrich 丰盈 Conditioner（适合细发至一般 Hair）令秀发富有弹性、充满活力。 它含有天然蚕丝提取物，可令细发变得丰盈、充满活力。
Wella Professionals Enrich Hair 发梢开叉 Elixir (40ml)用 Wella Professionals Enrich Hair 发梢分叉 Elixir 告别飞翘和分叉的发梢。 这款多级别免洗护发品能约束不羁的发梢，浸透头发，封闭受损发丝，使其显得健康、光滑。
name: Professionals Enrich丰盈三件套（适合细发至一般 Hair）- Shampoo、Conditioner & Elixir

product_description:
Fudge 推出的一款色泽调节产品，旨在提升发色和亮泽。 从五种不同的发色中选择您的染发创意：金发、黑发、红发、铜色发和红褐色发。 Fudge 色彩鸡尾酒让人感觉大胆而自信。这款产品可单独使用或与其他产品混合使用，打造个人定制化的护理方案。 在使用 Fudge Shampooo 后效果最佳，令秀发更持久地保持活力。 500ml 一瓶的半永久性染发剂一次可挤出 4ml。 E.N. 
使用说明：通过轻拍将本品涂抹于头发上，并根据所需的色泽强度，保留 10-20 分钟，然后冲洗干净。 戴上手套，避免涂抹过程中双手被染色。500ml 一瓶的半永久性染发剂一次可挤出 4ml。

product_description: 專用於打造順滑直挺造型，軟化自然捲髮絲。取少許於手心，均勻抹於濕髮或乾發上。

product_description: 使用 TIGI Health Factor Shampoo，实现更柔滑的秀发。 这款丰盈洗发水能温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，而牛油果油可提供额外滋润，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。 采用 Healthy Hair Complex 专门配制而成，强韧秀发并减少梳理造成的断发；护理油和维生素 E 提供抗氧化保护，避免造型工具造成的热损伤。 实现如丝绸般柔软的亮泽发丝。 E.N.

product_description:
TIGI蒂芝床頭系列城市解毒-復活護髮素(750ml) 
這款高效保濕護理套裝能讓脆弱易斷的髮質重獲新生。本品是最佳的中度/深層護理產品，能拯救受損髮質。 
可迅速高效地順滑髮質，去除頭屑。內含強力保濕因子，呵護髮色，預防掉色，此外還具有防曬功效。能修復髮質健康，有效維持健康狀態，持久保持頭髮柔軟閃耀。 
使用說明：
name: 蒂芝宝贝蛋复活护发素 (750ml)

product_description:
利用来自Glamoriser的梳通及Dry Brush和Dryer 在干燥的同时做造型，这款集两个功能于一身的梳通刷和吹干机，提供无打结吹干，同时为您的头发做造型。
利用红外技术，这款革命性的美发工具与传统吹风机一样可快速、有效地干燥头发，而它添加钻石油的刷毛和离子技术可提供无拳曲的效果和闪亮光泽。 将根据需要轻松进行顺滑和塑造发型。 - K.N.

product_description: Revel in incredibly smooth, frizz free hair every time you wash with Fix My Frizz Smoothing Conditioner from RPR. The innovative formula is infused with a blend of Carob Amino Acids, Collagen and Argan Oil, which work to restore body, gloss and intense smoothness. The balance of ingredients promotes frizz-free hair every day, leaving locks incredibly smooth and shiny, ideal for normal to coarse hair.
name: Fix My Frizz Smoothing Conditioner 300ml

product_description:
Experience the ultimate cleanse with DHC's Scalp Care Shampoo, a grease-banishing formula dedicated to purifying both the hair and scalp.
Infused with a Triple Care Essence of Collagen, Olive Oil and Eucalyptus, the shampoo effectively cleanses the hair and scalp, diminishing excess sebum and soothing flakiness with Liquorice. Expertly cleansing, moisturising and conditioning, the shampoo leaves dull hair feeling bright and revitalised, and its tea-citrus fragrance leaves you feeling energised. - K.N.
name: Scalp Care Shampoo (550ml)

product_description: 使用 TIGI S-Factor Diamond Dreams Conditioner，转变缺乏光泽的发丝。 其独特的配方含有钻石沙，以提升光泽，令秀发充满健康活力。 珍珠粉能有效地提升光泽；抗氧化油提供脂肪酸，以防止热力造型工具造成的损伤。 这款轻盈护发素含羊绒和香槟提取物，以锁住天然水分并提升秀发的强度，而不会显得颓丧。 呈现无毛躁、滋润、顺滑的发丝。 E.N.

product_description: Revitalise limp, thin and lacklustre hair with the My Boost Mousse Volumiser from RPR, a styling treatment specially formulated to add texture and hold. Ultra-lightweight, it doesn’t leave any build-up or crunchiness, with added Orchid Extract helping to moisturise and soften hair follicles. You can expect shiny, styled locks with added body.
name: My Boost Mousse Volumiser 200ml

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions（18 英寸），获得最佳造型效果。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，深受造型师和名人青睐。
这种易于使用、可自行动手完成的假发旨在为发丝增加体量和长度，使您能够随时变换想要的造型，而无需使用各种专用工具或胶水。
这种轻巧的接发采用手工挑选的 100% 保留雷米角质层的人类发丝制作而成，这意味着您可获得最自然的亮泽发丝。这款接发配有三条带发夹的易于使用的平纬纱带，提供防护硅胶层，以垫起自然头发并防止断裂。 每条发带均采用花边纬纱结构，自然而舒适，便于您层叠混搭发件，实现各种丰盈发型。 - K.N

product_description:
这款American Crew高效定型凝胶是一款巧妙的护发产品，采用了非剥落配方，可强力定型，令发型整天整夜都不变。 永远不要让发丝凌乱，用这款创新造型凝胶令自己的发型处于控制之下。
这款造型凝胶的天然配方独特、无酒精，富含维生素B5，可以令头发变得浓密、光亮、发型保持不变。 用这款滋补性的强力定型凝胶令头发富有光泽、发型保持不变。
name: Crew强力定型凝胶 (1000ml) - （价值 42.00 英镑）

product_description:
Sexy Hair 健康大豆烫直受热保护剂的设计旨在用于离子烫，可从发根到发梢有效保护发丝，具有强健发丝和顺滑作用。
这款海盐喷雾将摩洛哥坚果油、海藻萃取物和大豆蛋白相结合，具有丰盈和增加发量的作用，与此同时从发根到发梢强健发丝，为秀发补充营养。 而维他命 B5 和荷荷巴萃取物可保护和调节发丝，防止毛躁和静电。 既可喷洒在湿润的秀发上，也可喷洒在干燥的秀发上，以打造富有活力的沙滩卷发。

product_description:
Sexy Hair 简易造型发油可有效定型您的秀发，它采用高效定型配方，让您的发型更有层次感，散发着中等光泽。
可使发丝更加柔韧，因此您可随时随地根据自己的需要修改和重塑发型，这款柔韧的发油利用造型共聚物实现强效定型，而角蛋白氨基酸混合物能够有效增强发丝的韧性。 在打造较厚重的发型时，其定型功能可将发丝牢固地固定在合适的位置。
让您拥有所期待的易于模压造型和最终定型效果。

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions（18 英寸），获得最佳造型效果。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，深受造型师和名人青睐。
这种易于使用、可自行动手完成的假发旨在为发丝增加体量和长度，使您能够随时变换想要的造型，而无需使用各种专用工具或胶水。
这种轻巧的接发采用手工挑选的 100% 保留雷米角质层的人类发丝制作而成，这意味着您可获得最自然的亮泽发丝。这款接发配有三条带发夹的易于使用的平纬纱带，提供防护硅胶层，以垫起自然头发并防止断裂。 每条发带均采用花边纬纱结构，自然而舒适，便于您层叠混搭发件，实现各种丰盈发型。 - K.N

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸假发。由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其发夹采用隐形啮合设计，能够持久、牢固、舒适地固定假发，而所保留的角质层和独特的有机色素能够使发丝拥有亮丽的发色，使色泽极其鲜明。 佩戴简单，适合热力造型。

product_description:

Fortified with organic Bladderwrack Seaweed, sustainably-harvested off the coast of Maine, the luxurious shampoo revitalises and rejuvenates thin hair, whilst nourishing Argan Oil and Aloe leave locks healthier, thicker and fuller-looking. Delivers a relaxing fragrance of Lavender Essential Oil.

适合每天使用，蚕丝氨基酸有助于重建和修复发丝，保护发丝免受潮湿和加热的影响。 荷荷巴籽萃取物和鳄梨油具有软化和保湿作用，可舒缓毛囊，让您拥有所期待的有光泽发卷，有效控制和完美定型秀发。

product_description: 使用 AB CREW Men's Nitro Conditioner，呵护秀发。这是一款超清凉护发素，致力于软化秀发并让头皮充满活力。 该配方含有亚马逊棕榈衍生物和异国风情的蘑菇，可有效地软化秀发并即刻镇静头皮。 充满了西班牙迷迭香和薄荷的香味，让人欲罢不能。 - K.N

product_description:
Nourkrin Woman is a food supplement specially developed to help support and maintain healthy hair growth.
The hair growth cycle can be affected by a number of factors, including stress, genetics, hormones and hair styling. Nourkrin Woman has been scientifically formulated and proven to help maintain normal hair growth. It combines Marilex® with Acerola Cherry extract and D-biotin to nourish hair and promote healthier-looking tresses.

product_description:
Complete your style with the OUAI Finishing Crème; a lightweight formula developed by celebrity hair stylist, Jen Atkin. Suitable for all hair types, the effective crème is effortlessly distributed through blow-dried locks and offers an array of nourishing benefits.
The Finishing Crème is enriched with a cocktail of hair-loving ingredients, including Jojoba, Hibiscus and Jasmine oils, which work harmoniously to repair and protect the fiber, whilst enveloping hair in essential moisture.
The formula adds texture to freshly washed hair, giving it a lived-in look and an ultra-glossy finish. Protecting locks from heat styling, the luxurious crème works to smooth dry ends and leave tresses enhanced with light-reflective shine.
name: Finishing Crème 100ml

product_description: Kebelo丝绒卷发洗发水（500ml）能够抚顺毛躁的卷发。 这款令秀发重现活力的洗发水不含SLS和苯甲酸酯类，融入了丰富的椰子油、洋甘菊和藜麦，令卷发持久卷曲，柔顺不毛躁。 为秀发提供深层滋养，补充秀发必须的水分，直击受损的表皮。 期待洁净柔软、弹力丰盈的迷人头发。 - K.N.

Viviscal 女性浓发纤维 ，方便使用，使用后头发浓密亮泽，瞬间浓密蓬润。 
内含大量天然着色微静电电荷纤维，可增加头发数量，使头发浓密，遮盖白头发。打造瞬间浓密蓬润的秀发。 该农发纤维经得起风雨，可用洗发水轻松冲洗。 配有独特的涂抹装置。

product_description: Kebelo丝般柔顺护发素（250ml）专为所有发质或卷发配制，能够有效理顺、滋润秀发，令秀发顺滑到底，去除毛躁。 混合了"超级滋养成分"藜麦、苋菜和洋甘菊，令每一根发丝顺滑轻盈，带给您丝般顺滑、轻盈弹性的柔软秀发。 - K.R

適合各種髮質或毛躁髮質， Kebelo絲滑護髮素(500ml)能有效順滑保濕，同時消除毛躁，讓頭髮一順到底。 “超級食品”藜麥、莧屬植物和甘菊，共同柔順每一根髮絲，讓秀發倍感光滑、柔軟、輕盈，充滿彈性。 - KR 
 *不含防腐劑。

product_description:
Sexy Hair 魅惑金发洗发水可让您的缕缕金发保持亮泽 这款奢华的日用洗发水可有效祛除护发产品残留，让缕缕的金发、亮色秀发和银发看起来更加亮丽和极致水润。

product_description:
Treat sun-soaked tresses to TIGI's Bed Head Totally Beachin’ Summer Must Have Travel Pack. Combining four must-have hair care products, the jet-set-ready collection allows you to cleanse, condition and texturise your locks, wherever you are.
Bed Head Totally Beachin' Cleansing Jelly Shampoo (75ml)
A colour safe shampoo that works to wash away summer debris from sun-soaked tresses. Designed to expertly eliminate sweat, impurities and sand, the gentle cleansing formula lifts away the day's build-up to leave hair feeling soft, shiny and fresh. Its protective UV complex helps maintain colour vibrancy, whilst Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E leave strands feeling soft and nourished. Expect soft, shiny tresses infused with a sweet Mango and Tangerine fragrance.
Bed Head Totally Beachin' Mellow After Sun conditioner (75ml)
A colour safe conditioner that works to nourish and treat summer-drenched tresses. Designed to expertly protect and care for hair, the nourishing balm conditioner utilises a UV complex to help maintain colour vibrancy, and its dose of Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E target signs of damage for strands that feel super soft and quenched. Expect soft, shiny locks infused with a sweet Mango and Tangerine fragrance.
Bed Head Totally Beachin' Beach Freak Detangler Spray (100ml)
A milky, leave-in formula that works to soften, nourish and moisturise dry hair. Suitable for all hair types, the detangling formula intensely nourishes hair, easing out tangles for snag-free brushing and reduced breakage. Its lubricating properties make hair styling easier; every strand is left soft, lightweight and manageable. Suitable for all hair types.
Bed Head Queen Beach Salt Infused Texture Spray (100ml)
A salt-infused texturising spray that adds tousled texture and surfer-inspired waves. Enriched with Balinese Sea Salt, the leave-in spray creates long-lasting body and lends hair a tousled, beach-bound texture. Fast-dry formula.
name: Bed Head Totally Beachin' Summer Must Have Travel Pack (Worth £44.48)

這款護髮素中的SPF15 幫助頭髮抵禦日曬傷害，令髮絲閃亮豐盈，頭皮充滿健康活力。 KD

 Christophe Robin 薰衣草護髮油是一款超滋養呵護護理產品，採用特殊配方，適合所有頭髮類型。蘊含薰衣草油和棕櫚油，有助於恢復髮絲彈力，令頭髮充滿活力。

Enriched with Cucumber, the cleansing formula works to strengthen each fiber and leave hair soothed, whilst Aloe Vera delivers moisturising properties that gently hydrate the scalp. Expect thicker looking hair that is cleansed, volumised and shiny.

product_description:

這款革命性的產品系列採用特殊配方，可幫助頭髮抵禦現代生活中的日常壓力。熱造型、染色、日曬、海水和沙子都會對頭髮造成傷害，讓髮絲脆弱易斷。再長3 英寸洗髮前精華是護理的第一步，可有效抵御所有傷害，令髮絲更加強韌、富有彈性。

請注意：
如果您使用含矽護髮產品，需要先清洗頭髮，因為這些產品會阻止護理成分滲入髮絲。

它利用角蛋白植物特别配制，该成分提供人体必需的氨基酸，同时山榄果油脂和猴面包树油可软化头发，恢复头发纤维的细胞间粘合质。 该奢华乳霜加入粉红色牡丹花瓣提取物，可滋润头发，令头发润泽、健康，易于梳理。 E.N.

product_description:
Developed by celebrity hair stylist, Jen Atkin, OUAI's Repair Kit combines a trio of nourishing and replenishing hair products that work in synergy to lend your locks a healthier appearance. Helping to treat and repair damaged hair, the shampoo, conditioner and hair mask will cleanse, strengthen and intensively repair. Complete with six bobbles.
Repair Shampoo (50ml)
A nourishing shampoo that cleanses and strengthens every strand. Expertly lifting away dirt and impurities, the hair cleanser washes away grime whilst delivering a unique, Smart Technology complex to replenish moisture and fortify weakened strands. Its blend of Tamarind Seed extract and Smart Keratin help to protect against breakage, improve shine and keep colour looking vibrant. Hair looks healthier, glossier and nourished. Free from sulphates.
Repair Conditioner (50ml)
A weightless yet intensely moisturising conditioner that infuses every strand with much-needed hydration. Working to replenish damaged hair, the conditioner softens and detangles whilst protecting colour integrity. Its Smart Technology complex combines with Tamarind Seed extract and Smart Keratin to weightlessly repair neglected hair. Damaged tresses are transformed into nourished and beautifully healthy-looking locks. Free from phthalates.
Treatment Masque (30ml)
A powerful hair mask with concentrated ingredients to intensively repair, hydrate and protect. Working its magic within minutes, the intensive hair mask contains Artichoke Leaf extract to effectively seal the cuticle and combat further damage, alleviating the appearance of split ends and minimising breakage. The brand’s proprietary Smart Technology Complex infuses hair with essential Amino Acids and Keratin to help strengthen and nourish each follicle while shielding against environmental aggressors. Suitable for all hair types, the deep conditioning formula effectively reverses damage caused by heat styling, pollution and UV, resulting in locks feeling soft and replenished with a glossy shine and delicate fragrance of Rose, Bergamot and Lychee.
name: Repair Kit 130ml

Infused with wheat proteins and anti-static actives, its unique formula controls frizz and flyaways, whilst delivering a refreshing, zesty fragrance. Expect smooth, sleek and healthy-looking locks with enhanced shine. Suitable for daily use.
Lemon and Sage Conditioning Rinse (250ml)
A citrus-scented conditioning rinse that works to detangle, tame frizz and prevent split ends. Fortified with panthenol (vitamin B5) to moisturise and smoothen strands, whilst wheat protein repairs and protects from dryness. Ideal for all hair types, the conditioner promises to leave you with hydrated, luscious locks and luminous shine, without extra weight.

Suitable for all hair types, especially those craving extra support to grow stronger, fuller-looking hair, the supplement contains N-Acetyl L-Cysteine, an amino acid that provides additional strength and support; it improves hair's natural moisture-retaining ability to help maintain thickness and light-reflecting shine. Effortlessly gliding onto damp locks, the silky conditioning formula is enriched with an innovative form of Hyaluronic Acid, which is blended with Amino Acids, Biotin and B-Vitamins in order to address thinning hair and leave tresses soft, smooth and flake-free. Discover a safe and drug-free approach to hair preservation with Nourkrin Man; a daily supplement designed for men facing the prospect of hair loss and thinning.
The tablets seek to support, normalise and maintain the natural hair growth cycle by providing the correct nutrients to the follicles. The supplements contain Nourkrin’s exclusive ingredient Marilex®, Acerole Cherry Extract and Fenugreek, which work in synergy to provide the scalp with an array of Vitamins, including Vitamin C, A, B1, B2 and B3. The addition of Cod Liver Oil Extract offers a dose of Vitamin A and D.
Finished with D-Biotin, Nourkrin Man is able to contribute to the maintenance of normal hair. With continued use over a six month period, the supplements strive to restore the hair growth cycle to normal, which promotes strong and healthy hair growth, whilst discouraging thinning and loss.

來自Kebelo的天鹅绒Curls终极系列包括该品牌三种受欢迎的护发产品，可清洁、滋养和修饰卷发，同时具有头发无拳曲效果。 - K.N.
天鹅绒Curls Shampoo (250ml)
富含椰子油、洋甘菊和奎奴亚成分，提供长效、无拳曲效果，该Kebelo天鹅绒Curls Shampoo修饰并抚顺卷发。 该重焕活力配方为秀发提供深层滋养，补充秀发必须的水分，同时修复受伤表皮。 期待洁净柔软、弹力丰盈的迷人头发。
天鹅绒Curls Conditioner (250ml)
利用Kebelo天鹅绒Curls Conditioner可抚顺易拳曲的卷发。 它的保湿配方加入椰子油、洋甘菊和奎奴亚成分，为您带来效果持续、散发光泽的无拳曲卷发。 这款护发产品为秀发提供深层滋养，有效理顺、保护并强化每根发丝，令卷发散发迷人魅力，轻盈Q弹。
天鹅绒Curls塑形护发膏(100ml) 
该Kebelo天鹅绒Curls护发膏利用Perfect Curl技术与洋甘菊、有机奎奴亚和椰子油混合成分，获得完美塑形、无拳曲的卷发。 可便捷涂抹，该创新护理产品将让您拥有卓尔不凡，引人注目的卷发；秀发柔软、无额外重量而且富有弹性。
使用Cowshed 狂野牛強韌洗髮水，可讓您的秀發恢復強韌。本品不含人工發泡劑、香精或色素，這款精美的洗髮水不含苯甲酸酯，使用可持續產品在英國當地生產，讓您的秀發倍添活力。 - ED

product_description: 使用 TIGI S-Factor Smoothing Lusterizer Conditioner，转变缺乏光泽的发丝。 其独特的配方富含荷荷巴和鳄梨油，以提升光泽，令秀发充满健康活力。 这款轻盈护发素适用于所有发质，可顺滑秀发并控制毛躁和凌乱的头发，同时赋予亚洲梨和木瓜的馥郁芳香。 从发根到发梢强韧和滋润秀发，实现如丝绸般柔软的发丝。 E.N.

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions（18 英寸），获得最佳造型效果。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，深受造型师和名人青睐。
这种易于使用、可自行动手完成的假发旨在为发丝增加体量和长度，使您能够随时变换想要的造型，而无需使用各种专用工具或胶水。
这种轻巧的接发采用手工挑选的 100% 保留雷米角质层的人类发丝制作而成，这意味着您可获得最自然的亮泽发丝。这款接发配有三条带发夹的易于使用的平纬纱带，提供防护硅胶层，以垫起自然头发并防止断裂。 每条发带均采用花边纬纱结构，自然而舒适，便于您层叠混搭发件，实现各种丰盈发型。 - K.N

product_description:
TIGI Bed Head Urban Antidotes Re-Energize Conditioner是一款日常秀发急救产品，适合中性发质，必将成为您的新宠。 它能提振发质，恢复光泽，超强滋润，为您暮气沉沉的头发注入澎湃的青春能量。
TIGI Bed Head Urban Antidotes Re-Energize Conditioner可有效还原和维持秀发的完整性，并帮助平衡秀发水分含量。 理顺头发，对抗毛躁，使秀发闪耀最亮眼的光芒！ 保持头发颜色，平衡头发的天然水分。
使用说明

product_description:
Alterna魚子醬頭皮去角質護理霜富含魚子醬萃取精華和活性水果酵素，質地溫和，可去除頭皮死皮角質，清理油脂、頭皮屑，並且滋潤頭皮維持健康，深層補水保濕，用後不再乾癢，頭皮更舒爽。 
 使用方法：在使用洗髮水之前輕輕塗抹到濕潤的頭皮上，輕柔按摩。在頭皮上輕輕畫圈按摩，然後徹底沖洗。
Macadamia 造型霜质地浓稠，具有很好的定型力和质感，而且无残留。 使用这款产品抚顺零乱碎发或打造一个造型时尚、充满质感的秀发。 这款造型乳还具有蓬松效果，能够吸收多余的皮脂，因此让秀发持久保持健康光泽。  这款造型霜的主要成分是Macadamia油、摩洛哥坚果油、开心果油和巴西棕榈蜡，能够滋润、修复并保护秀发，使其散发迷人光泽。 LB
name: Natural Oil 造型霜

product_description: This Pureology Perfect 4 Platinum Conditioner (1000ml) is an intense daily conditioner that enhances brightness and shine whilst also protecting your highlighted hair from fading. Boasting a strengthening formula that fortifies fragile hair, this conditioner instantly detangles hair leaving it soft and shiny.  - E.D
name: Perfect 4 Platinum Conditioner (1000ml)

product_description:
Combat hair loss and thinning with the Nourkrin Man Value Pack; a three month supplement supply arriving in a convenient value pack. The collection contains daily supplements to support the hair growth cycle, alongside a bonus shampoo and conditioner, which further discourage loss and thinning. Healthy hair growth is supported and promoted.
Nourkrin Man (180 Tablets)
Discover a safe and drug-free approach to hair preservation with Nourkrin Man; a daily supplement designed for men facing the prospect of hair loss and thinning. The tablets seek to support, normalise and maintain the natural hair growth cycle by providing the correct nutrients to the follicles. The supplements contain Nourkrin’s exclusive ingredient Marilex®, Acerole Cherry Extract and Fenugreek, which work in synergy to provide the scalp with Vitamin C, A, B1, B2 and B3. The addition of Cod Liver Oil Extract offers a dose of Vitamin A and D. Finished with D-Biotin, Nourkrin Man is able to contribute to the maintenance of normal hair. With continued use over a six month period, the supplements strive to restore the hair growth cycle to normal, which promotes strong and healthy hair growth, whilst discouraging thinning and loss.
Shampoo and Scalp Cleanser (150ml)
The Shampoo and Scalp Cleanser is a gentle yet effective formula that helps create an optimum scalp environment to support healthy hair growth. Scientifically formulated, the solution gently cleanses away dirt and impurities whilst protecting components of the hair follicle. Its protective and stimulating properties help to improve the scalp environment and increase the appearance of hair volume.
Conditioner (150ml)
The Conditioner is clinically created to provide support for thinning hair and to help combat hair loss. Gentle enough to use every day, it’s a hair loss solution that will boost follicle strength, and your confidence. The lightweight formula provides gentle nourishment whilst making your hair soft and easy to comb. Specially formulated for damaged hair to contribute to re-growth of problem scalp areas. For best results it is suggested that a combination of Nourkin Extra Strength or Nourkrin Man Tablets are used in conjunction.
name: Man Value Pack - Contains 180 Tablets Plus Shampoo and Conditioner (2x150ml)

product_description:
Achieve healthy-looking, super sleek locks with the DHC After Bath Hair Treatment Oil; a conditioning serum that works to control frizz, tame flyaways and replenish moisture, without weighing your style down.
Fortified with a blend of olive oil, moisturising shea butter and squalane, the non-greasy oil can be applied to damp or dry hair for a calm, manageable finish with luminous shine. Transforms lack-lustre locks for smoother, softer strands and delivers an uplifting, floral fragrance of rose and geranium. E.N.
name: After Bath Hair Treatment Oil (100ml)

product_description: This luxuriously rich conditioner thickens each hair fiber with oat potein complex while protecting the hair with qadramine complex. To gain intense moisture and detangled hair.
name: Body Luxe Volumizing Conditioner (50ml)

product_description:
Complete your look with the Sachajuan Finish Styling Cream. The innovative treatment is designed as a final touch; reducing frizz and adding enviable shine.
Utilising Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, the luxurious formula delivers a natural look, as well as providing protection against heat styling such as blow drying and straighteners. Moisturising locks, the finish cream defines your finished style to leave hair frizz-free, ultra-shiny and put together.

product_description:

这款洗发水还以全新的生命起源前配方而深受青睐，可促进头皮健康，而维他命 B5 可增强秀发的柔韧性，具有保湿作用。 此外，玉米和豆类蔬菜蛋白质可定型发卷，让您拥有不毛躁的缕缕秀发。 – I.M

Shield your locks with the Colour Protect Shampoo from Sachajuan. Thoroughly cleansing, the shampoo is specially designed to prevent colour loss and ensure hair remains healthy-looking.
Utilising Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, the shampoo delivers long-lasting care and enviable shine, without weighing hair down. The cleansing formula also protects against free radicals and heat styling, ensuring coloured hair remains healthy as well as vibrant.

利用 A'kin的水稻氨基酸和小麦蛋白洗发液 修复干燥受损的头发；这款深层滋养配方旨在从发根至发梢恢复头发健康。
利用水稻氨基酸、小麦蛋白和六种植物清洁剂的功效，该轻质洗发液温和地去除杂质，同时为干渴的头发带来强效滋润。 头发将变得光滑柔顺，无拳曲，并富有光泽。

Add vibrant colour to your style with the Fudge Paintbox Hair Colourant; a semi-permanent hair dye that can be applied alone or with other shades to create a customised look.
Enriched with moisturising agents and keratin proteins, the formula stains the hair's cuticle for long-lasting effect, whilst conditioning and hydrating strands to leave hair luscious and healthy-looking with enhanced shine. Locks look bold, creative and striking after use.

Lending your hair beach-worthy bounce, the conditioner expertly nourishes and boosts natural volume. Utilising Ocean Silk Technology, it improves hair's strength, shine and softness whilst promoting textured, beach-bound tresses with long-lasting volume.

Sebastian Professional 深色定型油 ，具有营养成分，用以滋养头发。
配方丰富，内含檀香、雪松、摩洛哥坚果油等，能补充头发角质层，使秀发蓬润迷人。 配方清爽，采用 DiffusX 技术，为秀发覆上一层隐形保护膜，使秀发感觉轻盈、得到修复。 配有紫外线防护剂。

使用 Men-ü 男士定型柔亮发蜡塑造和重新塑造发型，让秀发的纹理和造型看起来更自然。 使用 Men-ü 男士定型柔亮发蜡塑造和重新塑造发型，让秀发的纹理和造型看起来更自然。
取少量 Men-ü 男士定型柔亮发蜡置于手指之间揉匀，然后均匀地涂抹在发丝，让您拥有天然纤维般的质感，定型更自然！ 一瓶小包装的 Men-ü 男士定型柔亮发蜡可使用 80 次之久！  这款发蜡可轻松洗掉，而且不会有产品残留。

Revive damaged hair with the Sublime Repair Conditioner from SHOW Beauty. The unique formula seeks to repair damaged hair, resulting in soft, enviable and full-bodied locks.
Formulated with Quinoa Protein, popular for reinforcing hair fibers and providing protection from cuticle abrasion, the treatment works to improve hair’s manageability and tensile strength. A blend of Caviar and White Truffle work harmoniously to enrich the formula with deep conditioning and revitalising qualities. The hair is left irresistibly touchable.

Enriched with Northern Linseed, Horse Chestnut and Plantain, the innovative formula helps to smooth out unwanted frizz, resulting in coloured hair that is protected, shiny and styled with ease.

Boost fine, limp hair with Time Bomb's High Profile Thicken and Lift Spray, a volumising hair formula that works to add body and bounce to flat, lifeless locks.
Formulated with a unique thickening resin, the lightweight spray creates the appearance of lifted, fuller-looking hair; lack lustre locks appear thicker with added body and movement. Never leaves hair feeling sticky or brittle.
name: Bomb High Profile Thicken and Lift Spray 150ml

product_description:
利用来自DS Laboratories的 Revita.Cor Conditioner 改善您的头发，增强自信，这款高性能头发刺激护发素可以帮助延迟脱发并支持头发再生。
帮助维持头皮活力并提供营养特性，这款高级配方含具有防护功效的化合物，如咖啡因及其他消炎成分，以延长毛囊寿命，而且它利用生物粘合剂的一种先进输送系统，令带阳离子电荷的微球体可以穿透更深、持续更长时间，以提供最大功效，即使游泳或出汗时也是如此。
加入植物干细胞，可模仿人类干细胞的可塑性以延续增长，这款头发刺激护发素将支持头发生长并保湿、恢复和维护头发。 - K.N.

product_description:
Experience pain free brushing whilst on-the-go, with the ikoo Pocket Detangling Hair Brush. The small yet effective brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp. Arriving with a practical bristle cover, the Pocket Brush is protected from dust and other dirt that can collect in your handbag.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, metallic resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
name: Pocket Detangling Hair Brush - Black/Cherry Metallic

product_description:
Catering specifically for men, the Senscience PROformance Polish Hair Pomade can be used to create sleek styles with medium hold and high shine.
Ideal for achieving classic, slicked back looks without flaking or build-up, the lightweight pomade is easy to apply and rinses out with shampoo. Controls unruly and curly hair so you can achieve your desired style with ease.
name: PROformance Polish Hair Pomade 60ml

product_description:
Experience pain free brushing whilst on-the-go, with the ikoo Pocket Detangling Hair Brush. The small yet effective brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp. Arriving with a practical bristle cover, the Pocket Brush is protected from dust and other dirt that can collect in your handbag.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.

product_description:
Phyto Huile 超润舒缓护发油（100ml）能够为秀发注入营养，改善亮泽度；还能抚顺秀发，更易于造型。 富含九大植物成分，这款营养丰富的护发油能够重塑并保护发丝结构，将让秀发变得更健康强韧，柔软丝滑。 - E.D
- 涂抹在刚洗完头后用毛巾擦干的秀发。
- 均匀地涂抹在秀发上，特别是发梢。
- 照常吹干和造型。

product_description:
Phyto Phytoplage Hair and Body After Sun Rehydrating Shampoo is an all-in-one aftersun care formula that cleanses both the skin and hair to lift away sand, salt and chlorine.
Infused with Coconut Oil, the multi-use shampoo performs a gentle yet thorough cleanse; it eliminates sunscreen residue and other impurities that can accumulate after a day in the sun. Intensely moisturising, the formula will cleanse hair and skin without stripping, promoting supple skin and silky-smooth tresses. Its cocktail of Bamboo Marrow, Kukui Oil and Wood Cellulose work in synergy to soften, prevent dryness and maintain optimum moisture levels from head to toe.
name: Phytoplage Hair and Body After Sun Rehydrating Shampoo

product_description:
Restore radiant, salon-worthy locks with Wella's Color Fresh; a semi-permanent hair dye that enhances vibrancy in between colour services.
Developed with a Care Complex of vitamins and conditioning agents, the ready-to-use formula adds depth and corrects tone, whilst innovative Tone2Shine technology delivers mirror-like shine that lasts up to ten washes. No mixing required.
name: Color Fresh Dark Natural Brunette Brown 3/07 75ml

product_description: Phytospecific Ultra-Smoothing Shampoo能令秀发洁净无杂质、柔软超顺滑。其配方补水保湿，散发海生熏衣草的香气，蕴含的硫磺、滋养矿物质和多酚成分令秀发体格强健、质地柔软。 可有效锁水保湿、提亮发色，令秀发至美至柔。 -SA

product_description:
Phytospecific Baobab Oil Bottle具有滋润和保护秀发和肌肤的多重功效，经临床证明能提高26%的整体含水率。 其成分丰富的抗氧化配方能防止断发，并更有效地保护肌肤免受阳光侵害；
由8种精油混制而成的猴面包油成分能卓效滋润和修复秀发和肌肤。 每次使用都令秀发肌肤均感觉丝般顺滑、健康亮泽。 - K.R

product_description:
Create enviable curls with the Balmain 32mm Curling Iron, a curling tong with ceramic barrel technology to achieve smooth, shiny, bouncy curls.
The 32mm barrel creates professional-looking, voluptuous curls, and its variable temperature control from 160°C to 220°C evenly distributes heat to eliminate damaging hot spots. Infused with ionic technology, the tongs emit hair-conditioning ions and far-infrared heat to preserve hair's natural moisture whilst preventing frizz for soft, sleek, hydrated-looking curls.
The curlers' anti-slip cool tip keeps fingers protected during styling, and its ergonomic handle ensures maximum comfort during the styling process. Complete with a 360° professional length power cord, 30 minute auto-shut-off and key-lock function.
name: Curling Iron - 32mm

product_description:
这款秀发定型产品是与一支理发大师团队共同专业研制而成的，适合需要强力定型和哑光效果的秀发。
本品使用了天然蜡和天然成分，并带有淡淡的香味， 这款必备定型产品所含的蜂蜡能自然柔韧地为各种长度秀发定型；同时令秀发丰盈饱满、充满质感。
name: Tonic Structure (85g)

product_description: 利用 TIGI S-Factor  Serious Shampoo 获得健康、光彩照人的头发；这是一款旨在修复和拯救受损头发的强效配方。 加入奢华蚕丝和富含欧米伽的葵花籽油，以防止进一步的头发损害，并恢复光滑、柔顺的头发，同时从发根至发梢输送营养物质，从内部修复发干。 改善缺乏光泽的头发，并提供强效保湿，让您获得清除污垢、杂质和多余油脂并深层滋润和强化的头发。 E.N.

product_description:
Enhance your blow dry with the Pro Blo AddME Curl Barrel Large, a set of six large sized ceramic coated barrels to attach to the CurlME styling tool.
Expertly designed to help you to recreate professional salon looks at home, the CurlME is an innovative hair brush with a unique detachable handle that allows the ceramic coated barrel to remain in place until hair has completely cooled to lock in big, bouncy styles.
Perfect for longer or thicker hair, this add on set provides six additional barrels as well as six clips to secure each barrel in place. Large barrels amplify volume on any length, leaving locks bouncy and smooth with a gorgeous glossy shine.
The Set Contains:
6 CurlME barrels - 6 x Large (55mm)
6 Hair Clips
Please Note: Handle not included (sold separately).
name: Blo AddME Curl Barrel - Large

product_description:
The Kérastase Reflection Masque Epais and Cool Brown Touche Chromatique Duo offers personalised care for your colour-treated hair. Combining an ink-in-care, highly concentrated hair dye formula with a rich, nourishing mask, the pair work in tandem to correct and brighten faded colour for restored softness, colour luminosity and radiance.
Touche Chromatique (10ml)
A colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique. The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your brown hair; it neutralises unwanted red undertones to enhance cool brown locks. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair, and helps prevent fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
Masque Chromatique (200ml)
A nourishing hair mask specially developed to enhance and protect the colour intensity of colour-treated or highlighted, thick hair. Promoting prolonged colour vibrancy, the deep conditioning treatment utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth with enhanced shine, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasise light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant. Expect vivid colour and light-reflecting shine, for longer. Ideal for thick, sensitised, colour-treated or highlighted hair.
name: Reflection Masque Epais and Cool Brown Touche Chromatique Duo

product_description: Phyto 9 是用於脫水秀發的保濕髮霜。本品含澳洲堅果油和植物萃取物，水潤滋養秀發，使秀發柔滑健康。

product_description:

Perfect for all hair types, six variable heat and speed settings allow you flexible styling to suit your needs, while the ergonomically balanced design enhances comfort and ease of use.
Achieve sleek, lustrous locks with professional looking results in minimal time and with maximum impact.

 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA

洗发后，将本品涂抹在湿发上，并轻轻按摩，避免接触发根。 在头发上保留最多两分钟后，彻底清洗。 理想的情况下与向日葵和山茶洗发水配合用于染过色的头发。

该款定型粉特别针对男性朋友制作。是多种专门蛋白的特殊混合，可覆盖每缕头发，使其浓密、修复秀发，令秀发看起来自然、有韧性。 本品含隐形啫喱，令秀发厚实饱满、超质感、无油光。 尤其适用于现代绅士使用。

product_description:
Kérastase 卡诗 Nutritive Fondant Magistral、卓越热滋养洗发水和 Crème Magistral 可有效护理干燥的秀发。 这款高效的三件套可有效清洁、滋养和焕活脆弱的秀发，使其恢复健康而有光泽。
Nutritive Fondant Magistral 洗发水（200ml） 
Fondant Magistral 洗发水专门用于护理高度敏感、纤细的秀发，可为发丝提供重要的营养物质，修复秀发，使其从发根到发梢都变得极致柔软，让缕缕秀发看起来更加健康。 其创新配方采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，可温和地祛除杂质，而具有复活再生作用的二苯乙醇酮树脂、神经酰胺和木糖混合物可从内部强化和调节发丝纤维。 使秀发更易于梳理，有效防止热力造型给秀发带来的损伤，每次使用都能使秀发更加平静顺滑。
卓越热滋养洗发水（250ml）
Kérastase 卡诗卓越滋养洗发水是一款超级滋养型洗发水，能使发丝恢复应有的柔软顺滑，使其更有光泽。 它非常适合极其干燥脆弱的发质，其强效配方采用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方，能够温和地清洁发丝，而二苯乙醇酮树脂、神经酰胺和木糖营养混合物可从发根到发梢强化、焕活和修复缕缕秀发。 让您拥有水润顺滑的体验，使您的秀发更易于梳理。
Nutritive Crème Magistral（150ml）
Nutritive Crème Magistral 可为发丝强化补充营养。 其强效配方的设计旨在利用皇家鸢尾 4600ppm 滋养秘方护理和显著增强发质，温和地清洁发丝。 二苯乙醇酮树脂、神经酰胺和木糖营养混合物可从发根到发梢强化、焕活和修复缕缕秀发。 发乳可使秀发更加水润、活泼而闪亮，令秀发更轻盈而易于梳理。
name: Nutritive Fondant Magistral 200ml & 卓越热滋养洗发水 250ml & Nutritive Creme Magistral 150ml

这款清洁洗发水是护发三部曲的第一步，让您拥有健康的头皮和更丰盈的秀发，通过包含绿茶提取物和薄荷油的 Activ-Renewal® 技术改善发质，令头皮更加清爽。 让秀发展现健康光泽，发质更加丰盈。 K.D.

product_description:
Deeply cleanse with the Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo; a unique treatment that creates the optimum environment for healthy re-growth and a balanced scalp.
A powerful combination of Binchotan Charcoal and vegetable-derived, micro-exfoliaors work to draw out impurities, unclog pores and remove dead skin cells and product build-up, resulting in a more balanced and refined scalp that feels fresh and clear.
Cooling extracts of Peppermint and Spearmint Oils blend with anti-septic Tea Tree Oil to minimise the feeling of itchiness and irritation, while Coconut Oil and vitamin-rich Panthenol help optimise moisture levels and deliver essential nutrients from root-to-tip.
Ideal for those with flaky, dandruff-prone scalps and safe for colour-treated hair, the pioneering shampoo ensures the scalp is left feeling supremely comfortable and replenished, with healthier looking regrowth and enhanced vitality.
name: Scalp Revival Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo 236ml

product_description:
Nanogen Fibre Sprayer 可实现最强的头发增稠效果，即刻获得更丰满的外表。 该喷雾器适合任何发质和任何性别，甚至最敏感的头皮，包含与自然头发的密度和质感完全相同的纯角质素，防止产生刺激作用。
凭借取得专利的 Kinetic™ 技术金属条，该广口瓶装载拥有 400% 静电电荷的头发增稠纤维，能更有力地粘结在头发上，甚至经历风雨和汗液都能提供持久的效果。 形成偶极电荷，确保纤维能分支出大量的柔软发丝。
该喷雾器非常适用于分型线或可见冠，拥有纤细的喷嘴，用于精确有序的涂抹；安全滑锁非常适用于旅行。 独有的 Colour Locking 技术意味着 Nanogen 纤维不会泄漏染料到皮肤上，因而可以放心使用。 E.N.
name: Fibre Sprayer Medium Brown (22.5g)

Wella Professionals Sun Express Conditioner是一款高效的护发素，能深层修复和滋养秀发，展现迷人的光滑、健康色彩以及柔软的触感。
Wella Professionals Sun Express Conditioner富含维生素E，是日晒之后的理想产品，它可以恢复天然水分含量，使秀发感觉如丝般柔滑，并得到深层护理和修复。
使用说明：

product_description:
用Joico Joifix 中度定型喷雾对秀发进行中度定型和护理。 这款非喷头发定型剂具有防潮配方，可以提供灵活的造型而不会使秀发僵硬或剥落，在各种气候条件下均可使用。
 Joifix 中度定型喷雾蕴含紫外线防护剂和泛醇，可以为秀发提供光泽，以及抗击环境的屏障，对所有发质和发型提供强力定型。

Fudge的这款不含硫酸盐的洗发水可在多达25次的使用过程中维持发色，其特有的保色成分能令发色持久如新的沙龙级效果。 - L.M.

product_description:
這款Christophe Robin 清潔发膜享有“勞斯菜斯”之稱，採用特殊配方，適合染色、挑染和敏感頭髮。
融合怡神檸檬萃取物，在溫和清潔的同時可去除角質，更加徹底地清潔頭皮。
