name: Robin 柠檬清洁发膜 (250ml)

product_description: 使用 Beauty Works Argan Serum，锁住水分。 这款活力产品采用了最优质的摩洛哥坚果油混合配方，深层滋养秀发，使其健康亮泽。 这款精华液适用于自然秀发和接发，可防止分叉并避免热力造型损伤，且不会显得颓丧。 E.N.
name: Works Argan Serum

product_description:
NIOXIN System 3 Scalp Treatment 的专门配方采用先进技术，旨在改善过薄、外观正常到纤细、染过色的头发，有助于让秀发看上去更浓密，同时控制水分平衡并使头皮焕发活力。 三步护理程序的最后一步
以增加密度的BioAmp™和Glyco-Shield™技术强化，包含White茶叶提取物和薄荷油的双屏蔽技术可保护和使头皮清爽，这款护理产品致力于增强您秀发的质地和活力，同时创造一个最佳的头皮环境。 在促进头发的浓密度的同时平滑磨破的角质层，这款免洗型配方采用了Scalp Access Delivery System™ 技术，可以向秀发补充抗氧化剂、植物成分，并提供SPF 15的保护。 Hair看起来更强壮、更厚，同时头皮也得到净化。
name: System 3 Scalp 护理液 200ml

product_description:
Effortlessly hold hair in place with the invisibobble ORIGINAL What's With The Catittude? Hair Tie; a limited-edition piece taken from the brand’s unique Circus Collection. Arriving in time for summer and festival season, the collection boasts an array of colourful creatures that guarantee to brighten any up-do.
The ‘What's With The Catittude?’ hair ties arrive in a metallic pink hue and are housed inside decorative packaging adorned with an array of feline friends. Perfect for any style or occasion, the invisibobble hair tie works to hold hair in place without the use of clips and pins.
Fun and functional, the unique, ultra-comfortable shape prevents headaches and kinks, whilst the hygienic, non-soaking design and smooth surface means the bobble stays dry even when worn on the wrist. Can be used in wet or dry hair without tangling, allowing you to create any up-do you desire.
name: Circus Collection ORIGINAL What's With The Cattitude? Hair Tie

product_description:
有了 Joico 锁色洗发水（1000ml）令秀发长效保持刚从美发沙龙出来的感觉。这款温和的护发素能有效理抚平并柔顺秀发，同时保护秀发色泽鲜明，锁色时间提升高达33％。
使用该产品清洁秀发18次后，可以保持86%的秀发色泽，让秀发更加强韧，柔软亮泽，易于打理。 特别适合红色发质，再次打理秀发之前可以保持88%的色泽。 您的秀发将保持耀人光泽，焕然如新，减缓发色流失，无须频繁地前往美发沙龙。
name: 锁色洗发水（1000ml）-（价值£43.00）

product_description:
適合髮質細、發量單薄，易脫髮質，Alterna魚子醬防脫髮洗髮露以魚子醬萃取精華結合創新酵素科技，溫和清潔並保護秀發，可有效改善老化脫髮現象，降低各種髮質傷害，恢復頭髮的青春活力與超完美觸感。獨特配方保護秀發不受周圍環境中細菌和有毒物質損害，用後秀發能持久保持自然清新，飽滿豐盈。 
 Alterna魚子醬防脫髮洗髮露富含紅三葉草生長複合物，有效防止各種脫髮因素的產生，使頭髮感覺更厚實，更濃密、更豐盈，具有健康光澤。 
使用方法：

Achieve a professional looking blow-dry with the Large Tangle Teezer Blow Styling Round Tool; an innovative brush that helps to take hair from wet to dry with minimal effort. The tool aims to deliver an enviable blow dry with natural bounce and volume. Arriving in a large size, it is best suited to those with medium to long hair lengths.
Created with intelligent teeth technology, the round brush lifts hair from the roots to create volumised results. Without pulling or tugging, the tool glides through locks, without needing to roll or wrap hair around it.
Through using the blow styling tool, excess water is eliminated from hair, which decreases the duration of drying time significantly. The tool seeks to discourage the use of straighteners or tongs by delivering all-over shine and smoothness. Expect a big and bouncy blow dry.
name: Teezer Blow Styling Round Tool - Large

product_description:
蒂芝天橋步伐濃密組合兩件裝， 價值¥429.00 ，專為纖細稀疏髮質組合推出，內含一瓶洗髮水和一瓶護髮素，可讓您的秀發倍感厚實蓬鬆。使用後，可讓秀發倍感厚實濃密，更具動感。 - LM 
 包含：
name: 蒂芝天桥步伐浓密组合两件装 - 价值 £49.45

product_description:
傑森天然荷荷巴油洗髮露採用特殊配方，在緩解頭皮幹癢問題的同時為頭髮補充營養，溫和去除可導致頭屑、發癢和脫髮問題的皮脂沉積。令頭髮富有光澤、充滿彈性。 
傑森天然荷荷巴油洗髮露蘊含獨有的planthenol-3、蛋白質和氨基酸，純植物萃取物、維生素和礦物質深層保濕，令髮絲恢復強韌。這款獨特的洗髮露蘊含植物維生素B5，可深入滲透毛乾和髮根，提供持久保濕，減少髮梢開叉，同時令髮絲濃密，易於打理。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森天然荷荷巴油洗发露(473ml)

product_description:
NIOXIN System 2 Scalp Treatment 适合稀疏自然发质的 2 号头皮护理液是 NIOXIN 丽康丝三步护发体系的最后一步，它是一种高效的创新型护理液。 经过专门设计，有助于使正常及偏纤细的自然头发变得更厚，它所含的抗氧化剂和植物成分协同工作，以保持一个更清新的头皮环境。
配方中采用了Activ-Renewal® ，BioAMP®和Scalp Access Delivery System®技术，这款护理产品使秀发更加浓密，同时增加每一根发丝的强度，减少脱发和破损；其薄荷油、White茶叶提取物的组合给头皮超清爽的感觉。 还含有额外添加的SPF 15以抵御有害的太阳射线。 您将拥有富有光泽的浓密秀发，同时头发也重新焕发了活力。
name: System 2 Scalp护理液 200 ml

無酒精配方，防止肌膚過度乾燥，並形成隔熱層，保護髮絲免受環境壓力影響。 
 風格：緊緻定型力，髮絲煥現緊緻亮澤

The tool aims to deliver an enviable blow dry with natural bounce and volume. Arriving in a smaller size, it is best suited to those with short to medium hair lengths.
Created with intelligent teeth technology, the round brush lifts hair from the roots to create volumised results. Without pulling or tugging, the tool glides through locks, without needing to roll or wrap hair around it.
Through using the blow styling tool, excess water is eliminated from hair, which decreases the duration of drying time significantly. The tool seeks to discourage the use of straighteners or tongs by delivering all-over shine and smoothness. Expect a big and bouncy blow dry.

这款轻质的洗发水非常适合经过染发处理的秀发，它采用日本氨基酸强化复合物为原料，有助于防止断发和发色暗沉，防止褪色，让缕缕秀发充满活力而有光泽，使其看起来更加健康。

Lock Stock & Barrel 85 克拉的多用途美容黏土，高亮泽、超大装。 这种无油光黏土富含优质啫喱，令秀发定型持久， 您一定会满心欢喜。 非常适合手指造型或可作为功效强大的结构风格。

product_description:
適合髮色暗淡，無光澤，受損發，易老化髮質，Alterna竹防曬鎖色深層保濕髮膜萃取天然有機竹精華，超滋養成分，用後秀發能保持健康強韌，是適合每週使用的完美鎖色發膜。 
專為護色鎖色設計的滋養保護配方，Alterna竹防曬鎖色深層保濕髮膜精選喀拉哈里沙漠甜瓜精華，強效鎖色快速修復損傷，預防髮絲顏色駁落，有效延長髮乾中色素細胞的壽命，最大程度緩解髮絲光老化痕跡。 Alterna竹防曬鎖色深層保濕髮膜可深層滋養乾枯秀發，用後秀發能持久保持自然清新的色澤和抵抗UV紫外線照射損傷，帶給髮絲最高級別的安全保護。 
使用方法：

Treat dry, damaged hair to the Mane 'n Tail Deep Moisturizing Conditioner; a weightless formula dedicated to repairing, strengthening and hydrating from root to tip.
Fortified with natural proteins and vitamins, the rejuvenating conditioner replenishes lost moisture, improves elasticity, and combats the damage caused by heat styling and environmental factors. Restores soft, smooth hair with healthy-looking shine.
name: 'n Tail Travel Size Deep Moisturizing Conditioner 60ml

product_description:
label.men的头皮香波是一种温和的日常洗浴乳，旨在使头皮和头发看上去和感觉上健康。 这款香波适合所有类型的头发，其配方中有独特的eleMENts复合物，所含的植物成分有缓和作用，可刺激头发生长。 微粉化技术和乙酰四肽-3这种关键成分能加固和增密头发。 体验一头更浓密的头发和无头皮屑的头皮。 E.N. 
使用说明：涂抹于湿发上，揉起泡沫，然后彻底冲洗。

用L'Anza Healing Style造型Dry 泥 (100g) 令您的发型整天保持不变。 这款多任务发泥可以强力定型，令秀发变得丰盈饱满，而不会感到油腻或带有粘性。
其配方富含润肤的巴西坚果油和L'Anza的Keratin疗愈体系，可修复损伤区域，深层滋润秀发。 它富含的仙人掌提取物，还可以提供高达 260℃ 的过热保护，以及紫外线防护剂，可令您的头发免受太阳自然光线的损害。 使用说明： 将本品涂抹到湿润的头发上，按照需要打造发型。
name: Healing Style造型Dry泥 (100g)

product_description:
KeraCare 头皮干痒滋润护发素将会滋润您的秀发与头皮，还有助于减缓干燥、瘙痒和头屑状况，令秀发柔软顺滑。 配方轻柔温和，具有清爽舒缓的功效，能够解开打结的发丝，让秀发更易于打理，一梳到底。
未处理过的自然秀发和经过烫染的秀发均适用，这款保湿护发素能够镇静敏感头皮并重塑发丝，以减少损伤和断裂。 - L.M.
name: 头皮干痒滋润护发素（950ml）

product_description:
Phyto 發朵PhytoCyane 補發療效精華蘊含葡萄籽油提取物和銀杏，可保護煥活頭髮，莢蓮花成分可加快營養交換，促進角蛋白生成。這款發朵精華可促進血液循環，保護頭髮和毛囊球部周圍區域，防止脫髮，促進髮根生長，同時減緩白髮形成。 
使用說明：
name: 发朵 PhytoCyane 补发疗效精华 (12 x 7.5ml)

product_description:
使用Evo Liquid Rollers Curl Balm（200ml）来任意打理您的波浪卷发。 此款质地浓厚的奢华发霜可以打造并定型您的卷发，同时改善卷毛的情况，使您的秀发具有弹性，富有光泽。
此款华丽的产品具有清新的花香气味，能够让您的发丝全天散发出好闻的气息。此外，本产品可以滋养和润湿您的秀发，让您的卷发柔软水嫩，使其更加易于打理。 - L.M.使用说明：
name: Liquid Rollers Curl Balm（200ml）

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸隐形®夹式固定假发。 由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，能从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其固定装置配备有一个纤细的丝网，带有四根纬线，模拟秀发的自然生长方式，能够实现持久的牢固固定，让您舒适佩戴。 它经过手工加工制成，保留有角质层，其独特的有机色素使发丝拥有亮丽的光泽和极致的发色活泼性，令秀发更加顺滑而有光泽，使其看起来更浓密丰盈。 适合热力造型。
name: Works Jen Atkin 隐形夹式固定假发 18 英寸——比佛利山庄 JA5

product_description:
NIOXIN System 5 Scalp Treatment是一种有效和创新性的免洗型的治疗，专门用于非常纤细、中等到粗糙、天然或经化学处理的头发，是NIOXIN三步护理系统的最后一步。 经过专门设计，有助于使您的秀发变得强壮、光滑和滋润，它所含的抗氧化剂和植物成分协同工作，以保持一个更清新的头皮环境。
配方中采用了Glyco Shield®，Smoothplex®和Transactive Delivery System®等多种技术，该护理方法会使秀发愈加饱满，同时增加每一根发丝的强度，减少脱发和破损；它的薄荷油、White茶叶提取物及纯净剂的组合有助于消除堵塞毛囊的残留物，给头皮超清爽的感觉。 您将用于富有光泽、滋润和更浓密的秀发，同时头发也重新焕发了活力。
name: System 5 Scalp 护理液 200ml

product_description:
Achieve healthy and manageable locks with the Detangling Hair Brush from Christophe Robin. Crafted with natural boar bristles, the Hair Brush ensures gentle brushing, keeping the hair free from damage. The brush utilises a traditional French method, boasting bristles of varying lengths which effortlessly glide through hair, leaving locks detangled and ultra-shiny.
Necessary to stimulate blood circulation, regular brushing can contribute toward healthy hair growth. Brushing tresses from root to tip evenly distributes the natural oils in hair and subsequently protects the fiber against damaging external factors.
name: Robin Detangling Hair Brush

product_description:
Energise limp, lifeless locks with the KMS AddVolume Leave-In Conditioner; a deeply hydrating, body-boosting formula that delivers long-lasting, weightless volume.
Fortified with an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the no-rinse conditioner moisturises and detangles hair, whilst infusing strands with body and bounce for easier styling. Hair is stronger, thicker and fuller-looking with a salon-worthy finish.
name: Add Volume Leave-In Conditioner 150ml

product_description: Combat frizz and enhance shine with the Oscar Blandi Jasmine Oil. Suitable for all hair types, the weightless formula contains a Jasmine Calming Complex that delicately balances Jasmine Oil, Sweet Almond and Vitamin E to intensively nourish locks, strengthen each individual follicle and seal cuticles for minimised split ends. Just a few drops of the rich serum leave hair feeling soft and sleek with mirror-like shine.
name: Blandi Jasmine Oil Serum 15ml

product_description:
Viviscal Man 6 Month Supply（360 片）旨在促进和维持秀发健康生长，专为男士的头皮设计。 含锌，经科学证明可维持头发健康生长，生物素添加创新深海鱼蛋白 AminoMar C™ 复合物。这些营养剂可使用三个月。 K.D.
建议每日用量：一日 2 片，至少服用 3-6 个月（早晚各一片，饭后用水吞服）。 此后，为保持头发健康生长，视需要一天服用 1-2 片。 我们建议 Viviscal Gentle Shampoo and Viviscal Moisturising Conditioner 与 Viviscal Man 补充剂配合使用。
name: Man 6 Month Supply Tablets（360 片）

product_description:
Add enviable bounce and fullness to hair with the Luxury Volume Shampoo from SHOW Beauty. The lightweight formula lifts the hair from the roots for a volumised look.
Formulated with a blend of Wheat Protein based Copolymers, renowned for their volume boosting qualities, the shampoo offers weightless body and improved manageability for tresses. Infused with Caviar and White Truffle extracts, the treatment also provides intense nourishing and conditioning properties, leaving hair incredibly smooth.
name: Beauty Luxury Volume Shampoo 200ml

product_description: Achieve the perfect up-do with the Popband London Hair Ties; a pack of five bobbles in a range of designs. Fun and functional, the unique, super-stretchy hair accessories allow you to create your desired style without dents, kinks or uncomfortable tightness. Ideal for any style, occasion, or wearing on your wrist as an attractive bracelet.
name: London Hair Ties - Fruit Burst

product_description:
用Wella专业版柔性固定霜创造独特的发型，该品牌倾情打造创新性的护发产品。 适合男性和女性的长短不同的头发。 这款质地柔软的固定霜配方中有巴西棕榈蜡，提供了强力支持，可以被成形和塑形，以满足个人的发型偏好。 E.N. 
使用指南： 搽少量到手中。 抹在干头发上，从发中抹到发梢。 打造心仪造型。

Achieve bouncy, defined curls with the Elnett Satin Strong Hold Curl Crème Mousse from L'Oréal Paris. Boasting the hold of a mousse but with the care of a delicate cream, the mousse works to provide humidity protection and frizz prevention, leaving hair tamed and incredibly smooth. The innovative formula delicately melts on the fiber, providing lightweight, non-greasy nourishment to curls.
name: Paris Elnett Satin Strong Hold Curl Crème Mousse 200ml

product_description:
為挑選色號困難的人們提供的一款理想的產品，這款產品色板提供了3個色號選擇，幫助你和你本身的髮色搭配，在你決定買全套產品之前。 
這款發片使用的是最好的雷米真人頭髮，同時保存了頭髮的角質層，但是經過處理能夠防止分叉。髮束是精緻巧妙的鏈接在一起，防止分離。使發片能夠自然的增加長度，發量。
name: Works 100%雷米颜色色板-色号 深发色系列

product_description:
曾经面临染发发色难以清除的烦恼？ 不要再观望了！ 这款 Louise Galvin hair colour remover 让您在家就能轻松解决染发剂问题。 本品只需 3 个简单的步骤即可清除永久性染发剂，在几分钟内就能还您自然发色！ 同时还能让秀发做好进一步染色的准备 - 完美地避免新的发色中不需要的色调。 本产品安全环保。 LB
使用说明：混合活化剂和卸妆水，涂抹于秀发上。 使其在发丝上停留 20 分钟。 彻底冲洗至少十分钟，再使用护理后缓冲剂。
name: Galvin Hair Colour Remover

product_description:
TIGI Bed Head 活力护发素 ，使头发焕发光釆，光亮顺滑。 内含葵花籽油和乳酸等成分。配方独特，可防紫外线及造型中的热浪对头发造成的损害，使秀发从发根至发梢都健康亮泽。
内含的泛醇，可提高头发数量和弹性，深度滋润头发，防止头发分叉，让头发营养充分，如明镜般闪亮。 其他成分如：甜橙、柠檬、野生覆盆子和闪闪发亮的西柚等，使秀发充满活力，散发出特有的香味，提升发质及发感。 E.N.
name: Bed Head 活力护发素 (200ml)

product_description:
Get gorgeous glossy locks with the BaByliss Diamond Heated Smoothing Brush. An innovative and easy-to-use styling tool, the cushioned brush features flexible taming bristles to detangle and smooth as well as heated ceramic straightening fins that help straighten as you comb.
With three heat settings to help create the styles you want with ease, it quickly heats up to up to 200°C. Suitable for all hair types, the ceramic fins are infused with diamond and feature a super ionic conditioning system, which works to instantly calm frizz and boost smoothness. Simply brush for quick, easy straightening and a radiant healthy shine.
name: Diamond Heated Smoothing Brush - Black

product_description:
Achieve enviable shine with the Gloss and Vibrance Conditioner from MÁDARA. The luxurious conditioner works to leave locks in tip top condition, preventing dry ends and enhancing gloss.
Enriched with Northern Birch and Cranberry, the rich formula provides nourishment and strength to the fiber. The scalp is left feeling calm whilst the hair is left visibly silky smooth, with improved manageability.
name: Gloss and Vibrancy Conditioner 200ml

product_description:
Experience pain free brushing whilst on-the-go, with the ikoo Pocket Detangling Hair Brush. The small yet effective brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp. Arriving with a practical bristle cover, the Pocket Brush is protected from dust and other dirt that can collect in your handbag.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
name: Pocket Detangling Hair Brush - White Classic

product_description:
Experience pain free brushing whilst on-the-go, with the ikoo Pocket Detangling Hair Brush. The small yet effective brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp. Arriving with a practical bristle cover, the Pocket Brush is protected from dust and other dirt that can collect in your handbag.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, metallic resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
name: Pocket Detangling Hair Brush - Black/Soleil Metallic

product_description:
利用来自DS Laboratories的 Revita.Cor Conditioner 改善您的头发，增强自信，这款高性能头发刺激护发素可以帮助延迟脱发并支持头发再生。
帮助维持头皮活力并提供营养特性，这款高级配方含具有防护功效的化合物，如咖啡因及其他消炎成分，以延长毛囊寿命，而且它利用生物粘合剂的一种先进输送系统，令带阳离子电荷的微球体可以穿透更深、持续更长时间，以提供最大功效，即使游泳或出汗时也是如此。
加入植物干细胞，可模仿人类干细胞的可塑性以延续增长，这款头发刺激护发素将支持头发生长并保湿、恢复和维护头发。 - K.N.
name: Laboratories Revita.Cor Conditioner (500ml)

product_description:
Restore radiant, healthy-looking locks with David Mallett's Mask No.1 L'Hydration; a deeply nourishing treatment developed specifically for dull, dehydrated hair.
Fortified with Keravis, a vegetable-based protein complex, the creamy formula penetrates over-processed hair to repair and strengthen at a molecular level, whilst restoring shine and leaving you with smooth, supple strands from root to tip. Combats damage caused by environmental aggressors so you can experience revitalised, replenished tresses that are bursting with moisture. Suitable for weekly use.
name: Mallett Mask No.1 L'Hydratation 500ml

product_description: Hairbond  专业定型 发蜡，打造各种发型。 这款定型发蜡内含五种支撑力中的四种强效支撑力，尤其适用于卷发、粗糙的或厚密的头发。 该款发蜡适用于潮湿或干性发质，散发出深色血橙的香味。 – E.W.
name: ml）

product_description:
无论是是金发还是白发，使用Tigi Catwalk Fashionista Violet Shampoo（750ml）后都可让秀发展现靓丽风采。  该洗头水不含硫酸盐，可温和地清理掉卷发上多余的油脂和杂质，同时减少可使金发显得暗沉无光的黄铜色和黄色。
该产品富含紫罗兰、珍珠提取物和米浆，可以亮泽和修复您的秀发，从而您就可以更长时间里有那种"只是漂过"的感觉。 - L.M.
name: Catwalk Fashionista Violet Shampoo (750ml)

product_description:
The Ultra-Sleek Blow Out Styling Mist from Giovanni shields hair from blow drying heat damage while enhancing volume and bounce.
Infused with a moisture rich, Dual Smoothing Complex of Phyto-Keratin and Argan Oil, the heat protecting spray delivers essential nourishment and moisture without weighing it down. Each individual strand is strengthened and smoothed, with frizz and tangles diminished. Locks are left feeling hydrated and more manageable, with replenished lustre and shine.
name: Ultra-Sleek Blow Out Styling Mist 118ml

product_description:
Pump up the volume with Giovanni's More Body Hair Thickener, a volumising formula that works to enhance body whilst sealing split ends.
Utilising Eco Chic Technology™ which synergises beauty from the elements with science, the gel textured solution combines proteins and botanicals to help thicken the appearance of hair whilst boosting shine and body. Hair is left smoother, conditioned and volumised.
name: More Body Hair Thickener 250ml

product_description: Give lacklustre locks a boost with the Root 66 Max Volume Spray from Giovanni. Designed for use on damp hair, the lifting spray raises roots to add enviable volume to hair. Allowing for directional control, the volume spray will leave hair big and bouncy.
name: Root 66 Max Volume Spray 250ml

product_description:
Treat your locks to Balance Me's Protect and Shine Shampoo; a lightweight, sulphate-free formula that works to cleanse, refresh and revitalise strands from root to tip.
Infused with Aloe Vera, Black Pepper and Chamomile, the foaming shampoo effortlessly eliminates impurities without stripping the hair's natural oils. Soothes and protects the scalp, whilst enhancing shine and strengthening weak hair to leave it smooth, glossy and healthy-looking after use.
name: Me Protect and Shine Shampoo 280ml

product_description:
The GNV 2chic U-Volume Super Potion from Giovanni is a leave in styling serum that transforms thin, limp and lifeless hair with fierce fullness and ultimate volume.
Fortified with a Dual Volumizing Complex of nourishing Papaya extract and smoothing Tangerine Butter, it smooths and moisturizes individual strands without leaving a greasy residue, helping to combat frizz and limit breakage. Achieve maximum volume and lustrous shine with this powerful treatment.
name: GNV 2chic U-Volume Super Potion 150ml

product_description:
用 L'Anza Healing Smooth 亮泽 Shampoo (1000ml) 消除乱发，令秀发光滑亮泽。 这款产品采用了 Keratin 疗愈体系，可以瞬时密封、修复和保护秀发，令秀发光滑不毛躁。
同时，Organic 薏苡仁有助于控制卷发和波浪发，如此可以打造丝毫不乱的超直光滑的发型。 这款乳状洗发水蕴含丰富奢华的成分，可有效清除杂质，同时令秀发亮泽柔顺。 使用说明：
name: Healing Smooth 亮泽 Shampoo (1000ml) - （价值82.50 英镑）

product_description:
Men Rock醒脑须皂温和洁净肌肤，去除油脂并洗去尘垢，使胡须清新爽洁，该品牌特有的西西里柠檬香气让胡须带上淡淡清香。 配方中含有的咖啡因活性成分可瞬间赋予胡须能量，给它锦上添花。 E.N. 
Men Rock是一个英国品牌，出产一系列高品质修容产品，给您一部造型完美的健康胡须。
 
使用方法：取少量涂到湿胡须上，搓出泡沫，再清洗。
name: Rock西西里柠檬与咖啡因醒脑须皂

product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results from home with the L'Hydratation Travel Kit from David Mallett. Combining a fragrance free shampoo and conditioner, the duo work in tandem to cleanse, hydrate and revitalise locks from root to tip. Housed in a zipped travel bag.
Shampoo No.1 (50ml)
A highly concentrated, rejuvenating formula developed for normal and dry hair. Infused with refined Macadamia Nut Oil, the regenerating shampoo creates a light lather to eliminate impurities, whilst allowing beneficial nutrients to penetrate deep into hair that has been damaged by blow-drying, styling or chemical treatment. Expect soft, healthy-looking locks with restored radiance and vitality.
Conditioner No.1 (50ml)
A weightless, creamy formula that penetrates deep into hair cuticles to replenish moisture lost by styling, chemical treatments or environmental aggressors. Harnessing the powers of Keravis, a vegetable-based protein complex, the regenerating conditioner reinforces and protects the hair surface, whilst preventing residue build-up to leave you with smooth, sleek strands and enhanced shine. Suitable for even the most sensitive scalps.
name: Mallett L'Hydratation Travel Kit

product_description:
TIGI Bedhead for Men Clean Up Daily Shampoo 适合清洗所有护发产品时使用。 这款洗发水能够清洗秀发，增加光泽度，日常保湿秀发，薄荷刺激头皮，产生凉爽感。 抗氧化剂Saw Palmetto天然激发毛囊，令头发保持健康。 洗发水散发薄荷和罗勒香味，给您一个清爽的清晨。 LB
使用说明： 起泡，按摩进头皮，冲洗干净。 然后涂抹 Clean Up Peppermint Conditioner。
name: Bed Head for Men Clean Up Daily Shampoo (750ml)

product_description:
Wet Brush for Men 可轻松消除湿发打结和缠绕，毫无痛感。 这款顺发梳具备纤细、强韧、富于弹性的 Intelliflex™ 刷毛，适合各种发质；刷毛尖具备 SofTips™，用于按摩头皮，刺激毛囊循环。
这些 Intelliflex™ 刷毛足够坚韧，能清除打结；亦足够灵活，不伤头发和头皮；并被设计为在每次刷过之后能恢复到原有形状，有助于减少头发断裂和受损。 这款多功能发刷还可用于干发、假发和接发。 - L.M.
name: Brush for Men - Carbon

product_description: 以拳击为主题的品牌，拥有一系列高品质的美容产品，肯会给您带来一个引入注目的形象。 这款现代化而又传统的Uppercut Deluxe牌男士头梳有助于您保持一个完美的发型。 为衣着考究、外表整洁的人而准备的一个可放在口袋中的梳子，梳齿宽窄适度并呈圆形，让人在感到舒适的同时保持整洁的形象。 E.N.
name: Deluxe Men's头梳 - 龟甲壳制

product_description: Phytospecific Deep Repairing Cream Bath蕴含牛油果油和药蜀葵精华，补水保湿，滋养护发，特别适合非常干燥、易断或受损的头发。 持续48小时强效护理干枯受损头发，滋养脆弱发丝，改善强度和韧度，令秀发更强韧、更健康、更闪亮。 -SA
name: Deep Repairing Cream Bath (200ml)

product_description:
Help to nourish and condition your hair with TIGI Catwalk Fashionista Violet Mask (580g), that’s specially formulated for blondes and highlights. This colour safe hair treatment helps to protect and restore your locks, producing a smooth and high-shine finish. 
Boasting multiple smoothing and light reflecting ingredients, the hair mask delivers a stunning, bright radiance to blond or highlighted hair. Your hair will be protected against heat, breakage and environmental damage, whilst violet toners are added to reduce brassiness. – N.P.
name: Catwalk Fashionista Violet Mask (580g)

product_description:
The Foxy Curls Screw It Curl Hydrating Gel Oil from TIGI Bed Head is a unique, leave-in styling treatment specifically designed for curly hair in need of a boost.
Enriched with Glycerin and detangling agents, the jelly-textured oil delivers intensive moisture and conditioning, working to penetrate the hair fibre from within to keep hair looking healthy and glossy with a sleek, knot-free finish.
The addition of a Frizz-Fighting Complex smoothes the outer layer of each follicle to instantly tame flyaways and frizziness, with Babassu and Brazil Nut Oils adding deluxe nourishment. Complete with a delectable Fruit Twist fragrance, it leaves locks looking revitalised and radiant with a brilliant shine.
name: Bed Head Foxy Curls Screw It Curl Hydrating Gel Oil 100ml

product_description:
TIGI Bed Head 炫彩女神护发素 ，武装头发、对抗褪色。 这款保湿护发素尤其适用于活泼的红色和前卫的深褐色头发，使头发柔软亮泽。
TIGI Bed Head 炫彩女神护发素，不含硫酸盐，可修复秀发。洗发之后，能保持头发鲜艳的颜色和超级闪亮的外观。 尤其适用于染过色的头发。
使用说明：
name: Bed Head 炫彩女神护发素（750 ml）

product_description:
使用 Nanogen Fibres Cinnamon (30g) 打造丰满浓密的秀发。 100％ 纯角蛋白纤维具有天然的外观和手感，轻松与您自己的秀发融合，打造丰满浓密的秀发。
专利技术配制而成，确保 400％ 强效粘合，双极充电电荷可实现最优厚化。安全产品，可每天使用。
name: Hair Thickening Fibres Cinnamon (30g)

product_description: Phytospecific Curl Hydration Shampoo特别适合自然卷发，其成分丰富的配方能清洁滋润干枯发卷，恢复水分，去除杂质。 这款洗发水质地温和，蕴含植物骨髓、澳洲坚果油、木槿和金盏花，能有效减少翘发； 补水保湿，强化头发纤维，令发卷充满弹性不打结，同时保护秀发免受外界侵害。
name: Curl Hydration Shampoo (150ml)

product_description:
Maximise and brighten blonde, highlighted and grey hair with the Expert Colour Care Platinum Supersize Shampoo from Jo Hansford.
Exclusively developed in her Mayfair salon and utilising advanced technologies, the lightweight, sulphate-free formula works to eliminate dirt, oil and impurities while infusing locks with essential moisture and vitamins, with a violet colouring to counteract uneven, brassy and yellow tones.
Fortified with the exclusive Colour Care Complex and Anti-Fade formula, it contains Sweet Blue Lupin peptides that have been scientifically proven to prolong hair colour vibrancy and tone for up to 30 washes, while Iselux LQ delivers effective cleansing without dulling colour.
Concentrated extract of Sunflower Seed combats free radical damage and enhances hairs natural elasticity, plus the addition of Keratec, a unique keratin-based ingredient, creates a protein shield to smooth the cuticle and limit environmental aggressors. Expect luminous, clarified locks with natural looking, enhanced colour and shine.
 Free from sulfates.
name: Hansford Expert Colour Care Platinum Supersize Shampoo (1000ml)

product_description:
Philip B去屑舒緩洗髮水2代快速消除頭皮瘙癢，舒緩頭皮，創新配方包含植物萃取成分：茶樹、蘆薈、鼠尾草和杜松子，不會刺激頭皮，使頭皮感受到舒適和清爽。 
獨特有效的配方，平衡、紓緩及滋潤頭髮，能保濕及紓緩頭皮，抑制頭皮屑，使頭髮更加堅韌健康，長效補水使頭髮更加柔軟光滑有光澤，不會傷害經過角蛋白處理、染色處理的頭髮。
name: B 去屑舒缓洗发水2代（220ml）

product_description:
使用 Jack Black Hair and Scalp Conditioner，为稀疏的头发赋予活力。这种保湿配方可增稠和滋润秀发，同时保持头皮的最佳健康状态。
这款丰盈护发素拥有 PureScience® 配方，融合了天然植物和经认证的有机成分，有助于您获得更丰盈、健康的亮泽秀发。 茶树叶油有助于减少头皮刺激和干燥，而罗勒叶和维生素原 B5 提供抗菌功效，提升丰盈度和光泽度。 不会让头发显得颓丧。 - K.N
美国生产。
name: Black Hair and Scalp Conditioner (295ml)

product_description: HeadBlade 的 Ghost 剃刀是一种新颖的剃头刀，通过特有的人体工学设计打造而成，可舒适地握在手中，并且可以毫不费力地在头上滑动。 只须用一个手指沿着头皮引导这种剃刀，不需要施加压力，即可拥有美容院那种完美的光头。 K.D.
name: Ghost 剃刀

product_description: 使用 Proraso Moustache Wax，任何造型都有可能实现。 柔软须蜡是胡须造型良品，可打造自然造型或有趣的八字胡造型，无论哪种造型都会吸引羡慕的目光。 檀香木、桉树、地中海柑橘和焦糖的香味将停留在肌肤上。 可为任何造型增添趣味。 A.B.
name: Moustache Wax

product_description:
打造出顺滑，柔软，丰盈的秀发。这款独特的套装包含专业头发滋养护色油和专业深层密集修复发膜，给予你的秀发让人惊叹的光泽。这款发油含有阿甘油，荷荷巴油，石榴油与杏仁油，使秀发拥有完美的滋润度，柔软度与光泽度。同时这款密集修复发膜能即时滋养发丝，使头发颜色看起来更加健康。-SA
这个套装包含:
Jo Hansford 专业头发滋养护色油15ml 这款不油腻的发油中含有许多珍稀又高效的成份，包括石榴提取物，阿甘油，卡兰贾树油，荷荷巴油，杏仁提取物，能够滋养头发，给予发丝迷人的光泽。 
Jo Hansford专业深层密集修复发膜 150ml专为修复受损发丝，提供长效滋养而设计，使秀发闪亮顺滑。这款发膜适合修复脆弱的发丝，可每日使用。
name: Hansford 专业头发护色油（15ml）&专业深层密集修复发膜

product_description:
超效洁发，使秀发更柔韧更易打理，焕发出顺滑柔软的华丽神采。
本品能为热力造型打好基础， 其独特配方能卓效完成秀发基础护理，让您可以放心打造完美持久的发型。
使用说明：
name: California FreeShape Shampoo (300ml)

product_description:
这款Wella Professionals Brilliance三件套是专为浓密粗糙的秀发设计的，它包含洗发水和护发素，配合使用可以深层清洁、滋养染过色的头发。 它采用了创新的三重融合技术，可滋养秀发，令秀发富有光泽、充满活力。
用Brilliance Treatment确保发色鲜艳大胆。 只需洗发后使用，留存5 分钟，然后彻底冲洗，即可取得立竿见影的效果。
该套装包括以下产品： 
Wella Professionals Brilliance Shampoo（适合粗糙、染过色的Hair 250ml）用 Wella Professionals Brilliance Shampoo （适合粗糙染过色的 Hair）获得丰富鲜活的发色。 这款悉心呵护的轻型香波含有革命性的三重融合技术和华贵的钻石粉，非常适合粗犷浓密的头发，它滋养、顺滑和保护头发的同时保持耀眼的色彩强度。
Wella Professionals Brilliance Colour 增色Conditioner （适合粗糙乱 Hair 200ml）用 Wella Professionals Brilliance Colour 增色 Conditioner （适合粗糙乱 Hair）驯服凌乱的头发。 这款护发素的设计用途是给过度护理的干燥头发补水，它融汇了革命性的三重融合技术，增强了色彩，使粗糙的头发充满鲜活的光泽，并能自由流动。
Wella Professionals Brilliance Treatment （适合粗糙染过色的 Hair 150ml）Wella Professionals Brilliance Treatment（适合粗糙染过色的 Hair） 采用了奢华钻石粉和创新的三重融合技术，可以恢复秀发的颜色并使之焕然一新，同时提供滋养和保护，使其看起来有光泽。
name: Professionals Brilliance 三件套（适合粗糙染过色的 Hair）- Shampoo, Conditioner & Treatment

product_description:
Beauty Works 与知名发型设计师 Jen Atkin 联合创作 18 英寸隐形®夹式固定假发。 由优质瑞路美丝发业手工制作而成，能够双倍牢固地固定假发，掩饰较短的秀发，纬线固定夹可使秀发拥有一致的长度，能从发根到发梢丰盈秀发。
能够与真发无缝融合，让您感觉不到是假发，其固定装置配备有一个纤细的丝网，带有四根纬线，模拟秀发的自然生长方式，能够实现持久的牢固固定，让您舒适佩戴。 它经过手工加工制成，保留有角质层，其独特的有机色素使发丝拥有亮丽的光泽和极致的发色活泼性，令秀发更加顺滑而有光泽，使其看起来更浓密丰盈。 适合热力造型。
name: Works Jen Atkin 隐形夹式固定假发 18 英寸——金发女郎 613/24

product_description:
利用来自label.men的Scalp滋补剂促进头发健康生长。 该品牌的创新元素混合物由独特植物成分配置而成，包括薄荷、印度檀香和新西兰茶树，该抚慰滋补剂可刺激毛囊活性，令头发更浓密、丰盈。
适合敏感头皮使用，法国橡木提供针对头发早衰的抗氧化保护，而甜菜植物成分可促进头发生长。 加入维生素C以增加头发光泽以及具有滋润功效的维生素B5从根部滋补发丝。 头发恢复活力、健康调理、滋润保湿，并散发持久清新香气。 E.N.
name: Scalp滋补剂(150ml)

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Elixir Ultime Trio，呵护秀发；丰盈洗发水、多功效护发霜和滋养油，富含美发油脂，可从发根至发梢恢复秀发亮泽并提供深层滋养。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain (250ml)
Elixir Ultime 是一款非常值得拥有、如金般纯净的奢华轻盈洗发水；经过精心设计，适用于所有发质，让您获得沙龙级妆效。 这款富含油脂的洗发水可为您提供最奢华的清洁体验，让您拥有皇室般感受，并呈现散发镜面般光泽的丝滑秀发。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime Crème Fine (150ml)
这款多功效护发霜含有白花油和石榴提取物，可用于吹干之前预清洗，作为深层调理产品；或作为干性发质的免洗定型产品。 这款轻盈护发霜非常适合中等粗细的头发至细发，融合了紫外线光滤剂，以保护秀发，令其亮泽、顺滑、健康。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime Hair Oil (100ml)
使用多功效发油让秀发体验众多功效；这种配方旨在呵护、保护和强韧秀发。 这款发油富含阿甘油和玉米油等多种珍贵油类，适合所有发质，能够深层滋养并抑制毛躁，同时提亮发色并减少分叉。 吹干前后均可使用，全天均可保持神清气爽。 提供热保护和湿度保护。 秀发更光亮、更有弹性。
name: Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain 250ml, Crème Fine 150ml and Original Hair Oil 100ml Bundle

product_description:
Maximise your blowout with the Paul Mitchell Neuro® Round Titanium Thermal Brush Small. Boasting heat-resistant bristles up to 260°, the ventilated titanium barrel retains heat and offers superior drying time over traditional ceramic brushes.
The anti-static corkscrew nylon fibres seamlessly glide through hair without pulling or tugging, minimising knots and tangles for a smooth, supple finish. Featuring an ergonomic soft-touch handle and integrated magnetic cap to enable the brush to stand freely.
name: Mitchell Neuro Round Titanium Thermal Brush - Small

product_description:
Jack Black Clay Pomade。该品牌采用 PureScience® 技术结合植物治疗成分和经过认证的有机成分，创造有助于您获得最佳形象和感觉的产品。 轻盈发蜡可提供强力定型和哑光妆效。 采用天然油脂配方，其中茶树油可缓解瘙痒和干燥，薰衣草油可护理脆弱或开叉的头发。
富含矿物质的海带有机可滋养秀发，而绿茶叶提取物可刺激毛囊，促进再生长。 使用通用的粘土产品，提升鲜明度和质感，打造想要的发型。 这款不油腻的造型发蜡可以很轻松地完成塑形和试验。 用水很容易洗掉。 E.N. 
美国生产。
name: Black Clay Pomade (77g)

product_description:
The Kérastase Reflection Masque Fina and Red Touche Chromatique Duo offers personalised care for your colour-treated hair. Combining an ink-in-care, highly concentrated hair dye formula with a nourishing mask, the pair work in tandem to correct and brighten faded colour for restored softness, colour luminosity and radiance.
Touche Chromatique (10ml)
A colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique. The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your red hair; it enhances shine and redness for a beautifully, vibrant finish. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
Masque Chromatique (200ml)
A nourishing hair mask specially developed to enhance and protect the colour intensity of colour-treated or highlighted, fine hair. Promoting prolonged colour vibrancy, the deep conditioning treatment utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth with enhanced shine, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasis light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant. Expect vivid colour and light-reflecting shine, for longer.
name: Reflection Masque Fins and Red Touche Chromatique Duo

product_description:
使用Evo Mister Fantastic Texture Spray（200ml）来实现完美的吹干效果。 本产品适合所有发质使用，但特别适合分层的长发，本产品可以改善发丝的层次感，同时让您的秀发散发出闪亮光泽，充满活力。
本产品是一款强大的多功效产品，同时能够保护您的秀发在打理热力造型时不受伤害，并且能够让您的发丝更为浓密，散发出健康的外观。 - L.M.使用说明：在吹干和打理热力造型之前，喷洒在湿润的头发上。
name: Mister Fantastic Blowout Spray（200ml）

product_description: 使用 TIGI S-Factor Smoothing Lusterizer，护理毛躁和凌乱。这是一款轻盈乳液，以抚平秀发表面，呈现更光滑的健康发丝。 这款乳液采用科学的混合成分专门配制而成，可封闭角质层，以锁住天然水分，同时提升光泽。 本品提供热保护，以抵御湿度影响和造型工具所造成的损伤，可用于湿发和干发，使其平静且易于打理。 E.N.
name: S-Factor Smoothing Lusterizer 200ml

product_description:
Cloud Nine卷发器旨在让您拥有引人注目弹力持久的卷发。 这款卷发器有各种不同大小的尺寸，如此您可以根据需要做卷的头发数量选择不同尺寸，它们可以从内部加热，因此它们在头发上会一直是热的，但触手不烫。
尺寸大小为 60mm 的 Cloud Nine卷发器是一款必备之物，采用了软握刷毛，确保可以毫无痛苦地打造靓丽有型的卷发。 K.D.
请注意： 应结合Cloud Nine The O卷发棒使用。
name: Nine卷发器尺寸(5) 60mm

product_description:
Treat dull, lack-lustre locks to the Sachajuan Silver Shampoo; a violet-hued formula that works to banish unwanted yellow, brassy tones caused by pollutants and UV rays.
Fortified with the brand's innovative Ocean Silk Technology, the lightweight, purple shampoo strengthens, replenishes and restores shine, whilst providing UV protection to leave hair radiant and healthy-looking from root to tip. Ideal for grey and blonde hair, you can expect luminous, luscious locks in between salon appointments.
name: Silver Shampoo 250ml

product_description: Evo 38 毫米布鲁斯硬毛刷，是一种轻量级发刷，使秀发更浓密、数量更多。 圆管由硬木制作，设有把手，使秀发易于打理造型。 其独特的野猪鬃可覆盖头发角质层，均匀地分布头皮的天然油脂和皮脂，使秀发更亮泽。 这款轻巧的刷子适合短而厚的头发或卷发，使秀发健康柔滑。 E.N.

Restore hair to its natural smoothness with the Pure Moisture Treatment Mask from SHOW Beauty. The incredibly rich mask offers intensive hydration and smoothing action, resulting in visibly healthy and lustrous locks.
Formulated with a blend of essential Amino Acids, Soy Protein and Hydrolysed Pea Protein, the treatment aims to improve hair’s elasticity and reduce brittleness, resulting in a stronger fiber. The mask features potent conditioning and revitalising properties due to an infusion of Caviar and White Truffle extracts.
name: Beauty Pure Moisture Treatment Mask 200ml

product_description: Pro Blo AddME 混合套装 适用于吹干秀发，它是一组用于连接至 CurlMe 造型工具的六个不同尺寸陶瓷涂层的卷发筒。 CurlME 专家级的设计让您在家就能再创专业级沙龙品质的发型，它是一款变革型的美发梳，配备有可拆卸的手柄，以便使陶瓷涂层的卷发筒固定到位，直至秀发完全冷却定型富有弹性的大卷。非常适合超长或超浓密的秀发，这款可安装配件的设备配备有六个附加卷发筒，以及用于将卷发筒固定到位的六个夹子。 让缕缕秀发更浓密顺滑，增强秀发的光泽感。
name: Blo AddME 混合套装

product_description:
Philip B African Shea Butter Gentle and Conditioning Shampoo 不含香料，丰盈而柔软，对头皮温和无刺激，是非洲牛油果油、蛇麻子、荨麻和紫草的轻盈滋润共混物，拥有适用于所有家人的温和配方。
非洲牛油果油富含泛醇（维生素 B5），为干枯的头发提供急需的水分，以强化和恢复弹性，防止断裂。 一种温和配方，pH 值为 5.5，可供全家人使用。 这款洗发水可提升秀发的可打理性、含水量和光泽，而不会显得颓丧。 这是一款适用于所有发质的优秀日常洗发水，对于染过色的头发也是安全的。
使用说明：
name: B African Shea Butter Gentle and Conditioning Shampoo (220ml)

product_description: 定型牢固，助您打造鲜明的发型。 丰盈秀发，可以在吹干时使用，也可以和中度定型产品配合使用，打造完美发型。 质地轻盈，秀发无坠重感。 蕴含护发成分，锁住水分，令秀发柔软顺滑。 -SA
name: Blow Dry Putty (75ml)

product_description:
Perfect for all hair types, O'right Green Tea Moisturising Cream is forumulated with organic green tea extract to provide hair with 72 hours of moisture. Also featuring super antioxidant capability, the cream protects hair from UV damage. The moistursing cream comes in a distinctive biodegrabable bottle, ensuring an natural product that provides hair with a silky gloss. -SA
Regarding themselves as a brand who represent the green lifestyle, eco-friendly values lie firmly at the heart of O'right's philosophy. The brand produce high quality, hair products using only organic and natural ingredients; free from 8 nasty chemicals commonly found in hair care products. O'right's green credentials even extends to their packaging, which is 100% biodegradable and environmentally friendly, meaning O'right's products can quite rightly be described as, "the world’s greenest hair care!"
name: Green Tea Moisturizing Cream (180ml)

product_description:
卷发更容易断裂，因而可使用 Joico Curl Crème Wash Sulfate-Free Co+Wash 进行呵护。这是一款富含 Curl Repair Technology™ 的清洁和调理产品，以打造更强韧、更具弹性、更健康的卷发。
这款多功效发乳含天然油脂、重构蛋白和指定聚合物的共混物，兼具清洁和调理功效，以打造更柔软、更易于打理的卷发。 该配方具备无泡沫质地，含有调理油脂，可消除多余的皮脂，使秀发具备最佳的保湿效果。
这种防毛躁配方可重新恢复卷发的活力，增强妆效，可消除干枯、毛躁的发丝，并打造质地柔软且具备弹性的持久卷发。 - K.N
name: Curl Crème Wash Sulfate-Free Co+Wash for Soft, Frizz Free Curls (300ml)

product_description:
Wet Brush 能无痛清除头发打结和缠结。 这款顺发刷拥有纤细、强韧和富有弹性的 Intelliflex™ 刷毛，可轻松滑过任何发质；亦具备 SofTips™，可按摩头皮并促进毛囊血液循环。
这些刷毛足够坚韧，能清除打结；亦足够灵活，不伤头发和头皮；并被设计为在每次刷过之后能恢复到原有形状，有助于减少头发断裂和受损。 这款多功能发刷还可用于干发、假发和接发。 - L.M.
name: Brush Classic

product_description:
非常适合难以选择确切颜色的人们，来自Beauty Works的100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension让您在购买全套颜色前可以匹配自己头发的自然颜色。
这种屡获殊荣的接发使用保有角质层并经轻度加工的最优质Remy人发制造，确保其不会纠结在一起。
发丝巧妙粘合在一起，以防止碎裂，令接发完美增加适当的长度，令头发丰满、茂盛。 E.N.
name: Works 100% Remy Colour Swatch Hair Extension - Boho Blonde 613/27

product_description:
Restore sleek, healthy-looking locks with KMS MoistRepair Shampoo; a lightweight, regenerating formula that works to cleanse, hydrate and revitalise strands from root to tip.
Powered by 18-MEA and an AHA Structure Complex, the reparative shampoo gently eliminates impurities as it strengthens and reconstructs hair from within. Its dose of Polyquaternium-7 helps to protect dry, damaged hair, whilst minimising breakage and replenishing moisture to leave you with smooth, luscious locks after use.
name: Moist Repair Shampoo 750ml

product_description:
d:fi 日用护发素可有效护理您的秀发；其轻盈配方可使营养成分渗透到缕缕秀发，可为秀发补充水分，焕活发丝，使秀发从发根到发丝都十分柔软。
这款营养丰富的护发素蕴含有水解角蛋白，可有效舒缓毛小皮细胞，使秀发更易梳理，令蓬乱的发丝更贴合，让您的缕缕秀发更有光泽。
name: 日用护发素 1000ml

product_description:
驯服恼人的零乱碎发，抚顺卷发，为秀发增添黄金般的奢华光泽。 TIGI Bed Head Blow Out造型乳专为对抗毛躁，抚顺受损发丝而设计。 具有护发效果的硅油能够抚顺发丝，同时柔润剂还能还原秀发的健康光泽。 此外，特别添加的金云母还能让秀发焕发闪耀的金色微光。 该款造型乳非常适合红色发质枯黄的问题，因为金光光泽将会带出秀发的自然发色。
TIGI Bed Head  Blow Out造型乳包装采用紫色瓶身，外形时尚，还带有迷人的水果芬芳。 – N.P.
name: Bed Head Blow Out造型乳（100ml）

product_description: 本品呈酸性，為半永久性，混合灰白髮色達到40%。採用全新配方，髮色持續時間增加35%，讓髮色艷麗，密集閃耀。
name: 威娜亮发深紫棕色 3.66 (75ml)

product_description:
使用Wella 专业纯净净化洗发露清洁并滋润倦怠的头发。 深层清洁配方，可去除积聚的杂质，使头发亮泽，清新和充满活力。
Wella 专业纯净净化洗发露 富含天然竹子提取物，可剥离头发中使用定型产品后留下的残留物 和环境污染物，使头发水润，达到彻底清洁的效果。
使用说明：
name: 专业纯净净化洗发露（250毫升）

product_description:
Achieve sleek, professional results with the Expert Colour Care Anti-Frizz Supersize Shampoo from Jo Hansford.
Exclusively developed in her Mayfair salon and utilising advanced technologies, the lightweight, sulphate-free formula works to eliminate dirt, oil and impurities while infusing dry and unruly hair with essential moisture and vitamins, revitalising colour and combating frizz and flyaways.
Fortified with the exclusive Colour Care Complex and Anti-Fade formula, it contains Sweet Blue Lupin peptides that have been scientifically proven to prolong hair colour vibrancy and tone for up to 30 washes, while Iselux LQ delivers effective cleansing without dulling colour.
Concentrated extract of Sunflower Seed combats free radical damage and enhances hairs natural elasticity, plus the addition of Quaterium-80 and conditioning Guar Gum surround individual follicles to help reduce electrostatic charge, minimising fluffiness, split ends and breakage. Expect healthier looking, revitalised hair with vivid colour and a smooth, glossy finish.
name: Hansford Expert Colour Care Anti-Frizz Supersize Shampoo (1000ml)

product_description: Add mirror-like shine to dull hair with the Oil Reflections Shampoo from Wella Professionals. Harnessing the powers of Camellia Oil and White Tea Extract, the lightweight formula gently eliminates impurities whilst delivering intense moisture to reveal soft, smooth locks from root to tip. Hair will feel deeply cleansed and rejuvenated with restored luminosity.
name: Professionals Oil Reflections Shampoo 250ml

product_description:

Minimise drying time by using a Lisse Luxe Hair Turban from Aquis. Suitable for all hair types, but ideal for curly, delicate and damaged hair, the towel is able to provide extremely gentle treatment.
Crafted with new generation Aquitex, the turban boasts improved absorbency, as well as increased comfort. The towel wraps easily around wet hair and fastens with a single button closure, leaving your hands free whilst hair dries. Use of the Lisse Luxe Hair Turban decreases drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber.

Macadamia澳洲堅果滋養免洗潤髮乳採用兩種世界上最珍貴天然堅果油，幫你拯救難打理、難控制的秀發。澳洲堅果油與摩洛哥堅果油將改善您的髮質，讓秀髮絲滑柔軟。

此款多功效发泥可以让您的秀发拥有长效浓密的视觉外观，适合所有发质和任意长度的秀发使用，是您打理发型的必备日常用品。 - L.M.

 Glyo-Shield®技術可提供白茶提取物與薄荷油以及清潔和保護護理劑，為您帶來清爽濕潤且健康的頭皮，準備就緒開始儷康絲流程。 
護理配方添加的最終技術是Transactive Delivery System®。純淨劑和維生素與抗氧化劑可防止皮脂和環境殘餘物堵塞毛孔，不損失保持健康頭髮的所需精油。 - KR

product_description: Take care of damaged hair with the Biolage R.A.W. Re-Hab Mask. Fortified with Jojoba Oil and a blend of Shea and Murumuru Butters, the formula replenishes dehydrated, thirsty locks, whilst resurfacing marine botanicals and minerals restore the hydro-lipid barrier for softer, stronger strands.
Its unique dispensing system delivers the perfect amount of aerated cream, just enough to preserve the hair's natural oils each time and reducing breakage by up to 59% to reveal healthy-looking, frizz-free tresses with enhanced shine.

The shampoo also boasts Rose Geranium, Linden Blossom and Frankincense essential oils, which work in synergy to envelop tresses in an uplifting scent.
With regular use, the shampoo helps hair to become less greasy, whilst minimising the occurrence of dandruff.

product_description:
Keep hair in place with invisibobble POWER Hawkwardly Good Looking; a limited edition, three-piece set taken from the brand’s unique Circus Collection. Arriving in time for summer and festival season, the collection boasts an array of colourful creatures that guarantee to brighten any up-do.
The ‘Hawkwardly Good Looking’ hair ties arrive in a metallic, mint green hue and are housed inside decorative packaging adorned with an array of feathered friends. Perfect for workouts or sport activities, the invisibobble Power Hair Tie holds unruly, hard-to-tame hair in place without the use of clips and pins.
Fun and functional, its ultra-comfortable, intensified spiral shape prevents headaches and kinks, whilst its hygienic, non-soaking design and smooth surface means it stays dry even when worn on your wrist. Can be used in wet or dry hair without tangling, breakage or snagging.

product_description:
Be blown away by the high performance BaByliss PRO Spectrum Hair Dryer. Available in a range of limited edition colours, the styling tool is powered by a long-life 2100W motor with a concentrated, directly penetrating airflow for faster drying times and optimum styling control.
Advanced ionic conditioning delivers over 50%* more negative ions to combat static and minimise frizz, helping to seal each individual cuticle for a visibly smoother and glossy finish. Perfect for all hair types, six variable heat and speed settings allow you flexible styling to suit your needs, while the ergonomically balanced design enhances comfort and ease of use.
Achieve sleek, lustrous locks with professional looking results in minimal time and with maximum impact.
name: PRO Spectrum Hair Dryer - Orange Flame

其蕴含的水解角蛋白能维持头发蛋白含量；甘油能吸收并保留空气中的水分，补水保湿；含代硅成分的护发剂能调理发丝，防止浮发。
本品配方能修复最多达80%的分叉和受损发丝，同时覆盖发丝，保护秀发不再受损，使秀发常保健康、气质绝佳。 - K.R

它适用于极其敏感的头皮，所采用的 SofTips™ 技术具有刺激按摩作用，可促进循环，而符合人体工程学的橡胶手柄具有防滑作用，可梳理任何发型，包括接发、假发和梳理儿童秀发。 非常适合外出旅行时使用，让您享有所期待的平静、好梳理的超柔顺秀发。

这两款产品得意于采用精致工艺的 Kérastase 优质配方，可修复损伤的发丝。 专业蛋白可从内部修复发丝，让秀发明显变得更加顺滑、更加滋养。 Kérastase 卡诗营养丰富的配方还得益于氨基酸、小麦蛋白衍生物和神经酰胺 R 的混合物，可有效顺滑和强韧发丝，保护秀发免受潮湿的影响，72 小时控制毛躁。
该套装包含以下产品：
name: 卡诗黛丝逸柔顺滑防毛躁洗发水（250ml）和发膜（200ml）

product_description:
Sebastian Professional Hydre Shampoo (1000ml) 是专门研制的可深层滋润干性发质的洗发水，其配方适合毛躁和凌乱的头发，有助于恢复秀发的天然健康和活力。
这款洗发水可产生丰富的泡沫，温和地清除秀发上多余的油脂和杂质，同时提供丰富的营养，令秀发健康丰盈、富有弹性。 秀发的水分含量将彻底得到补充，从而变得光滑、易于梳理。 - L.M.
name: Professional Hydre Shampoo (1000ml) - （价值 56.00 英镑）

product_description: 与其他顺发精华不同，Kérastase 卡诗终极精华护发精油（18g）蕴含有 15 种能与固态形式相融合的修复精油，采用能深层渗透到手部肌肤的配方。 使营养精油在掌心温暖和融化，它可用于集中处理经过过度处理的秀发，减少分叉，祛除毛躁。 - K.R
name: 卡诗终极精华护发精油（18g）

product_description:
深層保濕秀發，盡情享受優質的熱帶海藻萃取物、夏威夷果油和夏威夷姜。這款獨特的護髮素能增加發量，讓頭髮健康閃亮，富有彈性。 
減少分叉，同時使頭髮易打理。配方含維他命A，C 和E，結合植物醇，打造獨特功效。滋養秀發，令秀發健康閃耀。植物萃取的維他命B5，能徹底深入頭髮及根部，帶來持久保濕，減少分叉，同時增加發量，讓頭髮健康，富有彈性。 
使用說明：
name: (480ml)

product_description:
Mane 箭牌护色洗发水特别适用于经过染色处理的秀发，它可有效清洁发丝，为发丝补充营养，使秀发更柔顺，而不会引起水分丢失。
这款轻质洗发水含有微量蛋白质和营养丰富的柔顺剂，能温和地祛除杂质，同时有助于持久保持发色。 让您拥有所期待的清洁健康的秀发，令秀发恢复应有的闪亮色彩。
name: 箭牌护色洗发水 355 毫升

product_description:
American Crew 美国队员喷雾啫喱蕴含有草本植物萃取物，能够让您的秀发实现完美定型，同时使秀发保持自然，极其易于梳理，还具有调节和保湿作用，可有效防止发丝和头皮过度干燥。
American Crew 美国队员喷雾啫喱蕴含有鼠尾草、人参和皂树，具有中度定型作用，与其他定型喷雾不同，该喷雾可赋予秀发自然动感，使其更易于梳理。 American Crew 美国队员定型啫喱是一款非常棒的吹干前护发产品，可有效抵御有害紫外线。
使用说明：
name: Crew 美国队员喷雾啫喱（250ml）

product_description:
Evo 伊噢Bride of Gluttony 護髮素(300ml) 可讓您的頭髮更加滋養濃密，感覺發量更多更厚。清透配方還可令頭髮更加柔軟、滋養、順滑，更易打理，更顯年輕，還可讓頭髮更加飽滿蓬鬆。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 伊噢 Bride of Gluttony 护发素 (300ml)

product_description:
使用 Green People Intensive Repair Shampoo，补充天然油脂，修复受损和脆弱的头发。 这款提亮洗发水可从内部强韧秀发，非常适合经化学处理和经常吹干的头发。
Green People Vitamin Shampoo 舒缓无刺激，有助于强韧和修复脆弱的发丝。 这款护发素不含 SLS（存在于多数主流洗发水中，但可能导致头皮瘙痒）和苯甲酸酯，是大自然可以提供的最纯净的护发产品；其效果保持时间是传统洗发水的三倍左右，同时也证明了一点点就会超出很多！
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 这些产品也适用于素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Intensive Repair Shampoo (200ml)

product_description: KORRES 珂诺诗甘草荨麻洗发水是专门针对油腻型发质而设计的配方。 这款彻底清洁型洗发水可温和地控制发丝和头皮的油脂水平，而不会造成发丝的滋润油脂流失。 KORRES 珂诺诗甘草荨麻洗发水足够温和，可每天使用。
name: 珂诺诗甜杏仁亚麻籽洗发水

product_description:
Help maintain normal hair pigmentation with the Nourkrin Radiance Tablets; a daily supplement that helps hair to retain its natural colour.
Ideal for those spotting greys at any age, the radiance tablets are formulated with Copper, D-Biotin and Nourkrin’ s exclusive ingredient Marilex®, which work in synergy to maintain normal pigmentation and therefore delay the onset of colour changes.
Simply take one tablet a day to proactively provide the support required for hair to maintain its vibrant colour. Expect luscious locks.
name: Active 45+ Supplements - 30 Tablets (1 Month Supply)

product_description:
Joico JoiGel 紧实Styling发胶的前身是 I.C.E 强力 Styling 发胶，可以紧实强力定型。 它可以为发型设计提供出色的支持、控制和光泽，而不会使秀发剥落。
此外，JoiGel 紧实Styling 发胶中的紫外线防护剂可以护理和保护秀发免受日常环境压力，同时最大程度地为秀发提供造型控制，令秀发丰盈光亮。
使用说明：
name: JoiGel 紧致发胶 (250ml)

product_description:
Gently cleanse hair to remove excess oil and impurities with the Phytokeratine Extreme Shampoo from Phyto. Developed for ultra-damaged, dry or brittle hair, its advanced formula with botanical keratin and hyaluronic acid penetrates the hair fibre to rebuild internal structure, leaving you with supple, silky soft locks.
Replenishes locks from root to tip and coats the hair shaft for enhanced shine. Rice bran ceramides smoothen the cuticle, whilst antioxidant pomegranate extract protects hair from external aggressors to restore strength. The lightweight shampoo prevents further breakage and split ends so you can experience healthy-looking locks. E.N.
name: Phytokeratine Extreme Shampoo (200ml)

product_description:
NIOXIN System 2 Cleanser Shampoo 旨在去除会阻塞毛囊的油渍和污垢，如皮脂、脂肪酸和环境中残留物，适合明显纤薄较细的自然秀发。 这款洗发水能够温和地去除护发产品残留物，让营养直达头皮和毛囊部位，不损伤秀发的天然油脂。
独特的技术 BioAMP® 有助于减少脱发、增加每根发丝的丰盈度，从而令头发看起来更浓密，而 ScalpAccess® 输送系统采用维生素、植物性药材和 SPF15 防晒霜，以深层清洁和保护头皮免遭太阳光线的损伤。
这款清洁洗发水是护发三部曲的第一步，让您拥有健康的头皮和更丰盈的秀发，通过包含白茶提取物和薄荷油的 Activ-Renewal® 技术改善发质，令头皮更加清爽。 让秀发展现健康光泽，发质更加丰盈。 K.D.
name: System 2 Cleanser Shampoo（适合明显纤薄的自然Hair 1000ml - （价值 58.30 英镑）

product_description:
爱特纳竹光亮泽洗发水护发素二件套的设计宗旨是改造暗沉、倦怠的头发。 其独特的先进配方提供了必需的营养成分，有效修复受损的秀发，让秀发纵享丝滑。 E.N. 
爱特纳竹光亮泽洗发水(250毫升)
用这瓶轻巧的洗发水打造丝滑、外观健康的发绺。 配方不含硫酸盐和氯化钠，深层清洁与滋润秀发，恢复其弹力，增加其光泽。
使用指南： 揉进湿发，搓出泡沫，然后彻底冲洗。
爱特纳竹光亮泽护发素 (250毫升)
护发素能增强光泽，设计宗旨是让重要的营养物质浸润每一根头发。 配方不含对羟基苯甲酸酯和钠，能改造暗沉、倦怠的头发，这样您就可以体验到充满水分并散发健康光泽的发绺。
使用指南： 揉进洗净的湿发，然后彻底冲洗。

Sexy Hair 强效蓬松粉适合用于瞬间丰盈纤细平塌的秀发；它是一款质地轻盈的丰盈蓬松粉，可瞬间增加发量，让您拥有纹理结构层次分明的发型。
这款蓬松粉易于吸收，无味，涂抹后不会有残留，完全透明，适用于任何发色。 蕴含有天然油脂和萃取物，能够焕活和保护秀发，仅需几秒钟的时间就能让您拥有丰盈闪亮的秀发！
name: Hair 强效蓬松粉 2g

product_description:
本品溫和，適合日常使用，傑森蘆薈84% 洗髮露為您的秀髮帶來持久保濕，減少髮梢分叉，同時增加發量，令頭髮更好打理。用後頭髮健康、光澤、有彈性。 
深層滋養，含有天然草本萃取物精華，礦物質和維他命A、C 和E，令頭髮保濕​​順滑，減少毛糙。螺旋藻令秀發強韌，而蛋白質和透明質酸則能讓頭髮更易打理，溫和舒緩頭皮。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森芦荟 84% 洗发露 (480ml)

product_description:
Hydrea London竹炭超软干发毛巾，可快速自然地使头发变干。
由超强吸水的环保竹纤维制成，可牢固地绕过头顶，固定好头发，方便您涂抹化妆品或进行脸部按摩。 尤其适合在家、健身房、水疗中心等地方使用，使头发轻松变干。
name: London 竹炭超软干发毛巾

product_description: 该TIGI S-Factor真正持久Colour Tween Duo已专门放在一起，以满足染过色的头发的需求。 该套装与洗发水和护发素一起防止褪色，使卷发更有光泽，从而您的秀发会看起来充满活力、时尚鲜润，该套装最多可使用40次。 - L.M.
name: S-Factor长效Colour Tween Duo(2 x 750ml) （价值 57.45 英镑）

product_description:
Boost your locks with the KMS AddVolume Texture Creme; an innovative, shaping blend that works to thicken and volumise styles in need of awakening. The unique crème effortlessly glides through towel-dried hair and delivers instant results. Infused with Calcium Sulphate, the formula is able to envelop and visibly plump each fiber to promote a fuller appearance.
The texturising treatment offers enviable and touchable volume, which ensures hair looks and feels thick and full-bodied. After creating boosted, volumised styles, the Texture Crème works tirelessly for up to 72 hours to ensure hair stays full and lifted.
name: AddVolume Texture Creme 75ml

product_description:
本品能強韌髮質。富含天然路易波士有機茶萃取物，質地柔滑，能修復髮絲，讓頭髮更濃密，更有活力。適合成熟髮質。 
本品能預防髮絲斷裂和分叉，解決脆弱髮質的根本，恢復秀發的天然強韌。使用之後，頭髮強韌柔滑，豐盈光澤。 
 使用說明：
name: 威娜专业强韧洗发露 - 适合脆弱发质 (250ml)

product_description:
Define your natural curls with the KMS CurlUp Perfecting Lotion; a hair-enhancing formula that leaves hair enviably curly.
Developed using an innovative shaping blend, which includes Polyquaternium-69, the luxurious lotion effortlessly glides through damp hair and delivers superior curl retention once hair is dry. Alongside defining natural curls, the rich formula works to control frizz and shield hair from humidity for up to 72 hours, leaving hair smooth and sleek.
Throughout the day, curls can be refreshed by simply scrunching the hair to reactivate the lotion. Expect the lotion to enhance hair, without leaving tresses stiff and crunchy.
name: CurlUp Perfecting Lotion 100ml

product_description: Kebelo滋养护发素（250ml）专为干燥受损的秀发设计，能有效理顺并滋润每一根发丝，令秀发强韧。 这款护发素能够补充秀发流失的水分，带给您易于打理、柔顺不打结的秀发。 - K.R

儷康絲系統1 頭皮煥活護髮素，適合正常及細軟自然頭髮能夠有效軟化頭髮，使頭髮清爽濃密，令細軟稀疏的頭髮持久豐盈。這款護髮素融合創新BioAMP®技術，令髮絲根根飽滿，同時減少脫髮，Activ-Renewal® 技術中添加薄荷油和白茶萃取物，令頭皮清爽舒適。 
頭髮呈現閃耀光澤且更加濃密，而頭皮將感覺重獲新生、保持健康。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 俪康丝系统 1 头皮焕活护发素，适合正常及细软自然头发 (300ml)

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Nutritive Nourishing 3 Step Regime，修复和活化暗沉、干燥和脆弱的发丝；这是一款最畅销的三件套护理产品，共同致力于提供持久的功效。 这款套装专门采用再生共混物配制而成，专用于细发和脆弱的发丝，令秀发呈现健康活力。
Nutritive Fondant Magistral (200ml)
此款具有创新性的洗头水含有 Irisome 4600ppm Complex，能够温和地消除杂质，同时 Benjoin 树脂、神经酰胺和木糖的共混物可由内而外增强和改善发质。 本品有助于改善可打理性并防止热力造型造成的损伤，每次使用都能呈现平静、顺滑的发丝。
Nutritive Mask Magistral (200ml)
这款深层滋养发膜利用了 4600 PPM Irisome Complex 和 Benjoin 树脂技术，专用于改善营养不良和干枯的头发；其平衡和保护特性有助于顺滑和软化所有发束，提升可打理性并理顺发丝，赋予镜面般光泽。
Nutitive Bain Magistral (200ml)
这款超级滋养护发素含有 Irisome 4600ppm Complex，可恢复亮泽柔滑发丝。 采用 Benjoin 树脂、神经酰胺和木糖的修复性共混物配方，可强韧和修复头发纤维，同时提升可打理性。 获得滋润、顺滑、亮泽的发丝。
name: Nutritive Nourishing 3 Step Regime

product_description:
NIOXIN System 1 Scalp Treatment是一种专门用于正常至偏纤细的自然头发的有效和创新免洗型护理产品，是NIOXIN三步护理系统的最后一步。 经过专门设计，有助于使正常至偏纤细的头发变得更厚，它所含的抗氧化剂和植物成分协同工作，以保持一个更清新的头皮环境。
配方中采用了Activ-Renewal® ，BioAMP®和Transactive Delivery System®技术，这款护理产品在增加每一根发丝的丰盈度的同时减少脱发和破损；它采用特殊的薄荷油、White茶叶提取物成分，给头皮超清爽的感觉。 您的秀发将会富有光泽且变得更厚，同时头皮也重新焕发了活力。
name: System 1 Scalp 护理液 200ml

product_description: Tangle Angel天使梳使頭髮順滑好打理，獨特的設計，您可以握住翅膀更容易掌握梳子，也可以握住手柄使每日的梳理更得心應手。添加入塑料裡抗菌材質，保證髮梳的衛生。適合各種髮質，特別添加的抗靜電材料使頭髮始終保持光滑，服帖和柔順。抗熱的直立梳齒可以輕鬆的打開頭髮打結，不摩擦頭髮。
name: Angel 天使梳紫红色 Fab Fuchsia

product_description: Tangle Angel 天使顺发梳可让您拥有柔顺易梳理的秀发。 其创新性的天使翅膀设计可用于握持，以实现最强的控制力；日常使用也可以握持手柄。 这款顺发梳具备抗菌功能，塑料中内嵌的添加剂可有效减少细菌，保持顺发梳清洁卫生。 这款顺发梳适用于各种发型，其防静电功能让秀发变得柔顺而不毛躁，耐热而有弹性的梳齿可轻松梳顺打结的秀发而不会拉扯头皮。 E.N.
name: Angel 天使顺发梳玫瑰金版

product_description:
FIT 活性护发素 ，可增强头发韧性。配方先进、柔软温和、可提高头发强度、增加头发厚度、减少掉发。
这款日用护发素尤其适用于男性朋友，内含天然成分，可滋润头发、刺激头发生长、促进头发健康。 多种维生素、咖啡因和植物提取物等的混合物，结合生姜，可渗透毛囊，从发根加强头发韧性。采用OXY-FIT-10技术，改善头皮血液循环，使头发更浓厚、更健康。 这款智能护发素适合每天使用，可自我调节，以适应所有类型的头发，有效保护头发抵御日常损害和污染。 滋润营养头发，使秀发更坚韧、更浓厚、更健康。 - K.N
name: 250ml

product_description:
In its latest collaboration, Tangle Teezer has treated its on-the-go detangling hairbrush, the Compact Styler, to a special edition print, featuring Star Wars' TM most fearsome character, the Stormtrooper!
The Compact Styler is designed to detangle, define and deliver great hair on the move. This is all possible thanks to its unique two-tiered system technology – the long teeth detangle and the short teeth smooth the hair cuticle for healthier-looking, glossy hair. With teeth that good, you'll want to keep them in tip-top condition, so the Compact Styler also comes with a protective cover, so no matter where you go, the teeth stay perfect.
Star Wars fans will love this new addition to the Tangle Teezer Compact Styler collection - which totally saves their hair from going to the dark side!
name: Teezer Disney Star Wars Stormtrooper Compact Styler Hair Brush

product_description:
蒂芝天橋時尚燕麥蜂蜜護髮素(250ml) 可滋養和修復乾枯受損髮質,令秀發更顯強韌柔滑。本品配方含有槐花蜂蜜、小麥蛋白和維生素E 營養成分，可使秀發更加順滑，同時還可令秀發水潤光澤。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 蒂芝天桥時尚燕麦蜂蜜护发素 (250ml)

product_description:
Add striking gloss and enviable shine to hair with the Luxury Volume Conditioner from SHOW Beauty. The weightless formula is designed to leave hair looking extremely healthy, full and luscious.
Formulated with a blend of nourishing Caviar and White Truffle, the treatment is able to intensely condition hair without weighing it down. Wheat Protein provides volumising benefits, helping hair to maintain its body and fullness.
name: Beauty Luxury Volume Conditioner 200ml

product_description:
Sexy Hair 推出健康秀发大豆新生护发精油；这款快干发乳具有保湿、强健和软化发丝的作用，与此同时，可加速吹干的速度。
这款定型护发精油蕴含有具备调节作用的大豆蛋白、可可粉和摩洛哥精油混合物，它适用于所有发质，可保护发丝免受热力造型、有害紫外线的损伤，有效控制毛躁。 可增强秀发的光泽度和弹性，让您的秀发拥有所期待的顺滑的光泽。
name: Hair 健康秀发大豆新生护发精油 125ml

product_description:
令秀發易於梳理的免洗順發噴霧。超級輕透質地，調節自來水的酸鹼值，牢牢鎖住髮絲角質層、令秀發柔順閃亮、易於梳理，綻現絢麗奪目光彩。 
 使用說明 
向濕髮上噴6-8 次，將本品擠於髮絲上，用毛巾拭乾並如常造型。 
 成分 
水（去離子）、醋酸（蘋果醋）、氨端聚二甲基矽氧烷、變性乙醇、月桂酯、十六烷基三甲基氯化銨、十三烷醇聚醚-1、三甲基甲矽烷氧基氨端聚二甲基矽氧烷、C11-15 烷醇聚醚-7、C12-16 鏈烷醇聚醚-9、甘油、油橄欖(OLEA EUROPAEA) 果油、芝麻籽油、花生油、甜扁桃油、荷荷巴油、胡桃籽油、丁基羥基甲苯、依蘭花油、薰衣草油、梔子油、斑點老鸛草油、氯苯甘醚、芳樟醇。

Regarding themselves as a brand who represent the green lifestyle, eco-friendly values lie firmly at the heart of O'right's philosophy. product_description:
Boost the appearance of fine hair with NIOXIN's Hair System Kit 2 and Thickening Spray Bundle. The three step routine combines a shampoo, conditioner and scalp treatment, with the added bonus of a thickening spray to lend your hair a fuller, healthier appearance.
Cleanser (150ml):
The first step in your three step system designed specifically for fine, noticeably thinning natural hair. The Shampoo will deeply cleanse the hair whilst protecting the scalp to promote long-lasting shine. Containing a Scalp Access® delivery system which uses vitamins, botanicals and SPF15 sunscreen, the unique cleanser clears hair follicle sites without stripping away essential oils.
Scalp Revitaliser Conditioner (150ml):
Step two contains innovative BioAMP® technology which increases the fullness of each hair strand whilst reducing hair loss, the conditioner is also designed to refresh the scalp with added Peppermint Oil and White Tea Extract as part of the Activ-Renewal® technology. With added SPF15 protection against damaging sun rays, this conditioner will give your locks with a stunning shine and thicker feel.
Scalp Treatment (40ml):
A unique leave-in spray treatment, it combines a blend of innovative technologies which work to thicken fine natural hair types whilst ensuring a refreshed scalp environment. Also formulated with added SPF15 protection to shield the scalp from damaging UV rays. Step three in your routine.
Thickening Spray (150ml):
A miracle spray that works to add long-lasting body and texture to hair. Formulated with PRO-THICK™ technology, its complex of thickening polymers deposit on the hair, forming bonds between gaps in strands to create a fuller-looking appearance. Expect voluptuous looking hair with touchable texture.
name: Hair System Kit 2 and Thickening Spray Bundle

product_description: Achieve gorgeously glossy tresses with the My Glaze Strength, Shine and Colour Protection from RPR. Enriched with lush Abyssinian Oil that combats breakage, the luxe leave-in conditioning treatment can be used to define and separate curls or to add a radiant finish to sleek, straight styles. product_description:
使用 TIGI S-Factor True Lasting Colour Shampoo，实现更柔滑的秀发。 这款丰盈洗发水能温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，而甜杏仁可提供额外滋润，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。
采用椰子油专门配制而成，可有效地深入渗透至头发纤维和表面，提供深层滋润。 这款洗发水可提供保护，防止热造型工具和环境压力造成损伤，以此保护染过色的头发，确保在一次次清洗后发色仍能保持。 实现如丝绸般柔软的亮泽发丝。 E.N.
name: S-Factor True Lasting Colour Shampoo 250ml

product_description: 使用 TIGI Health Factor Conditioner，转变缺乏光泽的发丝。 其独特的配方富含牛油果油，可提升光泽，令秀发充满健康活力，同时提高韧性。 维生素 E 和护理油提供维生素和脂肪酸，保护秀发，减少受损、干燥或经化学处理过的头发发生断裂。 这款轻盈护发素可锁住天然水分，改善秀发质地，实现引人注目的、无毛躁、滋润顺滑的发丝。 E.N.
name: S-Factor Health Factor Conditioner (750ml)

product_description: TIGI S-Factor Creamy Molding Wax 是一种具备中等定型效果的蜡质，可增强光泽和鲜明度。 适用于所有发质，对于短发和长发都有很好的效果。 其独特的配方含有有效成分（包括巴西棕榈蜡），令秀发柔软、顺滑，并提供湿度保护。 使用这款易于使用的蜡油打造想要的发型和质地。 E.N.
name: S-Factor Creamy Molding Wax (50g)

product_description:
Deeply cleanse the hair with DHC’s Light and Smooth Shampoo. Supplementing your hair’s levels of 18MEA, a hydrating lipid compound, the shampoo encourages more manageable hair. Hair is enriched with a fruity floral fragrance, as the shampoo includes notes of cherry, lychee, pineapple, pear, rose and lily of the valley.
The shampoo revitalises hair that has been compromised by environmental stresses, including colour treatments and UV rays, by smoothing and nourishing the cuticles. – E.W.
name: Light and Smooth Shampoo (550ml)

product_description:
The Redken For Men Man Bun Kit combines a daily shampoo with an extra strong hold hair gel. The duo work in synergy to cleanse, preen and refine your style; perfect for gents who appreciate a well-groomed man bun. Housed in a convenient travel case.
Go Clean Shampoo (300ml)
A daily, moisturising shampoo specially formulated to clean and hydrate men's hair. Enriched with strengthening Proteins and moisturising Glycerin, the shampoo gently lifts away dirt and impurities whilst promoting a healthier, hydrated scalp environment. Suitable for normal to dry hair, the lightweight formula replenishes moisture and reinforces every strand to leave hair smooth, shiny and manageable.
Stand Tough Extreme Gel (150ml)
An extra strong hold hair gel to create sharp and defined styles. Delivering an ultra-firm finish with high shine, the extreme gel will help you achieve all-day perfection. Ionic bonds hold solid for maximum staying power.
name: For Men Kit Man Bun - Barber Essentials Kit (Long Men's Hair)

product_description: 使用 Schwarzkopf BC Smooth Perfect，护理和滋养蓬乱、粗糙的头发。 采用氨基增滑剂专门配制而成。这是一种有效的氨基化合物，可避免由于造型工具造成的潮湿和热损伤，同时提升光泽。 这款产品可深层滋养发丝并专注于秀发表面，以减少毛躁和不必要的凌乱，因而可实现更光滑、更亮泽、更易于打理的滋润秀发。 E.N.
name: BC Smooth Perfect (200ml)

product_description: 使用 hif (Hair is Fabric) Colour Support Conditioner，深层滋润秀发。 这款轻盈护发素采用生物酵母专门配制而成，提供必需的营养素，深层清洁秀发，而不会剥离色泽或水分。 保护自然秀发并避免在阳光下褪色，因而可实现强韧、柔软、如丝般柔滑的健康亮泽发丝。 E.N.
name: Colour Support Conditioner (180ml)

product_description:
Sexy Hair 强效丰盈护发乳让您拥有柔软健康的缕缕秀发，其特殊配方的设计旨在丰盈和增加纤细柔软发质秀发的发量。
其质地轻盈的配方中蕴含有植物萃取物、维他命 B3 和柠檬香草，能够强健和修复脆弱的毛囊，缔造浓密的秀发，改善发色。 其设计旨在深层调节和保护秀发，让您拥有所期待的轻盈水润和持久丰盈的发型。
name: Hair 强效丰盈护发乳 30ml

product_description:
Lock Stock & Barrel 的休养滋润洗发水的研制目的，是使头发和头皮的观感和触感都很健康。这种可使头发更有活力的洗发水，最适合头发浓密、干燥或容易打卷的男士，用天然聚合物和强效保湿剂配制而成，可发挥强效深层补水作用，直达毛干。含有多种阳离子制剂，可从发根到发梢清洗头发，以清除污泥和杂质，从而使头发柔顺并且易于梳理。 E.N. 
不含对羟基苯甲酸酯，适合素食者，未做残忍动物试验。
name: Stock & Barrel 休养滋润洗发水 (250ml)

product_description:
Sexy Hair 狂野造型发蜡让您展示靓丽的秀发，它是一款强效定型发蜡，让您一整天都能尽享超强的定型效果。
这款丝滑质地的发蜡可为您自信的发型提供强劲的定型，它所蕴含的共聚物可增加发量和发丝的光泽度，并且能够专业牢固地固定发型。
name: Hair 狂野造型发蜡 50g

product_description: 从首次使用开始，Radia净化及软化洗发液可消除化学品积聚，在软化发丝的同时为头发排毒。 这种超净化效果在不剥夺头发或头皮的天然水分前提下实现。 Radia可以用作每日洗发液，至少应偶尔使用。 日常使用Radia意味着其他护发产品可以提供其最佳功效，最大程度上让使用者的头发焕发光彩和光泽。
name: Laboratories Radia Shampoo 180ml

product_description:
本品適合溫柔梳髮，尼龍刷可以刺激頭皮。榮獲世界美容大獎的最佳髮梳稱號。 
本梳的氣墊橡膠墊在梳理濕髮、吹直或打造任何髮型時確保舒適。
name: 呵护发梳

product_description:
Promote a healthy head of hair with the Nourkrin Woman Value Pack. Combining a three month supply of food supplements with a shampoo and conditioner, the set has been carefully curated to help support and maintain a healthy hair growth cycle.
Nourkrin Woman (180 Tablets - 3 month supply)
A food supplement specially developed to help support and maintain healthy hair growth. The hair growth cycle can be affected by a number of factors, including stress, genetics, hormones and hair styling. Nourkrin Woman has been scientifically formulated and proven to help maintain normal hair growth. It combines Marilex® with Acerola Cherry extract and D-biotin to nourish hair and promote healthier-looking tresses. Three month supply. Not recommended for those allergic to fish. Not recommended if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.
Shampoo and Scalp Cleanser (150ml)
A gentle yet effective formula that helps create an optimum scalp environment to support healthy hair growth. Scientifically formulated, the solution gently cleanses away dirt and impurities whilst protecting components of the hair follicle. Its protective and stimulating properties help to improve the scalp environment and increase the appearance of hair volume.
Conditioner (150ml)
A daily conditioner clinically developed to provide support for thinning hair and to help combat hair loss. Gentle enough to use everyday, it’s a hair loss solution that will encourage follicle strength, and your confidence. The lightweight formula provides gentle nourishment whilst making your hair soft and easy to comb. Specially formulated for damaged hair to contribute to re-growth of problem scalp areas.
name: Woman Value Pack - Contains 180 Tablets Plus Shampoo and Conditioner (2x150ml)

product_description:
Treat dry, dehydrated locks to the Intensive Hair Oil from Swedish brand Sachajuan. Harnessing the powers of nourishing Argan Oil, Rosemary Leaf Extract and Sea Buckthorn Oil, the luxurious, shine-enhancing treatment delivers intense moisture and hydration to restore smooth, healthy-looking hair from root to tip.
Suitable for use on damp or dry hair, the lightweight, replenishing formula utilises the brand's unique Ocean Silk Technology to help strengthen and protect strands, whilst repairing split ends and preventing breakage for sleek, luscious locks with a salon-worthy finish. Defends against the damaging effects of heat styling and environmental aggressors to leave hair calm, manageable and revitalised.
name: Intensive Hair Oil 50ml

product_description:
使用 Nanogen Fibres Light Brown (15g)，打造丰满浓密的秀发。 100％ 纯角蛋白纤维具有天然的外观和手感，轻松与您自己的秀发融合，打造丰满浓密的秀发。
专利技术配制而成，确保 400％ 强效粘合，双极充电电荷可实现最优厚化。安全产品，可每天使用。
name: Hair Thickening Fibres Light Brown (15g)

product_description:
Tangle Teezer 快干造型吹发专用解结美发梳子——半号尺寸让您在家即可体验沙龙级价值的干发效果，它是一款创新发梳，可迅速让湿发变干，让您的造型丰盈有光泽，还可减少毛躁。
这款发梳具有干发功能，它配备有创新型梳齿，能够提取发干表面的水分，从而实现快干效果。 其梳齿可允许发丝拥有自由张力，因此不会牵拉或拉扯发丝，能够专业地增加秀发的丰盈度，增强发丝的光泽感和顺滑度，让您拥有不可挑剔的完美秀发。
使秀发顺滑健康，而不毛躁，并富有光泽感。
它还配备有清洁槽，能够轻松移除死亡的秀发。
name: Teezer 快干造型吹发专用解结美发梳子——半号尺寸

product_description:
Refresh your locks with the Hair After Sun Cream from Sachajuan. Ideal for all hair types, the ‘After Sun’ cream is designed to be used after hair has been exposed to UV sunlight.
Working as both a leave-in or rinse-out formula, the cream utilises Sachajuan’s signature ‘Ocean Silk’ technology, which delivers moisture and shine to locks. Also delivering a gentle styling effect, the cream leaves hair rejuvenated and healthy looking.
name: Hair After Sun Cream 125ml

product_description:
Philip Kingsley 沙龙级活化套装专为恢复健康迷人的秀发而设计，包含一瓶活化头皮护理膜和弹力素，非常适合发质较细的稀疏秀发。 这款套装可以替代专业级护理，让秀发和头皮恢复最佳状态。
活化头皮护理膜富含多种有效成分，能够刺激头皮，改善头皮状况和表现。 头皮护理膜拥有独特的脂质体运输系统，促进所有主要成分的充分吸收。 富含薄荷醇、樟脑和薄荷，促进血液循环，让头皮感到清爽舒缓。
弹力素可以增加秀发的弹性，强韧秀发，让秀发丰盈亮泽，易于打理。 -SA
name: Kingsley 沙龙级活化套装

product_description:
卷发更容易断裂，因而可使用 Joico Curl Cleansing Sulfate-Free Shampoo 进行呵护。这是一种滋润洗发水配方，富含 Curl Repair Technology™，令卷发更强韧、更具弹性、更健康。
这款洗发水含天然油脂、重构蛋白和指定聚合物的共混物，可在需要时强化和修复头发，同时细致清洁每一丝卷发，令秀发更具弹性、更易打理。
这款修护洗发水可重新恢复卷发的活力，令柔软度加倍*，并可消除干枯、毛躁的发丝。每次使用都能打造富于弹性的、持久的、符合预期的卷发。 - K.N
name: Curl Cleansing Sulfate-Free Shampoo for Bouncy, Healthy Curls (1000ml)

product_description:
Sexy Hair 健康秀发大豆三麦免洗护发素可有效护理您的缕缕秀发，这款奢华的深层滋养护发素具有顺发、滋养和修复毛囊的功效，让您的秀发更有活性和弹性。
这款护发素的专业配方中蕴含有大豆蛋白，可从发根到发梢强健发丝，而椰子油萃取物有助于顺滑和柔软发丝。 所蕴含的维他命 B5 具有保湿作用，能够锁住发丝的光泽。 它适合所有发质，第一次使用就能让您拥有所期待的健康亮色的秀发。
name: Hair 健康秀发大豆三麦免洗护发素 1000ml

product_description:
这款 KORRES 大米蛋白质和椴树 Shampoo（适合精细 Hair） 是专为细发设计的，拥有创新配方，可令您获得快速、明显的效果。 这款洗头水结合了钙、镁、锰和锌，可为头皮细胞提供能量并令脆发再生，对于那些头发稀薄需要质感和丰盈的人士是必备之物。
这款洗头水蕴含的大米和小麦蛋白可增强弹性、保护头发免受断裂，可令秀发具有无与伦比的光泽和质感。
name: 大米蛋白质和椴树Shampoo（适合精细Hair (250ml)

product_description:
Sexy Hair 魅惑金发护发素可有效护理您的秀发，这款强效护发素蕴含有具有保湿护发功能的抗氧化剂。
其配方非常适合金发、亮发或银发，能够专业地修复和滋养秀发；其完美的平衡技术（蕴含有柑橘、
蜂蜜和藜麦）有助于使秀发恢复水润，保护发色的活泼性，从皮层深层调节发丝，以使秀发更亮泽健壮，使其看起来更加健康。 这款护发素可有效保护发丝表面，防止断发和减少分叉，与此同时防止褪色。
使发丝更柔软，拥有像镜子一样闪亮的光泽。
name: Hair 魅惑金发护发素 1000ml

product_description:
Add bounce and body to your hair with OUAI Volume Conditioner, a body-building formula developed by celebrity hair stylist, Jen Atkin to soften and lift every strand.
 
Expertly detangling, the conditioner softens and nourishes whilst delivering a unique, Smart Technology complex to replenish moisture and add enviable bounce and volume. Its blend of Tamarind Seed extract and Smart Keratin help to build volume whilst intensely hydrating. Hair looks healthier, glossier and volumised.
name: Volume Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
Achieve surfer-inspired locks with TIGI's Catwalk Texturising Salt Spray; a lightweight salt-infused spray that allows you to create animated, beachy waves with ease.
Creating definition with light hold, the sea salt spray helps to fight frizz and humidity, whilst adding texture and volume from root to tip. Can be sprayed into wet or dry hair to add body and movement, leaving hair tousled and flexible with ocean vibes.
name: Catwalk Texturising Salt Spray 270ml

product_description:
NIOXIN 俪康丝系统 6 清洁洗发水 (300ml) 是三步法中的第一步，适用于特别稀薄、中等和粗糙的自然和烫染头发，使头发丰盈浓密。俪康丝采用独特的 Scalp Access Delivery System®，其净化成分能够清除环境残留和皮脂，SPF15 还能帮助头发和头皮抵御日晒伤害。这项技术中糅合的维生素和植物萃取物确保头发健康，同时不会带走必需的天然油脂。
Glyo-Shield®技术可提供白茶提取物与薄荷油以及清洁和保护护理剂，为您带来清爽湿润且健康的头皮，准备就绪开始俪康丝流程。
清洁配方中添加 Smoothplex®技术，旨在通过调理和保护秀芳，避免受损断裂，同时抚平毛躁，从而防止头发脱落稀疏。- K.R
俪康丝使用针对各种发质的一系列 3 步头发护理套装，实现健康头皮，促进头发生长并呈现美丽光泽，令头发完全焕然新生。该品牌致力于帮助饱受头发脱落稀疏困扰的人，能够为全世界超过 50% 的人的提供帮助。
name: 俪康丝系统 6 清洁洗发水，适合明显稀疏、中度及毛糙、正常的烫染头发 (300ml)

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Argan Oil Moisture Repair Gift Set，保持健康迷人的接发。这是一个滋养产品组合，令秀发充满活力，体量饱满，并散发不可抗拒的魅力。
1 x Pearl Nourishing Argan Shampoo (250ml)：
丰富的配方能温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，同时提升亮泽，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。 采用有机摩洛哥坚果油、乳蛋白和角蛋白专门配制而成，可深入渗透至发干，以保持水分含量。 这款洗发水适用于保持健康的接发，令发丝如丝绸般柔软，体量饱满。

1 x Pearl Nourishing Argan Oil Conditioner (250ml)：
一款活力护发素，致力于滋养、修复和理顺发丝。 这款护发素适用于所有发质，结合了有机摩洛哥坚果油和乳蛋白，以顺滑、滋润和滋养每一束发丝。 可呈现拥有镜面般光泽的健康秀发。
1 x Heat Protection Spray (250ml)：
这款不油腻的喷雾适合在吹干、拉直和造型过程中使用。其配方可为秀发补充水分并避免热损伤，实现拥有高亮泽度的、易于打理的柔顺发丝。
1 x Pearl Nourishing Argan Oil Mask (250ml)：
使用这款产品恢复秀发活力。其配方可重塑健康秀发。 这款发膜适用于所有发质，富含有机摩洛哥坚果油、乳蛋白和角蛋白，可渗入秀发并提升含水量，实现如丝绸般柔软的发丝。 实现拥有高亮泽度的、易于打理的柔顺发丝。
1 x Argan Serum (80ml)：
使用 Beauty Works Argan Serum，锁住水分。 这款活力产品采用了最优质的摩洛哥坚果油混合配方，深层滋养秀发，使其健康亮泽。 这款精华液适用于自然秀发，防止分叉并避免热力造型损伤，而不会显得颓丧。
name: Works Argan Oil Moisture Repair Gift Set

product_description:
KeraStraight KS Style Rescue Crème是一款终极急效修复产品，能补充发干缺失的水分和蛋白质，强效滋养受损和化学染烫的秀发。 蕴含氨基酸和本品牌独有的KS Care and Protect Complex，补水保湿，修复秀发，同时闭合分叉。 - K.R
主要益处：- 锁住和维持水分- 闭合分叉和修复受损部位 - 重建和闭合毛鳞片，恢复健康
name: KS Style Rescue Crème (120ml)

product_description:
The Kérastase Reflection Masque Fina and Copper Touche Chromatique Duo offers personalised care for your colour-treated hair. Combining an ink-in-care, highly concentrated hair dye formula with a nourishing mask, the pair work in tandem to correct and brighten faded colour for restored softness, colour luminosity and radiance.
Touche Chromatique (10ml)
A colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique. The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your hair; it lends hair a radiant, enhanced copper finish. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
Masque Chromatique (200ml)
A nourishing hair mask specially developed to enhance and protect the colour intensity of colour-treated or highlighted, fine hair. Promoting prolonged colour vibrancy, the deep conditioning treatment utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth with enhanced shine, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasis light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant. Expect vivid colour and light-reflecting shine, for longer.
name: Reflection Masque Fins and Copper Touche Chromatique Duo

product_description:
Color WOW 色哇发根染色粉进行四种发色的发根染色护理，能在进行两次沙龙护理之间快速遮掩色差迥异的发根。
这款创新型的矿物质粉末采用避免凌乱的简单应用配方，含有多种色素，可与发丝无缝融合，实现完美而不油腻的遮瑕，让您更加自信。
内置于带有镜子的粉盘中，配备有双头刷子，可将其轻松涂抹到干燥的发丝上，这款染色粉具有防水性和防汗性。 染色效果可一直保持至您下一次洗发。
name: WOW 色哇发根染色粉—浅褐色 2.1g

product_description: Restore flat, limp and thin hair with the Biolage R.A.W. Uplift Conditioner. Especially developed for fine hair types, the creamy formula has been made from over 97% ingredients of natural origin, working to weightlessly condition and strengthen hair for enhanced body and lustre. Enriched with Kiwi extract and Kaolin Clay, it leaves hair feeling light and refreshed with optimum manageability and lustrous volume.

product_description:

因其注入了Wella Colour颜料和一流的调理剂，本护发素将使您的秀发外观和感觉像丝般柔软，同时其丰富的配方将确保您的发色保持清新亮丽并具有多维层次感。

用Wella专业版干性粗糙固定哑光成形发霜达到粗燥的哑光妆效。 固定发型的同时增加前卫的妆效——这款发霜正是您的头发一直期待的。
Wella专业版干性粗糙固定哑光成形发霜的定型级别是3。
以拳击为主题的品牌，定会为您打造引入注目的形象。 这款现代而又传统的 Uppercut Deluxe men's Quiff Roller 头梳有助于您保持完美的发型。 塑料把手和橡胶材质设计，可实现极佳舒适握感，同时筒状刷头的间隔设计提升抓力，更好地控制秀发。 E.N.

噴在濕潤的頭髮後造型或者噴在乾燥的頭髮後用手打理。

product_description:
Treat your hair to the benefits of Briogeo's Rosarco™ Blow Dry Perfection and Heat Protectant Crème; an antioxidant-rich formula that works to nourish, soften and enhance shine without extra weight or greasy residue.
Harnessing the powers of Rosehip, Coconut and Argan Oils, the blowdry cream provides heat protection up to 220°C, whilst defending against breakage, UV rays and environmental aggressors to leave hair strong and healthy-looking from root to tip. Algae Extract helps to fight frizz and flyaways, revealing calm, manageable locks that are easier to style.
name: Rosarco Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Crème (118ml)

product_description: Perfect for creating salon-worthy results, the MiTi Professional Hair Tie securely holds hair in place without the need for clips and pins. Suitable for all hair types, its unique spiral shape leaves no indents or kinks, whilst its ultra-comfortable, smooth design minimises head stress even when worn during sleep. Fun and functional, you can create your desired up-do with ease.

product_description:
彻底清洁您的秀发。  蕴含活力精油和天然的薄荷、葡萄柚和桦树精华，卓效控油光，滋养秀发，促进头部和头皮健康。
该洗发水对头皮有清凉刺激效果，提亮发色同时令您神清气爽。 -SA

product_description: TIGI S-Factor Body Booster 是一款丰盈喷雾，可赋予发根能量，令秀发丰盈亮泽。 其轻盈而强效的配方融合了水解小麦蛋白和紫外线滤光剂，以保护秀发免受热力造型工具造成的损伤并降低湿度的影响，从而呈现更柔滑的发丝。 获得更富于弹性和光泽的动感健康秀发。 E.N.

product_description:
非常适合由于经常进行造型或化学染烫而变得干枯粗糙的头发。其奢华配方成分丰富，能深入滋润干枯头发。
本品富含K2复合成分，内含坚果、漆树果仁和葡萄籽精油，能温和去除杂质，减少毛燥，提升顺滑度，令秀发焕发闪亮光泽。
同时，这款洗发水不含硫酸盐和苯甲酸酯类，集中修复最受损伤的部位， 令秀发柔软顺滑、恢复生机。 - L.M.

product_description:
这款洗发乳非常温和，适合挑染、敏感或染过色的秀发。
  Christophe Robin抗氧化洗发乳（4种精油+蓝莓）富含丰富的滋养成分，为染过色的秀发提供完美呵护。
Christophe Robin抗氧化洗发乳（4种精油+蓝莓）浓缩多种植物精油，滋养发丝，使其重现活力，防止发色变得暗淡。

product_description:
Developed for normal to dry, or environmentally stressed hair, the Giovanni 50/50 Balanced™ Shampoo helps to restore calm, smooth and manageable strands from root to tip.
Powered by unique Eco Chic Technology™ (based on a combination of beauty, fashion, science and nature), the lightweight shampoo effortlessly eliminates impurities, whilst hydrating botanical extracts replenish and revitalise. Hair is clean and balanced after use.

product_description:
仅使用一次Alterna Caviar抗衰老隔夜Hair Rescue后，您会拥有柔滑、光泽的头发，而且感觉非常强壮、更加健康，明显焕发青春。
瞬间渗入秀发，Alterna Caviar抗衰老隔夜Hair Rescue在您睡眠时为头发提供营养物质，从而获得良好修复效果。 不含对羟苯甲酸酯、麸质、矿物油和邻苯二甲酸盐，不会在枕头上留下残留。
使用说明：
name: Caviar抗衰老隔夜Hair Rescue（100ml）

product_description: 让头发充满弹性和活力。内含天然丝质萃取物，让纤弱发质丰盈，充满活力。
name: 威娜专业滋养增发洗发露 - 适合纤弱发质和普通发质 (250ml)

product_description:
铜色款 KC Professional Color Mask 将会让头发色泽焕然一新，同时有助于修复秀发。 此款发膜有特殊配方，可以保持和加深目前的发色，同时会恢复头发的神采，给人一种刚刚"染过色"的感觉。
富含维他命原 B5 和角蛋白衍生物，它还能有效修复受损的头发，让秀发看起来有强度、顺滑和健康。 此护理产品不仅可以保持现有的发色，它还能使您头发的色调更加柔和。 也可以将 Color Mask 的各种色调混合起来，创建定制的色调。 - L.M.

product_description:
invisibobble Original Hair 发绳 适合任何风格或场合，可以拢住秀发，无需使用发夹和夹发针。
既好玩又有实际作用，其独特、超舒适的形状可以防止头痛和发绳扭结，而其卫生和不吸水的设计及光滑的表面意味着即使在手腕上佩戴，它也会始终保持干燥。
可在潮湿或干燥的头发上使用，不会让头发缠结，使您可以完成任何束发的发式。

product_description: 對細軟稀疏的燙染頭髮使用質地輕薄的護髮素，可增強彈性，控制水分平衡。儷康絲的系統3 頭皮煥活護髮素將角質層加強BioAmp™ 和頭皮活化Glyco-Shield™ 與白茶提取物和薄荷油獨特地混合在一起，經證明，可帶來明顯更加厚重、更加濃密的頭髮和健康的頭皮。作為三步護理套裝中的第二步，該煥活護理方案具備由抗氧化物和植物元素組成的Transactive Delivery System™，將滋養厚角質層，減少頭髮斷裂，實現健康、濃密、強韌的頭髮。 - KN
name: 俪康丝系统 3 头皮修复护发素 (1000ml) 适用于细密发质、正常到偏稀薄的发质，以及经化学处理的发质

product_description:
L'Anza苦楝树顺发精华采用绝佳配方，蕴含丰富的成分，修复功效卓著，令秀发散发自然光泽，迷人光彩，不扁塌。
特别添加了具有传奇色彩的苦楝树萃取物和透明质酸，令秀发丝般柔滑。 让秀发拥有丝般触感，闪耀年轻光泽。
使用说明：

Replenish dry, dull hair with the Biolage R.A.W. Nourish Conditioner. Specially developed for lifeless and lacklustre locks, the creamy formula has been made from over 97% ingredients of natural origin, delivering essential nutrients to help improve shine and strengthen individual follicles. Fortified with Coconut Oil and Kaolin Clay, it absorbs excess oils and leaves tresses feeling touchably soft with enhanced vitality.
name: R.A.W. Nourish Conditioner 325ml

product_description:
Christophe Robin果醋金发上光露是一款免洗护理液，富含有益的果醋和轻微的香味，能亮化金发。 它采用重构配方，具有补水、修复和亮化的特性，作用是激活颜色强度，产生清澈明亮的金色色调，去除头发和头皮上的杂质和不断堆积的化妆品。
这款上光露带有轻微香气，将使头发看上去和感觉上健康、平衡，并且色泽更闪亮。 也可以揉进皮肤，产生淡淡的香味。 - K.N
在用毛巾擦干的头发上： 
洗发后从发根涂到发梢。
在干头发上  ： 
作为自然风干香波使用——喷到发根和发中上产生清新作用。
在皮肤上： 
揉进皮肤，产生香味和色调。
喷到晒伤和蜇伤上。
name: Robin果醋金发上光露（200毫升）

product_description:
Alterna魚子醬瞬間修復發膜是一款強效修復發膜，適合乾枯受損髮質，染燙髮質。可即時修復秀發，富含重塑因子可保護受損髮質，重現頭髮自然健康光澤。深層滋養，柔順打結髮絲，賦活髮絲新生命。 
 Alterna魚子醬瞬間修復發膜創新配方，即時恢復調理和重建受損毛鱗片，採用珍貴的深海魚子醬為原料，應用最新微乳化魚子醬抗老晶球科技，將納米級營養元素濃縮進晶球內，活化髮絲，展現新生閃耀光澤，巧妙融合各類滋養成分，使細胞達到活化並恢復生機，瞬間賦予頭髮活力。重新密封毛髮受損部位，恢復健康順滑，鎖住水分和必須脂肪酸，蛋白質，礦物質和維他命，給予秀發深度修復保護，使用後秀發更柔軟光滑好打理。還有助於保護頭髮防止分叉。

product_description:
Green People Daily Aloe Shampoo 的温和无刺激配方可舒缓所有发质，但对于易生湿疹和牛皮癣的肌肤特别有益。 这款产品的保持时间是普通洗发水的 3 倍，是理想的家具卫生间用品。
Green People Daily Aloe Shampoo 是基于最温和的清洁和发泡剂，令秀发感觉柔软而纯净。 这款洗发水不含 SLS（存在于多数主流洗发水中，但可能导致头皮瘙痒）和苯甲酸酯，是大自然可以提供的最纯净的洗发产品。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 这些产品也适用于素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Daily Aloe Shampoo (200ml)

product_description:
Pro Blo AddME 混合套装适用于吹干秀发，它是一组用于连接至 CurlMe 造型工具的六个中号陶瓷涂层的卷发筒。 CurlME 专家级的设计让您在家就能再创专业级沙龙品质的发型，它是一款变革型的美发梳，配备有可拆卸的手柄，以便使陶瓷涂层的卷发筒固定到位，直至秀发完全冷却定型富有弹性的大卷。
这款组合套装非常适合较长或较浓密的发质，它配备有六个附加卷发筒和六个发夹，以将卷发筒固定到位。 让缕缕秀发更浓密顺滑，增强秀发的光泽感。

product_description:
Haircare expert Christophe Robin introduces the Hydrating Leave-In Mist with Aloe Vera; a non-sticky, naturally-derived, leave-in treatment that works to boost hydration levels for instant freshness.
The ultra-lightweight formula is free from any silicones, infusing hair with a concentrated dosage of pure Aloe Vera Gel to intensively replenish moisture levels and impart a comforting sensation to the scalp that doesn’t feel greasy or heavy.
Improving manageability and tackling unruly knots, the mist restores hair to optimum vitality with a natural, polished finish and an invigorating scent. Suitable for all hair types.
name: Robin Hydrating Leave-In Mist with Aloe Vera 180ml

product_description:
酱色款 KC Professional Color Mask 将会让头发色泽焕然一新，同时有助于修复秀发。 此款发膜有特殊配方，可以保持和加深目前的发色，同时会恢复头发的神采，给人一种刚刚"染过色"的感觉。

product_description:
使用L'Anza Keratin Healing Oil Shampoo（300毫升），换得一头光泽四溢的秀发。 本款乳状洗发水，具有厚重奢华之感，能够有效清洁头发多余油脂和杂质，同时保护发色，增加头发数量，补充角质蛋白，提升发质水分和强度。
本款产品结合L'anza IV Phyto Complex配方，包含四种滋养型植物油的独特配伍，实现强效滋润，同时纳米科学技术的应用，能让您的秀发完美健康。 您的头发将变得柔顺丝滑，呈现健康光泽。 使用说明：
name: Keratin Healing Oil Shampoo（300毫升）

product_description:
使用这款神奇的 DS 实验室光谱 RS 护理您稀疏的秀发，可有效治疗脱发。 它不含任何刺激性的化学成分，涂抹之后能带给您舒适感，可有效改善您的整体头皮环境。
DS 实验室光谱 RS 是患有脱发症的男士和女士们的理想选择。 它采用最先进的技术，可有效为毛囊提供营养成分，促进毛囊循环和新陈代谢。 其主要目的是为发丝的卵膜细胞提供营养物质。
所研发的超微粒子比肌肤细胞小 200 多倍，旨在使其渗透到肌肤所需的深层，然后由酶进行分解，以逐渐释放营养成分，获得预期的效果。
使用说明：
name: 实验室光谱 Rs——防脱护理（60ml）

invisibobble Original Hair 发绳 适合任何风格或场合，可以拢住秀发，无需使用发夹和夹发针。

product_description:
Sebastian Texturizer是一款专业液体定型发胶，为头发带来质感和运动性，无论是何种头发类型。 这款定型液体发胶利用小麦和大豆蛋白配制而成，可提供灵活保持性，为头发增加丰盈度和定型力，并增强弹性。
帮助您塑造质感发型，Sebastian Professional Texturizer 为柔软保持的发型塑造建立了光泽和弹性基础。
众所周知，Sebastian professional 对一切颜色和形状进行了实验，旨在打造无所畏惧的发型时尚。 Sebastian 美发产品渴求创新，不断改变发型设计的规则，有助于您打造梦寐以求的发型。 -SA

product_description:
使用温和的 L’Anza KB2 Bodify Shampoo，让稀疏的头发丰盈再现。 这款洗发水拥有丰盈配方，在丰盈秀发的同时清除秀发上的积聚物。

使用说明：
