product_description:
使用新生活力终极套装，令中性和油性发质重获新生活力。 产品涵盖完整护发三部曲，净发、护发、补充流失的水分，增加丰盈度，令秀发洁净，丝般柔滑，闪耀光泽。 - K.R
新生活力终极套装包含：
新生活力洗发水（250ml）有效清除秀发污渍和护发产品残留物，富含荷荷芭蛋白，令秀发重现健康状态。 洗发水特别添加了大豆和水解小麦，令秀发蓬松丰盈，洁净亮泽。
新生活力护发素（250ml）这款轻盈的护发素能有效理顺并滋润每一根发丝，令秀发丰盈，不扁塌。 增加秀发的丰盈度与光泽，带给您顺滑不打结的秀发。
新生活力发膜（100ml）这款深层护理的发膜能够为秀发和头皮提供新生活力，补充水分，而且不会有油腻的感觉。 这款发膜能够补充秀发流失的水分，恢复健康的头皮，带给您柔软顺滑、轻盈蓬松的秀发。

使用 TIGI S-Factor Smoothing Lusterizer Shampoo，实现如丝绸般柔软的秀发。 这款丰盈洗发水能温和地去除秀发与头皮的多余油脂、污垢和杂质，同时提升亮泽，令秀发充满健康活力，而不会显得颓丧。 采用维生素原 B5 复合物专门配制而成，提供高光泽度的妆效并深入渗透至发干，以保持滋润。 这款洗发水适合日常使用，可用于滋润干燥或受损的头发，并在清洗过程中保护发色。 E.N.
name: S-Factor Smoothing Shampoo 250ml

product_description: Cloud Nine发夹是必备之物，旨在使您的 Cloud Nine 卷发器固定在适当位置，如此可以打造出引人注目的发型。 这款发夹一套四个，尺寸不同，适合不同大小的卷发器，Perfect 长发或厚发。 这款包装的发夹适合 50-60mm 的卷发器。 K.D.
name: Nine 发夹尺寸 (2) 50-60mm

product_description:
Maximise your blowout with the Paul Mitchell Neuro® Round Titanium Thermal Brush Medium. Boasting heat-resistant bristles up to 260°, the ventilated titanium barrel retains heat and offers superior drying time over traditional ceramic brushes.
The anti-static corkscrew nylon fibres seamlessly glide through hair without pulling or tugging, minimising knots and tangles for a smooth, supple finish. Featuring an ergonomic soft-touch handle and integrated magnetic cap to enable the brush to stand freely.
name: Mitchell Neuro Round Titanium Thermal Brush - Medium

product_description: Kebelo新生活力护发素（500ml）专为中性和油性发质配制，能够有效理顺、滋润秀发，富含荷荷芭蛋白，令秀发重现健康状态。 护发素特别添加了大豆和水解小麦，令秀发蓬松丰盈，洁净亮泽。 - K.R

Protect, prolong and enhance your colour with Kérastase Reflection Touche Chromatique in 'Red', a colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique.
The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your red hair; it enhances shine and vibrancy for a beautifully, striking finish. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. 
Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
name: Reflection Touche Chromatique - Red 10ml

product_description:
用 Joico Color Endure Treatment Masque (250ml) 滋养并保护您的秀发。 这款深层滋润发膜是专门为染过色的头发配制的，可明显地改善秀发的状况，令其变得强韧、柔顺、富有光泽。
其配方蕴含 Joico 独有的多光谱防护复合物，可增强色彩的完整性并延长发色的寿命，这意味着您去发廊的时间间隔可以更长。 它富含保护性的绿茶、抗氧化剂和 UV 防护因子混合物，可以保护秀发免受自由基损伤，防止发色褪色和改变。 使用说明：
name: Color Endure Treatment Masque(250ml)

product_description:
Treat dry, damaged hair to the KMS MoistRepair Conditioner; a replenishing, detangling formula that helps to restore the hair's natural protective coating without weighing you down.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including Lactic Acid, 18-MEA and an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the conditioner delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst combating split ends and breakage to leave you with strong, healthy-looking locks from root to tip. Expect smooth, salon-worthy hair with improved manageability.
name: Moist Repair Conditioner 750ml

product_description:
NIOXIN System 6 Scalp Treatment是一种有效和创新性的免洗型的治疗，专门用于显著变薄、中等到粗糙、天然或经化学处理的头发，是NIOXIN三步护理系统的最后一步。 经过专门设计，有助于使您的秀发变得强壮、光滑和滋润，它所含的抗氧化剂和植物成分协同工作，以保持一个更清新的头皮环境。
配方中采用了Glyco Shield®，Smoothplex®和Transactive Delivery System®等多种技术，该护理方法会使秀发愈加饱满，同时增加每一根发丝的强度，减少脱发和破损；它的薄荷油、White茶叶提取物及纯净剂的组合有助于消除堵塞毛囊的残留物，给头皮超清爽的感觉。 您将用于富有光泽、滋润和更浓密的秀发，同时头发也重新焕发了活力。
name: System 6 Scalp 治疗 200ml

product_description:
KMS加州自由造型洗髮水 
 KMS 的這款塑型洗髮水專為提升髮絲順滑度，煥現柔順健康效果而設計，使用這款洗髮水也是您擁有沙龍般美髮效果的第一步。 
採用獨特配方，專為保護髮絲遠離因熱處理招致的損傷而設計，讓您完美造型隨心享，無需擔心損傷髮絲。 
使用說明：
name: 加州自由造型洗发水 - 超大装 (750ml)

product_description:
高濃縮深層滋養髮膜，能夠更新、活化修復任何受損髮質，可立即感受到髮絲重生的喜悅與健康亮澤的質感。 
適合所有髮質類型, 此款發膜使用世界上10項頂級珍貴的先進配方：非洲可可萃取物、琉璃醣碳基酸、魚子醬抗老化複合物、護色光酵素複合物、意大利白松露油、香檳葡萄籽油、保加利亞月見草、阿拉伯乳香、摩洛哥皂質樹皮、山金車花，呈現出超高效能的活化療護，讓秀發享受真正精緻粹煉後的完美極致呵護。 
 使用方法：
name: TEN顶级梦幻发膜150ml

product_description: Tone, brighten and nourish fair hair tones with the Brighten My Blonde Leave in Treatment from RPR. The moisturising treatment is infused with a blend of Carob Proteins, Chamomile and Jojoba Oil, which work to visibly reduce unwanted yellow and brassy tones. The formula will leave blonde, grey and highlighted hair incredibly luminous, smooth and shiny.
name: Brighten My Blonde Leave in Treatment 150ml

product_description:
Treat your hair to the benefits of the Wella Professionals Oil Reflections Mask; a deeply nourishing, shine-enhancing formula that works to restore sleek, luscious locks from root to tip.
With a host of conditioning ingredients, including Camellia Oil and White Tea Extract, the weekly treatment infuses individual strands with long-lasting moisture and hydration. Hair is revitalised, restructured and restored without extra weight.
name: Professionals Oil Reflections Luminous Reboost Mask 500ml

product_description:
俪康丝系统 1 头皮护理液，适用于正常和纤细自然头发，令秀发更浓密，头皮立感清爽。独特的免冲洗喷雾护理，采用多种创新技术，能够使正常及细软的自然发质更加浓密，同时维持清爽的头皮环境。采用 BioAMP®、Activ-Renewal® 和 Transactive Delivery System® 技术，让每缕发丝变得浓密，减少脱发，同时清爽成份白茶提取物和薄荷油可恢复头皮活力。
系统 1 头皮护理液是三步 俪康丝系统的第三步，是护发必备品。 K.D.
name: 俪康丝系统 1 头皮护理液（适合正常和纤细自然头发）(100ml)

product_description: NIOXIN System 3 Scalp Revitaliser Conditioner的配方已经专家级融合了先进的技术，以改善精细、一般至稀疏、染过色的头发，帮助提高秀发的弹性、控制水分平衡。 这款轻质护发素采用了增厚性 BioAmp™ 和Glyco-Shield™，这是一种双重保护技术，可以用白茶提取物和薄荷油保护和焕醒头皮，是旨在增加秀发密度和活力的三步护理机制的第二步。 这款活肤护发素凭借其抗氧化剂和植物性药材的 Transactive Delivery System™，可同时扩增纹理和平滑紧绷的角质层，令您的头发更强韧、更浓密，头皮保持健康。 - K.N.
name: System 3 Scalp Revitaliser Conditioner（适合精细、一般至稀疏、经过化学处理的Hair 1000ml - （价值 68.30 英镑）

product_description: Discover extreme texture with the Wicked Wax Styling Pomade from Giovanni. Designed to separate and define locks, the pomade is ideal for short hair and allows you to style hair with ease. Leaving hair with a long-lasting shine, the formula works on both dry and damp fibers, holding locks and delivering enviable texture to your chosen style.
name: Wicked Wax Styling Pomade 57g

product_description:
这款HairbondHair 造型膏可赋予头发惊人的造型质地，令发型保持稳定，整天不变。 这款Hair 造型膏旨在强力定型，它具有香草奶油太妃糖的奇妙香味，用后无论您去往何处，均会引人注目。
这款 Hair 造型膏是终极发型设计产品，可令您拥有帅气迷人的头发、如同在沙龙般打造的完美发型。 用这款奢华的发型设计产品 Treat自己。
name: Hair 造型膏 (100ml)

product_description:
使用 KeraCare 自然质感定型霜打造丰盈的魅力卷发。 这款专门配制的水润定型霜将让秀发手感变得柔软，更添光泽，特别添加了印度醋栗和头发果子植物精华、摩洛哥坚果、阿比西尼亚和蓖麻油，为秀发补充水分。
这款奢华的定型霜是百变造型的完美基底，使用后，您可以轻松卷曲秀发，打造持久定型的魅力卷发。 除此之外，这款多效造型霜还可以顺滑秀发，减少毛躁，让秀发变得更易于打理。 - L.M.
name: 自然质感定型霜（907g）

product_description: 来自Sebastian Professional FOUNDATION系列，Color Ignite Multi Conditioner专门用来保湿和护理多色调和漂浅的头发。 添加光泽的同时保持和提高色彩鲜艳度达25％，该发泡、微泡配方提供持久的色彩、令人羡慕的光泽和华丽柔软、滋润的头发。 - K.N.
name: Professional Color Ignite Multi Conditioner (200ml)

product_description:
Effortlessly hold hair in place with the invisibobble ORIGINAL You're Pawesome Hair Tie; a limited-edition piece taken from the brand’s unique Circus Collection. Arriving in time for summer and festival season, the collection boasts an array of colourful creatures that guarantee to brighten any up-do.
The ‘You're Pawesome’ hair ties arrive in a metallic hue and are housed inside decorative packaging adorned with an array of playful pandas. Perfect for any style or occasion, the invisibobble hair tie works to hold hair in place without the use of clips and pins.
Fun and functional, the unique, ultra-comfortable shape prevents headaches and kinks, whilst the hygienic, non-soaking design and smooth surface means the bobble stays dry even when worn on the wrist. Can be used in wet or dry hair without tangling, allowing you to create any up-do you desire.
name: Circus Collection ORIGINAL You're Pawesome Hair Tie

product_description:
Minimise drying time with the Aquis Lisse Luxe Hair Turban and Hair Towel White Bundle; an effective duo that assist in drying all hair types, including curly, fine and damaged hair. The set hosts a hair towel and a hair turban, each crafted using new generation Aquitex, which allows for improved absorbency and comfort, whilst providing gentle treatment.
Lisse Luxe Hair Towel – White
The Lisse Luxe Hair Towel wraps easily around wet hair, tucking in neatly to leave your hands free whilst hair dries. Use of the Lisse Luxe Hair Towel decreases drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber. (Dimensions: 50cm x 107cm)
Lisse Luxe Hair Turban – White
The turban quickly and conveniently wraps around wet hair, fastening with a single button closure and leaving hands free whilst hair dries. The towel turban is able to decrease drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber.
name: Lisse Luxe Hair Turban and Hair Towel - White Bundle (Worth £65)

product_description:
使用 Philip B Drop Dead Straightening Baume，远离造型烦恼。这是一款不油腻、不含硅的水溶定型助剂，赋予卷发或波浪发无缠结的顺滑妆效。
母菊、蜀葵和辣根提取物可让卷发和波浪发放松，使得完美吹干造型更易于实现。 不含香料的 Philip B Drop Dead Straightening Baume 致力于保持直发造型，有助于消除毛躁，同时缩短吹干时间。 Drop Dead Straightening Baume 是一款热活化产品，最好用于热造型。
使用说明：
name: B Drop Dead Straightening Baume (178ml)

product_description:
Protect and revitalise hair on-the-go with the Paul Mitchell Ultimate Color Repair Mask Take Home Kit; a selection of conveniently sized products to cleanse, condition and repair. Specifically developed for colour-treated hair, the range works in tandem to prolong hair colour and promote healthier looking locks.
Ultimate Color Repair® Shampoo (75ml)
The sulphate-free shampoo removes excess oil, dirt and impurities from colour-treated hair, whilst Sugar Cane and Lemon Peel extracts enhance shine for healthy-looking locks. Its Quinoa Color Repair complex delivers protein to repair hair strands and lock in moisture so you can experience vibrant, manageable locks. The luxurious shampoo preserves coloured hair by providing UV protection against harmful damage and environmental stresses to ensure colour is maintained after each wash.
Ultimate Color Repair® Conditioner (75ml)
Specially formulated with the Quinoa Color Repair complex, which penetrates deep into hair to create a protective barrier and preserve colour-treated hair, leaving it vibrant and healthy-looking. An effective blend of Shea Butter, Jojoba and Soybean Oil soften hair and enhance shine, whilst nourishing vitamins lock in moisture. The lightweight conditioner contains powerful antioxidants to shield hair from exposure to harmful UV rays, environmental aggressors and fading of colour.
Ultimate Color Repair® Mask (75ml)
Effortlessly combed through damp tresses, the easy-to-use mask replenishes hair with its Quinoa Color Repair Complex, which locks in colour and has a reparative effect. A hair-loving blend of Shea Butter, Jojoba and Soybean oil works to envelop hair in nourishing vitamins that hydrate the fiber and leave locks touchably soft with reflective shine. With potent antioxidants to shield against colour fade, the hair mask leaves coloured hair vibrant, moisturised and salon-fresh.
Ultimate Color Repair® Triple Rescue (25ml)
A non-greasy spray developed to preserve colour-treated hair, whilst enhancing shine and manageability. With a dual-phase formula and UV protection, the spray shields coloured hair from environmental stresses and excessive heat damage that can lead to dull, faded locks. Its Quinoa Color Repair complex intensely conditions hair to leave it vibrant, healthy-looking and full of moisture.
name: Mitchell Ultimate Color Repair Mask Take Home Kit

product_description:
Philip B 的这款 Oud Royal Forever Shine Conditioner 采用植物型缓效水化因子精心研制而成，将水分和营养注入每一根头发，让您的发结倍感光滑，超级闪亮。
这款护发素非常适用于唤醒秀发，消除卷曲，其富含滋养、温暖的木香，L 氨基酸可以唤醒干燥发株，无需重量便可消除卷曲。 这款创新滋养护发素不含苯甲酸酯类、硫和甲醛，给你华丽的丝般感受，让您每天都感受沙龙级的清新。
name: B Oud Royal Forever Shine Conditioner

product_description:
用L'Anza Healing Style喷露凝胶 (250ml) 灵活地打造发型。 这款轻巧的喷雾可强力定型，而不会令您感到沉重或者使头发扁塌。
它的配方采用了L'Anza的Keratin 疗愈体系，可以修复损坏区域，同时允许您打造可管理的发型。 它富含的仙人掌提取物，还可以提供高达 260℃ 的过热保护，以及紫外线防护剂，可令您的头发免受太阳自然光线的损害。 使用说明：
name: Healing Style喷雾凝胶 (250ml)

product_description:
Restore luminous, healthy-looking locks with KMS ColorVitality Shampoo; a radiance-reviving formula that works to cleanse, hydrate and preserve colour vibrancy.
Harnessing the powers of an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the lightweight shampoo gently purifies and refreshes hair, whilst creating a luxurious lather that locks in colour and helps to prevent fading in between salon appointments. Expect smooth, sleek and glossy locks with enhanced tone.
name: Color Vitality Shampoo 750ml

product_description:
具有抗靜電功效，其柔軟的氣墊保證了梳頭時的輕柔按壓力度，而圓形梳齒和寬大的梳齒間距在梳頭時不會讓頭髮打結，給頭皮輕柔的護理。這款大號梳特別適合濃密長發使用。 
該獨特的開縫髮梳使用輕量型楓木製作而成，結實易用，適用於一般梳理或吹乾。梳子上有大洞，能讓熱量快速散發，這樣能讓頭髮更快變乾，受熱也更均勻​​，也就是說，使用吹風機的時間更短。 
使用說明：
name: Kingsley 菲利普金斯利气孔直板梳

product_description: Neutralise and purify locks with the De-Chlorinate Shampoo from RPR, a clarifying formula to deeply cleanse hair and eliminate odours, chemicals and product build up. Ideal for swimmers, the shampoo helps to remove green tones from blonde hair and prevent further discolouration. Enriched with refreshing Ginko and Cucumber extracts, it’s gentle enough for daily use and leaves hair soft, shiny and perfectly balanced.
name: De-Chlorinate Shampoo 200ml

product_description: 使用 men-u LIQUIFFLEX (15ml)，实现持久多变造型。这是一款独特造型产品，专为男士设计。 实现发量增加，但不残留粘性物。每次使用都能实现沙龙级清爽的效果。 本品适合所有发质和发型，快速液化，使用方便。 K.D.
name: Liquifflex (15ml)

product_description: 使用 Murdock London Quince and Oakmoss Shampoo，温和地清洁秀发。这是一个打造特色男性美容产品的品牌，让他们在家感觉很舒适温馨。 其独特的配方含有小麦蛋白，可有效地深入渗透至秀发并强化毛发纤维。 芦荟和燕麦提取物可增强光泽，呈现更丰盈、更具体量的秀发。 这款轻盈洗发水适用于所有发质，可转变暗哑的头发，令其恢复柔滑质地，并镇静敏感头皮，提高舒适性。 E.N.
name: London Quince and Oakmoss Shampoo (250ml)

product_description: 使用 TIGI S-Factor Smoothing Lusterizer Conditioner，转变缺乏光泽的发丝。 其独特的配方富含荷荷巴和鳄梨油，以提升光泽，令秀发充满健康活力。 这款轻盈护发素适用于所有发质，可顺滑秀发并控制毛躁和凌乱的头发，同时赋予亚洲梨和木瓜的馥郁芳香。 从发根到发梢强韧和滋润秀发，实现如丝绸般柔软的发丝。 E.N.
name: S-Factor Smoothing Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
Sexy Hair 强效快干丰盈啫喱让您的秀发看起来更加浓密丰盈；其丰盈配方可有效从发根到发梢定型秀发。
这款啫喱蕴含有小麦蛋白和芳香薄荷、薰衣草、 西洋蓍草和甘菊萃取物，在吹干前将其均匀涂抹在彻底打湿的秀发上，能增加发量和实现中等定型效果。 内置于液压瓶中，以进行自由应用。
name: Hair 强效快干丰盈啫喱 50ml

product_description:
This Works 助眠 头发护理油，打造健康有光泽的头发。 双效合一的强大配方可修复滋润头发，使头发易于梳理。使头发散发出独特的香味，让您的睡眠达到最深度睡眠。
内含植物油混合物如：摩洛哥坚果、荷荷芭油、猴面包树等成分，使头发再现活力、闪耀光泽。带您体验柔顺亮泽的秀发。 既可涂抹在湿润的秀发，也可涂抹在干爽的秀发。 E.N.
name: Works 助眠头发护理油 80ml

product_description:
Discover a versatile hair cleanser with the Mizon Moroccan Treatment Shampoo; an all-in-one formula that offers salon results. The blending treatment effectively cleans locks, whilst treating the scalp and conditioning the fiber.
Ideal for weak and damaged hair, the vitamin-rich shampoo is fortified with Argan Oil to strengthen strands and discourage future damage. The shampoo is also infused with Salicylic acid, which provides a gentle peeling action that eliminates dead skin cells at the scalp and prevents dandruff.
Fitokeratin ensures hair boasts a healthy moisture balance, as well as promoting improvements in elasticity. Leaving hair supple and manageable, the shampoo is complete with Chamomile extract, which leaves tresses strong and ultra-shiny.
name: Moroccan Treatment Shampoo 800ml

product_description:
铜色款 KC Professional Color Mask 将会让头发色泽焕然一新，同时有助于修复秀发。 此款发膜有特殊配方，可以保持和加深目前的发色，同时会恢复头发的神采，给人一种刚刚"染过色"的感觉。
富含维他命原B5和角蛋白衍生物，它还能有效修复受损的头发，让您的头发看起来有强度、顺滑和健康。 此护理产品不仅可以保持现有的发色，它还能使您头发的色调更加柔和。 也可以将Color Mask的各种色调混合起来，创建一个定制的色调。 - L.M.
name: Professional Color Mask - Copper (200ml)

product_description: TIGI Catwalk 重建发质护发素（750ml）专为需要呵护的烫染发质而设计，这款具有重塑功效的护发素能够特别针对需要修复的区域。 这款柔顺护发素能有效减少断发和分叉，修复整体秀发；富含强大的重塑因子，能够渗入发丝，每次使用都能显著改善发质。 - E.D
name: Catwalk 重建发质护发素（750ml）

product_description:
BriogeoRosarco Hair 油是一款轻质和有修复治疗效果的产品，可对干燥、脆弱和毫无生机的头发进行护理，为秀发提供养分，调理并恢复明亮光泽。
该创新配方富含抗氧化Rosehip油，可渗透入发丝，抵御自由基损伤和紫外线，同时少量的Coconut油的则可减少头发破损和热力造型。
摩洛哥坚果油和萝卜籽提取物相结合，提供卓越的滋润效果；恢复秀发的光彩，使缺乏光泽的发丝从发根至发梢发生转变，变得更健康、更强壮。 100％来自天然，这款护发油可用于潮湿或干燥的头发。
name: Rosarco Hair油 30ml

product_description:
Phyto 發朵PhytoProgenium 洗髮露富含燕麥乳，藥蜀葵根萃取物(44%)，令頭髮柔順光滑。採用獨特配方，富含抗氧化物的橄欖葉萃取物和Progénium®。這種日常使用的洗髮露適用於所有肌膚類型，可保護有益菌群，有效維持頭皮生態系統，並減少有害菌的形成。 
使用說明：
name: 发朵 PhytoProgenium 智能调理洗发露 200ml

product_description:
Infuse weightless texture into flat, fine hair with the Giovanni Root 66™ Max Volume Conditioner; an innovative formula that works to add body and bounce to your style.
Harnessing the powers of volumising Horsetail Extract and PureOrganic Technology™, the hydrating conditioner delivers intense moisture and enhances shine, whilst creating soft, long-lasting fullness and definition without leaving hair heavy or greasy.
name: Root 66 Max Volume Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
控制髮絲時使用，無需最強定型力。不含酒精，所以不會令頭皮乾燥不適，蘊含的熱保護劑可在吹風時有效保護髮絲，另蘊含PVP 共聚物，卓效提升髮絲豐盈立體感。吹乾髮絲時強效保護髮絲，提升髮絲豐盈立體感，呈現無限亮澤。吹風時保護髮絲，並提升立體豐盈感，煥現無限亮澤秀發
 風格：輕柔定型，令秀發綻放光澤
name: Crew 美国队员轻柔定型啫喱 250ml

product_description: Kebelo新生活力护发素（250ml）专为中性和油性发质配制，能够有效理顺、滋润秀发，富含荷荷芭蛋白，令秀发重现健康状态。 护发素特别添加了大豆和水解小麦，令秀发蓬松丰盈，洁净亮泽。 - K.R

Satisfy hair’s thirst with the Ultra-Moist Conditioner from Giovanni. Ideal for dry and damaged hair, the formula conditions each fiber to leave hair smooth and supple.
Enriched with a luxurious blend of Avocado and Olive oil, the formula boasts exceptional moisture that is able to replenish dull, lacklustre locks. The conditioner works to prevent future damage to hair, including splits and breakages.
name: Ultra-Moist Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
Restore radiant, salon-worthy locks with Wella's Color Fresh; a semi-permanent hair dye that enhances vibrancy in between colour services.
Developed with a Care Complex of vitamins and conditioning agents, the ready-to-use formula adds depth and corrects tone, whilst innovative Tone2Shine technology delivers mirror-like shine that lasts up to ten washes. No mixing required.
name: Color Fresh Fresh Black 2/0 75ml

product_description:
Joico 锁色紫罗兰洗发水将带给您更进一步的护色效果。 这款洗发水将让金发恢复活力，增加发色的持久性，让秀发变得更柔软、更强韧、更易打理。
Joico 锁色紫罗兰洗发水能够让秀发恢复温暖的金色调，让迷人的金发闪耀亮泽。
锁色洗发水利用 Joico 独家三段式技术——多光谱防护复合物，增强色彩持久性，让发色变得更均匀。 它能够温和地清洁秀发，发挥锁色功效。
使用说明
name: 锁色紫罗兰洗发水（1000ml） - （价值£46.50）

product_description:
Fountain The Hair Molecule是一款可促进头发生长的美容保健品，能令您的秀发强韧健康。 香甜的浆果口味，每份为10ml，含有10000mg硅酮和200mg生物素，可共同作用促进头发和指甲快速生长，同时帮助滋润干燥头皮。
本品还蕴含适合素食者的透明质酸基质，可保持肌肤组织中的水分含量，从内部促进头发生长；不添加人工色素和人工香精，成年男女均适用。 - L.M.
name: The Hair Molecule (240ml)

product_description:
Alterna Repair Trio包含三件高效产品，可养护修复受损秀发。 这款套装中的洗发水、护发素和免洗CC 霜可修复秀发，深层滋养，重现秀发柔软水嫩光泽。 K.D.
Alterna Caviar Repairx Instant Recovery Shampoo 250ml这款创新洗发水能瞬间修复秀发，蕴含的修复性蛋白成分可重建每一根发丝，帮助缝合和填补头发上的断裂、缺失和撕裂部位。 令秀发更柔软光滑易打理，同时防止头发二次受损或断裂。 
Alterna Caviar Repairx Instant Recovery Conditioner 250ml这款强效修复护发素可帮助修复和重建严重受损的头发。 强效滋养，为每根发丝注入充足蛋白成分，减少断发，重现秀发健康光泽。
Alterna Caviar CC Cream 74ml这款神奇的免洗CC霜一次能发挥十大功效，令秀发感觉极致光亮、无比柔滑。 能提供专业级的保湿、亮泽、顺滑、柔软、抗紫外线、易打理、强韧、防断裂、抗高温和耐久效果。可单独使用或在造型前打底用。
name: Repair Trio

product_description:
Phyto PhytoLisse 精华液可使秀发立刻恢复光泽。 包含蜀葵及维他命原等成分，可在为秀发补水保湿之时，软化易卷曲的头发，使秀发蓬松。
PhytoPhytoLisse 精华液含蜀葵提取物，配合其它涂饰剂，令秀发更柔软、更光滑、更亮泽。 其轻盈配方可保护秀发免遭吹干的损害、也避免掉发。
使用说明：
name: PhytoLisse 超亮美发素50ml

product_description:
KMS加州自由造型護髮素 
這一補水配方卓效馴服髮絲，提高髮絲強韌度，讓您可以打造完美造型，整日靚麗迷人。配方豐富，卓效滲入髮絲，提高髮絲對熱處理的耐受度。
name: 加州自由造型护发素 - 超大装 (750ml)

product_description:
Color WOW 色哇一分钟定型让您实现秀发定型，它是一款不油腻的定型膏，可令发丝更顺滑，改善发质，为干燥损伤的发丝补充水分。
这款蜡状定型膏的设计旨在使难于定型的不规则毛躁发丝始终保持完美状态，同时改善发质，具有专家级的补水效果，提高发丝的水合作用，使其更加闪亮。 令干燥损伤的秀发看起来更加顺滑闪亮，使其看起来更加健康。
name: WOW 色哇一分钟定型 120 毫升

product_description: 利用 A'kin芸香草洗发液 平衡和滋养秀发；这是一款轻盈平方，专为油腻和油性发质设计。 拥有植物性清洁剂、芸香草和刺柏成分，该清新活力洗发液可清除杂质和多余油脂，避免过度干燥，同时调节皮脂产生，从而获得健康、舒适的头皮。
name: 225ml

product_description:
Vogetti 的这款 On the Up Hotshot 专业卷发梳采用大号陶瓷卷筒，在热力造型时能够高效导热，让造型更持久。 柔韧的梳齿能够有效抓取发丝，抚顺秀发，轻松造型。
Vogetti On the Up Hotshot 卷发梳带有根根分明的纤维，能够防止梳齿磨损秀发毛鳞片，为秀发提供最佳保护，防止不必要的损伤，让您轻松打造百变造型。 采用大号卷筒，方便您在造型时抓取秀发，增加秀发的蓬松度，灵动飘逸。
name: On the Up Hotshot 卷发梳

product_description:
Joico Color Infuse 红色头发护发素  可保护红色头发的鲜明色彩。其配方可防秀发褪色。本品可维持红色头发自然色彩的完整性。
本品可滋养保护每丝秀发，采用多光谱防御聚合物及有效的抗氧化剂，对抗头发褪色。可自头发内部预防紫外线对发色的损害。内含生物高级肽复合物，可从发根至发尖全面修复秀发。后续的 25 次洗发过程中，头发均不会受到损害。
您将拥有柔软顺滑的头发、毛躁头发减少；秀发将晶亮闪光、色泽鲜艳。
name: Color Infuse红色头发护发素 300ml

product_description:
Minimise drying time by using a Long Lisse Luxe Hair Towel from Aquis. Specially designed for those with long hair and suitable for all hair types, including curly, fine and damaged hair, the towel is able to provide gentle treatment.
Crafted with new generation Aquitex, the longer length towel boasts improved absorbency, as well as increased comfort. The towel wraps easily around wet hair, tucking in neatly to leave your hands free whilst hair dries. Use of the Long Lisse Luxe Hair Towel decreases drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber.
Dimensions: 50cm x 133cm
name: Long Hair Towel Lisse Luxe White

product_description:
Enjoy the best of both worlds with Mr Natty's Dub Hair Preparation, a hybrid hair formula that combines the dry, matt roughness of a clay, with the sharpness of a pomade wax.
Perfect on short and long hair, both wet and dry, the versatile styling putty adds texture and definition to create slicked back, debonair styles, or instant bed-head mania. Use it on dry hair for added weight; it creates a rough, messy, tacky finish with medium shine. Use on wet hair to add slickness with decent hold and glossy finish.
name: Natty Dub Hair Preparation 100ml

product_description:
Sexy Hair 强效极致丰盈洗发水让您的缕缕秀发更加闪亮；其强化发丝的配方可让您的发型拥有无与伦比的弹性。
其中蕴含的小黄瓜萃取物和维他命 B5 可温和地祛除杂质，而小麦蛋白和荨麻、迷迭香和鼠尾草萃取物可有效滋养、软化发丝，使柔软无生命力的缕缕秀发更加粗壮。 十分适合平塌纤细的发质，每次使用都能让您的缕缕秀发拥有所期待的发量和光泽。
name: Hair 强效极致丰盈洗发水 1000ml

product_description:
Delivering flexible hold and control, the ManCave Conditioning Whisky Scented Style Cream allows you to create your desired look with ease.
Fortified with Caffeine, Shea Butter and Argan Oil, the moisturising formula combines the benefits of a styling pomade with the nourishing properties of a leave-in conditioner to replenish dry, damaged hair, whilst holding hair in place for a frizz-free finish. Imparts the brand's signature Whisky-inspired fragrance.
name: Conditioning Whisky Scented Style Cream 75ml

product_description:
Experience pain free brushing whilst on-the-go, with the ikoo Pocket Detangling Hair Brush. The small yet effective brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp. Arriving with a practical bristle cover, the Pocket Brush is protected from dust and other dirt that can collect in your handbag.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, metallic resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
name: Pocket Detangling Hair Brush - Black/Pacific Metallic

product_description: Kebelo新生活力洗发水（250ml）专为中性和油性发质配制，能够有效清除秀发污渍和护发产品残留物，富含荷荷芭蛋白，令秀发重现健康状态。 洗发水特别添加了大豆和水解小麦，令秀发蓬松丰盈，洁净亮泽。 - K.R

Rediscover luscious, healthy hair with Grow Gorgeous Hair Density Serum and Cleansing Conditioner. The innovative formulas work in synergy to deeply cleanse and condition your hair whilst inspiring thicker, denser-looking locks.
Hair Density Serum (60ml)
An ultra-concentrated blend of 7 technologies encourages your hair to appear longer and denser within 4 months. Made with a 21.5% active complex, the growth serum contains Clover Flower Extract Active Complex to visibly improve hair length. Bio-active Complexes of Pea Shoot, Chinese Skullcap, Soy and Wheat Sprout combine to visibly increase hair thickness, density and health. Hyaluronic Acid improves scalp hydration and penetration. Expect dramatic results with regular use, or as a pampering treat.
11-in-1 Cleansing Conditioner (190ml)
Formulated with a 28.1% active complex, it combines foamless shampooing with deep conditioning to revitalise your hair and rebalance your scalp in one simple step. Offering 11 individual benefits, the treatment has an air-light texture that won't dry out your hair or strip natural oils, and absorbs excess oils and eliminates product build-up and toxins for improved lustre and vitality. Enriched with an advanced Conditioning Complex, the softening formula coats each individual follicle and works to smooth the cuticle for a sleek, frizz-free finish. Gentle enough for daily use and suitable for all hair types, the multi-tasking conditioner reduces flyaways, adds superior volume and hydrates your hair and scalp. Expect hair to feel sumptuously soft and supple with a healthy-looking gloss. Free from parabens and sulphates.
name: Gorgeous Hair Density Serum and Cleansing Conditioner

product_description:
Phyto PhytoNeutre 平衡洗髮水100ml 
此洗髮水採用高濃縮配方，清潔溫​​和又強效。可刺激頭皮，清潔造型產品的任何殘餘物。容易清洗，展現柔順閃亮的秀發，容易打理。 
 •溫和但有效 •清潔造型產品的任何殘餘物 •展現容易打理、柔順閃亮的秀發。
name: PhytoNeutre 平衡洗发水 100ml

product_description: Tangle Angel天使梳使頭髮順滑好打理，獨特的設計，您可以握住翅膀更容易掌握梳子，也可以握住手柄使每日的梳理更得心應手。添加入塑料裡抗菌材質，保證髮梳的衛生。適合各種髮質，特別添加的抗靜電材料使頭髮始終保持光滑，服帖和柔順。抗熱的直立梳齒可以輕鬆的打開頭髮打結，不摩擦頭髮。
name: Angel 天使梳紫色Pop Purple

product_description:
Tackle unruly curls with the KMS CurlUp Control Crème; a lightweight, pliable hair styling treatment to add shape, definition and shine.
Enriched with natural extracts of Mint and Orange, the refreshing formula combats frizz and imparts a touchably soft texture with long lasting hold. Perfect for wavy and curly hair of all types, the cream boosts body and shape for sleek and glossy results.
name: CurlUp Control Creme 150ml

product_description: Cloud Nine鳄鱼夹是一款必备之物，旨在温柔但牢固地抓紧头发，如此您可以在做发型的时候把头发夹成几个部分。 这款发夹凭借独特的双铰链可以夹住更多的头发，它有一个柔软的涂层，触感柔软。 这款发夹一包四个，可以确保有效地打造发型。 K.D.
name: Nine 鳄鱼夹

product_description:
屡获殊荣的 T3 Whirl Trio可更换造型棒是一款轻量级、革命性的工具，旨在塑造宽松的波浪式、茂密头发，让一切尽在掌握。 该造型棒适合所有类型的头发，它拥有三个卷筒附件，可根据您想要的造型进行更换，其中一个用于修饰、螺旋卷发和波浪式，一个用来增加头发丰盈度、强度和弹性，以及一个锥形卷筒适用于蓬乱波浪和自然卷发。
该品牌的Tourmaline®和陶瓷技术可散发负离子和红外线热量，以防止头发损伤，同时独特的数字 SinglePass™技术测量和调整卷筒整体的温度，以保持一致的热量。 该造型棒配备相机式的锁定机制，以便方便牢靠地更换卷筒，提供无穷造型的可能性。
五档加热设置，最高可达410℃的温度，每次均提供持久、沙龙式效果，离子卷发器可密闭头发鳞片层，获得光滑、闪亮的妆效。 配有方便的旋转式电源线、开/关按钮和支架，以保护其表面，并保持卷发造型棒直立。 E.N.
name: Whirl Trio可更换造型棒

product_description:
用 L'Anza Healing Volume Thickening Shampoo (1000ml) 令秀发变得丰盈而有弹性。 这款产品温和高效，其蕴含的 gugo 树皮可清除杂质，同时可令头发的厚度和直径增加 55％。
Organic 竹可从内部改善秀发，令秀发变得更浓密，同时，角蛋白疗愈体系可以增加秀发的刚性，这意味细柔的发丝不会变得扁平。 丰富的泡沫会令人感到美妙奢华，您的秀发会感觉起来更浓密、充满生机。 使用说明：
name: Healing Volume Thickening Shampoo (1000ml) - （价值 84.00 英镑）

product_description:
The BaByliss Pro Dial a Heat Conical Wand has been designed with the professional in mind. Gives amazing versatility to shaping and curling the hair. So easy to use - just take a section of hair, wrap around the cone and style. Make a beautiful cascade of curls, soft waves or ringlets.
240 volt UK specification with 3 pin UK plug. A power transformer is required for use in countries not using 240 voltage.
name: PRO Dial a Heat Conical Wand (32-19mm) - Black

product_description:
咖啡色款 KC Professional Color Mask 将会让发色焕然一新，同时有助于修复秀发。 此款发膜有特殊配方，可以保持和加深目前的发色，同时会恢复头发的神采，给人一种刚刚"染过色"的感觉。
富含维他命原B5和角蛋白衍生物，它还能有效修复受损的头发，让您的头发看起来有强度、顺滑和健康。 此护理产品不仅可以保持现有的发色，它还能使您头发的色调更加柔和。 也可以将Color Mask的各种色调混合起来，创建一个定制的色调。 - L.M.
name: Professional Color Mask - Coffee (200ml)

product_description:
Evo 伊噢Ritual Salvation 護髮素(300ml) 可讓染色、化學處理和受損的頭髮更加強韌，還可以溫和方式讓秀發更加柔軟順滑，易於打理。本品可拯救終極受損髮質，還可幫助染色的頭髮顏色更加鮮亮持久。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 伊噢 Ritual Salvation 护发素(300ml)

product_description:
TIGI Bed Head Urban Antidotes Resurrection Treatment Mask令您的秀发重现活力。 这款强效产品能有效修复严重受损头发，平滑软化，减少翘发和浮发。
独特配方蕴含核心修复（Core Repair）技术，能修复发内蛋白质，保护秀发免受热力造型和化学染烫的侵害，令发丝根根强韧、滋润健康。 本品适合每周使用，是受损、暗沉和问题头发的必备良药。 K.D.
name: Bed Head Urban Antidotes Resurrection Treatment Mask (200g)

product_description:
Revive your hair with Sebastian Professional Limited Edition Potion 9 Treatment, a leave-in conditioner that works to restore and protect the natural condition of your hair.
The cream-gel styling formula renews hair's condition and leaves locks feeling sleek, silky and controlled. Its infusion of botanical extracts improve manageability and boost shine. Can be used before heat styling, air-drying or as a style pick-me-up throughout the day.
Housed in limited edition packaging designed by tattoo artist, Maxime Büchi.
name: Professional Limited Edition Potion 9 Treatment 150ml

product_description:
Minimise drying time by using a Long Lisse Luxe Hair Towel from Aquis. Specially designed for those with long hair and suitable for all hair types, including curly, fine and damaged hair, the towel is able to provide gentle treatment.
Crafted with new generation Aquitex, the longer length towel boasts improved absorbency, as well as increased comfort. The towel wraps easily around wet hair, tucking in neatly to leave your hands free whilst hair dries. Use of the Long Lisse Luxe Hair Towel decreases drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber.
Dimensions: 50cm x 133cm
name: Long Hair Towel Lisse Luxe Chevron

product_description:
利用Sebastian Professional液体亮泽护理获得沙龙式闪亮头发。 在潮湿的头发吹干前喷一些，将让您的头发拥有只有广告中看到的令人嫉妒的光彩！ 富含抗拳曲成分，维持光滑并消除凌乱。 - K.R
塑造每种发型的最终点睛之笔，"最轻质的液体增强最明亮的光泽"。 Sebastian Professional Liquid Gloss通过其超反射光泽特性让您的头发散发华丽光彩。 该抛光液体还为头发提高去拳曲屏障，以帮助头发全天保持光滑、柔顺。
name: Professional Liquid Gloss (50ml)

product_description:
Jo Hansford Expert Colour Care Platinum Shampoo 一直被用于金发、颜色突出的或灰色头发。 这款温和的洗发水适用于日常清洗，采用紫色素配制而成，中和黄色或黄铜色调并消除变色，令秀发清新怡人、容光焕发。
这款丰盈洗发水拥有每次都可实现沙龙风格效果的 Heliovita™ Colour Care Complex，富含滋润石榴油和向日葵籽提取物，保护头发免遭氧化和紫外线辐射。 Prodew 氨基酸混合成分能强化发束，并提供颜色防护；同时修复受损，呈现健康发丝。
甜蓝羽扇豆肽已被科学证明，能在经过三十次清洗后仍保持头发的色泽；Keratec 是一种基于角蛋白的独特成分，能柔滑角质层，呈现时尚、丝绸般柔软的发丝。 E.N.
name: Hansford Expert Colour Care Platinum Shampoo

product_description:
这款 Men-ü 发胶非常适合哑光卷发和蓬松的发型，实现持久的定型，令秀发更有质感。 Men-ü 是去海滩游玩或冲浪时的理想选择，可让不易定型的发丝更贴合，让您拥有想要的发型。
一瓶小包装的 Men-ü 男士发胶可使用 80 次之久！ 这款定型持久的产品非常适合打造发型，具有固卷作用，令秀发更有质感，让您随时根据需要重新定型或缔造新发型。
使用说明：
name: 男士发胶（100 毫升）

product_description:
Joico Color Infuse棕色头发护发素  可保护深褐色头发的鲜明色彩。其配方可防秀发褪色。本品可维持浅棕色及中等棕色头发自然色彩的完整性。
本品可滋养保护每丝秀发，采用多光谱防御聚合物， 对抗头发褪色；利用阴离子染料技术，自头发内部固定秀发颜色，令秀发颜色更持久。 采用生物高级肽复合物，从发根至发尖进行全面修复。 确保毛躁头发减少、秀发光泽亮丽。 您将拥有柔软光滑、晶莹闪亮的秀发。断发率降低 53％。
name: Color Infuse棕色头发护发素 300ml

product_description:
使用 Kérastase Elixir Ultime 三件套，呵护染过色的头发；包括奢华洗发水、多功效护发膏和富含美发油脂的滋养油，可从发根至发梢恢复秀发亮泽，保持色泽鲜明度并提供深层滋养。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain (250ml)
Elixir Ultime 是一款非常值得拥有、如金般纯净的奢华轻盈洗发水；经过精心设计，适用于所有发质，让您获得沙龙级妆效。 这款富含油脂的洗发水可为您提供最奢华的清洁体验，让您拥有皇室般感受，并呈现散发镜面般光泽的丝滑秀发。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime Crème Fine (150ml)
这款多功效护发霜含有白花油和石榴提取物，可用于吹干之前预清洗，作为深层调理产品；或作为干性发质的免洗定型产品。 这款轻盈护发霜非常适合中等粗细的头发至细发，融合了紫外线光滤剂，以保护秀发，令其亮泽、顺滑、健康。
Kérastase Elixir Ultime 染发油 (100ml)
让染色后的头发体验这款美发油的多重功效；这种配方旨在让发色更鲜明，且能调理和保护发丝。 这款美发油富含摩洛哥坚果油和玉米油等珍贵油类混合成分，能够深层滋养秀发，抑制干燥并提亮发色。 吹干前后均可使用，全天均可保持神清气爽。 秀发看起来更加闪亮、更富活力。
name: Elixir Ultime Huile Lavante Bain 250ml, Crème Fine 150ml and Coloured Hair Oil 100ml Bundle

product_description:
Discover an essential set of products with the Detox Hair Ritual Travel Kit from Christophe Robin. Housed inside an exotic, cotton cosmetic pouch, the set is ideal for those with combination hair; oily roots and dry ends. The travel kit boasts a daily shampoo, cleansing scrub and hydrating hair cream, each guaranteeing to deliver a comfortable scalp and enviably shiny hair, even whilst on-the-go.
Purifying Shampoo with Jujube Bark Extract 75ml
Rebalance and refresh the hair and scalp with Purifying Shampoo; a lightweight, innovative formula that works to eliminate dandruff and relieve itching. Suitable for daily use, its unique blend of Jujube Bark and Cherry Flower Extracts provides instant anti-dandruff action to minimise flaking, whilst regulating excess sebum and soothing the scalp for long-lasting comfort. Ideal for hair with greasy roots and drier ends, you can expect touchably soft, radiant locks and a calm, restored scalp.
Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 40ml
Treat a sensitive scalp to intense levels of support and defence with the Cleansing Purifying Scrub. Created exquisitely to perform actively and acutely on impaired, delicate areas, relieving skin of the critical stage and arousing the scalp into renewal. Working through naturally embedded Sea-Salt, the oceanic-extracted additives lend a tone of refreshment and lightness, whilst the imbued renewal complex intimately modifies and enhances the body’s innate system, helping to supplement skin with optimum levels of moisture, hydration and upkeep.
Moisturizing Hair Cream 20.7ml
Fight against dry hair with the ultra-conditioning Moisturizing Hair Cream. The non-greasy, non-sticky formula is ideal for rehydrating dry and thirsty hair. Expect to reveal locks with a new shine and gorgeous volume. The sweet smelling cream is a leave-in conditioner with an intense formula that can work to repair split ends of weakened hair.
name: Robin Detox Hair Ritual Travel Kit

product_description: Boost thin, lacklustre hair with the Biolage R.A.W. Uplift Shampoo. Especially developed for thin and flat hair, the plant-based formula boasts ingredients of 71% natural origin, working to sweep away dirt and impurities without stripping away moisture to help keep body and movement. Enriched with Black Sesame and Grapefruit, it leaves hair feeling revitalised and replenished with enhanced volume and density.
name: R.A.W. Uplift Shampoo 325ml

product_description:
Transform limp, lifeless locks with Giovanni's Root 66™ Max Volume Shampoo; a body-boosting formula that works to cleanse, revitalise and strengthen fine hair.
Powered by innovative PureOrganic Technology™ and nutrient-rich Horsetail Extract, the volumising shampoo effortlessly eliminates impurities, whilst adding texture and definition to reveal big, bouncy locks from root to tip.
name: Root 66 Max Volume Shampoo 60ml

product_description:
Kebelo滋养护发素（500ml） 令干燥、粗糙、受损的秀发恢复生机。 这款采用浓缩配方的护发素不含SLS和苯甲酸酯类，混合了多种纯净成分，深度清洁并滋养秀发。
混合了水解小麦、瓜尔豆糖和葡萄籽油，使秀发丰盈，梳通并防止秀发毛躁开叉，另外添加的"护发神油"摩洛哥坚果油将为秀发注入天然水活力并柔顺发丝。 期待易于打理、水分充盈、质地柔软的秀发。 - K.N.

Restore glossy, healthy-looking locks with the KMS ColorVitality Blonde Conditioner; a weightless formula developed specifically for grey, white and blonde hair.
Utilising an innovative AHA Structure Complex, the radiance-reviving conditioner expertly hydrates and moisturises hair, whilst eliminating unwanted yellow and brassy tones to leave hair soft and luminous. Helps to prevent colour fading for smooth, bright locks with mirror-like shine.
name: Color Vitality Blonde Conditioner 250ml

product_description:
TIGI 蒂芝床头海量™ 发量洗发水可有效改变柔软缺乏光泽的秀发；其轻盈配方旨在让您拥有令人羡慕的秀发和弹性。
这款洗发水采用独特的泡沫清洁系统，可温和地去除杂质和护发产品残留，而创新的 Uploader™ 技术可缔造精致定型，让您瞬间拥有迷人发型。 使秀发带有甜美的浆果芳香，让您拥有所期待的持久丰盈效果，而不会发生发型变形。
name: 蒂芝床头海量发量洗发水（750ml）

product_description:
Philip Kingsley 无色无味洗发水非常适合敏感、娇嫩或易于过敏的秀发。 采用温和配方，即使接受化疗或放疗的患者也可使用；这款洗发水不含香氛、色素、SLS、SLES和苯甲酸酯类，因此做过巴西角蛋白植入护理的人群也可放心使用。
这款洗发水能有效清洁秀发，温和不伤发，让秀发变得柔顺，易于打理。 -SA
name: Kingsley 无色无味洗发水

product_description:
Phyto 发朵 PhytoArgent 增白洗发水 200ml
PhytoArgent 洗发水逐渐去除头发的黄色部分，让白色或灰色头发呈现美丽的银白色或灰白挑染色。由于从甘菊提取的天然成份甘菊蓝，此洗发水不仅可以增白头发，还可以舒缓头皮，防止干燥。
•让白色或灰白头发呈现美丽的银白色或灰白挑染色•舒缓头皮，防止干燥•增白成份在每次使用后积累和加强
name: 发朵 PhytoArgent 增白洗发水 200ml

product_description:
Sexy Hair 活力护色染发后锁色发乳可有效保护经过染发处理的秀发，它可用在护发的最后一步锁住发色，保持发色的整体性。
这款修复型护发素蕴含有玫瑰和杏仁油，能够专业地锁住发色，保护发色的活泼性，还能滋养和调节染发过程中受损伤的发丝。 其中具有舒缓和抗炎作用的玫瑰精油可使秀发和头皮保持柔软、舒缓，而杏仁油蕴含有重要的脂肪酸，可为发丝补充营养成分，促进秀发健康成长。
使秀发更加清爽、亮泽活泼，有效防止断发和未来损伤。
name: Hair 活力锁色护发素 1000ml

product_description: Sexy Hair 健康秀发大豆保湿护发素具有强健发丝和保湿作用。 这款护发素具有大豆蛋白和护发成分的混合物，可为秀发补充水分，保护发丝，使秀发明显地变得更加柔软亮色。 护发素中的椰子油可为发丝补充水分，增强修复功效，使秀发更加柔软而易于梳理。
name: Hair 健康秀发大豆保湿护发素 1000ml

product_description:
使用 Fudge Big Hair 丰盈造型乳（50ml）增添秀发的厚度和蓬松感。 这款轻盈的造型乳特别添加了 OOMF 丰盈化合物和竹子提取物 。 得益于这些成分，Fudge Big Hair 丰盈护发乳能够增添秀发的厚度和蓬松感，同时还将让秀发散发均匀的亮泽。
按压2-3下，涂于毛巾擦干的秀发，然后从下往上吹干秀发。 照常设计发型。 对发质较细、长度较短的秀发效果最好。- K.R
name: Big Hair 丰盈护发乳（50ml）

product_description:
Alterna魚子醬防脫髮精華噴霧具有革新配方養護秀發，有效防止各種脫髮因素的產生。為頭髮打造一層天然防護屏障，防止油脂過多及毛囊阻塞的髒污，可有效預防過度脫髮與髮乾變細。促進更豐盈、更濃密的新生髮生長。 
富含大量的維他命和營養素複合物，Alterna魚子醬防脫髮精華噴霧不含硫酸鹽，用後秀發更厚實，更濃密、更豐盈，具有健康光澤。 
使用方法：

适合所有类型的头发， Green People奎奴亚和朝鲜蓟Shampoo 温和洁净头发，从发根到发尖展现光泽、健康。 富含八种必需氨基酸，该配方覆盖发干，令头发平顺、易梳理、无卷曲，同时奎奴亚蛋白质可显著增加光泽。
恢复活力和柔软度，这款日常洗发水加入各种抗氧化剂，防止和修复环境有害因素和暴露于紫外线中所导致的伤害。 您将获得光滑、柔顺的秀发，并更有光泽、发丝粗壮而且有弹性。 E.N.
name: People奎奴亚和朝鲜蓟Shampoo（200ml）

product_description:
Cowshed 活力​​牛濃密護髮素可使頭髮更加柔順、濃密、強韌，並得到有效修復。本品富含大豆蛋白、維生素、精油和有機乳木果油，讓您的頭髮更顯濃密蓬鬆。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 活力牛浓密护发素

product_description:
选择此款 Wet Brush Paddle 发刷用于对湿发进行超有效的梳理。 按摩刷配有一块大长方形软垫，非常适用于梳顺长而浓密的头发，而且对头皮也很温和。 它拥有 Classic Wet brush 的所有优点，如 IntelliFlex™ 刷毛。这种刷毛比其他类型更细、更强韧、更具弹性，使用时不会抽丝。
刷毛末端的无痛 SofTips™ 能轻轻按摩头皮并刺激血液循环。得益于这种刷毛，您现在可以把每天梳理头发的五分钟用于小型休闲会议。 Wet Brush Paddle 甚至还可用于接发和假发，那您还在等什么呢？ - MB
name: Brush Paddle

product_description:
Discover a revolutionary way to tie hair with the Popband London Hairties in Mint; a pack of five decorative bands that hold hair tight, without leaving an unwanted kink.
The hair ties are ultra-soft yet stretchy, which allows them to hold an updo flawlessly, without damaging and denting hair like regular bobbles. Hair still appears fresh once taken out of the band and the hair ties are the ideal accessory for wearing on the wrist as a bracelet when not in use.
Mint Green with White Zig Zag Print
Pale Green
Emerald Green
Mint Green with White Heart Print
White
name: London Hairties - Mint

product_description: Shine Angel 由 Richard Ward 研制，他曾担任许多名人甚至皇室成员的发型师。 这款特别设计的专业吹干刷为您提供梦幻般高端、光泽而奢华的妆容。 圆形吹干刷的混合刷毛能提供最佳妆效。 垂直离子尼龙刷毛使头发保持挺立，而水平野猪鬃毛使秀发光亮而不毛躁。 除了最终的闪耀造型之外，V 形刷子可以使秀发呈现迷人的卷曲，同时提供全面护理。 刷子由实木精制而成，是一款高品质的发型设计工具。 刷体中空，因而重量极轻，末端的发夹便于头发分型。 橡胶把手易于抓握，而筒形刷身的上百个小孔利于空气分布，加速干燥进程。 这款刷子在英国设计研制，直径 70mm。 LB
name: Angel Shine Angel Brush – Large (70mm)

product_description: The BaByliss Pro Ceramic Dial a Heat Tong 16mm features a ceramic barrel which heats up quickly and evenly to create bouncy, natural-looking curls with minimal effort. With 25 temperature settings to suit all hair types, the tongs also boast a cool tip and integrated stand for your safety. - L.M.
name: PRO Ceramic Dial a Heat Tong (16mm)

product_description:
Repair and restore colour-treated or severely damaged hair with the Rita Hazan Weekly Remedy Treatment, a two-step hair programme that deeply hydrates and replenishes frizzy, frazzled, damaged hair.
Repairing hair from the inside out, the lightweight therapy combines two steps. Step 1 treats and opens the hair cuticle to maximise absorption of the formula's conditioning agents and blend of four oils (Mirabelle Plum, Moringa Seed, Jojoba, Olive), and Step 2 expertly seals the cuticle to lock in nutrition whilst delivering intense, long-lasting hydration. Promoting soft, smooth and manageable hair, the two-phase treatment also contains Rice Proteins to strengthen strands and prevent colour fading.
name: Hazan Weekly Remedy Treatment

product_description:
香草款 KC Professional Color Mask 将会让头发色泽焕然一新，同时有助于修复秀发。 此款发膜有特殊配方，可以保持和加深目前的发色，同时会恢复头发的神采，给人一种刚刚"染过色"的感觉。
富含维他命原B5和角蛋白衍生物，它还能有效修复受损的头发，让您的头发看起来有强度、顺滑和健康。 此护理产品不仅可以保持现有的发色，它还能使您头发的色调更加柔和。 也可以将Color Mask的各种色调混合起来，创建一个定制的色调。 - L.M.
name: Professional Color Mask - Vanilla (200ml)

product_description:
Control unruly hair with Straight Fast! from Giovanni. The straightening elixir is designed to be used on damp hair and works to smooth curly and wavy hair types for a straighter appearance.
Arriving as a clear gel, the formula creates a sleek style, alongside adding enviable shine and giving hair the power to repel humidity. Enriched with botanicals, Straight Fast! protects hair during heat styling. Locks are left temporarily straightened, until the next wash.
name: Straight Fast! 200ml

product_description:
Revive extremely dry hair with the Ultra-Moist Leave In Conditioner & Styling Elixir from Giovanni. Designed for rejuvenating even the most parched locks, the elixir improves hair’s elasticity and resilience.
Used on damp hair, the formula works to strengthen the fibers, which prevents split ends and allows for ultimate style control. The leave in conditioner and styling elixir is enriched with a blend of vitamins and omega fatty acids, which deliver a surge of moisture to hair in need. Locks are left smooth and softened.
name: Ultra-Moist Leave In Conditioner & Styling Elixir 118ml

product_description:
Discover a multi award-winning styling tool with the Tangle Teezer The Original Hairbrush in Pink Rebel; a coveted hairbrush that arrives in electric neon hues. Combining complementary pink and yellow shades, the brush adds a pop of colour to any haircare regime.
Perfect to use on the go, the compact brush is shaped to fit perfectly in the hand for ultimate control. Featuring unique flexible bristles, the brush effortlessly glides through wet and dry hair to detangle knots without snagging or pulling. Suitable for all hair types, the coveted brush allows you to add volume, texture and shine to your hair.
name: Teezer Original Pink Rebel

product_description:
使用Evo Crop Strutters Construct Creme来打理您的发型。 此款轻盈型发膏非常适合那些想要打造低光度、自然发型的人士使用。此款产品可以让您的发型具有层次感，起到支撑发型的作用。同时，可塑的定型效果可以让您随时改变造型。
本款多功效的发膏是让您从白天平常的发型转变成个性张扬、适合夜生活发型的理想产品。本产品适合所有发质使用。 - L.M.

使用说明：

涂抹在毛巾擦干的头发上，然后做出想要的发型。
name: Crop Strutters Construct Creme（90ml）

product_description:
ego Professional EGO Contours Medium Radial Brush (32mm) 适合打造中短、精细或柔软秀发。 中等卷筒打造丰满秀发，同时紧抓秀发，能够随心打造各种发型，尽情发挥想象力吧！
使用这款 Medium Radial Brush，消除静电及凌乱发丝。 手柄可实现在头发间轻松转动梳子，轻易打造任何发型。 凹面设计和陶瓷护发筒实现更好造型效果，吸收吹风机热量，防止秀发损伤。 -MB
name: Professional EGO Contours Brush Medium - 32mm Radial

product_description:
还在因孩子头发打结而困扰? PK 儿童美发梳将让您轻松抚顺孩子的秀发。 这款发梳的梳齿经过圆头处理，带有柔软的气垫，对秀发与头皮十分温和。
大小贴合孩子的小手，非常适合作为孩子的第一把发梳，教会他们如何打理秀发。 - SA
name: Kingsley 儿童美发梳

product_description:
Sebastian Professional Trilliance Conditioner (1000ml) 适合所有发质，可软化和疏通您的秀发，令其拥有美观、看上去健康的光泽。 它丰富细腻，可以深层滋养您的秀发，而水晶石提取物可以平滑角质层，使您的秀发更易于梳理。
这款护发素特别适合暗沉无光的头发，可以为头发造型打下完美的基础，同时创造一个柔软的表面，反射出散发着活力的炫目光芒。 - L.M.
name: Professional Trilliance Conditioner (1000ml) - （价值 68.00 英镑）

product_description:
NIOXIN System 4 Scalp Treatment 是一种有效和创新性的免洗型的治疗，专门用于极薄、纤细、天然或经化学处理的头发，是NIOXIN三步护理系统的最后一步。 经过专门设计，有助于使正常及偏纤细、染过色的头发变得浓密，它所含的抗氧化剂和植物成分协同工作，以保持一个更清新的头皮环境。
配方中采用了BioAMP®和Scalp Access Delivery System®技术，这款护理产品使秀发更加浓密，同时增加每一根发丝的强度，减少脱发和破损；其薄荷油、White茶叶提取物的组合给头皮超清爽的感觉。 还含有额外添加的SPF 15以抵御有害的太阳射线。 您将拥有富有光泽的浓密秀发，同时头发也重新焕发了活力。
name: System 4 Scalp 护理液 200ml

product_description: 本品为基础系列产品，采用强化修复配方，能清洁头发，同时强韧发丝，尤其是使用过化学发剂、过度造型的头发。深层渗透，活性补救，保护发色，重塑发质，恢复自然健康状态，抵御压力影响，清除残余化学品堆积，令秀发强韧、如丝般柔顺。- K.N.

product_description:
使用Evo Icon Welder Hot Tool Shaper（200ml）可以让您的秀发免受热力和潮湿的伤害。 此款强效的喷涂产品适合所有的发质使用，能够让您的秀发免受紫外线和热力造型的伤害。本款产品可以让您随心所欲地拉直或卷曲您的秀发。
这款轻型不油腻的喷雾具有妙不可言的多重功能，可使您的秀发蓬松有型，让您的卷发看起来更卷，同时发型全天候都处于最佳状态。 - L.M.使用说明：
name: Icon Welder Hot Tool Shaper（200ml）

product_description:
这款 Wella Professionals Brilliance两件套是专为浓密粗糙的秀发设计的，它包含洗发水和护发素，配合使用可以深层清洁、滋养染过色的头发。 它采用了创新的三重融合技术，可滋养秀发，令秀发富有光泽、充满活力。
该套装包括以下产品： 
Wella Professionals Brilliance Shampoo（适合粗糙、染过色的Hair 250ml）用 Wella Professionals Brilliance Shampoo （适合粗糙染过色的 Hair）获得丰富鲜活的发色。 这款悉心呵护的轻型香波含有革命性的三重融合技术和奢华的钻石粉，非常适合粗犷浓密的头发，它滋养、顺滑和保护头发的同时保持耀眼的色彩强度。
Wella Professionals Brilliance Colour 增色Conditioner （适合粗糙乱 Hair 200ml）用 Wella Professionals Brilliance Colour 增色 Conditioner （适合粗糙乱 Hair）驯服凌乱的头发。 这款护发素的设计用途是给过度护理的干燥头发补水，它融汇了革命性的三重融合技术，增强了色彩，使粗糙的头发充满鲜活的光泽，并能自由流动。

product_description: Transform hair with the Caviar Style Luxe Shape Crème Gel from Alterna. Lightweight and non-greasy, the premium hair gel enhances shine and allows you to shape and mould locks with a medium hold and buildable definition. Providing thermal heat protection, it’s ideal for using before styling and setting looks in place without leaving a stiff or crunchy texture.
name: Caviar Style Luxe Shape Creme Gel 147ml

product_description:
Color WOW 色哇发根染色粉进行四种发色的发根染色护理，能在进行两次沙龙护理之间快速遮盖色差迥异的发根。
这款创新型的矿物质粉末采用避免凌乱的简单应用配方，含有多种色素，可与发丝无缝融合，实现完美而不油腻的遮瑕，让您更加自信。
内置于带有镜子的粉盘中，配备有双头刷子，可将其轻松涂抹到干燥的发丝上，这款染色粉具有防水性和防汗性。 染色效果可一直保持至您下一次洗发。

product_description:
该Vogetti排气发刷是您的必备之物，适合短至中等长度头发。 这款发梳非常适合在吹干头发的过程中使用，因为它有助于头发加速吹干，同时可以打造发卷。
使用Vogetti排气发刷可以缩短吹干头发的时间。 梳子的通风口优化了空气的流动，从而缩短了吹干的时间，让您的头发更加柔软、光滑且无静电。

Discover a revolutionary way to tie hair with the Popband London Hairties in Mermaid; a pack of five decorative bands that hold hair tight, without leaving an unwanted kink.
The hair ties are ultra-soft yet stretchy, which allows them to hold an updo flawlessly, without damaging and denting hair like regular bobbles. Hair still appears fresh once taken out of the band and the hair ties are the ideal accessory for wearing on the wrist as a bracelet when not in use.
Seaweed Green
Sage Green with Clear Mash Panel
Deep Sky Blue
Sky Blue with Clear Mash Panel
Baby Blue

蕴含独特phyto IV complex成分，补充秀发水分，同时焕活身体机能，达到自然持久的护理效果。 配合您护发组合一起使用，令秀发造型圆滑水嫩，无毛燥和浮发。 K.D.

使用说明：

product_description:
Haircare expert Christophe Robin introduces the Hydrating Shampoo Bar with Aloe Vera; a unique, all-natural, hand-made composition that will transform your cleansing regime.
Suitable for all hair types but in particular dry and lacklustre locks, the solid formula contains an ultra-moisturising blend of Aloe Vera, Castor Oil and Glycerin, working to gently sweep away impurities and product build up from the scalp without disrupting the natural balance.
Ideal for taking with you on your travels, it effectively cleanses hair while optimising hydration levels for improved vitality, body and texture.
Due to the lack of synthetic agents, this unique formula can take time to adjust, with hair becoming accustomed to the new experience. The adjustment period can vary, usually between two to five applications for optimum results.
name: Robin Hydrating Shampoo Bar with Aloe Vera 110ml

product_description:

这款焕活护发素蕴含有鼠尾草油和维他命 B5，可从发根到发梢为发丝补充水分和营养，与此同时，有效防止分叉，使秀发更易于梳理，让您的缕缕秀发更有光泽。 让您拥有所期待的大卷发型，增强发丝的光泽度，使发丝更粗壮。

product_description:
只要幾滴Alterna魚子醬防脫髮強效增髮劑，即可有效防止各種脫髮因素的產生，每周保護秀發不受有毒因素侵害，促進新發活化重生。 
 Alterna魚子醬防脫髮強效增髮劑富含紅三葉草複合物，防止有害物質DHT在頭皮上的堆積，祛除油脂過多及毛囊阻塞的髒污，最大限度的刺激髮根，促進更豐盈、更濃密的新生髮生長。 
使用方法：

Alterna魚子醬髮絲修復加長精華專為增發而設計，吸收快速，用後秀發看起來更長，更強韌。特殊配方可減少斷發，治療頭皮，滋養髮絲，散發健康光澤。富含魚子醬萃取精華，深度鎖水，修復秀發損傷，使秀發亮澤、質地柔軟度都獲得提升。 
 使用方法:取少量到頭皮並輕柔按摩，塗抹在乾淨的潮發上，無須沖水。

Minimise drying time by using a Long Lisse Luxe Hair Towel from Aquis. Specially designed for those with long hair and suitable for all hair types, including curly, fine and damaged hair, the towel is able to provide gentle treatment.
Crafted with new generation Aquitex, the longer length towel boasts improved absorbency, as well as increased comfort. The towel wraps easily around wet hair, tucking in neatly to leave your hands free whilst hair dries. Use of the Long Lisse Luxe Hair Towel decreases drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber.
Dimensions: 50cm x 133cm

同时也能让您的秀发具备无与伦比的保护性能，从而抵御外界侵害，护发素的包装大小采用的是便捷出行的尺寸，以确保无论您身在何处，都可让您的秀发丝般柔滑。  你的秀发将恢复天然之美，并呈现出持久的光泽。 K.D.

product_description:
Purify hair with the KMS HeadRemedy Deep Cleanse Shampoo; a clarifying shampoo that is gentle enough for daily use to leave locks feeling ultra-clean and healthy.
Fortified with an AHA Structure Complex, the powerful formula seeks to remove build up from product, minerals, pollutants and hard water. A combination of Lactic and Malic Acids helps to reconstruct from within, while Polyquarternium-10 works to refine the hair surface for a sleek finish. Suitable for all hair types, the shampoo results in hair feeling soft and supple with weightless body and movement.
name: HeadRemedy Deep Cleanse Shampoo 750ml

product_description:
The Mane 'n Tail Hoofmaker Original Hand & Nail Therapy is an innovative horse to human crossover treatment, originally created to keep your pony's hooves in tip-top condition.
Fast-absorbing and non-greasy, the moisturising, protein-enriched formula targets cracked, dry skin on the hands, feet and body, whilst strengthening and protecting nails to leave them strong and healthy. Perfect for softening rough, callused areas, you can expect smooth, comfortable and rejuvenated skin all over the body.

product_description:

product_description: 来自Sebastian Professional FOUNDATION系列，Color Ignite Multi Conditioner专门用来保湿和护理多色调和漂浅的头发。 添加光泽的同时保持和提高色彩鲜艳度达25％，该发泡、微泡配方提供持久的色彩、令人羡慕的光泽和华丽柔软、滋润的头发。 - K.N.

product_description:
3步護髮系列產品適合明顯稀薄、中等至粗糙髮質、自然髮質及經化學處理的髮質使用。本款儷康絲系統6清潔洗髮水(1000ml)是打造濃密秀發的第一步。儷康絲採用獨特的Scalp Access Delivery System®，其淨化成分能夠清除環境殘留和皮脂，SPF15 還能幫助頭髮和頭皮抵禦日曬傷害。這項技術中糅合的維生素和植物萃取物確保頭髮健康，同時不會帶走必需的天然油脂。 
 Glyo-Shield®技術可提供白茶提取物與薄荷油以及清潔和保護護理劑，為您帶來清爽濕潤且健康的頭皮，準備就緒開始儷康絲流程。 
清潔配方中添加Smoothplex®技術，旨在通過調理和保護秀芳，避免受損斷裂，同時撫平毛躁，從而防止頭髮脫落稀疏。 - KR 
 使用說明： 
儷康絲使用針對各種髮質的一系列3 步頭髮護理套裝，實現健康頭皮，促進頭髮生長並呈現美麗光澤，令頭髮完全煥然新生。該品牌致力於幫助飽受頭髮脫落稀疏困擾的人，能夠為全世界超過50% 的人的提供幫助。

product_description:

这款洗发水采用十六种纯植物提取物、十一种精油和载体油，以及强效的 2.3% 纯薄荷油配制而成，可作为局部麻醉剂，舒缓头皮紧张，促进血液循环，令头皮感觉清新自然。 这款洗发水对于染过色的头发也是安全的，可消除产品残留物，恢复秀发的自然光泽和活力，而不损害其宝贵的水分和弹性。 从一开始使用就能感受到头皮和秀发的惊人变化。
使用说明：
name: B Peppermint and Avocado Volumizing and Clarifying Shampoo (220ml)

product_description:
White Hot 亮发洗发水的设计旨在每周使用一次或无论何时强健色泽暗沉的秀发，它可温和地清洁发丝，祛除因污染和紫外线而导致的暗沉发色和不喜欢发黄色、黄铜色。
其轻盈的紫色配方中蕴含有 Keravis™，能够舒缓和强健发丝，为缕缕秀发补充营养，而蓝豆油和光学亮发剂可使秀发从发根到发梢恢复应有的光泽。 这款洗发水适用于自然白发或灰发，让您拥有所期待的充满活力的焕活秀发，增强发丝的弹性。

product_description:
Nanogen Fibre Sprayer 可实现最强的头发增稠效果，即刻获得更丰满的外表。 该喷雾器适合任何发质和任何性别，甚至最敏感的头皮，包含与自然头发的密度和质感完全相同的纯角质素，防止产生刺激作用。
凭借取得专利的 Kinetic™ 技术金属条，该广口瓶装载拥有 400% 静电电荷的头发增稠纤维，能更有力地粘结在头发上，甚至经历风雨和汗液都能提供持久的效果。 形成偶极电荷，确保纤维能分支出大量的柔软发丝。
该喷雾器非常适用于分型线或可见冠，拥有纤细的喷嘴，用于精确有序的涂抹；安全滑锁非常适用于旅行。 独有的 Colour Locking 技术意味着 Nanogen 纤维不会泄漏染料到皮肤上，因而可以放心使用。 E.N.

这款含有丰富维他命的护发素以精油、蛋白质和天然草本植物为原料，可修复发丝和头皮，让秀发更容易梳理和控制毛躁，达到沙龙级的护发效果。 令秀发恢复原有的如丝般顺滑，带给干燥瘙痒的头皮持久的舒适感。

product_description:
Treat your hair to the strengthening and root-boosting properties of DHC's Q10 Revitalizing Hair Care Treatment, an age-fighting conditioner that works to detangle hair whilst softening and adding volume.
Expertly nourishing your locks, the daily conditioner promotes healthy hair and utilises a Damage Care Essence to smooth and strengthen, and a Volume-Up Complex to inspire a fuller appearance. Enriched with a powerhouse of antioxidant ingredients, the formula contains: Coenzyme Q10 to rejuvenate; Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate to lock in moisture; and Black Pearl Proteins to fortify and protect. Hair looks thicker, healthier and younger. - K.N.

product_description:
Sexy Hair 顺滑去毛躁洗发水让您拥有顺滑而有光泽的秀发；其不含硝酸盐的配方旨在抚平毛躁和蓬乱的发丝。
这款轻盈洗发水借助椰子油的功效，可渗透到发干深层，而不会引起水分丧失，与此同时有效应对角质层突出、粗糙和湿润，让您尽享沙龙级的护发效果。 非常适合波浪或卷发发型，让您拥有所期待的平静易于梳理的秀发，增强光泽度。

product_description:

该造型工具功能多样，使用方便，具有5档加热设置，最高达210℃，根据您希望塑造的发型或波浪风格为您提供最高控制能力。 它的椭圆形卷筒加入钻石油，每次均可实现最完美、美丽定型、光泽和无拳曲的波浪发，多档加热技术意味着您可以瞬间获得一致的、有弹性的波浪发。 快速加热，并在15秒中可以使用。 - K.N.

Sexy Hair 健康秀发大豆新生护发精油可打造富有活力的沙滩卷发；这款营养型定型护发产品既可涂抹在湿润的秀发，也可涂抹在干燥的秀发上，以在瞬间赋予秀发光泽感，保护秀发防止毛躁、潮湿和环境侵害因素的损伤。
其所蕴含的摩洛哥坚果油可有效防止秀发发丝损伤，大豆萃取物具有顺发功效，而向日葵籽油可软化和顺滑缕缕秀发，让您拥有冲浪时随意自然的飘逸发型。 缩短吹干时间。

product_description:
Experience pain free brushing whilst on-the-go, with the ikoo Pocket Detangling Hair Brush. The small yet effective brush is designed to detangle hair with ease, whilst also increasing relaxation and feelings of wellbeing by massaging and harmonising the scalp. Arriving with a practical bristle cover, the Pocket Brush is protected from dust and other dirt that can collect in your handbag.
Designed by Traditional Chinese Medicine, the innovative detangler boasts a ‘chessboard function’ bristle panel. The brush is host to a combination of long and short bristles, arranged together, which allow for painless and effortless detangling of hair, whatever the hair type it is tackling.
The concave shaped brush is constructed with an ergonomic design, featuring a caoutchouc handle, for improved grip and a glossy, metallic resin finish. Expect a stress free brushing experience that leaves behind shiny, tangle-free hair.
name: Pocket Detangling Hair Brush - Black/Rose Metallic

product_description:
Effortlessly detangle wet and dry locks with the Wet Brush Metallic Hair Brush. The rubber coated handle allows you to have a firm grip whilst brushing out tough knots and tangles, giving you smooth and sleek hair in no time.
Suitable for all hair types, the Wet Brush is also the perfect hair tool to use on children. With pull-free brush strokes, brushing is effortless and pain-free.
With a lightweight feel, the Wet Brush can even be carried in your handbag to treat your hair troubles on the go, leaving you with super sleek and smooth hair always.

product_description:
紅發可日久淡色並轉為黃發，Christophe Robin絕色盈亮植物發膜CHIC RED 時尚紅色能把秀發黃色色調淡退，使用後髮色回复亮麗，變得純淨，極其自然，避免髮色顯得人工化、造作。適合染色、漂染、局部挑染或自然中至深啡發和紅發。更能把過早出現的灰白髮轉化，營造挑染效果。

Christophe Robin絕色盈亮植物發膜CHIC RED 時尚紅色可以提升秀發的自然紅色色調，提高對比度，持久鎖色。富含抗氧化劑，不含氨，不含苯甲酸酯，不含矽。

Use of the Lisse Luxe Hair Towel decreases drying time, whilst also working to minimise frizz and damage to the fiber.

使用本品，喚醒沉睡髮絲。適合所有髮質，這款奢華的美髮沙龍專用護理產品能讓頭髮柔軟，如絲般光滑，充滿活力。

product_description:

The unique cream formula glides effortlessly onto skin and hair, delivering buildable colour that helps to disguise grown-out roots and unruly greys. product_description:
The Kérastase Reflection Masque Epais and Cool Copper Touche Chromatique Duo offers personalised care for your colour-treated hair. Combining an ink-in-care, highly concentrated hair dye formula with a rich, nourishing mask, the pair work in tandem to correct and brighten faded colour for restored softness, colour luminosity and radiance.
Touche Chromatique (10ml)
A colour-correcting hair dye formula specially developed to be mixed with Fondant Chromatique or Masque Chromatique. The ink-in-care formula helps to revive and correct your hair; it lends hair a radiant, enhanced copper finish. The highly concentrated hair dye revives colour whilst being gentle to hair; it helps promote colour evenness and prevents fading for long-lasting, vivid colour. When mixed with the conditioner, it treats the hair fibre to promote healthy-looking strands. Expect smooth, shimmering and radiant tresses with vibrant, revitalised colour.
Masque Chromatique (200ml)
A nourishing hair mask specially developed to enhance and protect the colour intensity of colour-treated or highlighted, thick hair. Promoting prolonged colour vibrancy, the deep conditioning treatment utilises Système Capture Advanced to help neutralise external aggressors that can compromise colour, and a blend of chelators, UV Filters and Vitamin E to help prevent colour fading caused by water particles and oxidative aggressors. Leaving hair feeling soft, supple and smooth with enhanced shine, it contains Rice Bran Oil to emphasise light refraction so hair looks glossy, healthy and vibrant. Expect vivid colour and light-reflecting shine, for longer. Ideal for thick, sensitised, colour-treated or highlighted hair.
name: Reflection Masque Epais and Copper Touche Chromatique Duo

product_description:
使用 Beauty Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions（18 英寸），获得最佳造型效果。这是英国领先的专业接发品牌，深受造型师和名人青睐。
这种易于使用、可自行动手完成的假发旨在为发丝增加体量和长度，使您能够随时变换想要的造型，而无需使用各种专用工具或胶水。
这种轻巧的接发采用手工挑选的 100% 保留雷米角质层的人类发丝制作而成，这意味着您可获得最自然的亮泽发丝。这款接发配有三条带发夹的易于使用的平纬纱带，提供防护硅胶层，以垫起自然头发并防止断裂。 每条发带均采用花边纬纱结构，自然而舒适，便于您层叠混搭发件，实现各种丰盈发型。 - K.N
name: Works Deluxe Clip-In Hair Extensions 18 Inch - Bohemian 18/22

product_description: Christophe Robin 蓝莓抗氧化洗发露 (400ml) 温和清洁头发，让发色更加生动，头发丰盈顺滑。该产品富含玫瑰水和猴面包树叶提取物，并采用啫喱配方，可滋养和强韧秀发，同时它的抗氧化成分和酸性 pH，可防止色素减退，让您的秀发持久保持活力、亮泽。- L.M.
name: Robin 蓝莓抗氧化洗发露 (400ml)

product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results from home with KMS ColorVitality Conditioner; an intensely moisturising formula dedicated to replenishing and revitalising coloured hair.
Harnessing the powers of an AHA Structure Complex and an innovative UV filter, the weightless, colour-preserving conditioner enhances shine and vibrancy as it hydrates and restores radiance from root to tip. Defends against the damaging effects of environmental aggressors to leave hair looking sleek and glossy after use.
name: Color Vitality Conditioner 750ml
